tika-abh04t:4_0: 1. Abhidhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo tassā ādigāthāya tāva payojanasambandhābhidhānapubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-abh04t:4_1: atthaṃ niddhārento uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ nisammakārīnaṃ paṭipatti paresaṃ vividhahitasukhanipphādanappayojanāti
tika-abh04t:4_2: ācariyassāpi dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya ādimhi satthari nipaccakārassa antarāyavisosanatthatā
tika-abh04t:4_5: apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammoti sāmaññavacanopi dhamma-saddo saddantarasannidhānena
tika-abh04t:4_6: idha pariyattivisesavisayo. Saṃvaṇṇīyati attho etāyāti saṃvaṇṇanā, aṭṭhakathā.
tika-abh04t:5_0: Tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammaṃ yathārahamanusāsatīti satthā. Paṇamanaṃ paṇāmo,
tika-abh04t:5_1: kāyavācācittehi satthu guṇaninnatā. Kiriyā karaṇaṃ, paṇāmassa karaṇaṃ paṇāmakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t:5_2: vandanāpayogo. So ca kiñcāpi “idāni adhippetaṃ paṇāmaṃ karonto”tiādinā “tassa pāde
tika-abh04t:5_4: sabbassa thomanāvasena vuttassapi vasena veditabbo. So hi satthu mahākaruṇādiguṇavisesakittanavasena
tika-abh04t:5_6: dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena svākkhātadhamme satthari anuppannasaddhānaṃ saddhājananāya,
tika-abh04t:5_7: uppannasaddhānañca bhiyyobhāvāya hoti. Satthuno ca aviparītadhammadesanabhāvena avitathadesanābhūte
tika-abh04t:5_8: dhammeti etena satthuno mahākaruṇādiguṇānaṃyeva ca phalavisesanipphādanasamatthatāya
tika-abh04t:5_9: pasādāvahataṃ āha. Dhammena hi satthusiddhi, satthārā ca dhammasiddhi, dhammasampattiyāpi
tika-abh04t:6_0: Evaṃ satthari paṇāmakaraṇassa ekaṃ payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni sambandhaṃ vibhāveti
tika-abh04t:6_1: “tadubhayappasādā hī”tiādinā. Na hi satthari dhamme vā appasanno saṃvaṇṇiyamāne tadadhigantabbe
tika-abh04t:6_2: ca dhamme sammā paṭipajjati, nāpi sīlādianupādāparinibbānantaṃ mahantaṃ atthaṃ sādheti,
tika-abh04t:6_4: ca viniyojitena satthari dhamme ca pasāduppādanaṃ satthari paṇāmakaraṇaṃ vihitanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:7_0: Bhagavato guṇasaṃkittanaṃ tassa dhammasaṅghānampi thomanā hotiyevāti vuttaṃ “ratanattayapaṇāmavacana”nti.
tika-abh04t:7_1: Tathā ca vakkhati “bhagavato thomanenevā”tiādi. Vakkhamānaṃ vā “saddhammañcassa pūjetvā”tiādiṃ
tika-abh04t:7_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Viññāpanatthaṃ paresaṃ viññūnanti vā sambandhanīyaṃ. Aviññūnaṃ appamāṇatāya
tika-abh04t:7_3: abhājanatāya ca viññūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Te hi buddhādīsu sagāravassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ jānantā
tika-abh04t:7_4: tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññanti, sammadeva ca naṃ anutiṭṭhantā tadadhippāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:7_5: pūrenti. Idhāpi purimanayeneva sambandho veditabbo pasādaviññāpanādimukhenapi sammāpaṭipattiākaṅkhāya paveditattā.
tika-abh04t:8_0: Ettha ca paṭhamo atthavikappo saddhānusārīnaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena vutto, dutiyo dhammānusārīnaṃ.
tika-abh04t:8_1: Paṭhamo vā asaṃsiddhasatthudhammānaṃ vasena vutto, dutiyo saṃsiddhasatthudhammānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:8_2: Tathā paṭhamo paṭhame ratane paṇāmakiriyādassanaparo, dutiyo itaresupīti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-abh04t:9_0: Paṇāmo karīyati etāyāti paṇāmakaraṇaṃ, paṇāmakiriyābhinipphādikā cetanā. Sā hi khettasampattiyā
tika-abh04t:9_2: kammassa balānuppadānavasena purimakammanipphannassa vipākasantānassa antarā vemajjhe
tika-abh04t:9_3: āyanti āpatantīti antarāyāti laddhanāmānaṃ rogādianatthānaṃ vidhāyakassa upapīḷakassa
tika-abh04t:9_4: upacchedakassa vā kammassa viddhaṃsanasamattho puññātisayoti imamatthaṃ dasseti “ratanattayapaṇāma…pe…
tika-abh04t:9_5: visesabhāvato”ti. Evañca katvā rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvavacanena antarāyassa kāraṇabhūtāya
tika-abh04t:9_7: sabbhāvassa, “sabyāpajjhāya pajāya abyāpajjho viharatī”ti vacanena diṭṭheva dhamme
tika-abh04t:10_1: tehi paṇāmavisayassa paṇāmārahabhāvavibhāvanena sātisayo vacīpaṇāmo vihitoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:10_2: Guṇavisesavā hītiādinā ācariyassa yuttapattakāritaṃ dasseti. Desanā vinayapiṭaketi
tika-abh04t:10_3: ettha nanu vinayapiṭakassapi desanābhāvato desanāvinayapiṭakānaṃ bhedavacanaṃ na
tika-abh04t:10_4: yuttanti? No na yuttaṃ “tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā”ti ettha viya
tika-abh04t:10_5: samudāyadesanāya avayavadesanānaṃ ādhārabhāvato. Desanākāle vā manasā vavatthāpitāya
tika-abh04t:10_6: vinayatantiyā vinayapiṭakabhāvato tadatthapaññāpanassa ca desanābhāvato bhedavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:10_7: Atha vā desīyati etenāti desanā, desanāsamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo, tassa ca vinayapiṭakavisayo
tika-abh04t:10_8: karuṇāpubbaṅgamo ca soti evamettha bhedavacanopapatti daṭṭhabbā. Suttantapiṭaketiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-abh04t:11_0: Kathaṃ pana bhagavato desanā vinayapiṭake karuṇāppadhānā, suttābhidhammapiṭakesu
tika-abh04t:11_6: paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī, tatopi karuṇāya kiccaṃ adhikanti adhippāyena
tika-abh04t:11_7: vuttaṃ “vinayapiṭake karuṇāppadhānā”ti. Karuṇābyāpārādhikatāya hi desanāya karuṇāppadhānatā,
tika-abh04t:11_11: pavattitoti paññāppadhānatā. Teneva ca kāraṇenātiādinā desanānurūpataṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-abh04t:12_0: Kusalā rūpaṃ cakkhumā dasa dāḷimādi samūhavasena atthānavabodhanattho viya atthāvabodhanattho
tika-abh04t:12_1: hi saddappayogo attaparādhīno kevalo atthapadatthako, so padatthavipariyesakārinā
tika-abh04t:12_2: iti-saddena saddapadatthako jāyatīti āha “karuṇā viyāti nidassanavacana”nti. Nidassanañhi
tika-abh04t:12_3: nāma nidassitabbadhamme tena ca sambandhe sati hoti, nāññathāti tassa nidassanabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:13_1: savisesanehi saha pakāsanavasena gāthāya atthatatvaṃ dassetvā avayavabhedavasena
tika-abh04t:13_2: atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kiratīti karuṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nicchandarāgānaṃ bhūtapubbagatiyā
tika-abh04t:13_3: vā sattatā veditabbā. Ekassapi dhammassa anekasāmaññākāravantatāya “yathāsabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:13_4: pakārehī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “sabbe dhammā sabbākārenā”ti dhammānaṃ aññeyyattaṃ
tika-abh04t:13_5: paṭikkhipati ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattābhāvato. Etena tassā paññāya akicchavuttitaṃ āha.
tika-abh04t:13_6: Yatheva hi “ñeyyesu sabbesu pavattitthā”ti ettāvatā adhippetatthe siddhe tesaṃ attattaniyatāvirahasaṃsūcanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:13_7: paresaṃ sattādimicchāgāhapaṭisedhanena dhamma-saddena ñeyyā visesitabbā, evaṃ “dhammesu
tika-abh04t:13_8: sabbesu pavattitthā”ti ettāvatā ca adhippetatthe siddhe dhammesu tassā paññāya ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhatāya
tika-abh04t:13_9: akicchavuttitaṃ dassetuṃ aññeyyattapaṭisedhanena ñeyya-saddena dhammā visesitāti.
tika-abh04t:13_10: Ñeyyadhamma-saddā nīluppalasaddā viya aññamaññaṃ bhedābhedayuttāti “ñeyyā ca te dhammā
tika-abh04t:13_11: cā”ti vuttaṃ. Yā yāti yathā-saddassatthaṃ dasseti. Byāpanicchāyañhi ayaṃ yathā-saddo,
tika-abh04t:14_0: Bhagavati pavattāvāti idaṃ yebhuyyena upamānopameyyatthānaṃ bhinnādhāratāya bhinnādhārassa
tika-abh04t:14_1: ca upamānatthassa idha asambhavato vuttaṃ. Bhagavato karuṇāya aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvo
tika-abh04t:14_2: satte saṃsāradukkhato uddharitvā accantasukhe nibbāne patiṭṭhapetuṃ attano sarīrajīvitapariccāgenapi
tika-abh04t:14_4: kataṃ, yañca yadime sattā jāneyyuṃ, bhagavato sāsanena rahadamiva sītalaṃ sampajjalitaṃ
tika-abh04t:14_5: aggikkhandhampi samogāheyya. Aññesaṃ passantānanti sambandho. Uddhaṭāti padaṃ apekkhitvā
tika-abh04t:14_6: mahoghapakkhandānaṃ sattānanti kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – kāmādimahoghapakkhande
tika-abh04t:14_7: satte tato uddhaṭā natthañño koci maṃ ṭhapetvāti passato yathā bhagavato karuṇāya
tika-abh04t:14_8: āvisanaṃ hoti, na evaṃ aññesaṃ tathādassanasseva abhāvato. Atha vā aññesaṃ passantānanti
tika-abh04t:14_9: yadipi pare passeyyuṃ, tathāpi na tesaṃ bhagavato viya karuṇokkamanaṃ atthi appaṭipattito
tika-abh04t:15_0: Anāvaraṇā tīsu kālesu sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya, asādhāraṇā sabbadhammānaṃ niravasesahetupaccayapariggahavasena
tika-abh04t:15_5: veditabbā. Ayañca attho bhagavato anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇādivasena
tika-abh04t:15_6: veditabbo. Yathā ca passantassāti idaṃ rāgaggiādīhi lokasannivāsassa ādittatādiākāradassanaṃ
tika-abh04t:15_7: bhagavato mahākaruṇokkamanupāyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ
tika-abh04t:15_8: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati. “Āditto lokasannivāso…pe… uyyutto…pe…
tika-abh04t:15_9: payāto…pe… kummaggappaṭipanno…pe… upanīyati loko adhuvo…pe… atāṇo loko anabhissaro…pe…
tika-abh04t:15_10: assako loko sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ…pe… ūno loko atitto taṇhādāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:15_11: bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”tiādinā paṭisambhidāmagge parosataṃ ākārehi
tika-abh04t:15_12: dassitanti ganthavitthāraṃ pariharituṃ saṃvaṇṇayituñca upāyaṃ dassetuṃ āha “taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-abh04t:15_14: yamakapāṭihāriya sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇāni sesāsādhāraṇañāṇāni. Tesampi hi vibhaṅgo
tika-abh04t:15_15: “idha tathāgato satte passati apparajakkhe”tiādinā paṭisambhidāmagge nānappakārena
tika-abh04t:15_16: dassitoti purimanayeneva atidisati. Ādi-saddena tattha vibhattānaṃ paṭisambhidāsaccañāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:16_0: Nippadesasappadesavisayā karuṇā viya bhagavato paññāpi idha nippadesasappadesavisayā
tika-abh04t:16_1: niravasesā adhippetāti tassā katipayabhedadassanena nayato tadavasiṭṭhabhedā gahetabbāti
tika-abh04t:16_2: dassento “paññāggahaṇena cā”tiādimāha. Te pana sīlasamādhi paññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassana,
tika-abh04t:16_4: sāmaññaphala ariyavaṃsādi, pañcagati pañcapadhāniyaṅgapañcaṅgikasamādhi indriya bala
tika-abh04t:16_6: anussatiṭṭhāna agāravagārava nissāraṇiyadhātu satatavihāra anuttariya nibbedhabhāgiyapaññādi,
tika-abh04t:16_7: sattaaparihāniyadhamma ariyadhana bojjhaṅga sappurisadhammanijjaravatthu saññā dakkhiṇeyyapuggalakhīṇāsavabalādi,
tika-abh04t:16_8: aṭṭhapaññāpaṭilābhahetu micchatta sammatta lokadhamma ariyānariyavohāra ārambhavatthu
tika-abh04t:16_10: sattāvāsa āghātavatthu āghātapaṭivinaya saññānānatta anupubbavihārādi, dasanāthakaradhamma
tika-abh04t:16_11: kasiṇāyatana akusalakammapatha kusalakammapatha micchatta sammatta ariyavāsa dasabalañāṇa
tika-abh04t:16_12: asekkhadhammādi, ekādasamettānisaṃsa sīlānisaṃsa dhammatā buddhihetu, dvādasāyatanapaṭiccasamuppāda
tika-abh04t:16_14: soḷasaānāpānassati saccākāra suttantapaṭṭhāna, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammadhātu bhedakaravatthu,
tika-abh04t:16_18: ye ca anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānapavicayadesanākārappavattā, ye ca anantāsu lokadhātūsu
tika-abh04t:16_20: paññāpabhedā, sabbepi idha ādi-saddena nayato saṅgayhantīti veditabbaṃ. Ko hi samattho
tika-abh04t:16_21: bhagavato paññāya pabhede anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ. Teneva bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-abh04t:17_0: Saṃsāramahoghapakkhandānaṃ sattānaṃ tato santāraṇatthaṃ paṭipanno tehi payojito nāma
tika-abh04t:17_1: hoti asatipi tesaṃ tathāvidhe abhisandhiyanti vuttaṃ “sattā hi mahābodhiṃ payojentī”ti.
tika-abh04t:17_2: Etena sabbenāti mahābodhimūlādidassanena. Apagamanaṃ nirupakkilesanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:17_3: Jātasaṃvaddhabhāvadassanena “anādi anidhano ca satto”ti evaṃpakārā micchāvādā paṭisedhitā
tika-abh04t:17_4: honti. Samaññā…pe… dasseti satte paramatthato asatipi sattapaññattivohārasūcanato.
tika-abh04t:17_5: Karuṇā ādipaññā pariyosānanti idaṃ sambharaṇanipphattikālāpekkhāya vuttaṃ, na paricchedavantatāya.
tika-abh04t:17_6: Tenevāha “tannidānabhāvato tato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato”ti. Sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā
tika-abh04t:17_7: honti nayato dassitattā. Eso eva hi anavasesato buddhaguṇadassanupāyo yadidaṃ nayaggāhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t:17_8: Paradhanaharaṇāditopi virati paresaṃ anatthapariharaṇavasappavattiyā siyā karuṇūpanissayāti
tika-abh04t:17_9: karuṇānidānaṃ sīlaṃ. Tato eva “tato pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:18_1: pana vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Abbhantaraṃ niyakajjhattaṃ, tato bahibhūtaṃ bāhiraṃ.
tika-abh04t:18_2: Dayāti karuṇā adhippetāti dayā-saddassa mettākaruṇānaṃ vācakattā vakkhamānañca anuyogaṃ
tika-abh04t:18_3: manasi katvā vuttaṃ. Tāya hi samussāhito, na mettāyāti adhippāyo. Pubbe vuttassa
tika-abh04t:18_4: paṭiniddeso hotīti ta-saddassa atthaṃ āha. Tanti paññaṃ visesetvā upamābhāvena vinivattā
tika-abh04t:18_5: caritatthatāya. Paṭiniddesaṃ nārahati padhānāpadhānesu padhāne kiccadassanato. Dvinnaṃ
tika-abh04t:18_6: padānaṃ…pe… vatoti karuṇāvācinā dayā-saddena ekādhikaraṇabhāvena vuccamāno ta-saddo
tika-abh04t:18_7: tato aññadhammavisayo bhavituṃ na yuttoti adhippāyo. Apariyāyasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo
tika-abh04t:18_8: visesanavisesitabbabhāve sati hoti, nāññathāti āha “samānā…pe… hotī”ti. Samānādhikaraṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:18_9: hettha visesanavisesitabbabhāvo sādhīyati, sā ca samānādhikaraṇatā visiṭṭhavibhattikānaṃ
tika-abh04t:18_10: na hotīti samānavibhattitāyapi tameva sādhīyatīti “dayā…pe… cida”nti idaṃ dayāya
tika-abh04t:18_11: visesitabbabhāve kāraṇavacanaṃ. Padhānatāya hi sāmaññatāya ca sā visesitabbā jātā.
tika-abh04t:18_12: Tattha bhagavato tadaññesañca karuṇānaṃ vācakattā sāmaññatā veditabbā. Tassa cāti
tika-abh04t:18_14: pana kevalaṃ avatvā dayāvisesanabhāvena vuttattā appadhānāyapi karuṇāya paṭiniddeso
tika-abh04t:18_15: yuttoti dasseti. Appadhānatā ca karuṇāya purimagāthāya vasena vuttā, idha pana padhānā
tika-abh04t:19_0: Kathaṃ pana…pe… ñātabbāti vakkhamānaññeva atthaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā codeti. Yadi evanti
tika-abh04t:19_1: yadi aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyaṃ aggahetvā vacanamattameva gaṇhasi. Mettāti ca na yujjeyyāti
tika-abh04t:19_2: yathā “mettacittataṃ āpanno”ti etissā aṭṭhakathāya vasena na dayā karuṇā, evaṃ “nikkaruṇataṃ
tika-abh04t:19_3: āpanno”ti etissā aṭṭhakathāya vasena na dayā mettāti vacanamattaggahaṇe aṭṭhakathānampi
tika-abh04t:19_4: virodhaṃ dasseti. “Adhippāyavasena yojetabbo”ti vatvā tameva adhippāyaṃ dayā-saddo
tika-abh04t:19_5: hītiādinā vivarati. Akkharacintakā hi dayā-saddaṃ dānagatirakkhaṇesu paṭhanti. Anurakkhaṇañca
tika-abh04t:19_7: dayā-saddo pavattatīti vuttaṃ. Antonītanti antogadhaṃ, rukkhattho viya dhavakhadirādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:19_8: anurakkhaṇattho mettākaruṇānaṃ sāmaññanti attho, adhippāyo pana “dayāpanno”ti ettha
tika-abh04t:19_9: sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti anantaraṃ karuṇāya vuttattā dayā-saddo mettāpariyāyoti
tika-abh04t:19_10: viññāyati. Mettāpi hi karuṇā viya pāṇātipātaviratiyā kāraṇanti. “Adayāpanno”ti ettha
tika-abh04t:19_11: pana kāruṇiko avihiṃ sajjhāsayattā paresaṃ vihesāmattampi na karoti, ko pana vādo
tika-abh04t:19_12: pāṇātipātaneti nikkaruṇatāya pāṇātipātitā dassitāti veditabbā. Etamevatthaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh04t:19_13: “evañhi aṭṭhakathānaṃ avirodho hotī”ti āha. Yadi dayā-saddo mettākaruṇānaṃ vācako,
tika-abh04t:19_14: evampikathaṃ pana karuṇā “dayā”ti jānitabbāti anuyogo tadavattho evāti codanaṃ manasi
tika-abh04t:19_15: katvā karuṇā ca desanāyātiādinā karuṇāya eva gahaṇe kāraṇamāha.
tika-abh04t:20_0: Nanu tāyātiādinā sāmatthiyatopi pakaraṇaṃ balavanti pakaraṇavaseneva karuṇāvisayassa
tika-abh04t:20_1: ñātataṃ dasseti. Yathāruci pavattitthāti etaṃ purimagāthāya sappadesanippadesasattavisayāya
tika-abh04t:20_2: karuṇāya gahitabhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yathārucipavatti hi ekasmiṃ anekesu ca icchānurūpappavattīti.
tika-abh04t:20_3: “Idha pana nippadesasattavisayataṃ gahetu”nti etena siddhe sati ārambho ñāpakattho
tika-abh04t:20_4: hotīti puna “sattesū”ti vacanaṃ imamatthavisesaṃ bodhetīti dasseti. Na devesuyevātiādināpi
tika-abh04t:20_6: tassa nippadesasattavisayabhāvo adhippetoti imaṃ visesaṃ ñāpetīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:21_1: Avasānamhi vasanto tidasālayeti vacanatoti etena tassa pāṭihāriyassa saddantarasannidhānena
tika-abh04t:21_2: avacchinnataṃ dasseti. Tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkāti puthujjanasantānepi rāgādipaṭipakkhaharaṇassa
tika-abh04t:21_3: abhāvato nicchandarāgesu sattavohāro viya puthujjanasantāne rāgādipaṭipakkhaharaṇavasena
tika-abh04t:21_4: pavattaṃ tadabhāvepi bhagavato santāne ruḷhīvasena pāṭihāriyantveva vuccatīti na
tika-abh04t:21_5: sakkā vattunti adhippāyo. Diṭṭhiharaṇavasena ye sammādiṭṭhikā jātā acelakakassapādayo
tika-abh04t:21_6: viya, diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena appaṭibhānabhāvādippattiyā saccakādayo viya.
tika-abh04t:22: 3. Sītapabbatā nāma “sineruṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā yugandharo…pe… giri brahā”ti evaṃ vuttapabbatā.
tika-abh04t:23_0: 4-5. Sabbaso cakkavāḷasahassehi sabbaso āgamma sabbaso sannisinnenāti sambandhavasena
tika-abh04t:23_1: tayo vikappā yuttā, sabbaso cakkavāḷasahassehi dasahi dasahīti pana aniṭṭhasādhanato
tika-abh04t:23_2: paṭisedhito. Vajjitabbeti ye vajjetuṃ sakkā “atisammukhā atisamīpaṃ unnatappadeso”ti,
tika-abh04t:23_3: ete. Itare pana tassā parisāya mahantabhāvena na sakkā pariharituṃ.
tika-abh04t:24_1: attanā paṭividdhākārassa dhammasāmināpi paresaṃ desetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ. Aññathā
tika-abh04t:24_2: sabbepi sattā diṭṭhasaccā eva bhaveyyuṃ. Sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvajānanasamatthatādiyeva
tika-abh04t:24_3: yathāvuttabalaṃ. Tesaṃ gahaṇasamatthataṃ dīpeti, adhikavacanamaññamatthaṃ bodhetīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:26_1: anuppattikaraṇanti veditabbaṃ. Atthaṃ pakāsayissāmīti sambandhoti “sosetvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāya
tika-abh04t:27_0: 8. Dukkarabhāvaṃ dīpetunti adukkarassa tathāabhiyācetabbatābhāvatoti adhippāyo. Pārājikasaṅghādisesānaṃ
tika-abh04t:27_2: tathā yojanā katā, tathā cārittasīlassa ācārasabhāvattā itaraṃ sabhāveneva gahetvā
tika-abh04t:27_4: sādaraṃ abhiyācitena tena ca abhidhammatthappakāsane samatthoti yāthāvato pamāṇitena
tika-abh04t:28: 9. Devadeva-saddassa attho paṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāṭīkāyaṃ vipañcitoti na vitthārayimha.
tika-abh04t:29_0: 13. Paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ yā aṭṭhakathā saṅgītāti vacanena sā bhagavato dharamānakālepi
tika-abh04t:29_1: aṭṭhakathā saṃvijjati, tena pāṭho viya bhagavaṃmūlikāvāti viññāyati. “Abhidhammassā”ti
tika-abh04t:29_2: padaṃ “atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti etadapekkhanti “kassa pana sā aṭṭhakathā”ti pucchitvā
tika-abh04t:29_3: adhikāravasena tameva abhidhammapadaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Āvuttiādivasena vā ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
tika-abh04t:30_1: tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādo ādi-saddena vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamenti,
tika-abh04t:30_3: saṅgayhanti. Tappakāsanenevāti abhidhammassa atthappakāsaneneva. Soti mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:30_4: vinicchayo. Tathāti asammissānākulabhāvena. Asammissānākulabhūto vā vinicchayo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:30_5: santakabhāvena, etena abhidhammassa atthappakāsaneneva mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayo
tika-abh04t:30_6: idha abhinipphādīyatīti dasseti. Atha vā tappakāsanenevāti asammissānākulabhāvappakāsaneneva.
tika-abh04t:30_7: Soti pakāsiyamāno abhidhammattho. Tathāti mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayabhāvena. Imasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:31: 17. Aññañca sabbaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ hotīti tosanaṃ hotīti attho. Tenevāha “sabbena tena tosanaṃ kataṃ hotī”ti. Yuttarūpā yojanā.
tika-abh04t:34_0: Paricchedo sattappakaraṇabhāvo. Sanniveso sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ tadavayavānañca vavatthānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:34_1: Sāgarehi tathā cintāti “imassa abhidhammassa gambhīrabhāvavijānanatthaṃ cattāro sāgarā
tika-abh04t:34_2: veditabbā”tiādinā nayena jalasāgarādīhi saha nayasāgaravicāro. “Satabhāgena sahassabhāgena
tika-abh04t:34_3: dhammantarā dhammantaraṃ saṅkamitvā saṅkamitvā desesī”tiādinā desanābhedehi abhidhammassa
tika-abh04t:35_0: “Evaṃ temāsaṃ nirantaraṃ desentassā”tiādinā desanākāle bhagavato sarīrassa yāpitākāravicāro
tika-abh04t:35_1: desanā…pe… gahaṇaṃ. Tathā therassa…pe…pi cāti “abhidhamme vācanāmaggo nāmā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:35_2: abhidhamme vācanāmaggassa sāriputtattherasambandhitatā tassa ca teneva uppāditatā.
tika-abh04t:35_3: Yo hi bhagavatā devatānaṃ desitākāro, so aparicchinnavāranayatantitāya ananto aparimāṇo
tika-abh04t:35_4: na bhikkhūnaṃ vācanāyoggo, yo ca therassa desitākāro, so atisaṃkhittatāya. Nātisaṅkhepanātivitthārabhūto
tika-abh04t:36_0: Vacanatthavijānanenātiādinā kusalā dhammātiādipadānaññeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ akatvā abhidhamma-saddavicārassa
tika-abh04t:36_1: sambandhamāha. “Ye te mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā. Seyyathidaṃ – cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe…
tika-abh04t:36_2: sikkhitaṃ sikkhiṃsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā”tiādisuttavasena kiñcāpi bodhipakkhiyadhammā
tika-abh04t:36_3: “abhidhammo”ti vuccanti, dhamma-saddo ca samādhiādīsu diṭṭhappayogo, pariyattidhammo
tika-abh04t:36_4: eva pana idha adhippetoti dassento “suttantādhikā pāḷīti attho”ti āha. Tattha dhammabyabhicārabhāvena
tika-abh04t:36_5: visesato abhidhammo viya suttantopi “dhammo”ti vuccati. “Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo
tika-abh04t:36_6: ca vinayo ca desito paññatto”tiādīsu aññattha ca sambhavato abhi-saddena nivattetabbatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:36_7: dīpetuṃ “suttantā”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu ca atirekavisesaṭṭhā bhinnasabhāvā yato te yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh04t:36_9: bhavitabbaṃ, na ekavacanenāti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “dvinnampi…pe… ekavacananiddeso kato”ti.
tika-abh04t:37_0: Payogameva nārahati upasagga-saddānaṃ dhātu-saddasseva purato payojanīyattā. Athāpi
tika-abh04t:37_1: payujjeyya atimālādīsu ati-saddādayo viya. Evampi yathā “atimālā”ti ettha samāsavasena
tika-abh04t:37_2: anāvibhūtāya kamanakiriyāya visesako ati-saddo, na mālāya, evamidhāpi abhi-saddo
tika-abh04t:37_3: na dhammavisesako yuttoti adhippāyo. Aññassapi hi upasaggassāti idaṃ ruḷhīvasena,
tika-abh04t:37_4: atthe upasajjatīti vā upasaggassa anvatthasaññataṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Atichattādīsu
tika-abh04t:37_5: hi ati-saddo idha upasaggoti adhippeto. Tattha yathā kalyāṇo pūjito vā puriso atipurisoti
tika-abh04t:37_6: bhavati, evaṃ atirekavisesaṭṭhānampi kalyāṇapūjitatthabhāvasambhavato kalyāṇaṃ vā
tika-abh04t:37_7: pūjitaṃ vā chattaṃ atichattanti saddanayo veditabbo. Kalyāṇapūjitabhāvā hi guṇavisesayogena
tika-abh04t:37_8: icchitabbā. Guṇaviseso cesa yadidaṃ pamāṇātireko ca vicittarūpatā ca. Evañca pana
tika-abh04t:37_9: katvā “akiriyāyapī”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati. Yathā ca atichattādīsu, evaṃ abhidhamma-saddepi
tika-abh04t:37_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Anekatthā hi nipātāti. Tabbhāvadīpakattāti atirekavisesabhāvadīpakattā.
tika-abh04t:38_0: Ekato anāgatattāti idaṃ suttante ekato āgatānaṃ khandhāyatanādīnaṃ suttantabhājanīyassa
tika-abh04t:38_1: diṭṭhattā “cha imāni, bhikkhave, indriyānī”tiādinā cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ itthindriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:38_2: tiṇṇaṃ sukhindriyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ saddhindriyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīnañca
tika-abh04t:38_3: tiṇṇaṃ vasena visuṃ visuṃ suttantabhāvena āgatattā ekasuttabhāvena anāgatānaṃ bāvīsatiyā
tika-abh04t:38_4: indriyānaṃ suttantabhājanīyassa adiṭṭhattā ca vuttaṃ, na suttante ekato āgamanassa
tika-abh04t:38_5: suttantabhājanīyassa kāraṇattā. Suttante ekato sabbena sabbañca anāgatā hi bhūmantaraparicchedapaṭisambhidā
tika-abh04t:38_6: suttantabhājanīyavasena vibhattā dissanti, ekato āgatāni ca sikkhāpadāni tathā na
tika-abh04t:38_7: vibhattāni. Veramaṇīnaṃ viya pana sabhāvakiccādivibhāgavinimutto bāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ
tika-abh04t:38_8: samāno vibhajanappakāro natthi, yo suttantabhājanīyaṃ siyāti indriyavibhaṅge suttantabhājanīyaṃ
tika-abh04t:39_0: Yadipi paccayadhammavinimutto paccayabhāvo nāma natthi, yathā pana pavatto paccayadhammo
tika-abh04t:39_1: paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayo hoti, so tassa pavattiākāraviseso hetuādibhāvo tato
tika-abh04t:39_2: añño viya paccayadhammassa paccayabhāvoti vutto, so ca “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:39_3: padhānabhāvena vutto. Tattha ca guṇībhūtā hetuhetuphalabhūtā avijjāsaṅkhārādayoti
tika-abh04t:39_5: khandhādīnaṃ khandhavibhaṅgādīsu pañhapucchakanayo dassito, na ito aññathāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:40_0: Suttante saṅgītisuttantādike. Pañca sikkhāpadāni pāṇātipātā…pe… pamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇīti
tika-abh04t:40_1: evaṃ uddiṭṭhāni. Añño pana veramaṇīnaṃ vibhajitabbappakāro natthīti idaṃ atītāniccādivibhāgo
tika-abh04t:40_2: veramaṇīnaṃ khandhāyatanādīsu antogadhattā tabbaseneva vijānitabbo, tato pana añño
tika-abh04t:40_3: abhidhammanayavidhuro veramaṇīnaṃ vibhajitabbappakāro natthīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:40_4: Tathā ca paṭisambhidāmagge “cakkhuṃ aniccaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ anicca”nti anupadadhammasammasanakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:41_0: Nanu dhammasaṅgaṇīdhātukathādīnampi vasena abhidhammapāḷiyā atirekavisesabhāvo dassetabboti?
tika-abh04t:41_1: Saccametaṃ, so pana ekantaabhidhammanayanissito avuttopi siddhoti katvā na dassito.
tika-abh04t:41_2: Etena vā nidassanena sopi sabbo netabbo. Abhidhammanayasāmaññena vā abhidhammabhājanīyapañhapucchakehi
tika-abh04t:41_3: so vutto evāti na vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t:42_0: Pañhavārāti pucchanavissajjanavasena pavattā pāḷinayā. Etthevāti dhammahadayavibhaṅge
tika-abh04t:42_1: eva. Apekkhāvasikattā appamahantabhāvassa yato appamattikā mahādhātukathātanti dhammahadayavibhaṅgavacanavasena
tika-abh04t:42_2: avasesā, taṃ dassanatthaṃ “dhammahadayavibhaṅge anāgantvā mahādhammahadaye āgatatantito”ti
tika-abh04t:42_3: vuttaṃ. Dhammahadaya…pe… āgatatantito rūpakaṇḍadhātuvibhaṅgādīsu anāgantvā mahādhātukathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:42_4: āgatatanti appamattikāvāti sambandho. Atha dhātukathāya vitthārakathā mahādhātukathā
tika-abh04t:42_5: dhammahadayavibhaṅge anāgantvā mahādhammahadaye āgatatantito dhātukathāyaṃ anāgantvā
tika-abh04t:43_3: “upalabbhati nupalabbhatīti paṭiññāya gahitāya paṭikkhepaggahaṇattha”nti ānetvā sambandhanīyaṃ,
tika-abh04t:43_4: tathā sabbadā sabbesūti etthāpi. Yadi khandhāyatanādayo gahitā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena,
tika-abh04t:43_5: atha pana vuttanti sambandho. Yo saccikaṭṭhoti saccikaṭṭhanissayaṃ upalakkheti. Etehīti
tika-abh04t:43_6: etehi vacanehi. Saccikaṭṭhadesakālappadesehi kathaṃ saccikaṭṭhādīnaṃ padeso ekadesabhūto
tika-abh04t:43_7: sabboti vuccati? Padesānaṃ puthuttā. “Sabbesu padesesū”ti paccekaṃ bhedāmasanavasena
tika-abh04t:43_8: cāyaṃ pañho pavattoti na purimehi avaseso.
tika-abh04t:44_1: anulomapaṭilomato paṭiññāṭhapananiggahapāpanāropanānañca vasena pavattā tanti paṭhamapañcakassa
tika-abh04t:44_2: ekaṃ aṅgaṃ eko avayavoti attho. Evaṃ sesesupi netabbaṃ. Niggahassa suniggahabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:44_3: icchato sakavādino “tvaṃ ce pana maññasi vattabbe kho puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:44_4: paṭiññāṭhapanena, tena “tava tattha hetāya paṭiññāya hevaṃ paṭijānanto hevaṃ niggahetabbe
tika-abh04t:44_5: atha taṃ niggaṇhāma suniggahito ca hotī”ti vatvā “hañci puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:44_6: paravādino attano paṭikammaṃ yathā sakavādī na nibbeṭheti, evaṃ karaṇaṃ paṭikammaveṭhanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:44_7: Paravādino paṭikammassa duppaṭikammabhāvaṃ icchato sakavādino taṃnidassanena “eso
tika-abh04t:44_8: ce dunniggahito heva”nti paṭikammanidassanena, “vattabbe kho puggalo upalabbhati…pe…
tika-abh04t:44_9: paramatthenāti. No ca mayaṃ tayā tattha hetāya paṭiññāya hevaṃ paṭijānanto hevaṃ
tika-abh04t:44_10: niggahetabbā. Atha amhe niggaṇhāsi dunniggahitā ca homā”ti vatvā “hañci puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:44_12: “Tena hi yaṃ niggaṇhāsi hañci puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādiṃ vatvā “tena hi ye kate niggahe
tika-abh04t:44_13: se niggahe dukkaṭe sukate paṭikamme sukatā paṭipādanā”ti sakavādino niggahassa, aniggahabhāvāropanena
tika-abh04t:44_14: attano paṭikammassa supaṭikammabhāvakaraṇena ca sakavādino niggahassa chedo vināsanaṃ
tika-abh04t:44_15: puggalavādanisedhanavasena samuṭṭhitattā. Dhammatāya anulomanavasena uṭṭhahitvā tabbilomanavasena
tika-abh04t:45_0: Tadādhāroti te saccikaṭṭhaparamatthā rūpādayo ādhārā etassāti tadādhāro. Etena “rūpasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:45_1: attā”ti evaṃpakāro puggalavādo dassito hoti. Tesaṃ vā ādhārabhūtoti etena “attani
tika-abh04t:45_2: rūpa”nti evaṃpakāro. Aññatra vā tehīti tehi rūpādīhi vinā. Ādhārādheyyādibhāvena
tika-abh04t:45_3: asaṃsaṭṭho visuṃyeva vinā. Tena sattādiguṇehi avokiṇṇo purisoti evamādiko. Taṃsāmibhūtatāya
tika-abh04t:45_4: vā tadadhīnabhāvena “aññatra vā tehī”ti vuttanti “rūpavā attā”ti evaṃpakāro puggalavādo
tika-abh04t:45_5: dassitoti veditabbo. Anaññoti etena “rūpaṃ attā”ti evaṃpakāro. Ruppanādisabhāvo rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:45_6: visesalakkhaṇaṃ, sappaccayādisabhāvo sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ. Rūpādito añño anañño vā aññatte
tika-abh04t:45_7: ca tadādhārādibhūto upalabbhamāno āpajjatīti anuyuñjati sakavādī pakārantarassa asambhavato.
tika-abh04t:45_8: Puggalavādī puggalassa rūpādīhi na aññattaṃ icchati rūpādi viya paccakkhato anumānato
tika-abh04t:45_9: vā gāhayituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tassa ca kārakavedakabhāvassa ayujjamānakattā. Nāpi anaññattaṃ
tika-abh04t:45_10: ruppanasappaccayādisabhāvappasaṅgato puggalasseva abhāvappasaṅgato ca. Yatheva hi
tika-abh04t:45_11: na vinā indhanena aggi paññāpiyati, na ca aññaṃ indhanato aggiṃ sakkā paṭijānituṃ,
tika-abh04t:45_12: nāpi anaññaṃ. Yadi hi añño siyā, na uṇhaṃ indhanaṃ siyā. Atha anañño, niddahitabbaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:45_13: dāhakaṃ siyā. Evameva na vinā rūpādīhi puggalo paññāpiyati, na ca tehi añño, nāpi
tika-abh04t:45_14: anañño sassatucchedabhāvappasaṅgatoti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā puggalavādī “na hevā”ti paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh04t:45_15: Tattha aggindhanopamā tāva yadi lokavohārena vuttā, apaḷittaṃ kaṭṭhādiindhanaṃ niddahitabbañca,
tika-abh04t:45_16: paḷittaṃ bhāsuruṇhaṃ aggi dāhakañca, tañca ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ purimapacchimakālikaṃ
tika-abh04t:45_17: aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ, yadi evaṃ puggalo rūpādīhi añño anicco ca āpanno.
tika-abh04t:45_18: Atha paramatthato, tasmiṃyeva kaṭṭhādike paḷitte yaṃ usumaṃ so aggi, taṃsahajātāni
tika-abh04t:45_19: tīṇi bhūtāni indhanaṃ, evampi siddhaṃ lakkhaṇabhedato aggindhanānaṃ aññattanti aggi
tika-abh04t:45_20: viya indhanato rūpādīhi añño puggalo anicco ca āpannoti byāhatāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:46_0: Puggalo upalabbhatīti paṭijānantassa pakārantarassa asambhavato vuttesu pakāresu
tika-abh04t:46_1: ekena pakārena upalabbhamāno upalabbhatīti “āpanna”nti vuttaṃ “paṭiññāya ekattāpanna”nti.
tika-abh04t:46_2: Ekattāpannattā eva appaṭikkhipitabbaṃ, puggale paṭisiddhe tadabhinivesopi ayāthāvato
tika-abh04t:46_3: puggalavādino gahitākārasuññatāvibhāvanena sakaṭṭhānato cāvito paṭisedhito eva nāma
tika-abh04t:46_4: hotīti vuttaṃ “puggaladiṭṭhiṃ paṭisedhento”ti. Puggaloyeva vā tathā passitabbattā
tika-abh04t:46_5: diṭṭhi. “Sāmī nivāsī kārako vedako nicco dhuvo”ti abhinivesavisayabhūto hi parikappamattasiddho
tika-abh04t:46_6: puggalo idha paṭikkhipīyati, “na cattārome, bhikkhave, puggalā”tiādinā vuttavohārapuggaloti
tika-abh04t:46_7: ananuyogo ākāsakusumassa rattanīlādibhāvavicāraṇā viyāti attho. Pubbe “nupalabbhatī”ti
tika-abh04t:46_8: paṭijānitvā visesacodanāya anāpajjanato puna “na hevā”ti paṭikkhepo paṭiññāya āpajjanaleso.
tika-abh04t:46_9: Vañjhāputtakassa dīgharassatānuyogassa viya sabbena sabbaṃ paramatthato anupalabbhamānassa
tika-abh04t:46_10: puggalassa rūpādīhi aññānaññatānuyogassa ananuyogabhāvo eva idha aviparītattho.
tika-abh04t:47_0: Yaṃkāraṇāti etena “yatonidāna”nti ettha vibhattialopo daṭṭhabboti dasseti. Ajjhācarantīti
tika-abh04t:47_1: abhibhavanti. Abhinandanādayo taṇhādīhi yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojetabbā, taṇhādiṭṭhīhi vā
tika-abh04t:47_2: abhinandanajjhosānāni, tīhipi abhivadanaṃ avisesena vā tīhipi tayo yojetabbā. Ettha
tika-abh04t:47_3: ce natthi abhinanditabbantiādinā abhinandanādīnaṃ abhāvasūcanena phalūpacārato abhinandanādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:47_4: samucchedapaṭippassaddhibhūtaṃ maggaphalaṃ vuccati, taṃ paccāmasanañca esevāti idanti
tika-abh04t:48_0: “Ñāyatīti jāna”nti ukkaṃsagativijānanena niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggayhatīti tabbisayāya
tika-abh04t:48_2: jānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā pakaraṇavasena, “bhagavā”ti saddantarasannidhānena vā ayaṃ
tika-abh04t:48_3: attho vibhāvetabbo. Passaṃ passatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Jānantāpi vipallāsavasena
tika-abh04t:48_4: jānanti titthiyā paṭhamajjhānaarūpajjhānehi kāmarūpapariññāvādino. Jānanto jānātiyeva
tika-abh04t:48_5: bhagavā anāgāmiarahattamaggehi taṃpariññāvāditāya. Ayañca attho dukkhakkhandhasuttavasena
tika-abh04t:48_6: vibhāvetabbo. Paññācakkhunā uppannattā vā cakkhubhūto. Ñāṇabhūtotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-abh04t:48_7: Atha vā dibbacakkhuādikaṃ pañcavidhampi cakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti cakkhubhūto. Evaṃ ñāṇabhūtotiādīsupi
tika-abh04t:48_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya sātisayo bhagavato vattuādibhāvoti vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:48_10: dassetuṃ “ciraṃ…pe… pavattā”ti āha. Niddhāretvā netā ninnetā.
tika-abh04t:49_0: “Ekūnanavuti cittānī”ti vuttā cittasahacariyāya yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti. Tesañca
tika-abh04t:49_1: pāḷipadesānaṃ ekekaṃ padaṃ uddharitvāpi kiñcāpi kusalattikapadāniyeva uddharitvā
tika-abh04t:49_2: cittuppādakaṇḍe cittāni vibhattāni, kusalattikena pana sabhāvadhammasaṅgahitānaṃ
tika-abh04t:49_4: itarattikadukapadānipi uddhaṭānevāti vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā mātikāggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati.
tika-abh04t:50_0: So ca dhammoti “tayo kusalahetū”tiādīsu purimāya purimāya pāḷiyā pacchimā pacchimā
tika-abh04t:50_2: daṭṭhabboti dassetuṃ “samānaṃ karontī”ti vuttaṃ. Samānakaraṇañca ūnapakkhipanena
tika-abh04t:50_3: adhikāpanayanena vā hoti, idha ūnapakkhipanenāti dassetuṃ “pūrentī”ti vuttaṃ. Samānetabbanti
tika-abh04t:51_0: Balavatā ñāṇavegena abhidhammapaccavekkhaṇavasappavattena. Balavato ñāṇavegassa sabbakilesakkhepanavasappavattassa.
tika-abh04t:51_1: Gambhīrameva gambhīragataṃ diṭṭhigatantiādīsu viya. Niravasesenāti na kañci avasesetvā.
tika-abh04t:52_0: Ekādhikesu aṭṭhasu kilesasatesūti “jātimado”tiādinā ekakavasena āgatā tesattati,
tika-abh04t:52_1: “kodho ca upanāho cā”tiādinā dukavasena chattiṃsa, “tīṇi akusalamūlānī”tiādinā tikavasena
tika-abh04t:52_7: aṭṭhārasakavasena aṭṭhasatanti evaṃ ekādhikesu aṭṭhasu kilesasatesu. Sesā tenavutādhikaṃ
tika-abh04t:52_8: chasataṃ kilesā. Te brahmajālasuttāgatāhi dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīhi saha pañcapaññāsādhikaṃ sattasataṃ honti.
tika-abh04t:53_0: Atha vā cuddasekantākusalā, pañcavīsati kusalābyākatasādhāraṇā, cuddasa kusalattikasādhāraṇā,
tika-abh04t:53_1: upacayādidvayaṃ ekaṃ katvā sattavīsati rūpāni cāti ime asīti dhammā, imesu bhāvadvaye
tika-abh04t:53_2: ekaṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhattikā ekūnāsīti, bāhirā ekūnāsītīti sabbepi aṭṭhapaññāsādhikaṃ
tika-abh04t:53_3: sataṃ honti. Imesu ekekasmiṃ dasannaṃ dasannaṃ kilesānaṃ uppajjanato asītiadhikaṃ
tika-abh04t:54_0: Atha vā tepaññāsa arūpadhammā, aṭṭhārasa rūparūpāni, ākāsadhātu, lakkhaṇarūpāni cāti
tika-abh04t:54_1: pañcasattati dhammā ajjhattabahiddhābhedato paññāsasataṃ honti. Tattha ekekasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:54_2: dasa dasa kilesātipi diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ. Tathā ettha vedanaṃ sukhindriyādivasena
tika-abh04t:54_3: pañcavidhaṃ katvā sattapaññāsa arūpadhammā, aṭṭhārasa rūparūpāni cāti pañcasattati
tika-abh04t:54_4: vipassanūpagadhammā ajjhattabahiddhābhedato paññāsasataṃ honti. Etesu ekekasmiṃ dasa
tika-abh04t:55_0: Aparo nayo – dvādasaakusalacittuppādesu paṭhame cha kilesā, dutiye satta, tatiye
tika-abh04t:55_1: cha, catutthe satta, pañcame cha, chaṭṭhe satta, sattame cha, aṭṭhame satta, navame
tika-abh04t:55_2: pañca, dasame cha, ekādasame pañca, dvādasame cattāroti sabbe dvāsattati, ime pañcadvārikā
tika-abh04t:55_3: pañcasu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu ekekasmiṃ dvāsattatīti saṭṭhiadhikāni tīṇi satāni, manodvārikā
tika-abh04t:55_4: pana chasu ārammaṇesu ekekasmiṃ dvāsattati dvāsattatīti katvā dvattiṃsādhikāni cattāri
tika-abh04t:55_5: satāni, sabbānipi dvānavutiadhikāni sattasatāni, tāni ajjhattabahiddhāvisayatāya
tika-abh04t:56_1: dhammārammaṇakā sesā cāti dasa, te ajjhattabahiddhābhedato vīsati, paññatti cāti
tika-abh04t:56_2: ekavīsatiyā ārammaṇesu dvāsattati dvāsattati kilesāti dvādasādhikaṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ honti.
tika-abh04t:57_0: Atha vā dvādasasu akusalacittuppādesu paṭhame vīsati dhammā, dutiye dvāvīsati, tatiye
tika-abh04t:57_1: vīsati, catutthe dvāvīsati, pañcame ekūnavīsati, chaṭṭhe ekūnavīsati, sattame ekūnavīsati,
tika-abh04t:57_2: aṭṭhame ekavīsati, navame ekūnavīsati, dasame ekavīsati, ekādasame soḷasa, dvādasame
tika-abh04t:57_3: soḷasāti sabbe akusaladhammā chattiṃsādhikāni dve satāni, ime chasu ārammaṇesu paccekaṃ
tika-abh04t:57_4: chattiṃ sādhikāni dve satāni, sabbe soḷasādhikāni cattāri satāni ca sahassaṃ hontīti
tika-abh04t:58_1: ariyamaggena samucchindane. “Diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ khepetvā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Paramatthato
tika-abh04t:58_2: atītādīnaṃ maggena appahātabbattā “atītādibhāvāmasanā aggahaṇaṃ khepane”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:58_3: Yaṃ pana paṭṭhāne “dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
tika-abh04t:58_4: paccayo”tiādinā tike, tathā dassanena pahātabbātītatikatike “atītā dassanena pahātabbā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:58_5: ca tīsu kālesu dassanādipahātabbavacanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ atītādīnaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhatāya apāyagamanīyatāya
tika-abh04t:59_0: Na bhāsitatthavacananti idaṃ “hitapariyāyavacana”nti etena nivattitassa ekadesakathanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:59_1: Yathā hi ayaṃ attha-saddo na bhāsitatthavacanaṃ, evaṃ visayappayojanādivacanampi
tika-abh04t:59_2: na hotīti. Yathāvuttassāti hitapariyāyassa. “Na haññadatthatthipasaṃsalābhā”ti padassa
tika-abh04t:59_3: niddese “attattho vā parattho vā”tiādinā kiñcāpi suttanirapekkhaṃ attatthādayo vuttā
tika-abh04t:59_4: suttatthabhāvena aniddiṭṭhattā, tesu pana ekopi atthappabhedo suttena dīpetabbataṃ
tika-abh04t:59_5: nātikkamatīti āha “te suttaṃ sūcetī”ti. Imasmiṃ vikappe attha-saddo bhāsitatthavacanampi
tika-abh04t:59_6: hoti. Purimakā hi pañca atthappabhedā hitapariyāyā, tato pare cha bhāsitatthappabhedā,
tika-abh04t:59_7: pacchimakā pana ubhayasabhāvā. Tattha duradhigamatāya vibhāvane aladdhagādho gambhīro,
tika-abh04t:59_8: na vivaṭo guḷho, mūludakādayo viya paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā tirohito paṭicchanno,
tika-abh04t:59_9: niddhāretvā ñāpetabbo neyyo, yathārutavaseneva veditabbo nīto. Anavajjanikkilesavodānā
tika-abh04t:59_10: pariyāyavasena vuttā, kusalavipākakiriyadhammavasena vā. Paramattho nibbānaṃ, aviparītasabhāvo
tika-abh04t:59_11: eva vā. Sātisayaṃ pakāsitāni tapparabhāvena pakāsitattā. “Ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato
tika-abh04t:59_12: suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpanna”nti, “sakavāde pañcasuttasatānī”ti ca evamādīsu sutta-saddo
tika-abh04t:59_13: upacaritoti adhippāyenāha “idameva atthānaṃ sūcanato suttanti vutta”nti. Ekantahitapaṭilābhasaṃvattanikā
tika-abh04t:59_14: suttantadesanāti idampi vineyyānaṃ hitasampāpane suttantadesanāya tapparabhāvaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:59_15: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tapparabhāvo ca vineyyajjhāsayānulomato daṭṭhabbo, tathā attatthādippakāsanapadhānatāpi.
tika-abh04t:60_0: Rattiādīsūti rattirājavinayesu visayabhūtesu. Nanu ca “abhirattī”ti avuttattā rattiggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:60_1: na kattabbaṃ, “abhiññātā abhilakkhitā”ti ca ñāṇalakkhaṇakiriyāvisesako abhi-saddoti?
tika-abh04t:60_3: samānādhikaraṇatāya rattivisayattā. Ettha ca vācakasaddasannidhāne nipātānaṃ tadatthajotakamattattā
tika-abh04t:60_4: lakkhitasaddatthajotako abhi-saddo lakkhaṇe vattatīti vutto. Abhilakkhitasaddapariyāyo
tika-abh04t:60_5: ca abhiññātasaddoti daṭṭhabbo, abhivinayasaddassa pana abhipurisassa viya samāsasiddhi
tika-abh04t:60_6: daṭṭhabbā. Anekatthā hi nipātā, anekatthabhedo ca saddānaṃ payogavisayoti.
tika-abh04t:61_0: Kiñcāpi desanādayo desetabbādinirapekkhā na santi, āṇādayo pana visesato desakādiadhīnāti
tika-abh04t:61_1: taṃtaṃvisesayogavasena tesaṃ bhedo vutto. Yathā hi āṇāvidhānaṃ visesato āṇārahādhīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:61_2: tattha kosallayogato, evaṃ vohāraparamatthavidhānāni ca vidhāyakādhīnānīti āṇādividhino
tika-abh04t:61_3: desakāyattatā vuttā. Aparādhajjhāsayānurūpaṃ viya dhammānurūpampi sāsanaṃ visesato
tika-abh04t:61_5: viya viniveṭhetabbāya diṭṭhiyāpi kathanaṃ sati vācāvatthusmiṃ, nāsatīti visesato
tika-abh04t:62_0: Tantisamudāyo avayavatantiyā ādhāro yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti. Na codetabbametaṃ samukhena,
tika-abh04t:62_1: visayavisayimukhena vā vinayādīnaṃyeva gambhīrabhāvassa vuttattāti adhippāyo. Dhammo
tika-abh04t:62_2: hi vinayādayo, tesañca visayo attho, dhammatthavisayā ca desanāpaṭivedhāti. “Paṭivedhassā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:62_3: dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭividdhattā desanāya uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā paṭivedhassa uppādetuñca
tika-abh04t:63_0: Dhammānurūpaṃ yathādhammanti ca attho yujjati. Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya aviparītaṃ
tika-abh04t:63_1: savisayavibhāvanato dhammānurūpaṃ pavattati yato “aviparītābhilāpo”ti vuccati. Dhammaniruttiṃ
tika-abh04t:63_2: dassetīti etena desanāsaddasabhāvāti dīpeti. Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya parittārammaṇādibhāvo
tika-abh04t:63_4: saddārammaṇatā. Imassa atthassa ayaṃ saddo vācakoti vacanavacanīyaṃ vavatthapetvā
tika-abh04t:63_5: taṃtaṃvacanīyavibhāvanavasena pavattito hi saddo desanāti. Nanu ca “dhammo tantī”ti
tika-abh04t:63_6: imasmiṃ pakkhe dhammassapi saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ viseso na siyāti? Na,
tika-abh04t:63_7: tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ bodhakabhāvena ñāto uggahitādivasena ca pubbe pavattito saddappabandho
tika-abh04t:63_8: dhammo, pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito tadatthappakāsanako saddo desanāti.
tika-abh04t:63_9: Atha vā yathāvuttasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo desanā musāvādādayo viya. Vacanassa
tika-abh04t:63_10: pavattananti ca yathāvuttacittuppādamāha. So hi vacanaṃ pavatteti, taṃ vā etena pavattīyatīti
tika-abh04t:63_11: pavattanaṃ. Desīyati attho etenāti desanā. Pakārehi ñāpīyati etena, pakārato ñāpetīti
tika-abh04t:63_12: vā paññattīti vuccatīti. Tenevāha “adhippāyo”tiādi. Abhisameti, abhisamīyati vā etenāti
tika-abh04t:63_13: abhisamayoti evampi abhisamayattho sambhavati. Abhisametabbato pana abhisamayoti
tika-abh04t:64_0: Vuttanayena veditabbāti avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭivijjhatāya dukkhogāhatā,
tika-abh04t:64_1: tesaṃ paññāpanassa dukkarabhāvato taṃdesanāya paṭivedhanasaṅkhātassa paṭivedhassa
tika-abh04t:65_0: Kāraṇe phalavohārena te dhammā dukkhāya saṃvattantīti vuttanti āha “upārambha…pe…
tika-abh04t:65_1: hetubhāvenā”ti. Aññaṃ atthanti upārambhaṃ nissaraṇañca. Niṭṭhāpetvāti kathanavasena
tika-abh04t:65_2: pariyosāpetvā. Tassa “āraddha”nti etena sambandho. Uddānasaṅgahādibhedo saṅgītoti
tika-abh04t:65_3: pāṭho yutto, “saṅgītiyā”ti pana likhanti. Purimaṃ vā saṅgītiyāti bhāvena bhāvalakkhaṇe
tika-abh04t:66_0: Tattha aṅgesu suttaṅgameva na sambhavati “sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ
tika-abh04t:66_1: veyyākaraṇa”nti vuttattā, maṅgalasuttādīnañca suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato
tika-abh04t:66_2: dhammapadādīnaṃ viya, geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya,
tika-abh04t:69_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi. Tenevāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano
tika-abh04t:69_2: sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”ti evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ, tadekadesesu pana
tika-abh04t:69_3: geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitattā. Tathā hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṃ
tika-abh04t:69_4: tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti.
tika-abh04t:69_5: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa. Pucchāvissajjanañhi
tika-abh04t:70_0: Evaṃ sante sagāthakānampi pañhavissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-abh04t:70_1: Nāpajjati veyyākaraṇādisaññānaṃ anokāsabhāvato “gāthāvirahe pana satī”ti visesitattā
tika-abh04t:70_2: ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttesu
tika-abh04t:70_4: yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve
tika-abh04t:70_5: bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā. Satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve
tika-abh04t:70_6: sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ
tika-abh04t:70_7: tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti
tika-abh04t:70_8: visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyaṅgādayo. Yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ,
tika-abh04t:71_0: Nanu ca sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na
tika-abh04t:71_1: sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthāti? Na, sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati
tika-abh04t:71_3: maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na, niruḷhattā. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīsu
tika-abh04t:71_4: suttabhāvo. Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni, kintu
tika-abh04t:71_5: suttabhāveneva. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ suttanāmakanti nāmaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yaṃ pana
tika-abh04t:71_6: vuttaṃ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā”ti, tadapi natthi. Yasmā sahatāññena.
tika-abh04t:71_7: Saha gāthāhīti sagāthakaṃ, sahabhāvo ca nāma attato aññena hoti, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu
tika-abh04t:71_8: gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi, yo “saha gāthāhī”ti vucceyya, na ca samudāyo
tika-abh04t:71_9: nāma koci atthi. Yadapi vuttaṃ “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho
tika-abh04t:71_10: siyā”ti, tadapi na, aññato. Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā. Ato na tāhi
tika-abh04t:71_11: ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh04t:72_0: Jinasāsanaṃ abhidhammo. Paṭividdhaṭṭhānaṃ paṭivedhabhūmi paṭivedhāvatthā, paṭivedhahetu
tika-abh04t:72_1: vā. “So evaṃ pajānāmi sammādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita”nti vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “so
tika-abh04t:72_2: evaṃ pajānāmi micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitaṃ. Sammādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita”nti
tika-abh04t:72_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ paravādicodanaṃ patvā. Adhiga…pe… rūpenāti adhigantabbo ca so
tika-abh04t:72_5: desetabbo cāti adhigantabbadesetabbo, so eva dhammo, tadanurūpena. Ettha ca yathādhammasāsanattā
tika-abh04t:72_7: desanānidānaṃ. Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “desanānidānaṃ yāva dhammacakkappavattanā”ti
tika-abh04t:72_8: vuttaṃ, taṃ abhidhammadesanāvisesena dhammacakkappavattananti katvā vuttaṃ. Dhammacakkappavattanasutte
tika-abh04t:72_9: vā desitehi ariyasaccehi sakalābhidhammapadatthasaṅgahato, paramatthato abhidhammabhūtānaṃ
tika-abh04t:72_10: vā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ tattha desitattā vuttaṃ. Tattakānaṃyeva desanāruḷhatāya aḍḍhachakkesu
tika-abh04t:72_11: jātakasatesu paripācanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi ettakāsu eva jātīsu puññādisambhārasambharaṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t:72_12: kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ ettakā eva jātiyo desitāti? Tadaññesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh04t:74_0: Uppanne buddhe tato attānaṃ seyyato vā sadisato vā dahanto jhānābhiññāhi parihāyati,
tika-abh04t:74_1: na tathā sumedhapaṇḍito aṭṭhāsīti tassa jhānābhiññāhi aparihāni daṭṭhabbā. Tenevāha
tika-abh04t:74_2: “tāpasehi asamo”ti. Yathā nibbānaṃ, aññaṃ vā niccābhimataṃ aviparītavuttitāya sabbakālaṃ
tika-abh04t:74_3: tathābhāvena “sassata”nti vuccati, evaṃ buddhānaṃ vacananti tassa sassatatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t:74_5: samādānassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ karaṇanti attho. Ñāṇatejenāti pāramīpavicayañāṇappabhāvena.
tika-abh04t:74_6: Mahānubhāvañhi taṃ ñāṇaṃ bodhisambhāresu anāvaraṇaṃ anācariyakaṃ mahābodhisamuppattiyā
tika-abh04t:74_7: anurūpapubbanimittabhūtaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ manussapurisabhāvādiādhārameva jātaṃ. Kāyādīsu
tika-abh04t:74_9: dassento “līnatā”ti āha. Līnatāti ca saṅkoco vīriyahāni vīriyārambhassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh04t:78_0: 1. Tenāti vedanāsaddena. Sabbapadehīti tīhi padehi laddhanāmo hoti avayavadhammenāpi
tika-abh04t:78_1: samudāyassa apadisitabbato yathā “samaṃ cuṇṇa”nti. Codako yathādhippetamatthaṃ appaṭipajjamāno
tika-abh04t:78_2: vibhattiantasseva padabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā “nanu sukhāyā”tiādinā codeti. Itaro “adhippetappakāratthagamakassā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:78_3: attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Tena “vākyaṃ idha padanti vutta”nti dasseti. Hetupadasahetukapadādīhīti
tika-abh04t:79_1: Tathāti ubhayekapadavasena. Ettha ca sahetukahetusampayuttadukātiādinā yathā hetugocchake
tika-abh04t:79_3: paṭhamadukatatiyadukasambandho pañcamo duko, evaṃ āsavagocchakādīsupīti nayaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t:79_4: Sakkā hi imināva nayena tesupi dukantarasambandho viññātuṃ, kevalaṃ pana āsavagocchakādīsu
tika-abh04t:79_6: Dhammānaṃ sāvasesaniravasesabhāvena tikadukānaṃ sappadesanippadesatā vuttāti yehi
tika-abh04t:79_7: tikadukā sāvasesāti padissanti apadissanti, te asaṅgahitadhammāpadeso. Evaṃ sati
tika-abh04t:79_9: Atha vā padissati etena samudāyoti padeso, avayavo. “Sāmaññajotanā visese avatiṭṭhatī”ti
tika-abh04t:80_0: Anavajjattho avajjavirahattho. Nāmaṃ saññā, kiriyā karaṇaṃ, payojanaṃ ratharathaṅgavibhāvanena
tika-abh04t:80_1: tesaṃ pakārato yojanaṃ. Kusena ñāṇena lātabbāti kusalāti ayamattho ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ
tika-abh04t:80_2: tāva hotu, ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ kathanti āha “ñāṇavippayuttānampī”tiādi. Ñāṇavippayuttāpi
tika-abh04t:80_3: hi ñāṇeneva pavattiyanti hitasukhahetubhūtāya pavattiyā paññavantānaṃ paṭipattibhāvato.
tika-abh04t:80_4: Na hi antarena yonisomanasikāraṃ kusaluppatti atthīti. “Yadi kusalassa ubhayabhāgagataṃ
tika-abh04t:80_5: saṃkilesalavanaṃ pākaṭaṃ siyā, kusā viya lunantīti kusalāti ayamattho yutto siyā”ti
tika-abh04t:81_0: Na cātiādinā “sabhāvaṃ dhārentī”ti ettha paramatthato kattukammassa ca bhedo natthi,
tika-abh04t:81_1: kappanāsiddho eva pana bhedoti dasseti. Tattha nāmavasena viññātāviññāteti yesaṃ
tika-abh04t:81_2: “dhammā”ti iminā pariyāyena aviññātā sabhāvā, “sabhāvaṃ dhārentī”ti iminā ca pariyāyena
tika-abh04t:81_3: viññātā, tesaṃ vasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamo attho saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammavasena
tika-abh04t:81_4: vutto, dutiyo saṅkhatavasena, tatiyo saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:82_0: Kusalapaṭisedhanaṃ kusalābhāvo eva. Abhāvo hi sattāpaṭisedhoti. Dhammoti sabhāvadhammo.
tika-abh04t:82_1: Akusalavacanena na koci attho sabhāvadhammassa abodhakattāti adhippāyo. Atha siyā
tika-abh04t:82_3: evaṃ sati “anabyākatā”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, tato cāyaṃ catukko āpajjati, na tiko.
tika-abh04t:82_4: Tasmāti yasmā dukacatukkabhāvo anabyākatavohāro ca natthi, so ca vuttanayena abhāvamattavacane
tika-abh04t:82_5: āpajjati, tasmā. Sabhāvadhāraṇādīti ādi-saddena “dhārīyanti paccayehī”ti ayamattho
tika-abh04t:82_6: saṅgahito. Ñeyyapariyāyena pana dhamma-saddenāyaṃ dosoti nanu añeyyapariyāyepi dhamma-sadde
tika-abh04t:83_0: Pārisesenāti ettha nanu ayamakāro na-atthattayasseva jotako, atha kho “ahetukā dhammā,
tika-abh04t:83_2: Paccayuppannañhi paccayasambandhīti appaccayuppannattā asambandhitā ettha jotīyati.
tika-abh04t:83_3: “Anidassanā dhammā”ti taṃsabhāvanivattiyā. Nidassanañhi daṭṭhabbatā. Atha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:83_4: nidassanaṃ, taggayhabhāvanivattiyā, tathā “anāsavā dhammā”ti. “Appaṭighā dhammā anārammaṇā
tika-abh04t:83_5: dhammā”ti taṃkiccanivattiyā. “Arūpino dhammā acetasikā dhammā”ti tabbhāvanivattiyā.
tika-abh04t:83_6: Tadaññatā hi ettha pakāsīyati. “Amanusso”ti tabbhāvamattanivattiyā. Manussattamattaṃ
tika-abh04t:83_7: natthi aññaṃ samānanti sadisatā hettha sūciyati. “Asamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño aputto”ti
tika-abh04t:83_8: taṃsambhāvanaguṇanivattiyā. Garahā hi ettha ñāyati. “Kacci nu bhoto anāmayā, anudarā
tika-abh04t:83_11: ca vijjamānattā uppannānukūlatā, pageva paccuppannānanti tabbidhurabhāvo ettha viññāyati.
tika-abh04t:83_13: atthānaṃ jotako, tattha kiṃ vuccate atthadvayameva vatvā pārisesenāti? Itaresaṃ ettha
tika-abh04t:83_14: suvidūrabhāvato. Na hi kusalavippayuttādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ akusalabhāvo yujjati.
tika-abh04t:84_0: Akusalasaddassa uccāraṇānantaraṃ vineyyānaṃ kusalapaṭipakkhabhūte atthe paṭipattibhāvato
tika-abh04t:84_1: tattha niruḷhatā daṭṭhabbā. “Viruddhasabhāvattā”ti vuttaṃ kiccavirodhādīnampi tadantogadhattā,
tika-abh04t:84_3: āha. Itarathā kusalānampi akusalehi pahātabbabhāve accantaṃ samucchinnakusalamūlattā
tika-abh04t:84_4: apāyapūrakā eva sattā siyuṃ. Yaṃ pana “dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t:84_5: taṃ “rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahathā”tiādīsu viya tadārammaṇasaṃkilesappahānavasena
tika-abh04t:84_6: pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Yathāha “na hi kusalā akusalehi pahātabbā”ti.
tika-abh04t:85_0: Phassādivacanehi taṃniddesabhūtehi. Tabbacanīyabhāvenāti tehi “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā
tika-abh04t:85_2: evaṃ avipākatthā abyākatavacanena bodhitā evāti āha “abyākatavacaneneva cā”ti. Kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:85_3: avatvāti idha vuttabhāvena anuvattamānattāti kāraṇaṃ avatvā. Aññā…pe… nivāretabboti
tika-abh04t:85_4: etena kusalākusalasaddā viya kusalākusalasabhāvānaṃ tadubhayaviparītasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:85_5: abyākatasaddo bodhakoti dasseti. Na hi avipākavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, akusalavacanañca avuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:85_6: Yato avipākavacanassa adhikatabhāvo akusalassa ca tabbacanīyabhāvena akathitabhāvo
tika-abh04t:85_7: siyā, tasmā na akusalānaṃ abyākatatāti ayaṃ akusalānaṃ anabyākatabhāve yojanā.
tika-abh04t:86_0: Taṃ pariharitunti abyākatanivattanamāha. Yadi evaṃ “sukhavipākānavajjā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:86_1: Anavajjā hi byabhicāritāya visesitabbāti? Na, sukhavipākavacanassa visesanabhāvena
tika-abh04t:86_2: aggahitattā. Sukhavipākavacanena hi kusalabhāve samatto viññāyati, anavajjavacanaṃ
tika-abh04t:86_3: panettha kusalānaṃ agarahitabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ kañci visesamāha. Teneva ca tassa visesanabhāvena
tika-abh04t:86_5: phaladhammā visesena paṭippassaddhāvajjā nāma hontīti samācārattayavasena tasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:86_6: sutte anavajjadhammānaṃ vuttattā ca te anavasesato saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “virahitāvajjamattā”ti
tika-abh04t:86_7: vuttaṃ. Avajjavināsanabhāvo dassito kaṇhasukkadhammānaṃ vajjhaghātakabhāvassa niyatattā.
tika-abh04t:86_8: Savipākatā vipākadhammatā. Sukho vipāko etesanti sukhavipākāti iminā samāsena kusalānaṃ
tika-abh04t:86_9: sukhavipākavantatā vuttā. Sā ca nesaṃ na taṃsamaṅgitāya asahavattanatoti taduppādanasamatthatāti
tika-abh04t:86_12: vatthusmiṃ upacārena hotīti yuttamettha lakkhaṇalakkhitabbabhāvena bhedavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:86_13: Bhavati hi saddatthavisesamattenapi abhinne vatthusmiṃ bhedavacanaṃ yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-abh04t:87_0: Vināpi bhāvābhidhāyinā saddena bhāvappadhāno niddeso hotīti vuttaṃ “anavajjavacanena
tika-abh04t:87_1: anavajjattaṃ āhā”ti. Evañcettha padaviggaho gahetabbo – na avajjaṃ anavajjaṃ, avajjapaṭipakkhatāya
tika-abh04t:87_2: agarahitabbasabhāvo. Sukho vipāko assāti sukhavipākaṃ, sukhavipākavipaccanasamatthatā.
tika-abh04t:87_3: Anavajjañca taṃ sukhavipākañcāti anavajjasukhavipākaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti anavajjasukhavipākalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh04t:87_4: Atha vā pubbe viya anavajjaṃ, vipaccanaṃ vipāko, sukhassa vipāko sukhavipāko, anavajjañca
tika-abh04t:87_5: sukhavipāko ca anavajjasukhavipākaṃ ekattavasena. Taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti anavajjasukhavipākalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh04t:87_6: Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ padadvayapariggahe, nanu ekeneva padena iṭṭhappasiddhi. Yadipi
tika-abh04t:87_7: “avajjarahitaṃ anavajja”nti imasmiṃ pana pakkhe abyākatanivattanatthaṃ sukhavipākaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:87_8: kattabbaṃ siyā, sukhavipākaggahaṇe pana kate anavajjaggahaṇaṃ na kattabbameva. “Avajjapaṭipakkhā
tika-abh04t:87_9: anavajjā”ti etasmiṃ pana pakkhe sukhavipākaggahaṇañcāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha
tika-abh04t:87_11: evaṃ vipulappayojanattho padadvayapariggahoti dasseti. Sukha-saddassa iṭṭhapariyāyatā
tika-abh04t:87_12: viya “nibbānaparamaṃ sukhaṃ, sukhā virāgatā loke, tesaṃ vūpasamo sukho”tiādīsu saṅkhāradukkhūpasamapariyāyatāpi
tika-abh04t:87_13: vijjati, taṃavipākatāya pana idha sukhavipākabhāvo na sakkā vattunti dassento āha
tika-abh04t:87_14: “saṅkhā…pe… natthī”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tebhūmakakusalānampi vivaṭṭasannissayabhāvena
tika-abh04t:87_15: pavattisabhāvattā kiñcāpi sabbe kusalā saṅkhāradukkhūpasamasukhanipphādakā sambhavanti,
tika-abh04t:87_16: yathāvuttasukhassa pana avipākabhāvato na etena padena kusalānaṃ sukhavipākatā sambhavatīti.
tika-abh04t:87_17: Vipakkabhāvamāpannesu arūpadhammesu niruḷhattā vipāka-saddassa “yadi panā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
tika-abh04t:88_0: Yathāsambhavanti saha avajjenāti sāvajjā, garahitabbabhāvayuttā. Tena nesaṃ garahitabbasabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:88_1: dasseti. Aññepi atthi dukkhabhāvena garahitabbasabhāvā akusalavipākāti sāvajjavacanamattena
tika-abh04t:88_2: tesampi akusalatāpattidosaṃ disvā taṃ pariharituṃ dukkhavipākavacanamāha. Avajja-saddo
tika-abh04t:88_3: vā rāgādīsu ekantākusalesu niruḷhoti taṃsahavattidhammānaṃ eva sāvajjabhāve kusalābyākatehi
tika-abh04t:88_4: akusalānaṃ viseso sāvajjavacaneneva dassito. Abyākatehi pana visiṭṭhaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ
tika-abh04t:88_5: sādhāraṇaṃ savipākatālakkhaṇanti tasmiṃ lakkhaṇe visesadassanatthaṃ dukkhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:88_6: vuttaṃ. Ito paraṃ “dukkho vipāko etesanti dukkhavipākā”tiādinā sukhavipākaanavajjakusalapadānaṃ
tika-abh04t:88_7: ṭhāne dukkhavipākasāvajjaakusalapadāni ṭhapetvā yathāvuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-abh04t:88_8: Yojanā ca sāvajjavacanena akusalānaṃ pavattidukkhataṃ dasseti, dukkhavipākavacanena
tika-abh04t:88_9: vipākadukkhataṃ. Purimañhi attano pavattisabhāvavasena lakkhaṇavacanaṃ, pacchimaṃ
tika-abh04t:88_10: kālantare vipākuppādanasamatthatāyāti. Tathā purimena akusalānaṃ avisuddhasabhāvataṃ
tika-abh04t:88_11: dasseti, pacchimena avisuddhavipākataṃ. Purimena ca akusale kusalasabhāvato nivatteti,
tika-abh04t:88_12: pacchimena abyākatasabhāvato savipākattadīpakattā pacchimassa. Purimena vā avajjavantatādassanato
tika-abh04t:88_13: kiccaṭṭhena rasena anatthajananarasataṃ dasseti, pacchimena sampattiatthena aniṭṭhavipākarasataṃ.
tika-abh04t:88_14: Purimena ca upaṭṭhānākāraṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānena saṃkilesapaccupaṭṭhānataṃ, pacchimena
tika-abh04t:88_15: phalaṭṭhena dukkhavipākapaccupaṭṭhānataṃ. Purimena ca ayonisomanasikāraṃ akusalānaṃ
tika-abh04t:88_16: padaṭṭhānaṃ pakāseti. Tato hi te sāvajjā jātāti. Pacchimena akusalānaṃ aññesaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:88_17: vibhāveti. Te hi dukkhavipākassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti. Ettha ca dukkha-saddo aniṭṭhapariyāyavacananti
tika-abh04t:88_18: veditabbaṃ. Aniṭṭhacatukkhandhavipākā hi akusalā, na dukkhavedanāvipākāva. Vipāka-saddassa
tika-abh04t:88_19: phalapariyāyabhāve pana nissandavipākena aniṭṭharūpenapi dukkhavipākatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh04t:88_20: Vipākadhammatāpaṭisedhavasena abyākatānaṃ avipākalakkhaṇāti lakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti tadatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:89_0: Chahi padehi tikesu, catūhi dukesu yathākkamaṃ cha cattāro atthā vuttā. Chakkabhāvo
tika-abh04t:89_1: na bhavissatīti etena catukkabhāvābhāvo dassitanayattā coditoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atthabhedo
tika-abh04t:89_2: upapajjatīti kasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu tīhi dhammasaddehi vuccamāno sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthena
tika-abh04t:89_3: abhinno eva so atthoti? Na, jātiādibhedena bhedasabbhāvato. Bhedakā hi jātiādayo.
tika-abh04t:89_5: vattabbānaṃ visiṭṭhatthānaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “yathā kālasaddādiabhidheyyānaṃ kālādiatthānaṃ
tika-abh04t:89_6: bhinnasabhāvānampi māsa-saddābhidheyyabhāvena abhedo, evaṃ jātiādibhedena bhinnānampi
tika-abh04t:89_7: tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dvinnañca atthānaṃ dhamma-saddābhidheyyabhāvena natthi bhedo”ti. Vini…pe…
tika-abh04t:90_0: Sādhetunti bodhetuṃ. Hotu asambandho, kā no hānīti kadāci vadeyyāti āsaṅkāya āha
tika-abh04t:90_2: na sakkā vattunti yathāvuttassa abhāvassa apekkhāvuttitāya vuttaṃ. Na hi apekkhāvuttino
tika-abh04t:90_3: antarena apekkhitabbaṃ labhanti. Satipi sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthasāmaññe kusalajātiādivisiṭṭhasseva
tika-abh04t:90_4: tassa idha adhippetattā ekatthatā na anuññātāti vuttaṃ, vacanasilesavasena vā. Atha
tika-abh04t:90_5: vātiādinā tiṇṇaṃ dhammasaddānaṃ abhāvattaṃ asampaṭicchanto nānatthatābhāvadosaṃ pariharati.
tika-abh04t:91_0: Ñāpakahetubhāvato upapatti idha kāraṇanti vuttāti āha “kāraṇaṃ nāma yuttī”ti. Punaruttītiādinā
tika-abh04t:91_1: nanu “kusalādīnampi ekattaṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttattā ekattāpattipi vattabbāti? Saccaṃ
tika-abh04t:91_2: vattabbā, sā pana abhāvāpattiyaṃ eva antogadhā nānattābhāvacodanāsāmaññena. Bhedābhedanibandhanattā
tika-abh04t:91_3: visesanavisesitabbabhāvassa so accantamabhinnesu niyamena natthīti visesanavisesitabbābhāvena
tika-abh04t:91_4: accantābhedaṃ dasseti, na pana accantaṃ abhinnesuyeva visesanavisesitabbābhāvaṃ.
tika-abh04t:91_5: Atha vā accantaṃ abhinnesu avivaṭasaddatthavivaraṇatthaṃ pavattā. Kasmā? Visesanavisesitabbābhāvatoti
tika-abh04t:91_6: evaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Amittaṃ abhibhavituṃ sakkuṇātīti sakko, indatīti indo, purime
tika-abh04t:92_0: Bhedābhedavantesūti visesasāmaññavantesu. Nīla-saddo hi uppalasaddasamāyogo rattuppalasetuppalādiuppalajātisāmaññato
tika-abh04t:92_1: vinivattetvā nīlaguṇayuttameva uppalajātivisesaṃ joteti. Uppala-saddopi nīla-saddasamāyutto
tika-abh04t:92_3: pakāsetīti visesatthasāmaññatthayuttatā padadvayassa daṭṭhabbā. Iminā nayena itaratrāpi
tika-abh04t:92_4: bhedābhedavantatā yojetabbā. Tāya tāya anumatiyāti tena tena saṅketena. Te te vohārāti
tika-abh04t:92_5: accantaṃ abhinne atthe pariyāyabhāvena accantaṃ bhinne yathāsakaṃ atthavivaraṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:92_6: bhedābhedavante visesanavisesitabbabhāvena tā tā samaññā paññattiyo siddhāti attho.
tika-abh04t:92_7: Samāneti ekasmiṃ. Kusalādibhāvanti kucchitasalanādibhāvaṃ. Abhidhānatthopi hi anavajjasukhavipākādiabhidheyyattho
tika-abh04t:93_0: Etthāha “kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ tikā eva paṭhamaṃ vuttā, na dukā, tikesupi kusalattikova,
tika-abh04t:93_1: na añño”ti? Vuccate – sukhaggahaṇato appabhedato ca tikā eva paṭhamaṃ vuttā. Yasmā
tika-abh04t:93_2: tikehi bodhite kusalādibhede tabbibhāgabhinnā hetuādayo vuccamānā suviññeyyā honti.
tika-abh04t:93_3: Tathā hi “tayo kusalahetū”tiādinā kusalādimukhena hetuādayo vibhattā, katipayabhedā
tika-abh04t:94_0: Tesu pana sabbasaṅgahaasaṅkaraādikalyāṇabhāvena paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ vuttaṃ. Niravasesā
tika-abh04t:94_1: hi rūpārūpadhammā kusalattikena saṅgahitā, na tathā vedanāttikādīhi. Nanu vipākattikādīhipi
tika-abh04t:94_2: niravasesā dhammā saṅgahitāti? Saccametaṃ, tesu pana anavajjasāvajjadhammā na asaṅkarato
tika-abh04t:94_3: vuttā yathā kusalattike. Nanu ca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikattikādīsupi te asaṅkarato
tika-abh04t:94_4: vuttāti? Evametaṃ, te pana akalyāṇabhūte pāpadhamme ādiṃ katvā vuttā, na evamayaṃ.
tika-abh04t:94_5: Ayaṃ pana kalyāṇabhūte pujjabhavaparinibbutinipphādake puññadhamme ādiṃ katvā vutto.
tika-abh04t:94_6: Iti bhagavā saṇhasukhumaṃ rūpārūpadesanaṃ ārabhanto sabbasaṅgahaasaṅkaraādikalyāṇaguṇayogato
tika-abh04t:94_7: paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ deseti, kiñca tadaññattikānaṃ sukhaggahaṇato. Tathā hi kusalattikamukhena
tika-abh04t:95_0: Kusalattikepi ca padhānapāsaṃsaubhayahitabhāvato kusalā dhammā paṭhamaṃ vuttā. Kusalā
tika-abh04t:95_1: hi dhammā sukhavipākattā sabbasaṅkhatadhammānaṃ uttamā avajjavidhamanato viññuppasatthā
tika-abh04t:95_2: idhalokaparalokesu atthāvahā nissaraṇāvahā ca, tasmā padhānādibhāvena paṭhamaṃ vuttā,
tika-abh04t:95_3: tappaṭipakkhattā tadanantaraṃ akusalā, tadubhayaviparītasabhāvā tadanantaraṃ abyākatā
tika-abh04t:95_4: vuttā. Kusalavasena vā assādo, akusalavasena ādīnavo, abyākatadhammesu nibbānavasena
tika-abh04t:95_5: nissaraṇanti iminā assādādikkamena, kusalesu patiṭṭhāya paṇḍitā akusale pajahantā
tika-abh04t:95_6: abyākatadhammabhūtamaggaphalaṃ nibbānañca sacchikarontīti iminā vā paṭipattikkamena
tika-abh04t:96_0: Kasmā panettha sekkhattikādīsu viya sarūpato purimapadadvayapaṭikkhepavasena tatiyapadaṃ
tika-abh04t:96_1: na vuttaṃ “nevakusalā nākusalā”ti? Visesadīpanatthaṃ. Yathā hi sekkhāsekkhasabhāvesu
tika-abh04t:96_2: dhammesu kocipi dhammo tadubhayasabhāvena kenacipi pariyāyena kadāci abyākaraṇīyo
tika-abh04t:96_3: nāma natthīti sekkhattike padadvayapaṭikkhepavasena “nevasekkhā nāsekkhā”tveva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t:96_4: na evaṃ idha. Idha pana kusalasabhāvā eva dhammā aggaphaluppattiyā tathā na byākaraṇīyā
tika-abh04t:96_5: hontīti imassa visesassa dīpanatthaṃ “abyākatā”ti vuttaṃ. Vacanamatte eva vā idaṃ
tika-abh04t:96_6: nānākaraṇaṃ “abyākatā nevakusalā nākusalā”ti byākata-saddena kusalākusalānaṃ bodhitattāti.
tika-abh04t:97_0: Ettha ca akusalesu taṇhāya sabbākusalehi, tebhūmakakusalākusalehi vā samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-abh04t:97_2: nirodhasaccaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tattha samudayena assādo, dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi
tika-abh04t:97_4: tesaṃ pana kusalādivisese niddhārite tassa upasampādetabbatādipi atthato vuttameva
tika-abh04t:97_5: hoti. Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya “sabbapāpassa
tika-abh04t:97_6: akaraṇaṃ, kusalassa upasampadā”ti evamādivacanato hi kusalādīnaṃ upasampādanādidassanaparaṃ
tika-abh04t:97_7: bhagavato sāsanaṃ, tasmā kusalānaṃ upasampādanaṃ akusalānaṃ pahānañca upāyo, abyākatavisesassa
tika-abh04t:97_8: sacchikiriyā phalaṃ, kusalādīnaṃ upasampādanādiatthā desanā āṇattīti ayaṃ desanāhāro.
tika-abh04t:98: Ārogyaṭṭhena anavajjaṭṭhena kosalyasambhūtaṭṭhena ca kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato akusalā, tadubhayaviparītato abyākatā, sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthena dhammāti anupadavicinanaṃ vicayo hāro.
tika-abh04t:99_1: akusalehīti yujjati aniṭṭhaphalattā, tadubhayaphalānaṃ anuppatti abyākatehīti yujjati
tika-abh04t:100: Kusalā dhammā sukhavipākassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, akusalā dukkhavipākassa, abyākatā kusalākusalābyākatadhammānanti ayaṃ padaṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-abh04t:101_0: Kusalaggahaṇena ye anavajjasukhavipākā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya
tika-abh04t:101_2: araṇā dhammā, te bodhitā bhavanti kusalalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā akusalaggahaṇena
tika-abh04t:101_3: ye sāvajjadukkhavipākā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya
tika-abh04t:101_5: saraṇā dhammā, te bodhitā bhavanti akusalalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā abyākataggahaṇena
tika-abh04t:101_6: ye avipākārahā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya
tika-abh04t:101_7: vedanāya sampayuttā vipākā dhammā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā upādinnupādāniyā
tika-abh04t:101_8: anupādinnupādāniyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā…pe… araṇā dhammā, te bodhitā bhavanti abyākatalakkhaṇena
tika-abh04t:102_0: “Kucchite pāpadhamme salayantī”tiādinā nirutti veditabbā, kusalādimukhena rūpārūpadhamme
tika-abh04t:102_1: pariggahetvā visuddhiparamparāya “kathaṃ nu kho sattā anupādisesanibbānabhāgino bhaveyyu”nti
tika-abh04t:102_2: ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo, nidānaṃ asādhāraṇato kusalādibhedena bujjhanakasattā.
tika-abh04t:102_3: Sādhāraṇato pana pākaṭameva. Paṭhamaṃ kusalattikassa desanā vicāritāyevāti ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
tika-abh04t:103_0: Kusalaggahaṇena kalyāṇamittapariggaho yonisomanasikārapariggaho ca. Tattha paṭhamena
tika-abh04t:103_1: sakalaṃ brahmacariyamāvattati, dutiyena ca yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā. Akusalaggahaṇena
tika-abh04t:104_0: Tattha kusalā bhūmito catudhā vibhattā, sampayuttapavattiākārādito pana anekadhā.
tika-abh04t:104_1: Akusalā bhūmito ekadhā vibhattā, sampayuttādito anekadhā. Abyākatā pana vipākakiriyarūpanibbānavasena
tika-abh04t:104_2: catudhā bhūmisampayuttādito anekadhā ca vibhattāti ayaṃ vibhatti hāro.
tika-abh04t:105_0: Kusalā dhammā akusalānaṃ tadaṅgādippahānāya vītikkamādippahānāya ca saṃvattanti,
tika-abh04t:105_1: akusalā dhammā kusalānaṃ anupasampajjanāya, abyākatesu asaṅkhatadhātu sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇāyāti
tika-abh04t:106: Kusalā anavajjā puññānīti pariyāyavacanaṃ, akusalā sāvajjā apuññānīti pariyāya vacanaṃ, abyākatā avipākārahā nevaācayagāmī naapacayagāmīnoti pariyāyavacananti ayaṃ vevacano hāro.
tika-abh04t:107: Kusalādayo “yasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā pabhavabhūmivevacanapaññattivasena yathāsambhavaṃ pariññādipaññattivasena ca paññattāti ayaṃ paññatti hāro.
tika-abh04t:108_0: Akusalānaṃ kucchitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ salanaṃ kusānaṃ viya kusānaṃ vā rāgādīnaṃ lavanaṃ
tika-abh04t:108_1: evaṃdhammatāti ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena avataraṇaṃ, tathā kusena lātabbā kosallasambhūtā
tika-abh04t:108_3: vā ādiantavantā aniccantikā cāti aniccatāmukhena avataraṇaṃ, aniccatā eva udayabbayapaṭipīḷitatāya
tika-abh04t:108_4: dukkhāti dukkhatāmukhena avataraṇaṃ, nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena dhammāti abyāpārato suññatāmukhena
tika-abh04t:108_5: avataraṇaṃ, evaṃ kusalāti cattāro khandhā dvāyatanāni dve dhātuyotiādinā khandhāyatanadhātādimukhenapi
tika-abh04t:108_6: avataraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iminā nayena akusalābyākatesupi avataraṇaṃ dassetabbanti ayaṃ avataraṇo hāro.
tika-abh04t:109: Kusalāti ārambho, dhammāti padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. Tathā akusalā dhammā abyākatāti, dhammāti pana padasuddhi ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ sodhano hāro.
tika-abh04t:110_0: Dhammāti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ kusalākusalābyākatāti.
tika-abh04t:110_1: Tathā kusalā dhammāti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā kāmāvacaraṃ somanassasahagatantiādi
tika-abh04t:110_2: visesavacanaṃ. Akusalā dhammātiādīsupi eseva nayoti ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-abh04t:111_0: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ navamo khaṇo cattāri ca sampatticakkāni yonisomanasikāro eva
tika-abh04t:111_1: vā hetu, vuttavipariyāyena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetu, kusalākusalā dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-abh04t:111_2: abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetūti ayaṃ parikkhāro hāro.
tika-abh04t:112_3: tadaṅgādivītikkamādippahānāni lokiyalokuttarā ca bhāvanā dassitāti ayaṃ samāropano hāro.
tika-abh04t:113_0: Kāmañcetaṃ avisesato sabhāvadhammakathanaṃ, visesavanto pana dhammā visesato niddhāritā.
tika-abh04t:113_1: Tathā hi citteneva samayo niyamito, tasmā kusalaggahaṇena visesato sādhiṭṭhāno samatho
tika-abh04t:113_2: vipassanā ca dassitāti. Tathā tappaṭipakkhato akusalaggahaṇena sādhiṭṭhānā taṇhā
tika-abh04t:113_3: avijjā ca, abyākataggahaṇena saparivārā cetovimutti paññāvimutti cāti ayaṃ nandiyāvattassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-abh04t:114_0: Tathā kusalaggahaṇena mūlabhāvavisesato tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tesu ca adosena sīlakkhandho,
tika-abh04t:114_1: alobhena samādhikkhandho, amohena paññākkhandho nīyati. Tathā akusalaggahaṇena tīṇi
tika-abh04t:114_2: akusalamūlāni, tesu ca lobhena tadekaṭṭhā akusalā dhammā. Tathā dosamohehi taṃtadekaṭṭhā.
tika-abh04t:114_3: Abyākataggahaṇena appaṇihitānimittasuññatā nīyantīti ayaṃ tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-abh04t:115_0: Tathā kusalaggahaṇena yato kosallato sambhūtā kusalā, taṃ paññindriyaṃ. Taṃsahajātā
tika-abh04t:115_1: tadupanissayā ca saddahanussahanāpilāpāvikkhepā saddhindriyādīni. Tehi ca sabbe saddhammā
tika-abh04t:115_4: yathāvuttavipallāsappahānabhūtāni ca cattāri sāmaññaphalāni bodhitānīti ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa
tika-abh04t:116: Tehi ca siddhehi dve kammanayāpi siddhā hontīti. Ayaṃ tiko sabbadhammasaṅgahitasabbabhāgiyo veditabboti idaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:118_0: Evaṃ vedanāttikādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ catusaccaniddhāraṇādividhinā soḷasa hārā pañca
tika-abh04t:118_1: nayā niddisitabbā, ativitthārabhayena pana na vitthārayāma. Sakkā hi iminā nayena
tika-abh04t:118_2: tesu tesu tikadukesu taṃtaṃhāranayayojanānurūpadhammaniddhāraṇavasena te te hāranayā
tika-abh04t:119_0: 2. Tañca sukhindriyaṃ sukhavedanā eva hoti sāmaññassa bhedapariyādānato, bhedassa
tika-abh04t:119_1: ca sāmaññapariccāgatoti adhippāyo. Yasmā pana visesasāmaññāni avayavasamudāyā viya
tika-abh04t:119_2: aññamaññato bhinnāni, tasmā “na pana…pe… samānatthattā”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva nesaṃ
tika-abh04t:119_3: bhinnatatvaṃ “ayañhī”tiādinā vivarati. Tanti sukhahetūnaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Tena sukhassa
tika-abh04t:119_4: kāraṇaṃ sukhahetu, sukhassa kāraṇakāraṇaṃ sukhamūlanti dasseti. Sukhahetūnanti ettha
tika-abh04t:119_6: Ettha ca sukhamūlasukhahetūsu phalūpacārena, sukhārammaṇasukhapaccayaṭṭhānesu sukhasahacariyāya,
tika-abh04t:119_7: abyāpajjanibbānesu dukkhāpagamabhāvena sukhapariyāyo vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Iṭṭhāsūti
tika-abh04t:119_9: Upekkhameva vā apekkhitvā visesanaṃ kataṃ. Sā hi akusalavipākabhūtā aniṭṭhāpi atthīti.
tika-abh04t:119_10: Evamādīsūti ādi-saddena “sovaggikaṃ sukhavipāka”nti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Iṭṭhapariyāyo
tika-abh04t:120_0: Saṅkhāradukkhādīsūti ettha ādi-saddena “ṭhitisukhaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ, akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ
tika-abh04t:120_1: dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipāka”ntiādike saṅgaṇhāti. Yathākkamaṃ sukhavedanā dukkhaaniṭṭhapariyāyo
tika-abh04t:120_2: hi ettha dukkha-saddoti. Dukkhavedanādukkhavatthuādīsu dukkhasaddappavatti vuttanayeneva
tika-abh04t:120_3: yojetabbā. Vipākāvipākabhedāya sabbāyapi sukhavedanāya vasena lakkhaṇassa vuttattā
tika-abh04t:120_4: tadubhayānukūlamatthaṃ vivaranto “sabhāvato”tiādimāha. Tattha vipākā sabhāvato iṭṭhassa
tika-abh04t:120_5: anubhavanalakkhaṇā. Itarā sabhāvato saṅkappato ca iṭṭhassa iṭṭhākārassa vā anubhavanalakkhaṇāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:121_0: Asamānapaccayehi ekajjhaṃ uppattito samānapaccayehi ekajjhaṃ uppatti sātisayāti ukkaṃsagativijānanavasena
tika-abh04t:121_1: “samānapaccayehi sahuppattikāti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā uppajjanaṃ uppādo, uppajjati
tika-abh04t:121_2: etasmāti uppādoti duvidhopi uppādo ekuppādāti ettha ekasesanayena saṅgahitoti iminā
tika-abh04t:121_3: adhippāyena “samā…pe… attho”ti vuttaṃ siyā. Tena tāni ekavatthukānīti etassa ca “kappentassā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:121_4: sambandho. Tattha purimavikappe ekaṃ vatthu nissayo etesanti yojanā, na ekaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:121_5: vatthūti. Ekekabhūtassa bhūtattayanissitattā catubhūtanissitattā ca upādārūpānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:121_6: Dutiyavikappe pana ekaṃyeva vatthu etesu nissitanti yojanā. Nissayanissitatāsaṅkhātaupakāropakattabbabhāvadīpanaṃ
tika-abh04t:121_7: ekavatthukavacananti dutiyavikappe mahābhūtavasena yojanā katā. Itarathā ekaṃ vatthu
tika-abh04t:121_8: etesūti samāsatthabhāvena upādārūpānampi pariggaho vattabbo siyā. Pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanānanti
tika-abh04t:121_9: idaṃ nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiriyamanodhātucakkhuviññāṇādayopi hi ekārammaṇābhinnavatthukā
tika-abh04t:121_11: saṅgayhanti, etāni ca sampaṭicchanādīni cutiāsannāni idhādhippetānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:121_12: Tāni hi taduddhaṃ kammajarūpassa anuppattito ekasmiṃyeva hadayavatthusmiṃ vattanti,
tika-abh04t:121_13: itarāni pana purimapurimacittakkhaṇuppanne hadayavatthusmiṃ uttaruttarāni pavattantīti.
tika-abh04t:121_14: Chasu vā vatthūsu ekaṃ hadayavatthuyeva vatthu etesanti evaṃ pana atthe sati cutiāsannato
tika-abh04t:122_0: Etthāha – “kasmā panettha kusalattikānantaraṃ vedanāttikova vutto”ti? Kismiṃ pana
tika-abh04t:122_1: vuccamāne ayamanuyogo na siyā, apica avayavānaṃ anekabhedatādassanatthā tikantaradesanā.
tika-abh04t:122_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi kusalattikena sabbadhammānaṃ tidhā vibhāgaṃ dassetvā puna tadavayavānaṃ
tika-abh04t:122_4: “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”ti vuttaṃ. Kusalā hi dhammā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
tika-abh04t:122_5: siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā. Akusalā dhammā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
tika-abh04t:122_6: siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, tathā
tika-abh04t:122_7: abyākatā sampayogārahāti. Evaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ paccekaṃ vedanābhedena vibhāgadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:122_8: kusalattikānantaraṃ vedanāttikaṃ vatvā idāni sukhasampayuttādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vipākādibhedabhinnataṃ
tika-abh04t:122_9: dassetuṃ vedanāttikānantaraṃ vipākattiko vutto. Sukhasampayuttā hi dhammā siyā vipākā,
tika-abh04t:122_10: siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā. Tathā adukkhamasukhasampayuttā,
tika-abh04t:122_11: dukkhasampayuttā pana siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammāti iminā nayena avasesattikānaṃ
tika-abh04t:122_12: dukānañca tassa tassa anantaravacane payojanaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:123_0: 3. Vipākaniruttiñca labhantīti tesu vipākasaddassa niruḷhataṃ dasseti. Sukkakaṇhādīti
tika-abh04t:123_1: ādi-saddena akaṇhaasukkaphassādibhāvo pariggahito. Sati pana pāka-saddassa phalapariyāyabhāve
tika-abh04t:123_2: rūpaṃ viya na nihīno pakkaṃ viya visiṭṭho pākoti vipākoti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t:123_3: Sabyāpāratāti saussāhatā. Santāne sabyāpāratāti etena cittappayogasaṅkhātena kiriyābhāvena
tika-abh04t:123_4: vipākadhammānaṃ santānavisesamāha “yato yasmiṃ cittuppāde kusalākusalā cetanā, taṃsantāne
tika-abh04t:123_5: eva tassā vipākuppattī”ti. Ettha ca “sabyāpāratā”ti etena āvajjanadvayaṃ vipākañca
tika-abh04t:123_6: nivatteti, “anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmāne”ti iminā avasiṭṭhaṃ kiriyaṃ nivatteti. Ubhayenapi
tika-abh04t:123_8: hi anusayā upanissayā honti, yato “katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ…pe…
tika-abh04t:123_9: tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā ariyamaggacetanāya avijjāupanissayatā
tika-abh04t:124_0: Abhiññādikusalānanti ādi-saddena “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko”ti iminā tikena
tika-abh04t:124_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ pana saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammādibhāvaṃ na bhajati.
tika-abh04t:124_3: Bhāvanāya pahātabbādīti ādi-saddena dassanena pahātabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Ubhayampi “vipākānuppādane”ti
tika-abh04t:124_4: vacanato gatiupadhikālapayogābhāvena anuppannavipākameva adhippetaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbassapi
tika-abh04t:124_5: pavattivipākassa anujānanato. Yesaṃ pana bhāvanāya pahātabbā avipākā, tesaṃ matena
tika-abh04t:124_6: ādi-saddena dassanena pahātabbassa ahosikammanti evaṃpakārasseva pariggahoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:125_3: vuttaṃ. Upetanti hi upetabbatthe vuccamāne avassaṃ upetakiriyā upetā ca ñāyatīti.
tika-abh04t:125_4: “Rūpadhātuyā kho pana, gahapati, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā,
tika-abh04t:125_5: cetaso adhiṭṭhānā abhinivesā anusayā”tiādīsu “upayo”ti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo adhippetāti
tika-abh04t:125_7: vuttaatthesu yo yo sambhavati yojetuṃ, so soti attho. Na vacanānupubbenāti “kiṃ pana
tika-abh04t:125_8: taṃ upeta”ntiādinā vuttavacanānupubbena na yojetabbo. Sabbapaccayuppannānanti sabbatebhūmakapaccayuppannānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:125_9: Nāpajjati sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato visesatthinā ca viseso anupayujjatīti
tika-abh04t:125_10: taṃ pana visesaṃ vuttappakāraṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ “bodhaneyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:126_0: Upetaṃ dīpetīti yathā “pācariyo”ti ettha pagato ācariyo pācariyoti pa-saddo pagataṃ
tika-abh04t:126_1: dīpeti, evaṃ upa-saddo upetaṃ dīpeti eva, na cettha gatādiatthānaṃ ekantena paccattavacanayogo
tika-abh04t:126_2: icchitoti. Atisaddo viyāti ca idaṃ sasādhanakiriyādīpanasāmaññena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:126_3: Paccayabhāvenāti etena purimanibbattiṃ viseseti. Tena sahajātassapi upādānassa saṅgaho
tika-abh04t:126_4: kato hoti. Sahajātopi hi dhammo paccayabhūto purimanipphanno viya voharīyati yathā
tika-abh04t:126_5: “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā”ti, “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”ti
tika-abh04t:126_6: ca. Dhātukathāyaṃ pakāsitanti “upapattibhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi
tika-abh04t:126_7: sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito. Katihi asaṅgahito. Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena
tika-abh04t:126_8: ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahito”ti evamādiṃ sandhāyāha. Tasmā evāti upādinnasaddānapekkhattā
tika-abh04t:126_9: eva. Avisesetvāti upādinnānupādinnavisesaṃ akatvā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvānativattanato
tika-abh04t:126_10: upādānehi upādātabbāti vā upādāniyā, upādātuṃ vā arahantīti upādāniyā, upādāne niyuttāti
tika-abh04t:126_11: vā upādāniyā ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabboti.
tika-abh04t:127: 5. Vibādhanaṃ pīḷanaṃ kilamanaṃ upatāpo pariḷāho appassaddhibhāvo. Vidūsitā malīnā ca yato keci akilesasabhāvāpi aniṭṭhaphalā gārayhā ca jātā.
tika-abh04t:128_0: 6. “Sīlamattakaṃ, paraṃ viya mattāyā”tiādīsu mattā-saddassa pamāṇavācakatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t:128_1: Mariyādavācako vā mattā-saddo. Vicāro hettha jhānaṅgesu heṭṭhimamariyādo, na paṭhamajjhānaupacārajjhānesu
tika-abh04t:128_2: viya vitakko. Sā pana vicāramariyādatā vitakkābhāvena etesaṃ jātāti avitakkaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:128_3: kataṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – avitakkā hutvā vicāramariyādajhānaṅgesu vicāraheṭṭhimakoṭikāti.
tika-abh04t:128_4: Atha vā īsadattho mattā-saddo “mattāsukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu viya. Ayañhettha attho
tika-abh04t:128_5: – vitakkarahitā bhāvanāya atisukhumabhūtavicārattā īsaṃ vicārā ca avitakkavicāramattāti.
tika-abh04t:128_6: Na hi ito paraṃ vicāro atthīti. Yadi vitakkavisesarahitā vicāramattā, evaṃ sante
tika-abh04t:128_8: aññesampi avitakkānaṃ atthibhāvajotanatthaṃ avitakkavacanaṃ, avitakkā ca vicāramattā
tika-abh04t:128_9: avicārāti nivattetabbā gahetabbā ca, evaṃ sati vicāramattā visesanaṃ, avitakkā visesitabbāti
tika-abh04t:128_10: vicāramattāvitakkāti vattabbanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “visesanavisesitabbabhāvo”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:128_11: Yathākāmanti vattuicchānurūpaṃ. Yena yena hi pakārena dhammesu nivattetabbagahetabbabhāvā
tika-abh04t:128_12: labbhanti, tena tena pakārena visesanavisesitabbabhāvo sambhavatīti. Padānaṃ anukkamo padānukkamo.
tika-abh04t:129_0: Avitakkā savitakkā ca savicārā avicārā cāti avitakkāsavicārā savitakkā avicārāti
tika-abh04t:129_2: vuttaṃ. Itarampi pakāsetunti idaṃ yathā savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakko
tika-abh04t:129_4: “savitakkaavicāro”ti sakkā viññātunti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vitakkābhāvena
tika-abh04t:129_5: ete vicāramattāti ayampi attho visesanivattiatthaṃyeva mattā-saddaṃ gahetvā vutto.
tika-abh04t:129_6: Vicāramattāti hi vicāramattavantoti viññāyamānattā tadaññavisesavirahasāmaññato nivattetvā
tika-abh04t:130_0: 7. Vedayamānāti anubhavamānā. Sukhākāreti iṭṭhākāre, iṭṭhānubhavanākāre vā. Udāsināti
tika-abh04t:130_1: natiapanatirahitā. Sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā tesaṃ byavadhāyikābhāvato. Sukhadukkhāni
tika-abh04t:130_2: viya hi sukhadukkhānaṃ anantaraṃ pavattanato byavadhāyikābhūtā na tehi virujjhati,
tika-abh04t:130_3: na pana sukhadukkhāni anantarāpavattito. “Upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā”ti ayaṃ panattho
tika-abh04t:130_4: idha upekkhā-saddassa sabbupekkhāpariyādānato na vutto. Na hi lobhasampayuttādiupekkhā
tika-abh04t:130_5: upapattito ikkhatīti. Tasmāti yasmā pītisahagatāyeva na sukhasahagatā, sukhasahagatāpi
tika-abh04t:130_6: na pītisahagatā evāti pītisahagatā sukhasahagatā ca aññamaññaṃ bhinnā, tasmā. Satipi
tika-abh04t:130_7: sukhasahagatānaṃ yebhuyyena pītisahagatabhāve yena sukhena samannāgatā sukhasahagatā
tika-abh04t:130_8: eva honti, na pītisahagatā, taṃ sukhaṃ nippītikasukhanti ayaṃ viseso iminā tikena
tika-abh04t:131_0: Siddhoti sāvasesaṃ niravasesañca sukhapītiyo saṅgahetvā pavattehi paṭhamadutiyapadehi
tika-abh04t:131_1: yo pītisahagato dhammaviseso, taṃ sukhaṃ, yo ca sukhasahagato dhammaviseso, sā pītīti
tika-abh04t:131_2: satipi aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāve padantarasaṅgahitabhāvadīpanatosiddho ñāto viditoti
tika-abh04t:131_3: attho. “Catutthajjhānasukhaṃ atipaṇītasukhanti oḷārikaṅgato nīharitvā tassa paṇītabhāvaṃ
