tika-abh04t:131_4: dassetuṃ ayaṃ tiko vutto”ti keci vadanti, tadetaṃ sabbesaṃ sukhavedanāsampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:131_5: idha “sukhasahagatā”ti vuttattā vicāretabbaṃ. Tathā hi “sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:132_0: 8. Nibbānārammaṇataṃ sandhāyāha, na nibbānapaṭivijjhanaṃ, itarathā gotrabhussa dassanabhāvāpatti
tika-abh04t:132_1: acodanīyā siyāti adhippāyo. Nanu ca disvā kattabbakiccakaraṇena sotāpattimaggova
tika-abh04t:132_2: dassananti ukkaṃsagativijānanena nibbānassa paṭivijjhanameva dassananti gotrabhussa
tika-abh04t:132_3: dassanabhāvāpatti na codetabbāvāti? Na, dassanasāmaññasseva suyyamānattā dassanakattabbakiccakaraṇānañca
tika-abh04t:132_4: bhedena vuttattā. Tattha yadipi “paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:132_5: viya abhinnakālassapi bhinnakālassa viya bhedopacāradassanato bhedavacanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t:132_6: dassanavisese pana adhippete dassanasāmaññavacanaṃ na kattabbanti dassanasāmaññamattaṃ
tika-abh04t:132_7: gahetvā codanā katāti “nibbānārammaṇataṃ sandhāyāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Dutiyatatiyamaggānampi
tika-abh04t:132_9: vaḍḍhanā. Sā ca bahulaṃ uppattiyā hotīti āha “punappunaṃ nibbattanenā”ti. Tathā hi
tika-abh04t:132_11: sati. Nanu lokiyasamathavipassanāpi yathābalaṃ kāmacchandādīnaṃ pahāyakā, tatra kathamidaṃ
tika-abh04t:132_12: vuttaṃ, na ca añño pahāyako atthīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “aññehī”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:133_1: Samāso na upapajjati asamatthabhāvato. Yesanti ye tatiyarāsibhāvena vuttā dhammā,
tika-abh04t:133_2: attho tesaṃ. Ubhinnanti visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbatāya dve pahātabbahetusaddāti katvā
tika-abh04t:133_3: vuttaṃ. Etanti “nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesaṃ atthī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:133_4: Tehi dassanabhāvanāpadehi yuttena pahātabbahetukapadena. Evañca katvāti evaṃ dassanabhāvanāpadehi
tika-abh04t:133_5: pahātabbahetukapadassa visuṃ visuṃ yojanato. Evañhi purimapadadvaya…pe… dassanametaṃ
tika-abh04t:133_6: hotīti. Evanti dassanabhāvanāhi napahātabbo hetu etesanti evaṃ atthe sati. “Hetu…pe…
tika-abh04t:133_8: atthaṃ vatvā idāni “atha vā”tiādinā dutiyasseva atthassa yuttabhāvaṃ vibhāvento “gahetabbatthassevā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:134_0: 10. Aññathāti ārammaṇakaraṇamatte adhippete. Kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:134_1: katvāti etena catukiccasādhakaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ vuccatī”ti? Sāmaññajotanāya visese
tika-abh04t:134_2: avaṭṭhānato ariyamaggadhammānaṃyeva ca apacayagāmibhāvato. “Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā
tika-abh04t:134_3: apacayagāmino”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “ariyamaggānaṃ etaṃ adhivacana”nti. Eteneva
tika-abh04t:134_4: vā visesupalakkhaṇahetubhūtena vacanena yathāvutto ārammaṇakaraṇaviseso viññāyati.
tika-abh04t:134_5: Ukkaṃsagativijānanena vā ayamattho veditabbo. Paccavekkhaṇādīnanti vodānādayo saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh04t:134_6: Hetubhāvenāti sampāpakahetubhāvena. Ñāpako kārako sampāpakoti tividho hi hetu, tathā
tika-abh04t:134_8: “ācayagāmino dhammā”ti vuttā, na micchādiṭṭhiādilokiyasammādiṭṭhiādidhammā eva, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:134_10: na ariyamaggadhammā evāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “purimapacchimāna”ntiādi. Tattha
tika-abh04t:134_11: ariyamaggasseva nibbānagāmipaṭipadābhāvo paribyattoti tasseva apacayagāmibhāvo yutto,
tika-abh04t:134_12: tadanuvattakattā pana sesadhamme saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ. Apacaye dukkhaparijānanādinā
tika-abh04t:134_13: sātisayaṃ gamanaṃ yesante apacayagāminoti “maggā eva apacayagāmino”ti vuttaṃ. Purimapacchimānanti
tika-abh04t:134_14: ca imasmiṃ tike paṭhamapadadutiyapadasaṅgahitānaṃ atthānanti attho. “Jayaṃ veraṃ
tika-abh04t:134_15: pasavati, caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭha”ntiādīsu viya sānunāsiko ācaya-saddoti “anunāsikalopo
tika-abh04t:134_16: kato”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “ācina”nti vattabbe “ācaya”nti byattayavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:134_17: Ācayā hutvā gacchantīti etena apacinantīti apacayā, apacayā hutvā gacchanti pavattantīti
tika-abh04t:135: 11. Lokiyesu asekkhabhāvānāpatti daṭṭhabbāti kasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu –
tika-abh04t:136_0: “Sikkhatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā sekkhoti vuccati. Kiñca sikkhati, adhisīlampi sikkhati
tika-abh04t:136_1: adhicittampi sikkhati adhipaññampi sikkhati. Sikkhatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā sekkhoti
tika-abh04t:136_2: vuccati. Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu
tika-abh04t:136_3: guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ
tika-abh04t:136_4: dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati ‘ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
tika-abh04t:137_0: Vacanato yathāvuttakalyāṇaputhujjanassapi sīlādidhammā sekkhāti vuccantīti? Na, pariyāyabhāvato.
tika-abh04t:137_1: Nippariyāyena hi sekkhāsekkhabhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ maggaphaladhammesu evāti lokiyesu
tika-abh04t:137_3: sikkhāphalabhāvena pavattanato heṭṭhimaphaladhammā viya sikkhāsu jātātiādiatthehi
tika-abh04t:137_4: sekkhā siyuṃ, heṭṭhimaphaladhammāpi vā sikkhāphalabhāvena pavattanato arahattaphaladhammā
tika-abh04t:137_5: viya asekkhāti codanaṃ manasikatvā “pariniṭṭhitasikkhākiccattā”ti vuttaṃ, tathā “heṭṭhimaphalesu
tika-abh04t:137_6: panā”tiādi. “Taṃ eva sāliṃ bhuñjāmi, sā eva tittirī, tāni eva osadhānī”tiādīsu taṃsadisesu
tika-abh04t:137_7: tabbohāro daṭṭhabbo. Etena ca sekkhasadisā asekkhā yathā “amanusso”ti vuttaṃ hotīti
tika-abh04t:137_8: aññe. Aññattha “ariṭṭha”ntiādīsu vuddhiatthepi a-kāro dissatīti vuddhippattā sekkhā
tika-abh04t:138_1: hettha labbhatīti. Akusalaviddhaṃsanarasattā vā kusalānaṃ tattha sātisayakiccayuttataṃ
tika-abh04t:138_3: Vipākakiriyesu dīghasantānatāva, na kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatā vipulaphalatā cāti
tika-abh04t:138_4: attho. “Vipulaṃ phalaṃ vipulaphala”nti evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne vipākesupi vipulaphalatā
tika-abh04t:138_5: labbhateva. Sopi ekasesanayena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti veditabbo. Mahantehi gatā paṭipannāti
tika-abh04t:138_6: ayaṃ panattho tiṇṇampi sādhāraṇoti. Guṇato ayaṃ ettakoti sattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ karontā
tika-abh04t:138_7: viya pavattantīti oḷārikā kilesā “pamāṇakarā”ti vuttā. Tehi parito khaṇḍitā paricchinnāti
tika-abh04t:138_8: parittā. Satipi kehici paricchinnatte mahāpamāṇabhāvena gatā pavattāti mahaggatā.
tika-abh04t:138_9: Paricchedakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sukhumānampi agocarabhāvato tehi na kathañcipi paricchinnā
tika-abh04t:138_10: vītikkantāti aparicchinnā appamāṇā, yato te “apariyāpannā”tipi vuccanti.
tika-abh04t:139_0: 14. Tittiṃ na janenti santataratāya asecanakabhāvato. Ettha ca “pamāṇakarehī”tiādiko
tika-abh04t:139_2: likhīyati, yathāṭhāne eva pana ānetvā vattabbo.
tika-abh04t:140_1: vinā vipallāsabalavabhāvena na hotīti “vipariyāsadaḷhatāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Etenāti “vipākadāne
tika-abh04t:140_2: satī”tiādinā satipi kālaniyame vipākuppādane sāsaṅkavacanena. Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttanayena
tika-abh04t:140_3: niyatatāya atippasaṅgo dunnivāro, tasmā. Balavatā…pe… pavattīti etena asamānajātikena
tika-abh04t:140_4: anivattanīyavipākataṃ, samānajātikena ca vipākānuppādanepi anantaraṃ vipākuppādanasamatthatāya
tika-abh04t:140_5: avihantabbataṃ anantarikānaṃ dasseti. Yato tesaṃ vipākadhammatā viya sabhāvasiddhā
tika-abh04t:140_6: niyatānantariyatā. Aññassa…pe… dānatoti imināpi asamānajātikādīhi anivattanīyaphalataṃ eva vibhāveti.
tika-abh04t:141_0: Codako adhippāyaṃ ajānanto “nanū”tiādinā atippasaṅgameva codeti. Itaro “nāpajjatī”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:141_1: attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Ekanteti avassambhāvini. Sanniyatattāti sampādane janane
tika-abh04t:141_2: niyatabhāvato. Uparatā avipaccanasabhāvāsaṅkā yesu tāni uparatāvipacca…pe… saṅkāni,
tika-abh04t:141_3: tabbhāvo upa…pe… saṅkattaṃ, tasmā. “Na samatthatāvighātattāti balavatāpi ānantariyena
tika-abh04t:141_4: anupahantabbataṃ āha. Upatthambhakāni anubalappadāyakāni honti uppattiyā santānassa
tika-abh04t:141_5: visesitattā. Tena nesaṃ vipākānuppādanepi amoghavuttitaṃ āha.
tika-abh04t:142_2: tiṇṇaṃ nayānaṃ asaṅgahitasaṅgaṇhanavasenāti vuttaṃ. Hetubahutāvasenāti bahuhetukassa
tika-abh04t:142_3: paṭhamanayassa anantaraṃ bahuhetukatāsāmaññena nikkhepakaṇḍapāḷiyaṃ tatiyaṃ vuttanayo
tika-abh04t:142_4: idha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dutiyaṃ vutto. Yathāsakaṃ paccayehi pavattamānesu nirīhakesu dhammesu
tika-abh04t:142_5: kesañci anuvattanīyabhāvo na kevalaṃ dhammasabhāvatoyeva, atha kho purimadhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:142_6: pavattivisesenapi hotīti āha “pubbābhisaṅkhāravasenā”ti. Pavattiviseso hi purimapurimānaṃ
tika-abh04t:142_8: garukārayamāno. Udāharaṇavasenāti nidassanavasena, na niravasesadassanavasena. Yasmā
tika-abh04t:142_9: panātiādinā yathāvuttaṃ atthaṃ pāṭhantarena sādheti. Tattha hi adhipatipaccayassa
tika-abh04t:142_10: paccanīye ṭhitattā maggo adhipati maggādhipatīti ayamattho labbhatīti. Samānasaddatthavasenāti
tika-abh04t:143_0: 17. Uppanna-saddo uppādādiṃ paṭipajjamāno, patvā vigato cāti duvidhesu atthesu ubhayesampi
tika-abh04t:143_1: vācako, na purimānaṃyevāti tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “anuppannā”tiādimāha. Tattha uppannabhāvo
tika-abh04t:143_2: uppādādippattatā. Tena atītāpi saṅgahitā honti. Tenevāha “sabbo uppannabhāvo”ti.
tika-abh04t:143_4: attho. Yo vā uppādādippatto attano ca sabhāvaṃ dhāreti paccayehi ca dhārīyati, so
tika-abh04t:143_5: uppannadhammoti paccuppannabhāvo uppannadhammabhāvoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t:143_6: Uppannadhamme vatvā “anuppannā”ti vacanaṃ na yathādhigatapaṭisedhananti kathamidaṃ
tika-abh04t:143_7: paccetabbanti āha “yadi hī”tiādi. Keci panettha “uppannāti padena atītāpi saṅgahitā.
tika-abh04t:143_8: Yadi na saṅgahitā, nibbānaṃ viya tepi navattabbāti vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca tathā vutta”nti
tika-abh04t:143_9: vadanti, taṃ pana tesaṃ matimattameva. Ayaṃ pana tiko dvinnaṃ addhānaṃ vasena pūretvā
tika-abh04t:143_10: dassitoti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhatīti. Evaṃ sante kasmā atītā navattabbāti na vuttāti?
tika-abh04t:143_11: Dhammavasena asaṅgahitattābhāvato. Dhammavasena hi asaṅgahitaṃ nibbānaṃ tattha navattabbaṃ
tika-abh04t:143_12: jātaṃ, na ca niyogato atītā nāma dhammā keci atthi, ye idha asaṅgahitattā navattabbā
tika-abh04t:143_13: siyunti. Phalanibbattito kāraṇassa puretaraṃ nibbatti idha pariniṭṭhitasaddena vuccati,
tika-abh04t:143_14: na tassa hutvā vigatabhāvoti āha “anāgate vā”ti. Yato metteyyassa bhagavato uppajjanakaphalampi “uppādī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh04t:144: 20. Yassa jhānā vuṭṭhahitvātiādinā “tenānandā”tiādipāḷiyā heṭṭhāpāḷiṃ atthavasena dasseti. Ayañhi tattha pāḷi –
tika-abh04t:145_0: “Kathañcānanda, bhikkhu ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapeti sannisādeti ekodiṃ karoti
tika-abh04t:145_1: samādahati. Idhānanda, bhikkhu vivicceva…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
tika-abh04t:145_2: Evaṃ kho…pe… samādahati. So ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasi karoti, tassa ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ
tika-abh04t:145_3: manasikaroto suññatāya cittaṃ na pakkhandati…pe… muccati. Evaṃ santametaṃ, ānanda,
tika-abh04t:145_4: bhikkhu evaṃ sampajānāti ajjhattaṃ kho me suññataṃ manasikaroto ajjhattaṃ suññatāya
tika-abh04t:145_5: cittaṃ na pakkhandati…pe… muccatīti, itiha tattha sampajāno hoti. So bahiddhā suññataṃ…pe…
tika-abh04t:145_6: ajjhattabahiddhā suññataṃ…pe… so āneñjaṃ manasi karoti, tassa āneñjaṃ manasikaroto
tika-abh04t:145_7: āneñjāya cittaṃ na pakkhandati…pe… muccatīti, itiha tattha sampajāno hoti. Tenānanda, bhikkhunā”ti.
tika-abh04t:146_0: Tattha ajjhattasuññatādīsūti ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhā ca suññatāya āneñje
tika-abh04t:146_2: vuṭṭhitassa hi ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasikaroto tattha cittaṃ na pakkhandati. Tato
tika-abh04t:146_3: “parassa santāne nu kho katha”nti bahiddhā manasi karoti, tatthapi na pakkhandati.
tika-abh04t:146_4: Tato “kālena attano santāne, kālena parassa santāne nu kho katha”nti ajjhattabahiddhā
tika-abh04t:146_5: manasi karoti, tatthapi na pakkhandati. Tato ubhatobhāgavimutto hotukāmo “arūpasamāpattiyaṃ
tika-abh04t:146_6: nu kho katha”nti āneñjaṃ manasi karoti, tatthapi na pakkhandati. “Idāni me cittaṃ
tika-abh04t:146_7: na pakkhandatī”ti vissaṭṭhavīriyena na bhavitabbaṃ, pādakajjhānameva pana sādhukaṃ
tika-abh04t:146_8: punappunaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ, evamassa rukkhaṃ chindato pharasumhi avahante punappunaṃ
tika-abh04t:146_9: nisitanisitaṃ kāretvā chindantassa chijje pharasu viya kammaṭṭhāne manasikāro vahatīti
tika-abh04t:147_0: Atthato ca asamānattāti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ. Nanu yesu atthesu ajjhatta-saddo vattati,
tika-abh04t:147_1: te sabbe dassetvā idhādhippetatthaniddhāraṇatthaṃ atthuddhāravasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Cakkhādīsu
tika-abh04t:147_2: ca ajjhattika-saddo ajjhattānaṃ abbhantaratāvisesamupādāya pavattati, yato te ajjhattaajjhattāti
tika-abh04t:147_3: vuccanti. Apica “cha ajjhattikānī”ti idaṃ ajjhattika-saddassa cakkhādīnaṃ ajjhattabhāvavibhāvanasabbhāvato
tika-abh04t:147_4: idha udāharaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ajjhattikaduke “ajjhattāva ajjhattikā”ti
tika-abh04t:147_5: vuttaṃ. Evañca sati na ettha saddato asamānatāpi siyā, tasmāyeva yathāvuttacodanaṃ
tika-abh04t:147_6: visodhento “ayaṃ panetthā”tiādimāha. Tenāti tasmā. Taṃvācakassāti ajjhattajjhattavācakassa
tika-abh04t:148_0: “Na kho, ānanda, bhikkhu sobhati saṅgaṇikārāmo saṅgaṇikārato saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ anuyutto”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:148_1: pabbajitāsāruppassa nekkhammasukhādinikāmalābhitāya abhāvassa ca dassanena saṅgaṇikārāmatāya,
tika-abh04t:148_2: “nāhaṃ, ānanda, ekaṃ rūpampi samanupassāmi, yattha rattassa yathābhiratassa rūpassa
tika-abh04t:148_3: vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na uppajjeyyuṃ sokapari…pe… upāyāsā”ti evaṃ rūpādiratiyā ca
tika-abh04t:148_4: ādīnavaṃ vatvā sace koci duppaññajātiko pabbajito vadeyya “sammāsambuddho khette
tika-abh04t:148_5: paviṭṭhā gāviyo viya amheyeva gaṇato nīharati, ekībhāve niyojeti, sayaṃ pana rājarājamahāmattādīhi
tika-abh04t:148_6: parivuto viharatī”ti, tassa vacanokāsupacchedanatthaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantāya parisāya
tika-abh04t:148_7: majjhe nisinnopi tathāgato ekakovāti dassanatthaṃ “ayaṃ kho panā”ti desanā āraddhāti
tika-abh04t:148_10: Tenevāha “ajjhatta”ntiādi. Tattha dutiye vikappe ṭhāna-saddo kāraṇapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t:149_0: “Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, aggivessana, anekasatāya parisāya dhammaṃ desetā, apissu
tika-abh04t:149_1: maṃ ekameko evaṃ maññati ‘mamevārabbha samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desetī’ti. Na kho panetaṃ,
tika-abh04t:149_2: aggivessana, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yāvadeva viññāpanatthāya tathāgato paresaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-abh04t:149_3: desetīti. So kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:149_4: samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi, ekodiṃ karomi, samādahāmi
tika-abh04t:151_0: 22. Aññehi anidassanehi aññaṃ viya katvā yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti. Dhammasabhāvasāmaññenātiādinā
tika-abh04t:151_1: kiñcāpi rūpāyatanato añño nidassanabhāvo nāma natthi, dhammasabhāvo pana atthi. Tato
tika-abh04t:151_2: ca rūpāyatanassa viseso nidassanabhāvena katoti tadaññadhammavisesakaro nidassanabhāvo
tika-abh04t:151_3: rūpāyatanato anaññopi añño viya katvā upacaritoti dasseti. Atthaviseso sāmaññavisesatthabhedo.
tika-abh04t:151_4: Sayaṃ sampattānaṃ phoṭṭhabbadhammānaṃ, nissayavasena sampattānaṃ ghānajivhākāyānaṃ
tika-abh04t:151_5: gandharasānañca, itaresaṃ asampattānaṃ. Aññamaññapatanaṃ aññamaññassa yogyadese avaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh04t:151_7: heṭṭhā upari ca saṃsīdanalaṅghanādippavattimāha. Vikāruppatti visadisuppatti, visayassa
tika-abh04t:154_1: vā. Atha vā samānadesānaṃ ekavatthukattā samānagahetabbabhāvānaṃ ekuppāditoti attho.
tika-abh04t:154_2: Ye dhammā hetusahagatā, te hetūhi saha saṅgayhanti. Yo ca tesaṃ sahetukabhāvo, so
tika-abh04t:154_3: sahajātādīhi hetūhi katoti katvā vuttaṃ “samā…pe… sabbhāva”nti. Ādi-saddena cettha
tika-abh04t:154_8: Anekappakārā hi dhammā. Teneva “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
tika-abh04t:154_9: āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayañca attho tikesupi daṭṭhabbo. Yesaṃ vineyyānaṃ yehi
tika-abh04t:154_10: pakāravisesehi dhammānaṃ vibhāvane kate paṭivedho hoti, tesaṃ tappakārabhedehi dhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:154_11: vibhāvanaṃ. Yesaṃ pana yena ekeneva pakārena vibhāvane paṭivedho hoti, tesampi taṃ
tika-abh04t:154_13: Nanu ekena pakārena jānantassa tadaññappakāravibhāvanaṃ aphalaṃ hotīti? Na hoti paṭisambhidāppabhedassa
tika-abh04t:154_14: upanissayattā. Te pakārā etesanti tappakārā, tabbhāvo tappakāratā. Iminā dhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:155_0: Aññatthāpīti “ahetukā ceva dhammā na ca hetū”tiādīsu. Yathā paṭhamadukekadese gahetvā
tika-abh04t:155_1: dutiyatatiyadukehi saddhiṃ chaṭṭhadukanaye yojanā “hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī”tiādayo
tika-abh04t:155_2: tayo dukā labbhanti, evaṃ dutiyatatiyadukekadese gahetvā paṭhamadukena saddhiṃ yojanāya
tika-abh04t:155_3: “sahetukā dhammā hetūpi na hetūpi, ahetukā dhammā hetūpi na hetūpi, hetusampayuttā
tika-abh04t:155_4: dhammā hetūpi na hetūpi, hetuvippayuttā dhammā hetūpi na hetūpī”ti cattāro dukā labbhanti,
tika-abh04t:155_5: te pana vuttanayeneva sakkā dassetunti na dassitāti daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ vuttehi
tika-abh04t:155_6: catutthapañcamehi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitehi purimehi dvīhi ninnānākaraṇato ete na vuttā.
tika-abh04t:155_7: Sannivesavisesamattameva hettha visesoti. Teneva hi ninnānatthattā pāḷiyaṃ āgatadukesu
tika-abh04t:155_8: yathāniddhāritadukānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ avarodhanena avuttataṃ dassetuṃ “etesu panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:156_0: Atha vā “etena vā gatidassanenā”tiādinā vakkhamānanayena “hetū ceva dhammā ahetukā
tika-abh04t:156_1: cā”tiādīnaṃ sambhavantānaṃ dukānaṃ saṅgahe sati etesampi saṅgaho siyā. Yato vā dukato
tika-abh04t:156_2: padaṃ niddhāretvā dukantaraṃ vuccati, tena sati ca nānatte dukantaraṃ labbhati, na
tika-abh04t:156_3: cettha koci viseso yathāvuttadukehīti saṃvaṇṇanāsu na dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha
tika-abh04t:156_4: ca yathā sahetukadukato hetusampayuttadukassa, hetusahetukadukato ca hetuhetusampayuttadukassa
tika-abh04t:156_5: padatthamattato nānattaṃ, na sabhāvatthato. Evaṃ santepi sahetukahetusahetukaduke
tika-abh04t:156_6: vatvā itarepi vuttā, evaṃ hetusampayuttahetuhetusampayuttadukādīhi sabhāvatthanānattābhāvepi
tika-abh04t:156_8: vuttattā “hetusahagatā dhammā, na hetusahagatā dhammā, hetusahajātā dhammā, na hetusahajātā
tika-abh04t:156_9: dhammā. Hetusaṃsaṭṭhā dhammā, hetuvisaṃsaṭṭhā dhammā. Hetusamuṭṭhānā dhammā, na hetusamuṭṭhānā
tika-abh04t:156_10: dhammā. Hetusahabhuno dhammā, na hetusahabhuno dhammā”tiādīnaṃ, tathā “hetū ceva
tika-abh04t:156_11: dhammā hetusahagatā cā”tiādīnaṃ, “na hetū kho pana dhammā hetusahagatāpi, na hetusahagatāpī”tiādīnañca
tika-abh04t:156_12: sambhavantānaṃ anekesaṃ dukānaṃ saṅgaho anuññāto viya dissati. Tathā hi vakkhati
tika-abh04t:156_13: “etena vā gatidassanenā”tiādi. Evaṃ āsavagocchakādīsupi ayamattho yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-abh04t:156_14: vattabbo. Dhammānaṃ vā sabhāvakiccādiṃ bodhetabbākārañca yāthāvato jānantena dhammasāminā
tika-abh04t:156_15: yattakā dukā vuttā, tattakesu ṭhātabbaṃ. Addhā hi te dukā na vattabbā, ye bhagavatā
tika-abh04t:156_16: na vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Na hetuhetusampayuttaduko chaṭṭhadukena ninnānatthoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:156_17: Tesūti paṭhamadukatatiyadukesu. Yadi dukantarehi dukantarapadehi ca samānatthattā
tika-abh04t:156_18: etesaṃ dukānaṃ dukantarapadānañca avacanaṃ, evaṃ sati chaṭṭhaduke paṭhamapadampi
tika-abh04t:156_19: na vattabbaṃ catutthaduke dutiyapadena samānatthattā. Tathā ca chaṭṭhadukoyeva na
tika-abh04t:156_20: hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “catutthaduke”tiādi. Dukapūraṇatthanti idaṃ samānatthataṃyeva
tika-abh04t:156_21: sandhāya vuttaṃ, desanāviseso pana vijjatiyeva. Atthantaratābhāvepi pakārabhedahetukaṃ
tika-abh04t:156_22: dukantaravacananti dassito hi ayamatthoti. Etena gatidassanenāti atthavisesābhāvepi
tika-abh04t:156_23: chaṭṭhadukapūraṇasaṅkhātena nayadassanena. Paṭhamaduke…pe… dassito pāḷiyaṃ vuttehi
tika-abh04t:156_24: catutthapañcamehi, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitehi purimehi dvīhi, idha dassitehi catūhi.
tika-abh04t:156_25: Tesūti dutiyatatiyadukesu. Paṭhamadukapakkhepena dassito pāḷiyaṃ chaṭṭhadukena itaratra
tika-abh04t:157_0: 7-13. Paccayabhāvamattena…pe… atthitanti etena na paṭiladdhattatāsaṅkhātā sasabhāvatāva
tika-abh04t:157_1: atthitā, atha kho paṭipakkhena anirodho appahīnatā anipphāditaphalatā kāraṇāsamugghātena
tika-abh04t:157_2: phalanibbattanārahatā cāti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Tathā hi “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti
tika-abh04t:157_3: ettha “satī”ti iminā vacanena yena vinā yaṃ na hoti, taṃ atītādipi kāraṇaṃ saṅgahitamevāti.
tika-abh04t:157_4: Tenevāha “na sahetu…pe… kālānamevā”ti. Same…pe… dīpeti samecca sambhūya paccayehi
tika-abh04t:157_5: katanti saṅkhatanti. Ayametesaṃ visesoti ayaṃ paccayanibbattānaṃ paccayavantatā anekapaccayanipphāditatā
tika-abh04t:157_6: ca dukadvaye purimapadatthānaṃ bhedo, itaresaṃ pana purimapadasaṅgahitadhammavidhurasabhāvatāyāti.
tika-abh04t:157_8: dhammānaṃ avuttattā vuttaṃ. Suttantamātikāyaṃ pana niddhāritasarūpasaṅkhāvisesattā
tika-abh04t:157_9: vinicchitatthaparicchedāyeva avijjādayo vuttāti. “Pathavīādi rūpa”nti etasmiṃ atthavikappe
tika-abh04t:157_10: anekahetukesu cittuppādesu hetūnaṃ sahetukabhāvo viya sabbesaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ rūpibhāvo
tika-abh04t:157_11: siddhoti āha “purima…pe… pajjatī”ti. Na hi tesu niyato katthaci saṃsāmibhāvoti. Aniccānupassanāya
tika-abh04t:157_12: vā lujjati chijjati vinassatīti gahetabbo lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ
tika-abh04t:157_13: natthi lokatā. Tenevāti dukkhasaccabhāvena pariññeyyabhāvenāti attho.
tika-abh04t:158_0: Dukabahutā āpajjatīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu vīsati dukā vibhattā, “avuttopi yathālābhavasena
tika-abh04t:158_1: veditabbo”ti ca vakkhatīti dukabahutā icchitā evāti? Saccametaṃ, taṃyeva pana dukabahutaṃ
tika-abh04t:158_2: anicchanto evamāha. Apica dukabahutā āpajjati, sā ca kho viññāṇabhedānusārinī, tatrāpi
tika-abh04t:158_3: kāmāvacarakusalato ñāṇasampayuttāni, tathā mahākiriyato manodvārāvajjananti evaṃpakārānaṃ
tika-abh04t:158_5: Abyāpibhāve pana dosaṃ dassento “tathā ca…pe… siyā”ti āha. Niddesena ca viruddhanti
tika-abh04t:158_6: “ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā, na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā”tiādinā rūpāyatanādīnaṃ paccekacakkhuviññāṇādinā
tika-abh04t:158_7: kenaci viññeyyataṃ, sotaviññāṇādinā kenaci naviññeyyatañca dassentena nikkheparāsiniddesena
tika-abh04t:158_8: “dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hotī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ, tathā atthuddhāraniddesenapi
tika-abh04t:158_9: atthato na sametīti attho. Tatthāti tassaṃ nikkheparāsisaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ. Yo ca paṭisedho
tika-abh04t:158_10: kato atthanānattato dukaṃ dassetunti adhippāyo. Na hi sama…pe… sedhetunti etena “ye
tika-abh04t:158_11: te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā, na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā”ti ettakesu niddesapadesu dukapadadvayappavatti
tika-abh04t:159_0: Tathevāti ubhinnaṃ kecina-saddānaṃ aniyamato cakkhusotādinissayavohārena cakkhusotaviññāṇādiko
tika-abh04t:159_1: bhinnasabhāvoyeva dhammo atthoti dassanavasena. Rūpāyatanameva hi cakkhusotaviññāṇehi
tika-abh04t:159_2: viññeyyāviññeyyabhāvato “kenaci viññeyyaṃ kenaci naviññeyya”nti ca vuccatīti. Yadi
tika-abh04t:159_3: evaṃ imasmimpi pakkhe dukabahutā āpajjatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “na cetthā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:159_4: Viññātabbabhedenāti viññātabbavisesena, viññeyyekadesenāti attho. Dukabhedoti dukaviseso,
tika-abh04t:159_5: kenaci viññeyyaduko, tappabhedoyeva vā. Samatto pariyatto paripuṇṇoti attho. Yattakā
tika-abh04t:159_6: viññātabbā tattakā dukāti dukabhedāpajjanappakāradassanaṃ. Evañca satītiādinā imissā
tika-abh04t:159_7: saṃvaṇṇanāya laddhaguṇaṃ dasseti. “Ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā, na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā”ti
tika-abh04t:159_8: rūpāyatanasseva vuttattā atthabhedābhāvato kathamayaṃ duko hotīti āha “viññāṇanānattenā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:159_9: Yadi pana sabbaviññātabbasaṅgahe dukosamatto hoti, nikkheparāsiniddeso kathaṃ nīyatīti
tika-abh04t:160_0: Ettha pana yathā viññāṇanānattena viññātabbaṃ bhinditvā duke vuccamāne satipi viññātabbānaṃ
tika-abh04t:160_1: bahubhāve yattakā viññātabbā, tattakā dukāti natthi dukabahutā dukasaṅgahitadhammekadesesu
tika-abh04t:160_2: dukapadadvayappavattidassanabhāvato. Evaṃ dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattena duke vuccamānepi
tika-abh04t:160_3: yattakāni viññāṇāni, tattakā dukāti natthi dukabahutā dukasaṅga…pe… bhāvato eva.
tika-abh04t:160_4: Na hi ekaṃyeva viññāṇaṃ “kenaci kenacī”ti vuttaṃ, kintu aparampīti sabbaviññāṇasaṅgahe
tika-abh04t:160_5: duko samatto hoti, na ca katthaci dukassa pacchedo atthi indriyaviññāṇānaṃ viya manoviññāṇassapi
tika-abh04t:160_6: visayassa bhinnattā. Na hi atītārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ anāgatādiārammaṇaṃ hoti, anāgatārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:160_7: vā atītādiārammaṇaṃ, tasmā yathāladdhavisesena visiṭṭhesu manoviññāṇabhedesu tassa
tika-abh04t:160_8: tassa visayassa ālambanānālambanavasena dukapadadvayappavatti na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-abh04t:160_9: Teneva ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “manoviññāṇena pana kenaci viññeyyañceva aviññeyyañcāti ayamattho
tika-abh04t:160_10: atthi, tasmā so avuttopi yathālābhavasena veditabbo”ti bhūmibhedavasena yathālābhaṃ
tika-abh04t:160_12: gahetvā vuttaṃ. Pāḷi pana indriyaviññāṇehi nayadassanavasena āgatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:160_13: Evañca katvā imissāpi atthavaṇṇanāya “kenacī”ti padaṃ aniyamena sabbaviññāṇasaṅgāhakanti
tika-abh04t:160_14: siddhaṃ hoti, niddesena ca na koci virodho. Cakkhuviññeyyanasotaviññeyyabhāvehi dukapadadvayappavatti
tika-abh04t:160_15: dassitā, na pana cakkhuviññeyyācakkhuviññeyyabhāvehi visesakāraṇābhāvato. Kiñca “ye
tika-abh04t:160_16: vā panā”ti padantarasampiṇḍanatopi “ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā…pe… na te dhammā
tika-abh04t:160_17: cakkhuviññeyyā”ti ettāvatā dukapadadvayappavatti dassitāti viññāyati. Padantarabhāvadassanattho
tika-abh04t:160_18: hi yevāpana-saddo yathā “ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā. Ye vā pana kusalamūlā,
tika-abh04t:160_19: sabbe te dhammā kusalā”tiādīsu. Aññathā “ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā, na te dhammā
tika-abh04t:160_20: sotaviññeyyā. Ye te dhammā sotaviññeyyā, na te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā”ti pāḷi abhavissa.
tika-abh04t:160_21: Yaṃ pana vadanti “ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā…pe… na te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyāti iminā
tika-abh04t:160_22: atthato dve dukā vuttā hontī”ti, tadapi cakkhuviññeyyācakkhuviññeyyataṃ sotaviññeyyāsotaviññeyyatañca
tika-abh04t:160_24: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etena pāḷipaṭisedhanañca nivāritaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ paṭisedhanasseva abhāvato.
tika-abh04t:160_25: Tathā yassa ārammaṇassa vijānanabhāvena yo attho vuccamāno aniyamadassanatthaṃ “kenacī”ti
tika-abh04t:160_26: vutto, soyeva tato aññassa avijānanabhāvena vuccamāno aniyamadassanatthaṃ puna “kenacī”ti
tika-abh04t:160_27: vuttoti tadatthadassane tenevāti ayaṃ padattho na sambhavatīti na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh04t:160_28: Evamettha yathā aṭṭhakathā avaṭṭhitā, tathā attho yujjatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:161_1: “asucibhāvena sandantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthāti vaṇe. Paggharaṇaka…pe… saddoti etena āsavo
tika-abh04t:161_2: viya āsavoti ayampi attho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gotrabhu…pe… vuttānīti etena gotrabhuggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:161_3: upalakkhaṇaṃ yathā “kākehi sappi rakkhitabba”nti dasseti. Gotrabhusadisā gotrabhūti
tika-abh04t:161_4: pana atthe sati guṇappadhānatthānaṃ ekena saddena avacanīyattā vodānādayova vuttā
tika-abh04t:161_5: bhaveyyuṃ. Atha vā gotrabhūti ekasesena sāmaññena vā ayaṃ niddesoti veditabbaṃ. Abhividhivisayaṃ
tika-abh04t:162_0: Sampayuttehi āsavehi taṃsahitatā āsavasahitatā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā sahetukānaṃ
tika-abh04t:162_1: sampayuttehi hetūhi sahetukatā, na evaṃ sāsavāti vuttadhammānaṃ sampayuttehi āsavehi
tika-abh04t:162_2: sāsavatā, atha kho vippayuttehīti. Dukantare avuttapadabhāvoyevettha dukayojanāya
tika-abh04t:162_3: ñāyāgatatā. Yadi evaṃ hetugocchake kathanti āha “hetugocchake panā”tiādi. Paṭhame
tika-abh04t:162_4: duke dutiyassa pakkhepe ekoti catutthadukamāha. Paṭhame duke tatiyassa pakkhepe dveti
tika-abh04t:162_5: “āsavā ceva dhammā āsavavippayuttā ca, āsavavippayuttā ceva dhammā no ca āsavā”ti
tika-abh04t:162_6: iminā saddhiṃ pañcamadukamāha. Paṭhamassa dutiye duke pakkhepe ekoti “no āsavā dhammā
tika-abh04t:162_7: sāsavāpi anāsavāpī”ti ayameko. Tatiye paṭhamassa pakkhepe dveti “āsavā dhammā āsavasampayuttāpi
tika-abh04t:162_8: āsavavippayuttāpi, no āsavādhammā āsavasampayuttāpi āsavavippayuttāpī”ti ime dve.
tika-abh04t:162_9: Tatiye dutiyassa pakkhepe ekoti “sāsavā dhammā āsavasampayuttāpi āsavavippayuttāpī”ti
tika-abh04t:162_10: eko. Dutiye tatiyassa pakkhepe ekoti chaṭṭhadukamāha. Tīhīti catutthapañcamachaṭṭhehi.
tika-abh04t:162_11: Itareti tadavasiṭṭhā pañca. Te pana paṭhame tatiyadukadutiyapadapakkhepe eko, dutiye
tika-abh04t:162_12: paṭhamadukadutiyapadapakkhepe eko, tatiye paṭhamassa ekekapadapakkhepe dve, tatiye
tika-abh04t:162_13: dutiyadukapaṭhamapadapakkhepe ekoti evaṃ veditabbā. “Sāsavā dhammā āsavāpi no āsavāpi.
tika-abh04t:162_14: Āsavasampayuttā dhammā āsavāpi no āsavāpi. Āsavavippayuttā dhammā āsavāpi no āsavāpī”ti
tika-abh04t:162_15: etesampi, “āsavasahagatā dhammā no āsavasahagatā dhammā”ti evamādīnañca aggahaṇe
tika-abh04t:162_16: kāraṇaṃ gahaṇanayo ca pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:163_0: Esa nayoti yo esa paṭhamaduke dutiyadukapakkhepādiko upāyo idha āsavagocchake vutto,
tika-abh04t:163_1: esa nayo saṃyojanagocchakādīsu dukantaraniddhāraṇeti attho. Tattha pāḷiyaṃ anāgatadukā
tika-abh04t:163_2: saṃyojanagocchake tāva “saṃyojanā ceva dhammā saṃyojanavippayuttā ca, saṃyojanavippayuttā
tika-abh04t:163_3: ceva dhammā no ca saṃyojanā, saṃyojanā dhammā saṃyojanasampayuttāpi saṃyojanavippayuttāpi,
tika-abh04t:163_4: no saṃyojanā dhammā saṃyojanasampayuttāpi saṃyojanavippayuttāpi, no saṃyojanā dhammā
tika-abh04t:163_5: saṃyojaniyāpi asaṃyojaniyāpi, saṃyojaniyā dhammā saṃyojanasampayuttāpi saṃyojanavippayuttāpī”ti
tika-abh04t:163_6: pañca. Evaṃ ganthaoghayogaupādānagocchakesu paccekaṃ pañca. Nīvaraṇagocchake pana
tika-abh04t:163_7: nīvaraṇānaṃ nīvaraṇavippayuttabhāvābhāvato “no nīvaraṇā dhammā nīvaraṇiyāpi anīvaraṇiyāpi,
tika-abh04t:163_8: no nīvaraṇā dhammā nīvaraṇasampayuttāpi nīvaraṇavippayuttāpi, nīvaraṇiyā dhammā nīvaraṇasampayuttāpi
tika-abh04t:163_9: nīvaraṇavippayuttāpī”ti tayo. Tathā parāmāsagocchake “no parāmāsā dhammā parāmaṭṭhāpi
tika-abh04t:163_10: aparāmaṭṭhāpi, no parāmāsā dhammā parāmāsasampayuttāpi parāmāsavippayuttāpi, parāmaṭṭhā
tika-abh04t:163_11: dhammā parāmāsasampayuttāpi parāmāsavippayuttāpī”ti. Kilesagocchake “no kilesā dhammā
tika-abh04t:163_12: saṃkilesikāpi asaṃkilesikāpi, no kilesā dhammā saṃkiliṭṭhāpi asaṃkiliṭṭhāpi, no kilesā
tika-abh04t:163_13: dhammā kilesasampayuttāpi kilesavippayuttāpi, saṃkilesikā dhammā saṃkiliṭṭhāpi asaṃkiliṭṭhāpi,
tika-abh04t:163_14: saṃkilesikā dhammā kilesasampayuttāpi kilesavippayuttāpi, asaṃkiliṭṭhā dhammā saṃkilesikāpi
tika-abh04t:163_15: asaṃkilesikāpī”ti cha dukāti evaṃ veditabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-abh04t:164_0: 20-25. Paccayabhāvenāti saṃyojanatthaṃ dasseti. Yathāsakaṃ paccayabhāvo eva hi kāmarāgādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:164_1: vaṭṭasaṃyojananti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva saṃyojanabhāvoti āha “satipī”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:164_2: Aññesanti saṃyojanehi aññesaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ. Tappaccayabhāveti tesaṃ kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ
tika-abh04t:164_3: paccayabhāve. Orambhāgiyuddhaṃbhāgiyabhāvena saṅgahitā paricchinnā ora…pe… saṅgahitā,
tika-abh04t:164_5: niyamoti katvā āha “taṃtaṃ…pe… hotī”ti. Tena saṃyojanānaṃ bhāve yathāvuttaniyamānaṃ
tika-abh04t:164_6: kammūpapattibhavānaṃ bhāvaṃ dassetvā tadabhāve abhāvaṃ dassento “na cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:164_7: Bandhanaṃ aseribhāvakaraṇaṃ andubandhanādayo viya. Ganthakaraṇaṃ avacchinnatākaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t:164_8: Cakkalakaṃ pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalaṃ. Na codetabbanti paññācakkhunā pacurajanassa
tika-abh04t:164_9: passituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā yathāvuttavisesassa saddheyyataṃ āha. Tividho hi attho koci
tika-abh04t:164_10: paccakkhasiddho yo rūpādidhammānaṃ paccattavedanīyo aniddisitabbākāro, sabbadhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:164_11: sabhāvalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Koci anumānasiddho yo ghaṭādīsu paṭādīsu ca pasiddhena
tika-abh04t:164_12: paccayāyattabhāvena ghaṭapaṭa-saddādīnaṃ aniccatādiākāro, koci okappanasiddho yo
tika-abh04t:164_13: pacurajanassa accantamadiṭṭho saddhāvisayo sagganibbānādi. Tattha yassa satthuno
tika-abh04t:164_14: vacanaṃ paccakkhasiddhe anumānasiddhe ca atthe na visaṃvādeti aviparītappavattiyā,
tika-abh04t:164_15: tassa vacanena saddheyyatthasiddhīti tathārūpo ca bhagavāti “dhammānaṃ sabhāva…pe…
tika-abh04t:164_16: na codetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi evarūpesu.
tika-abh04t:165: 26-37. Yathā sarabhehi atikkamitabbā pabbatarāji sarabhaniyā, evaṃ oghaniyāti saddasiddhīti āha “tenā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:166: 50-54. Vipariyesaggāho parāmasananti “parato”ti ettha na dhammasabhāvato aññathāmattaṃ paranti adhippetaṃ, atha kho tabbipariyāyoti āha “paratoti niccādito”ti.
tika-abh04t:167_0: 55-68. Yadi sabhāvato avijjamānaṃ, kathamārammaṇabhāvoti āha “vicittasaññāya saññita”nti,
tika-abh04t:167_2: “suviññeyyanānattattā na saṃsaṭṭhatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ. Itarehi rūpanibbānehi.
tika-abh04t:167_3: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ samānuppādanirodhānaṃ ekakalāpabhūtānaṃ arūpadhammānameva aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh04t:167_4: saṃsaṭṭhatā vuccati, na pana tathābhūtānampi rūpadhammānanti āha “esa hi tesaṃ sabhāvo”ti.
tika-abh04t:167_5: Tena yadipi keci arūpadhammā visuṃ ārammaṇaṃ honti, dandhappavattikattā pana rūpadhammānaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:167_6: suviññeyyanānattaṃ, na arūpadhammānanti tesaṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāvo tadabhāvo ca itaresaṃ
tika-abh04t:167_7: sabhāvasiddhoti dasseti. Samūhaghanatāya vā dubbibhāgatarattā natthi arūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:167_8: visuṃ ārammaṇabhāvoti duviññeyyanānattattā tesaṃyeva saṃsaṭṭhatā. Amuñcitvā tadadhīnavuttitāya
tika-abh04t:168_0: 83-100. Kāmataṇhā kāmo uttarapadalopena yathā rūpabhavo rūpaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti
tika-abh04t:168_1: etena kāmarūpārūpataṇhānaṃ visayabhāvo yathākkamaṃ kāmarūpārūpāvacaratāya kāraṇanti
tika-abh04t:168_2: dasseti. Avassañcetamevaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā kāmāvacarādibhāvo aparipuṇṇavisayo
tika-abh04t:168_3: siyā. Yadi hi ālambitabbadhammavasena bhūmiparicchedo, evaṃ sati anārammaṇānaṃ saṅgaho
tika-abh04t:168_4: na siyā. Atha vipākadānavasena, evampi avipākānaṃ saṅgaho na siyā, tasmā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-abh04t:168_5: pariyāpannānaṃ bhūmiparicchedo kātabbo. Evañhi sati kāmāvacarādibhāvo paripuṇṇavisayo
tika-abh04t:168_6: siyā. Tenevāha “evañhi satī”tiādi. Apariyāpannānaṃ pana lokato uttiṇṇabhāvena anuttarabhūmitā.
tika-abh04t:168_7: Akāmāvacarāditā nāpajjatīti abyāpitadosaṃ pariharati, kāmāvacarāditā nāpajjatīti
tika-abh04t:168_8: atibyāpitadosaṃ. Nanu ca imasmiṃ pakkhe kāmataṇhā katamā, kāmāvacaradhammārammaṇā
tika-abh04t:168_9: taṇhā, kāmāvacaradhammā katame, kāmataṇhāvisayāti itarītaranissayatā dosoti? Na,
tika-abh04t:168_10: avīciādiekādasokāsaninnatāya kiñci taṇhaṃ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṃsabhāvāya visayabhāvena
tika-abh04t:169_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāṭhena samatthento “nikkhepakaṇḍepī”tiādimāha. Tattha hi
tika-abh04t:169_1: kāmataṇhāya ālambitabbattā kāmadhātupariyāpannadhammā ca kāmabhavasaṅkhāte kāme ogāḷhā
tika-abh04t:169_2: hutvā caranti, nāññatthāti etthāvacarāti vuttanti. Visesatthinā viseso anupayujjatīti
tika-abh04t:169_3: imamatthaṃ dassento āha “lokassa vasena pariyāpannanicchayato”ti. Tena lokiyadhammesu
tika-abh04t:169_4: pariyāpanna-saddassa niruḷhataṃ dasseti bhagavato taduccāraṇānantaraṃ vineyyānaṃ
tika-abh04t:169_6: vuttaṃ. Sā hi dhammānaṃ kāmāvacarādibhāvaṃ paricchindati. Pari-saddo cettha “upādinnā”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:169_7: upa-saddo viya sasādhanaṃ kiriyaṃ dīpetīti ayamattho vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:170_0: Niyyānakaraṇasīlā niyyānikā yathā “apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko”ti, niyyānasīlā eva
tika-abh04t:170_1: vā. Rāgadosamohāva gahitāti ñāyati, itarathā pahānekaṭṭhatāvacanaṃ nippayojanaṃ siyā.
tika-abh04t:170_2: “Raṇohatā na jotanti, candasūriyā satārakā”tiādīsu raṇa-saddassa reṇupariyāyatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t:170_3: Sampahārapariyāyattā yuddha-saddassa sampahāro ca paharitabbādhāroti akusalasenāva
tika-abh04t:170_5: ca micchāpaṭipadāya. Tannibbattakasabhāvānaṃ akusalānanti etena sabbesampi akusalānaṃ saraṇataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t:173_0: 101-108. Vijjāsabhāgatāya, na saṅkappādayo viya vijjāya upakārakabhāvato. “Abhejjaṃ…pe…
tika-abh04t:173_1: ruhatī”ti ubhayampi anavasesappahānameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi heṭṭhimamaggehipi
tika-abh04t:173_2: pahīyamānā kilesā tena tena odhinā anavasesameva pahīyanti, ye pana avasiṭṭhā bhinditabbā,
tika-abh04t:173_3: te lobhādikilesabhāvasāmaññato puna viruḷhā viya honti. Arahattamagge pana uppanne
tika-abh04t:173_4: na evaṃ avasiṭṭhābhāvato. Tadupacārena nissayavohārena. Kusalehi tāpetabbāti vā tapaniyā,
tika-abh04t:173_5: tadaṅgādivasena bādhitabbā pahātabbāti attho. Samānatthāni adhivacanādīnaṃ saṅkhādibhāvato.
tika-abh04t:173_6: “Sabbeva dhammā adhivacanapathā”tiādinā adhivacanādīnaṃ visayabhāve na koci dhammo
tika-abh04t:173_7: vajjito, vacanabhāvo eva ca adhivacanādīnaṃ vakkhamānena nayena yujjatīti adhippāyenāha
tika-abh04t:174_0: 109-118. Aññaṃ anapekkhitvā sayameva attano nāmakaraṇasabhāvo nāmakaraṇaṭṭhoti, tena
tika-abh04t:174_1: arūpadhammānaṃ viya opapātikanāmatāya pathavīādīnampi nāmabhāvo siyāti āsaṅkāya nivattanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:174_2: “nāmantarānāpajjanato”ti āha. Na hi vinā pathavīādināmenapi rūpadhammā viya kesādināmehi
tika-abh04t:174_3: vinā vedanādināmehi aññena nāmena arūpadhammā piṇḍākārato voharīyantīti. Yaṃ pana
tika-abh04t:174_4: parassa nāmaṃ karoti, tassa aññāpekkhaṃ nāmakaraṇanti nāmakaraṇasabhāvatā natthīti
tika-abh04t:174_5: sāmaññanāmādikaraṇānaṃ nāmabhāvo nāpajjati. Yassa caññehi nāmaṃ karīyati, tassa nāmakaraṇasabhāvatāya
tika-abh04t:174_6: abhāvoyevāti natthi nāmabhāvo. Ye pana anāpannanāmantarā sabhāvasiddhanāmā ca, te
tika-abh04t:174_7: vedanādayova nāmaṃ nāmāti dassento “attanāvā”tiādimāha. Phassādīnaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhatā
tika-abh04t:174_8: taṃ aggahetvā appavattiyevāti dassetuṃ “avinābhāvato”ti vuttaṃ. Adhivacanasamphasso
tika-abh04t:174_9: manosamphasso, so nāmamantarena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pākaṭoti nidassanabhāvena
tika-abh04t:174_11: hi vināpi nāmena rūpadhammā pākaṭā hontīti. Atha vā pakāsakapakāsitabbabhāvo visayivisayabhāvo
tika-abh04t:174_12: cakkhurūpādīnaṃ sabhāvo, so ruppanasabhāve sāmaññe antogadhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:175_0: 119-123. Ito pubbe parikammantiādinā samāpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā viya samāpattikusalatāpi
tika-abh04t:175_1: jhānalābhīnaṃyeva hotīti vuttaṃ viya dissati. “Itaresampi anussavavasena samāpattīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:175_2: appanāparicchedapaññā labbhatī”ti vadanti. “Evaṃ sīlavisodhanādinā samāpattiṃ appetīti
tika-abh04t:175_3: jānanakapaññā saha parikammena appanāparicchedajānanakapaññā”ti keci. Vuṭṭhāne kusalabhāvo
tika-abh04t:176_0: 124-134. Sobhane rato surato, tassa bhāvo soraccanti āha “sobhanakammaratatā”ti.
tika-abh04t:176_1: Suṭṭhu vā orato virato sorato, tassa bhāvo soraccanti. Ayaṃ panattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:176_2: vutto eva. Appaṭisaṅkhānaṃ moho. Kusalabhāvanā bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ vaḍḍhanā. Saññāṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:176_3: upalakkhaṇaṃ. Saviggahaṃ sabimbakaṃ. Upalakkhetabbākāraṃ dhammajātaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ vā.
tika-abh04t:176_4: Avikkhepoti cittavikkhepapaṭipakkho. Ujuvipaccanīkatāya hi pahānavuṭṭhānena ca avikkhepo
tika-abh04t:177_0: 135-142. Kāraṇasīlaṃ lokiyaṃ. Phalasīlaṃ lokuttaraṃ tena sijjhatīti katvā, lokiyassapi
tika-abh04t:177_1: vā sīlassa kāraṇaphalabhāvo pubbāparabhāvena daṭṭhabbo. Sampannasamudāyassa paripuṇṇasamūhassa.
tika-abh04t:177_2: Akusalā sīlā akusalā samācārā. Sīlasampadā sīlasampatti sīlaguṇāti attho. Sahottappaṃ
tika-abh04t:177_3: ñāṇanti ottappassa ñāṇappadhānataṃ āha, na pana ñāṇassa ottappasahitatāmattaṃ. Na
tika-abh04t:177_4: hi ottapparahitaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthīti. Adhimuttatā abhirativasena nirāsaṅkāpavatti. Nissaṭatā
tika-abh04t:177_5: visaṃyuttatā. Ettha ca adhimuttatānissaṭatāvacanehi tadubhayapariyāyā dve vimuttiyo
tika-abh04t:177_6: ekasesanayena idha “vimuttī”ti vuttāti dasseti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “cittassa ca adhimutti
tika-abh04t:177_7: nibbānañcā”ti. Uppajjati etenāti uppādo, na uppādoti anuppādo, tabbhūte anuppādapariyosāne
tika-abh04t:177_8: vimokkhante anuppādassa ariyamaggassa kilesānaṃ vā anuppajjanassa pariyosāneti ṭhānaphalehi
tika-abh04t:180_0: 1. Appetunti nigametuṃ. “Padabhājanīyaṃ na vutta”nti padabhājanīyāvacanena appanāvarodhaṃ
tika-abh04t:180_2: hotī”tiādīsu hoti-saddo atthi-saddena anānatthoti adhippāyena vuttaṃ “dutiyena hoti-saddenā”ti.
tika-abh04t:180_3: Pubbe aṭṭhakathādhippāyena vatvā yathāvuttassa pāḷippadesassa appanāvarodho samatthitoti
tika-abh04t:181_0: Ñātuṃ icchitoti lakkhaṇassa pucchāvisayataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yena kenacīti dassanādivisesayuttena,
tika-abh04t:181_1: itarena vā. Avatthāviseso hi ñāṇassa dassanatulanatīraṇāni. “Adiṭṭhata”ntiādīsu āhāti
tika-abh04t:181_2: yojetabbaṃ, sabbattha ca lakkhaṇassāti. Tañhettha adhikatanti. Adiṭṭhaṃ jotīyati
tika-abh04t:181_3: etāyāti etena diṭṭhaṃ saṃsandati etāyāti diṭṭhasaṃsandanā. Vimatiṃ chindati etāyāti
tika-abh04t:181_4: vimaticchedanāti etāsampi saddattho nayato dassito, atthato pana sabbāpi tathāpavattaṃ
tika-abh04t:182_0: Aññamaññato pabhijjatīti pabhedo, viseso, tena pabhedena. Dhammānaṃ desananti kiñcāpi
tika-abh04t:182_2: vattuṃ yuttā, tathāpi kusalādimātikāpadasaṅgahitavisesoyeva idha pabhedoti adhippetoti
tika-abh04t:182_3: vuttaṃ “pabheda…pe… desanaṃ āhā”ti. Tenevāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kusala…pe… dīpetvāti
tika-abh04t:182_4: phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī”ti. “Phasso phusanā”tiādinā ca pabhedavantova sātisayaṃ
tika-abh04t:182_5: niddiṭṭhā, na pana mātikāyaṃ vuttappabhedoti pabhedavantadassanaṃ niddeso. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:182_6: hotītiādinā “pabhede…pe… dassanattha”nti imassa vākyassa piṇḍatthamāha. Yadi dhammā
tika-abh04t:182_7: eva pucchitabbā vissajjetabbā ca, kasmā kusalāti pabhedavacananti āha “te panā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:182_8: Na hi pabhedehi vinā pabhedavanto atthīti. “Ime dhammā kusalā”ti etena “phasso hotī”ti,
tika-abh04t:182_9: “phasso phusanā”ti ca ādinā uddiṭṭhaniddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalabhāvo vissajjito
tika-abh04t:182_10: hotīti iminā adhippāyena “ime dhammā kusalāti vissajjanepī”ti āha. Imasmiñhīti hi-saddo
tika-abh04t:182_11: kāraṇattho. Tena yasmā dhammāva desetabbā, te ca kusalā…pe… bhedā desetabbā, tasmāti
tika-abh04t:182_12: evaṃ vā yojanā. Dhammānamevāti avadhāraṇaphalaṃ dasseti “avohāradesanāto”ti. Atthānañcāti
tika-abh04t:182_14: “Iti evaṃ ayaṃ pavattetabbo nivattetabbo cā”ti tathā tathā vidhetabbabhāvo itikattabbatā,
tika-abh04t:182_15: tāya yutto iti…pe… yutto, tassa vidhetabbassāti attho, visesanattā pabhedassāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:183_0: Itikattabbatāyuttassa visesitabbattā uddeso dhammappadhāno, tasmā tattha dhammassa
tika-abh04t:183_1: visesitabbattā “kusalā dhammā”ti ayaṃ padānukkamo kato. Pucchā saṃsayitappadhānā
tika-abh04t:183_3: pucchā desetabbapuggalagatasaṃsayāpattiṃ attani āropetvā saṃsayāpannehi viya pavattīyatīti
tika-abh04t:183_4: dasseti. Kāmāvacarādibhedo viya kusalādibhāvena kusalādibhedo dhammabhāvena niyatoti
tika-abh04t:183_5: dhammāti vutte nicchayābhāvato “kusalā nu kho akusalā nu kho”tiādinā saṃsayo hotīti
tika-abh04t:183_6: āha “kusalādibhedo pana saṃsayito”ti. Dhammabhāvo pana kusalādīsu ekantikattā nicchitoyevāti
tika-abh04t:183_7: vuttaṃ “na ca dhammabhāvo saṃsayito”ti. Tena saṃsayito nicchetabbabhāvena padhāno
tika-abh04t:183_8: ettha kusalabhāvo, na tathā dhammabhāvoti dhammā kusalāti vuttanti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:184_0: Cittuppādasamayeti cittassa uppajjanasamaye. “Atha vijjamāne”ti ettha atha-saddassa
tika-abh04t:184_2: dassetuṃ “samavāyādī”ti vuttaṃ. Visesitāti etena “niyamitā”ti padassa atthaṃ vivarati,
tika-abh04t:184_3: tasmā yathāvuttacittavisesitabbato samayatoti attho. Yathādhippetānanti kāmāvacarādivisesayuttānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:184_4: “Tasmiṃ samaye”ti cittuppattiyā visesitabbopi samayo yena cittena uppajjamānena visesīyati,
tika-abh04t:184_5: tasseva cittassa “yasmiṃ samaye”ti ettha sayaṃ visesanabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Tathā “tasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:184_6: samaye”ti ettha visesanabhūtaṃ cittaṃ attanā visesitabbasamayassa upakāratthaṃ “yasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:184_7: samaye…pe… citta”nti visesitabbabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Upakāroti ca aññamaññaṃ avacchedakāvacchinditabbabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:184_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purimadhammānaṃ bhaṅgasamakālaṃ, bhaṅgānantarameva vā pacchimadhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:184_9: uppatti purimapacchimānaṃ nirantaratā kenaci anantaritatā. Yāya bhāvapakkhassa balavabhāvena
tika-abh04t:184_10: paṭicchādito viya hutvā abhāvapakkho na paññāyatīti tadevetanti gahaṇavasena pacurajano
tika-abh04t:184_11: vipariyesito, soyamattho alātacakkena supākaṭo hoti. Tenevāha “ekībhūtānamivā”ti.
tika-abh04t:184_13: ekībhūtānamiva pavatti kiccaghanatāti yojanā. Ettha ca paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena
tika-abh04t:185_0: Sahakārīkāraṇasannijjhaṃ sametīti samayo, samavetīti atthoti samaya-saddassa samavāyatthataṃ
tika-abh04t:185_1: dassento “paccayasāmaggi”nti āha. Sameti samāgacchati ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti
tika-abh04t:185_2: samayo, khaṇo. Samenti ettha, etena vā, samāgacchanti dhammā sahajātadhammehi uppādādīhi
tika-abh04t:185_3: vāti samayo, kālo. Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā
tika-abh04t:185_4: adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ,
tika-abh04t:185_5: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho yathā “samudāyo”ti.
tika-abh04t:185_6: Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūho. Paccayantarasamāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati
tika-abh04t:185_7: pavattati cāti samayo, hetu yathā “samudayo”ti. Sameti sambandho eti savisaye pavattati,
tika-abh04t:185_8: sambandhā vā ayanti etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhantīti.
tika-abh04t:185_9: Samayanaṃ saṅgati samodhānanti samayo, paṭilābho. Samassa nirodhassa yānaṃ, sammā
tika-abh04t:185_10: vā yānaṃ apagamo appavattīti samayo, pahānaṃ. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā etabbo abhisametabbo
tika-abh04t:185_11: adhigantabboti aviparīto sabhāvo abhisamayo. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā vā eti gacchati
tika-abh04t:185_12: bujjhatīti abhisamayo, avirādhetvā dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvāvabodho. Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ
tika-abh04t:185_13: jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako samaya-saddo evāti saupasaggopi vutto.
tika-abh04t:185_14: Tānevāti pīḷanādīneva. Vipphārikatā seribhāvena kiriyāsu ussāhanaparinipphanno.
tika-abh04t:186_0: Kesucīti akusalavipākādīsu. Khaṇassa asambhavo tena vinābhāvoti āha “nanū”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:186_1: Dhammenevāti visesantararahitena. Taṃyeva hi avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ visesaṃ dasseti
tika-abh04t:186_2: “na tassa pavattitthā”tiādinā. Yathā vā tathā vāti kālena loko pavattati nivattatīti
tika-abh04t:186_3: vā kālo nāma bhāvo vattanalakkhaṇo bhāvānaṃ pavattiokāsadāyakoti vā yena tena pakārena.
tika-abh04t:186_4: Idha uttamahetuno sambhavo eva natthīti hetuhetusādhāraṇahetūyeva paṭisedheti. Tappaccayataṃ anekapaccayataṃ.
tika-abh04t:187_1: “ekakāraṇavādo”ti. Vā-saddena vā tesampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Avayava…pe… dāyo vutto
tika-abh04t:187_2: avayavadhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbattā, yathā “samaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, alaṅkato devadatto”ti
tika-abh04t:187_3: ca. Anipphādanaṃ nipphādanābhāvo ahetubhāvo. Nipphādetuṃ asamatthassa pana paccayantarānaṃ
tika-abh04t:187_4: sahassepi samāgate nattheva samatthatāti āha “nipphādanasamatthassā”ti. Ettha ca
tika-abh04t:187_5: sahakārīkāraṇāyattā phaluppādanā paccayadhammānaṃ aññamaññāpekkhāti vuttāti apekkhā
tika-abh04t:188_0: Nibyāpāresu abyāvaṭesu. Ekekasminti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āmeḍitavacanassa luttaniddiṭṭhataṃ
tika-abh04t:188_1: dasseti. Sati ca āmeḍite siddho bahubhāvoti. Andhasataṃ passatīti ca paccattavacanaṃ
tika-abh04t:188_2: niddhāraṇe bhummavasena pariṇāmetvā “andhasate”ti āha. Tathā ekekasminti iminā visuṃ
tika-abh04t:188_3: asamatthatā jotitāti andhasataṃ passatīti samuditaṃ passatīti atthato ayamattho āpannoti
tika-abh04t:188_4: āha “andhasataṃ sahitaṃ passatīti adhippāyo”ti. Aññathāti yathārutavasena atthe gayhamāne.
tika-abh04t:188_5: Yasmā asā…pe… siddho sivikubbahanādīsu, tasmā nāyamattho sādhetabbo. Idāni tassatthassa
tika-abh04t:189_0: Etenupāyenāti yoyaṃ khaṇasaṅkhāto samayo kusaluppattiyā dullabhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Attano
tika-abh04t:189_1: dullabhatāyāti ettha khaṇattho vā samaya-saddo khaṇasaṅkhāto samayoti attho vutto.
tika-abh04t:189_2: Etena upāyabhūtena nayabhūtena. Yojanā kātabbāti etthāyaṃ yojanā – samavāya…pe… vuttiṃ
tika-abh04t:189_3: dīpeti sayaṃ paccayasāmaggibhāvato, samavāyattho vā samaya-saddo samavāyasaṅkhāto
tika-abh04t:189_4: samayo. So yāya paccayasāmaggiyā satīti imassa atthassa pakāsanavasena dhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:189_5: anekahetuto vuttiṃ dīpeti. Kāla…pe… parittataṃ dīpeti attano atiparittatāya. Samūha…pe…
tika-abh04t:189_6: sahuppattiṃ dīpeti sayaṃ dhammānaṃ samudāyabhāvato. Hetu…pe… vuttitaṃ dīpeti sati
tika-abh04t:189_7: eva attani attano phalānaṃ sambhavatoti. Atthapakkhe ca saddapakkhe ca yasmiṃ atiparitte
tika-abh04t:189_8: kāle yasmiṃ dhammasamudāye yamhi hetumhi satīti etassa atthassa ñāpanavasena tadādhārāya
tika-abh04t:189_9: tadadhīnāya ca kusaladhammappavattiyā duppaṭivijjhataṃ anekesaṃ sahuppattiṃ parādhīnappattiñca dīpetīti.
tika-abh04t:190_0: Daḷhadhammā dhanuggahāti daḷhadhanuno issāsā. Daḷhadhanu nāma dvisahassathāmaṃ vuccati.
tika-abh04t:190_1: Dvisahassathāmanti ca yassa āropitassa jiyābaddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā
tika-abh04t:190_2: yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati. Sikkhitāti dasadvādasavassāni ācariyakule
tika-abh04t:190_3: uggahitasippā. Katahatthāti dhanusmiṃ ciṇṇavasībhāvā. Koci sippameva uggaṇhāti, katahattho
tika-abh04t:190_4: na hoti, ime pana na tathāti dasseti. Katupāsanāti rājakulādīsu dassitasippā. Catuddisā
tika-abh04t:190_5: ṭhitā assūti ekasmiṃyeva padese thambhaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci ekaṃyeva nissāya
tika-abh04t:190_6: catuddisābhimukhā ṭhitā siyunti attho. Evaṃ vuttajavanapurisassāti na evarūpo puriso
tika-abh04t:190_7: koci bhūtapubbo aññatra bodhisattena. So hi javanahaṃsakāle evarūpamakāsi. Sutte
tika-abh04t:190_8: pana abhūtaparikappanavasena upamāmattaṃ āhaṭaṃ. Tapparabhāvāti tapparabhāvato hetusaṅkhātassa
tika-abh04t:190_9: samayassa parāyattavuttidīpane ekantabyāvaṭasabhāvatoti attho. Ye pana “tapparabhāvo”ti
tika-abh04t:190_10: paṭhanti, tesaṃ paccayāyattavuttidīpanato tapparabhāvo hetusaṅkhātassa samayassa,
tika-abh04t:190_11: tasmā tassa parāyattavuttidīpanatā vuttāti yojanā. Samudāyāyattatādīpane tapparo,
tika-abh04t:191_0: Nanu ca taṃ taṃ upādāya paññatto kālo vohāramattako, so kathaṃ ādhāro tattha vuttadhammānanti
tika-abh04t:191_1: āha “kālopi hī”tiādi. Yadi kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ, kā
tika-abh04t:191_2: panettha lakkhaṇakiriyāti āha “ihāpī”tiādi. Lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti iti-saddo hetuattho.
tika-abh04t:191_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā sattāsaṅkhātāya lakkhaṇakiriyāya yutto samayo, tasmā tattha bhūminiddesoti.
tika-abh04t:192_0: Uddānatoti yadi saṅkhepatoti attho. Nanu ca avasiṭṭhakilesādayo viya kilesakāmopi
tika-abh04t:192_1: assādetabbatāya vatthukāme samavaruddho ñāṇaṃ viya ñeyyeti saṅkhepato ekoyeva kāmo
tika-abh04t:192_2: siyāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “kilesakāmo”tiādi. Sahitassāti visayavisayibhāvena avaṭṭhitassa.
tika-abh04t:192_3: “Uddānato dve kāmā”ti kiñcāpi sabbe kāmā uddiṭṭhā, “catunnaṃ apāyāna”ntiādinā pana
tika-abh04t:192_4: visayassa visesitattā orambhāgiyakilesabhūto kāmarāgo idha kilesakāmoti gahitoti
tika-abh04t:192_5: “tenā”tiādimāha. Codako tassa adhippāyaṃ ajānanto “nanu cā”tiādinā anuyuñjati. Itaro
tika-abh04t:193_0: Kāmāvacaradhammesu vimānakapparukkhādippakāresu parittakusalādīsu vā. Nanu ca “catunnaṃ
tika-abh04t:193_1: apāyāna”nti visayassa visesitattā rūpārūpadhātuggahaṇassa asambhavoyevāti? Na, “uddānato
tika-abh04t:193_2: dve kāmā”ti niravasesato kāmānaṃ uddiṭṭhattā. Uddiṭṭhepi hi kāmasamudāye yathā tadekadesova
tika-abh04t:193_3: gayhati, taṃ dassetuṃ “duvidho”tiādimāha. Kāmarāgo pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo. Kāmataṇhā
tika-abh04t:193_4: kāmāvacaradhammavisayā taṇhā. Nirodhataṇhā ucchedadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo. Idhāti ekādasavidhe
tika-abh04t:193_5: padese. Yadi anavasesappavatti adhippetā, “duvidhopeso”ti na vattabbaṃ vatthukāmekadesassa
tika-abh04t:193_6: idha appavattanatoti anuyogena yebhuyyabhāvato anavaseso viya anavasesoti vā attho
tika-abh04t:193_8: kassaci anavasesato. Evañca katvāti kilesakāmavatthukāmānaṃ anavasesaparipuṇṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:193_9: abhilakkhitattāti attho. Cāsaddassa rassattaṃ katanti kāmāvacarasadde hetukattuattho antonītoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:194_0: Visayeti vatthusmiṃ abhidheyyattheti attho. Nimittaviraheti etena ruḷhīsu kiriyā
tika-abh04t:194_1: vibhāgakaraṇāya, na attakiriyāyāti dasseti. Kusalabhāvanti jātakabāhitikasuttaabhidhammapariyāyena
tika-abh04t:194_2: kathitaṃ kusalattaṃ. Tassāti sukhavipākabhāvassa. Tassa paccupaṭṭhānataṃ vattukāmatāyāti
tika-abh04t:194_3: etena “anavajjasukhavipākalakkhaṇa”nti ettha sukhasaddo iṭṭhapariyāyo vuttoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:194_5: iminā vuccatīti āha “saññā…pe… gahaṇa”nti. Nanu ca phassādikiccatopi visiṭṭhakiccaṃ
tika-abh04t:194_6: cittanti? Saccametaṃ, so pana viseso na tathā duravabodho, yathā saññāpaññāviññāṇānanti
tika-abh04t:194_8: kāraṇabhāvena pavattamāno santānaṃ cinoti nāma. Tathāpavatti ca āsevanapaccayabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:195_0: Cittakatamevāti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇakatameva. Nānattādīnaṃ vavatthānanti ettha vavatthānaṃ
tika-abh04t:195_1: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Vavatthānaṃ paricchedo asaṅkarabhāvo. Tena ca dhammo nicchito
tika-abh04t:195_2: nāma hotīti āha “nicchitatā”ti. Liṅganānattādīnīti ettha itthipurisasaṇṭhānavasena
tika-abh04t:195_3: liṅganānattaṃ. Devamanussatiracchānādivasena itthiliṅgassa puthuttaṃ, tathā purisaliṅgassa.
tika-abh04t:195_5: desādibhedabhinnassa ca visesassa vasena pabhedo veditabbo. Tathā purisaliṅge. Liṅganibbattakassa
tika-abh04t:195_6: vā kammassa yathāvuttanānattādivasena liṅgassa nānattādīni yojetabbāni. Liṅganānattādīsu
tika-abh04t:195_7: pavattattā saññādīnaṃ nānattādīni. Tenevāha “kammanānattādīhi nibbattāni hi tānī”ti.
tika-abh04t:195_8: Apadādinānākaraṇadassanena liṅganānattaṃ dassitaṃ. Tasmiñca dassite saññānānattādayo
tika-abh04t:195_9: dassitā evāti āvattati bhavacakkanti dassento āha “anāga…pe… ghaṭento”ti. Itthiliṅgapurisaliṅgādi
tika-abh04t:195_10: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitassa rūpakkhandhassa sannivesaviseso. Saññāsīsena cattāro khandhā
tika-abh04t:195_11: vuttā. Vohāravacanena ca pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ voharitabbabhāvena pavatti dīpitā,
tika-abh04t:195_12: yā sā taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinivesahetūti imamatthaṃ dassento “liṅgādi…pe… yosānānī”ti āha.
tika-abh04t:196_0: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā, sabbete manopubbaṅgamā”ti, “manopubbaṅgamā
tika-abh04t:196_1: dhammā”ti ca evamādivacanato cittahetukaṃ kammanti āha “kammañhi cittato nibbatta”nti.
tika-abh04t:196_2: Yathāsaṅkhyanti kammato liṅgaṃ liṅgato saññāti attho. Na purimavikappe viya kammato
tika-abh04t:196_3: liṅgasaññā liṅgato liṅgasaññāti ubhayato ubhayappavattidassanavasena. “Bhedaṃ gacchanti
tika-abh04t:196_4: itthāyaṃ purisoti vā”ti bhedassa visesitattā itthādibhāvena voharitabbabhāvo idha
tika-abh04t:196_6: Guṇābhibyāpanaṃ kittīti āha “patthaṭayasata”nti. Kammanānākaraṇena vinā kammanibbattanānākāraṇābhāvato
tika-abh04t:196_7: “kammajehi…pe… nānākaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Avipaccanokāso aṭṭhānabhūtā, gatikālopi vā.
tika-abh04t:196_8: Kāmāvacaraṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ rūpadhātuyā cakkhuviññāṇādiṃ janetvā anokāsatāya
tika-abh04t:196_9: tadārammaṇaṃ ajanentaṃ ettha nidassetabbaṃ. Ekaccacittakaraṇassa adhippetattā cakkhādivekallena
tika-abh04t:196_10: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ajanakaṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ avasesapaccayavikale anogadhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:196_11: Tadapi kālagatipayogādīti ādi-saddena saṅgahitanti. Ettha ca “sahakārīkāraṇavikalaṃ
tika-abh04t:196_12: vipākassa accantaṃ okāsameva na labhati, itaraṃ vipākekadesassa laddhokāsanti, idametesaṃ
tika-abh04t:196_13: nānatta”nti vadanti, taṃ vipākassa okāsalābhe sati sahāyakāraṇavikalatāva natthīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:197_0: Bhavatu tāva bhavitvā apagataṃ bhūtāpagataṃ, anubhavitvā apagataṃ pana kathanti āha
tika-abh04t:197_1: “anubhūtabhūtā”tiādi. Tena anubhūta-saddena yo attho vuccati, tassa bhūta-saddoyeva
tika-abh04t:197_2: vācako, na anu-saddo, anu-saddo pana jotakoti dasseti. Sākhābhaṅgasadisā hi nipātopasaggāti.
tika-abh04t:197_3: Kiriyāvisesakattañca upasaggānaṃ anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ tehi vattabbavisesassa
tika-abh04t:197_4: jotanabhāveneva avacchindananti yattakā dhātusaddena abhidhātabbā atthavisesā, tesaṃ
tika-abh04t:197_5: yaṃ sāmaññaṃ aviseso, tassa visese avaṭṭhāpanaṃ tassa tassa visesassa jotanamevāti
tika-abh04t:197_6: āha “sāmañña…pe… visesīyatī”ti. Anubhūta-saddo bahulaṃ kammatthe eva dissatīti tassa
tika-abh04t:197_7: idha kattuatthavācitaṃ dassetuṃ “anubhūtasaddo cā”tiādimāha. Satipi sabbesaṃ cittuppādānaṃ
tika-abh04t:197_8: savedayitabhāvato ārammaṇānubhavane, savipallāse pana santāne cittābhisaṅkhāravasena
tika-abh04t:197_9: pavattito abyākatehi visiṭṭho kusalākusalānaṃ sātisayo visayānubhavanākāroti ayamattho
tika-abh04t:198_1: anāgatassapi tasseva uppanna-saddena vuttatāya kāraṇamāha. Ettha ca rajjanādivasena
tika-abh04t:198_2: ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ sātisayanti akusalañca kusalañca uppajjitvā niruddhatāsāmaññena
tika-abh04t:198_4: tadārammaṇaṃ. Avipakkavipākassa sabbathā avigatattā bhavitvā vigatatāmattavasenakammañca
tika-abh04t:198_5: bhūtāpagata”nti vuttaṃ. Teneva tattha okāsakatuppannanti vipākamevāha. Idha pana
tika-abh04t:198_6: kammampīti. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavati ettha kilesajātanti bhūmīti vuttā upādānakkhandhā.
tika-abh04t:198_7: Aggiāhito viyāti bhūmiladdhanti vattabbatāya upāyaṃ dasseti. Etenāti kammaṃ. Etassāti
tika-abh04t:199_0: Avikkhambhitattāti avinoditattā. Sabhūmiyanti sakabhūmiyaṃ. Vicchinditvāti puna uppajjituṃ
tika-abh04t:199_1: adatvā. Khaṇattayekadesagataṃ khaṇattayagatanti vuttanti yathāvuttassa udāharaṇassa
tika-abh04t:199_2: upacārabhāvamāha. Tena uppannā dhammā paccuppannā dhammāti idamettha udāharaṇaṃ yuttanti
tika-abh04t:199_3: dasseti. Padhānenāti padhānabhāvena. Desanāya cittaṃ pubbaṅgamanti lokiyadhamme desetabbe
tika-abh04t:199_4: cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā desanā bhagavatā ucitāti dasseti. Dhammasabhāvaṃ vā sandhāyāti
tika-abh04t:199_5: lokiyadhammānaṃ ayaṃ sabhāvo yadidaṃ te cittajeṭṭhakā cittapubbaṅgamā pavattantīti
tika-abh04t:199_6: dasseti. Tena tesaṃ tathādesanāya kāraṇamāha, sabbe akusalā dhammā cittavajjāti attho.
tika-abh04t:199_7: Kecīti padakārā. Phassādayopīti pi-saddena rāgādayo sampiṇḍeti. Kālabhedābhāvepi
tika-abh04t:199_8: paccayabhāvena apekkhito dhammo purimanipphanno viya voharīyatīti āha “paṭhamaṃ uppanno
tika-abh04t:199_10: vuttaṃ. “Khīṇā bhavanettī”tiādivacanato nettibhūtāya taṇhāya yuttaṃ cittaṃ nāyakanti
tika-abh04t:200_0: “Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ sāta”nti niddiṭṭhattā somanassavedanā sātasabhāvāti
tika-abh04t:200_1: āha “sabhāvavasena vutta”nti. Nippariyāyena madhura-saddo rasavisesapariyāyo, iṭṭhabhāvasāmaññena
tika-abh04t:200_2: idha upacārena vuttotiāha “madhuraṃ viyā”ti. Paramatthato taṇhāvinimutto nandirāgo
tika-abh04t:200_3: nandirāgabhāvo vā natthīti “na ettha sampayogavasena sahagatabhāvo atthī”ti, “nandirāgasahagatā”ti
tika-abh04t:200_4: ca vuccati. Tena viññāyati “sahagatasaddo taṇhāya nandirāgabhāvaṃ jotetī”ti. Avatthāvisesavācako
tika-abh04t:200_5: vā saha-saddo “sanidassanā”tiādīsu viya, sabbāsupi avatthāsu nandirāgasabhāvāvijahanadīpanavasena
tika-abh04t:200_6: nandirāgabhāvaṃ gatā nandirāgasahagatāti taṇhā vuttā. Gata-saddassa vā “diṭṭhigata”ntiādīsu
tika-abh04t:200_7: viya atthantarābhāvato nandirāgasabhāvā taṇhā “nandirāgasahagatā”ti vuttā, nandirāgasabhāvāti
tika-abh04t:200_8: attho. Idhāpīti imissaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Imasmimpi padeti “somanassasahagata”nti etasmimpi
tika-abh04t:200_9: pade. Ayamevatthoti saṃsaṭṭho eva. Yathādassitasaṃsaṭṭhasaddoti atthuddhārappasaṅgena
tika-abh04t:201_0: Kālavisesānapekkho kammasādhano ābhaṭṭha-saddo bhāsitapariyāyoti dassento āha “abhāsitabbatā
tika-abh04t:201_1: anābhaṭṭhatā”ti. Pāḷiyanti imissā paṭhamacittuppādapāḷiyaṃ. Abhāsitattā evāti asaṅkhārikabhāvassa
tika-abh04t:201_2: avuttattā eva. Kāraṇapariyāyattā vatthusaddassa paccayabhāvasāmaññato dvārabhūtadhammānampi
tika-abh04t:201_3: siyā vatthupariyāyoti āha “dvāraṃ vatthūti vutta”nti. Tena vatthu viya vatthūti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:201_4: Manodvārabhūtā dhammā yebhuyyena hadayavatthunā saha carantīti dvārena…pe… hadayavatthu
tika-abh04t:201_5: vuttanti āha yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti. Sakiccabhāvenāti attano kiccabhāvena, kiccasahitatāya
tika-abh04t:201_6: vā. Aññāsādhāraṇoti sa-saddassa atthamāha. Sako hi raso sarasoti.
tika-abh04t:202_1: cetasikānaṃ dvisamuṭṭhānatā. “Cittasamuṭṭhānā dhammā, phuṭṭho bhikkhave vedeti, phuṭṭho
tika-abh04t:203_0: Sukhumarajādirūpanti aṇutajjārirūpamāha. Paramāṇurūpe pana vattabbameva natthi. Vatthuparittatāyāti
tika-abh04t:203_1: etena anekakalāpagatāni bahūniyeva rūpāyatanāni samuditāni saṃhaccakāritāya sivikubbahanañāyena
tika-abh04t:203_2: cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo, na ekaṃ katipayāni vāti dasseti. Nanu ca evaṃ sante
tika-abh04t:203_3: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ samudāyārammaṇaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati samudāyasseva abhāvato. Na
tika-abh04t:203_4: hi paramatthato samudāyo nāma koci atthi. Vaṇṇāyatanameva hi yattakaṃ yogyadese avaṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-abh04t:203_5: sati paccayantarasamāyoge tattakaṃ yathāvuttena ñāyena cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo
tika-abh04t:203_6: hoti avikappakattā tassa. Tadabhinihaṭaṃ pana manoviññāṇaṃ anekakkhattuṃ uppajjamānaṃ
tika-abh04t:203_7: purimasiddhakappanāvasena samūhākārena saṇṭhānādiākārena ca pavattatīti kiṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa
tika-abh04t:203_8: ekaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, udāhu anekānīti na codetabbametaṃ. Na hi paccakkhavisaye
tika-abh04t:203_9: yuttimagganā yuttā. Kiñca bhiyyo accharāsaṅghātakkhaṇena anekakoṭisaṅkhāya cittuppattiyā
tika-abh04t:203_10: pavattanato cittassa lahuparivattitāya samānepi ghaṭasarāvādivaṇṇānaṃ yogyadesāvaṭṭhāne
tika-abh04t:203_11: purimamanasikārānurūpaṃ “ghaṭo”ti vā “sarāvo”ti vā paṭhamaṃ tāva eko manoviññāṇasantānena
tika-abh04t:203_12: paricchijjati, pacchā itaro cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā byavahitenāti avisesavidutāya pana
tika-abh04t:203_13: ghaṭasarāvādibuddhiyā abhedāpattiparikappanāti. Īdisīpettha codanā acodanāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t:203_14: Khaṇaparittatāyāti pabandhakkhaṇassa ittaratāya. Pabandhavasena hi paccekaṃ rūpārūpadhammā
tika-abh04t:203_15: virodhiavirodhipaccayasamāyoge lahuṃ dandhañca nirujjhanato parittakālā dīghakālā
tika-abh04t:203_16: ca honti, sabhāvalakkhaṇavasena pana ekaparicchedā evāti. Yathā ca rūpāyatanaṃ, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:203_17: itarānipi. Saddādayopi hi vatthuparittatādibhāvena labbhantīti. Accāsannāditāyāti
tika-abh04t:203_18: ādi-saddena anāvajjanaṃ kenaci paṭicchannatāti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Visayidhammaṃ
tika-abh04t:203_19: visesato sinoti bandhatīti visayoti anaññatthabhāvāpekkho visayoti āha “visayo anaññatthabhāvenā”ti.
tika-abh04t:203_20: Na hi cakkhuviññāṇādayo rūpāyatanādito aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavattantīti. Gāvo caranti
tika-abh04t:203_21: etthāti gocaro, gocaro viyāti gocaroti sambahulacāritāpekkho gocaroti āha “gocaro
tika-abh04t:203_22: tattha caraṇenā”ti. Bahulañhi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi rūpādayo gayhanti, na tathā manoviññāṇenāti.
tika-abh04t:203_23: Tesanti manoviññāṇena gayhamānānaṃ rūpāyatanādīnaṃ. “Vacanassa anupapattito”ti kasmā
tika-abh04t:203_24: vuttaṃ, nanu pañcadvāre pavattamanoviññāṇadhātuṃ sandhāya tesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotīti
tika-abh04t:203_25: vacanaṃ upapajjatiyevāti? Na, niyamābhāvato. Na hi pañcadvārābhinihaṭaṃyeva mano
tika-abh04t:203_26: idha “mano”ti vuttanti niyamahetu atthīti, etaṃyeva vā codanaṃ manasi katvā dibbacakkhuñāṇādiggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:204_0: Bhojana …pe… ussāhādīhīti idaṃ yāya kammaññatāya rūpakāyassa kallatā hoti, tassā
tika-abh04t:204_1: paccayanidassanaṃ. Bhojane hi sammāpariṇate sappāye ca utubhojane sammupayutte sammāpayogasaṅkhāte
tika-abh04t:204_2: kāyikacetasikavīriye ca samāraddhe lahutādisabbhāvena kāyo kammakkhamo hoti sabbakiriyānukūloti.
tika-abh04t:204_3: Atha vā bhojana…pe… ussāhādīhīti idaṃ kāyassa kalyatāya viya upaddutatāyapi kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:204_4: Visamabhojanāpariṇāmādito hi kāyassa upaddavakarā vātādayo uppajjantīti. Anuvattantassāti
tika-abh04t:204_5: padaṃ “jayaṃ veraṃ pasavatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthavasena veditabbaṃ. Jāgaraṇanimittañhi
tika-abh04t:204_6: idha anuvattanaṃ adhippetanti. Atha vā anuvattantassāti idaṃ pakatiyā diṭṭhādivasena
tika-abh04t:204_9: āpāthagamanaṃ na siyāti. Yathānubhūte rūpādivisaye cittassa ṭhapanaṃ āvajjanaṃ cittapaṇidahanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:204_10: Yathānubhūtena rūpādinā sadisaṃ asadisaṃ sambandhañca sadisāsadisasambandhaṃ, tassa
tika-abh04t:204_12: ca citta…pe… dassanādayo te paccayāti yojetabbaṃ. Dhātukkhobhādīti ādi-saddena devatūpasaṃhārādiṃ
tika-abh04t:204_14: Kenaci vutteti iminā saddhāya anussavanibbattataṃ āha. Ākāravicāraṇanti tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-abh04t:205: Niyamitassāti kusalameva mayā uppādetabbanti evaṃ niyamitassa. Pasādasinehābhāvo dosabahulatāya hotīti lūkhapuggalā dosabahulāti āha.
tika-abh04t:207: Vijjamānavatthusminti etena “vināpi deyyadhammapariccāgena cittuppādamatteneva dānamayaṃ kusalaṃ upacitaṃ hotī”ti kesañci atidhāvanaṃ nivattitaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh04t:208_0: Dhammasavanassa ghosanaṃ dhammasavanaghosanaṃ. Tassāti “saddadānaṃ dassāmī”ti saddavatthūnaṃ
tika-abh04t:208_1: ṭhānakaraṇabheriādīnaṃ sasaddappavattikaraṇassa. Cintanaṃ tathā tathā cittuppādanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:208_2: Aññatthāti suttesu. Aparatthāti abhidhammapadesu. Apariyāpannāti padassa atthavaṇṇanā
tika-abh04t:208_3: “paribhogaraso”tiādikāya atthavaṇṇanāya parato bahūsu potthakesu likhīyati, yathāṭhāneyeva
tika-abh04t:208_4: pana ānetvā vattabbā. Tattha paramatthato avijjamānattā lakkhaṇapaññattiyo aññāyatanattā
tika-abh04t:209_0: “Ekadvārikakammaṃ aññasmiṃ dvāre uppajjatī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu rūpādīsu ekārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:209_1: cittaṃ yathā na aññārammaṇaṃ hoti cittavisesassa adhippetattā, evaṃ kammavisese adhippete
tika-abh04t:209_2: kāyadvārādīsu ekadvārikakammaṃ aññasmiṃ dvāre na uppajjati tattheva pariyositattā,
tika-abh04t:209_3: atha kammasāmaññaṃ adhippetaṃ, rūpādīsu ekārammaṇanti idaṃ udāharaṇaṃ na siyāti?
tika-abh04t:209_4: Na, asadisabhāvavibhāvanavasena udāhaṭattā, itarathā manoviññāṇabhūtaṃ idaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh04t:209_5: chasupi visayesu pavattanato anibaddhārammaṇanti ārammaṇaṃ sadisūdāharaṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:209_6: vucceyya ārammaṇaṃ viya dvārampi anibaddhanti. Yasmā pana satipi kammānaṃ dvārantaracaraṇe
tika-abh04t:209_7: yebhuyyena vuttiyā tabbahulavuttiyā ca dvārakammānaṃ aññamaññaṃ vavatthānaṃ vakkhati,
tika-abh04t:209_8: tasmā pāṇātipātādibhāvasāmaññena kammaṃ ekattanayavasena gahetvā tassa vacīdvārādīsu
tika-abh04t:209_9: pavattisabbhāvato kammassa anibaddhattāti vuttanti āha “kāyadvārādīsu ekadvārikakammaṃ
tika-abh04t:209_10: aññasmiṃ dvāre na nuppajjatī”ti. Rūpādīsu pana ekārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ tenevārammaṇena
tika-abh04t:209_11: paricchinnanti visiṭṭhameva gahitanti ārammaṇameva nibaddhanti vuttanti cittaviseso
tika-abh04t:209_12: eva gahito, na cittasāmaññaṃ. “Nanu ca rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ
tika-abh04t:209_13: yaṃ vā panā”ti ārammaṇampi aniyameneva vuttanti? Saccametaṃ, tattha pana yaṃ rūpādīsu
tika-abh04t:209_14: ekārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ tena vinā nappavattati, kammaṃ pana kāyadvārikādibhedaṃ vacīdvārādīsu
tika-abh04t:209_15: na nappavattatīti imassa visesassa jotanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ārammaṇameva gahitaṃ, dvāraṃ
tika-abh04t:209_16: na gahitanti imamatthaṃ dasseti “ārammaṇameva nibaddha”ntiādinā. Vacīdvāre uppajjamānampi
tika-abh04t:212_0: Kammadvārānantiādinā pakāsetabbassa sarūpaṃ pakāsanupāyañca dasseti. Niyatarūparūpavasenāti
tika-abh04t:212_2: gahetabbaṃ siyā. Ekasantatipariyāpanno upādinnakakāyo idha gahitoti cakkhāyatanādīti
tika-abh04t:212_3: vuttesu eko bhāvo hadayavatthu ca gahitanti na sakkā vattuṃ “cakkhāyatanādīni jīvitapariyantānī”ti
tika-abh04t:213_2: āha. Desantaruppattihetubhāvena cāletunti etena desantaruppatti calanaṃ, taṃnimitte
tika-abh04t:213_3: ca kattubhāvo upacaritoti dasseti, aññathā khaṇikatā abyāpāratā ca dhammānaṃ na sambhaveyyāti.
tika-abh04t:213_4: Tadabhimukhabhāvavikāravatīti taṃdisamabhimukho tadabhimukho, tassa bhāvo tadabhimukhabhāvo,
tika-abh04t:213_5: so eva vikāro, taṃsamaṅginī vāyodhātu tadabhimukhabhāvavikāravatī. Idāni tadabhimukhabhāvavikā
tika-abh04t:213_6: rassa viññattibhāvaṃ dassento āha “adhippāyasahabhāvī”tiādi. Evañca katvātiādinā
tika-abh04t:213_7: imissā atthavaṇṇanāya laddhaguṇaṃ dasseti. Tattha āvajjanassāti manodvārāvajjanassa.
tika-abh04t:213_8: Yato bāttiṃsātiādinā tassa viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatā na sakkā paṭisedhetunti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:214_0: Paccayo bhavituṃ samatthoti etena yathāvuttavāyodhātuyā thambhanacalanasaṅkhātakiccanipphādane
tika-abh04t:214_1: tassa ākāravisesassa sahakārīkāraṇabhāvamāha. Anidassanasappaṭighatādayo viya mahābhūtānaṃ
tika-abh04t:214_2: avatthāvisesamattaṃ so ākāravisesoti paramatthato na kiñci hotīti “paramatthato abhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:214_3: dassetī”ti āha. Paramatthato cittasamuṭṭhānabhāvo paṭisedhito. Kammasamuṭṭhānādibhāvassa
tika-abh04t:214_4: pana sambhavoyeva natthīti yathāvuttavikārassa paramatthato sabbhāve nakutocisamuṭṭhitattā
tika-abh04t:214_5: appaccayattaṃ āpannaṃ. Na hi rūpaṃ appaccayaṃ atthi, appaccayatte ca sati niccabhāvo
tika-abh04t:214_6: āpajjati, na ca nibbānavajjo attho sabhāvadhammo nicco atthi. Cittasamuṭṭhānabhāvo
tika-abh04t:215_0: Viññattiyā karaṇabhūtāya. Yaṃ karaṇanti yaṃ cittakiriyaṃ cittabyāpāraṃ. Viññattiyā
tika-abh04t:215_1: viññātattanti idamesa kāretīti yadetaṃ adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ, etaṃ viññattivikārarahitesu
tika-abh04t:215_2: rukkhacalanādīsu na diṭṭhaṃ, hatthacalanādīsu pana diṭṭhaṃ, tasmā vipphandamānavaṇṇavinimutto
tika-abh04t:215_3: koci vikāro atthi kāyikakaraṇasaṅkhātassa adhippāyassa ñāpakoti viññāyati. Ñāpako
tika-abh04t:215_4: ca hetu ñāpetabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ ñātoyeva ñāpeti, na sabbhāvamattenāti vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ
tika-abh04t:215_5: vikāraggahaṇampi viññāyati. Tathā hi visayabhāvamāpanno eva saddo atthaṃ pakāseti,
tika-abh04t:215_6: netaro. Tenevāha “na hi viññattī”tiādi. Yadi pana cittajarūpānaṃ calanākāro viññatti,
tika-abh04t:215_7: cakkhuviññāṇassa vipphandamānavaṇṇārammaṇattā tenapi sā gahitā siyāti āsaṅkāya nivattanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:216_0: Tālapaṇṇādirūpānītiādināpi viññattiyā viññātabbataṃ manoviññāṇeneva ca viññātabbataṃ
tika-abh04t:216_1: dasseti. Sañjānāti etenāti saññāṇaṃ, tassa udakādino saññāṇaṃ taṃsaññāṇaṃ, tassa
tika-abh04t:216_2: ākāro taṃsaññāṇākāro, udakādisahacārippakāro ca so taṃsaññāṇākāro cāti udakā…pe…
tika-abh04t:216_3: kāro, taṃ gahetvā jānitvā. Tadākārassāti udakādiñāpanākārassa. Yadi yathāvuttavikāraggahaṇaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:216_4: kāraṇaṃ adhippāyaggahaṇassa, atha kasmā aggahitasaṅketassa adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ na hotīti?
tika-abh04t:216_5: Na kevalaṃ vikāraggahaṇameva adhippāyaggahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ, kiñcarahīti āha “etassa panā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:217_0: Atha panātiādinā viññattiyā anumānena gahetabbataṃ dasseti. Sādhippāya…pe… nantaranti
tika-abh04t:217_2: anantaraṃ. Adhippāyaggahaṇassāti adhippāyavavatthāpakassa tatiyavāre javanassa. Adhippāyasahabhū
tika-abh04t:217_3: vikārābhāve abhāvatoti etena yathāvuttavikāraṃ adhippāyaggahaṇena anuminoti. Evaṃ
tika-abh04t:217_4: satītiādinā yathānumitamatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti. Tattha udakādiggahaṇenevāti
tika-abh04t:217_6: tattha atthibhāvavijānaneneva. Yathā tālapaṇṇādīnaṃ udakādisahacārippakārataṃ saññāṇākāro
tika-abh04t:217_7: viññātoyeva hoti nānantariyakattā, evaṃ vipphandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantarena purimasiddhasambandhānuggahitena
tika-abh04t:217_8: gantukāmatādiadhippāyavijānaneneva viññatti viññātā hoti tadabhāve abhāvatoti upamāyojanā.
tika-abh04t:218_0: Sabhāvabhūtanti anvatthabhūtaṃ. Dvidhāti viññāpanato viññeyyato ca. Kāyaviññattiyā
tika-abh04t:218_1: tathāpavattamānāya cetanāsaṅkhātassa kammassa kāyakammabhāvo nipphajjati tāya upalakkhitabbattā,
tika-abh04t:218_2: na pana catuvīsatiyā paccayesu kenaci paccayabhāvatoti dassento “tasmiṃ dvāre siddhā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:218_3: Tena vacīdvāruppannāpi pāṇātipātādayo saṅgahitāti tesaṃ saṅgahitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t:218_4: Atha vā kāyadvāruppannāya kāyakammabhūtāya cetanāya vasena “tena dvārena viññātabbabhāvato”ti
tika-abh04t:218_5: vuttaṃ, tassāyeva dvārantaruppannāya vasena “tena dvārena nāmalābhato”ti. Manodvārāvajjanassapi
tika-abh04t:219_0: Dvārantaracārinoti dvārantarabhāvena pavattanakā. Dvārasambhedāti dvārānaṃ saṅkaraṇato.
tika-abh04t:219_1: Dvārānañhi dvārantarabhāvappattiyā sati kāyadvārassa vacīdvārādibhāvo, vacīdvārassa
tika-abh04t:219_2: ca kāyadvārādibhāvo āpajjatīti taṃtaṃdvāruppannakammānampi saṅkaro siyā. Tenāha “kammasambhedopī”ti.
tika-abh04t:219_3: Evaṃ sati kāyakammaṃ…pe… vavatthānaṃ na siyā. Yadi kammāni kammantaracārīni honti,
tika-abh04t:219_5: kāyakammadvāranti aññamaññavavatthānaṃ na siyāti imamatthamāha “kammānampi kammantaracaraṇe
tika-abh04t:219_7: Dvārantaracaraṇaṃ dvārantaruppatti. Dvāreti attano dvāre. Aññasminti dvārantare.
tika-abh04t:219_8: Kammānīti taṃtaṃdvārikakammāni. Aññānīti aññadvārikakammāni. Dvāre dvārāni na carantīti
tika-abh04t:219_9: dvārantarabhāvena nappavattanti, dvārantaraṃ vā na saṅkamanti. Kiñcāpi viññattiyā
tika-abh04t:219_10: catuvīsatiyā paccayesu yena kenaci paccayena cetanāya paccayabhāvo natthi, tathā
tika-abh04t:219_11: pana viññattiyā pavattamānāya eva pāṇātipātādi hoti, nāññathāti siyā viññattiyā hetubhāvo
tika-abh04t:219_12: cetanāyāti vuttaṃ “dvārehi kāraṇabhūtehī”ti. Kāyakammaṃ vacīkammanti kammavavatthānasseva
tika-abh04t:219_13: vā kāraṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya “dvārehi kāraṇabhūtehī”ti vuttaṃ. Yadipi “dvārehi kammānī”ti
tika-abh04t:219_14: vuttaṃ, “aññamaññaṃ vavatthitā”ti pana vuttattā kammehipi dvārāni vavatthitānīti
tika-abh04t:219_15: ayamatthopi siddhoyevāti dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Advāracārīhīti dvārānaṃ
tika-abh04t:219_16: sayaṃ vavatthitabhāvamāha, na pana avavatthānaṃ, vavatthānamevāti adhippāyo. Idāni
tika-abh04t:219_17: taṃ vavatthānaṃ vibhāveti kammānapekkhātiādinā. Tattha samayaniyamitena cittena samayo
tika-abh04t:219_18: viya dvāraniyamitehi kammehi dvārāni niyamitānīti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-abh04t:220_0: Evaṃsabhāvattāti dvārabhūtehi kāyādīhi upalakkhaṇīyasabhāvattā. Āṇatti…pe… mānassāti
tika-abh04t:220_1: kāyavacīkammānaṃ vacīkāyaviññattīhi pakāsetabbataṃ āha. Kāyādīhīti kāyavacīviññattīhi.
tika-abh04t:220_2: Tasmāti yasmā dvārantare carantānipi kammāni sakena dvārena upalakkhitāneva caranti,
tika-abh04t:220_3: tasmā. Nāpi kammaṃ dvārassāti yasmiṃ dvārantare kammaṃ carati, tassa dvārassa anattaniyassa.
tika-abh04t:220_4: Taṃtaṃdvāramevāti sakadvārameva. Kammassāti sakasakakammassa. Yadi kammehi dvārāni
tika-abh04t:220_5: vavatthitāni, “kammassa anibaddhattā”ti idaṃ kathaṃ nīyatīti āha “pubbe panā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:221_0: Sāti viññatti. Tassāti kammassa. Kenaci pakārenāti catuvīsatiyā paccayappakāresu
tika-abh04t:221_1: kenaci pakārena. Taṃsahajātāti etena kāyaviññattiyā sabbhāveyeva kāyakammassa sabbhāvo,
tika-abh04t:221_2: nāññathāti pariyāyena viññattiyā kammassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ vibhāveti. Tenevāha “uppattiṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh04t:224_0: Catūhi aṅgehīti ettha “subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsati, no dubbhāsitaṃ. Dhammaṃyeva, piyaṃyeva,
tika-abh04t:224_1: saccaṃyeva bhāsati, no alika”nti yāni aṅgāni sutte vuttāni, tesaṃ cetanāsabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:224_3: pavattā. Saha sambhūtattāti saheva uppannattā. Na hi vacīviññatti saddarahitā atthi.
tika-abh04t:224_4: Tathā hi “yā tāya vācāya viññattī”ti vuttaṃ. “Vācāgirā byapatho”tiādinā nātisukhumaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:224_5: saddavācaṃ vatvā “yā tāya vācāya viññattī”ti, tāya saddhiṃ yojetvā vacīviññattiyā
tika-abh04t:224_6: vuttattā rūpāyatanaṃ viya vatthuparittatādinā saddāyatanampi anindriyagocaro atthīti
tika-abh04t:225_0: Idāni avisesena cittasamuṭṭhānasaddassa sotaviññāṇārammaṇatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttāti vitakkavipphārasaddo
tika-abh04t:225_1: na sotaviññeyyoti mahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa pāḷiyā virodhaṃ dassetuṃ “cittasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādi
tika-abh04t:225_2: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ saṅgahakārassa adhippāye ṭhatvā mahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa paṭisedhetabbataṃ
tika-abh04t:225_3: dassetvā idāni attano adhippāye ṭhatvā taṃ pariharituṃ “mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:225_4: Saṅghaṭṭanākārena pavattānaṃ bhūtānaṃ saddassa nissayabhāvato saṅghaṭṭanena saheva
tika-abh04t:225_5: saddo uppajjati. Tappaccayabhāvoti upādinnakaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhāvo. Cittajapathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh04t:225_6: upādinnakaghaṭṭane paccayo bhavituṃ samattho cittasamuṭṭhānamahābhūtānaṃ eko ākāraviseso
tika-abh04t:225_7: atthi. Tadākārattā hi tesaṃ pathavīdhātu upādinnakaṃ ghaṭṭetīti imamatthaṃ vuttānusārena
tika-abh04t:225_9: vibhāveti. Tattha aññamaññassa paccayabhāvo tappaccayabhāvo vuttoti attho. Aññampi
tika-abh04t:225_10: sabbaṃ vidhānanti “na cittasamuṭṭhānāti etena paramatthato abhāvaṃ dassetī”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:225_11: attanā vuttavidhānaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttavidhānaṃ “heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabba”nti
tika-abh04t:226_0: Attano attano paccayuppannassa desantare pārampariyena uppādanaṃ desantaruppādanaparamparatā.
tika-abh04t:226_2: satta akkharāni nibbattentīti vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ekajavanavārapariyāpannāni cittāni
tika-abh04t:226_3: ekamakkharaṃ nibbattentī”ti vadanti. Kiñcāpi paṭhamacittenapi ghaṭṭanā nipphajjati,
tika-abh04t:226_4: ekasseva pana bahuso pavattanena atthi koci visesoti purimajavanasamuṭṭhitāhi ghaṭṭanāhi
tika-abh04t:226_5: paṭiladdhāsevanena sattamajavanena samuṭṭhitā ghaṭṭanā paribyattamakkharaṃ nibbattetīti
tika-abh04t:226_6: upatthambhanaṃ natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ. Laddhābhisaṅkhārena pana paṭhamacittenapi
tika-abh04t:226_7: ghaṭṭanā balavatī hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “upatthambhanakiccaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh04t:229_0: “Sabbāyapi kāyavacīviññattiyā kāyavacīdvārabhāvo viya sabbassapi cittassa manodvārabhāvo
tika-abh04t:229_1: sambhavatī”ti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayaṃ nāma mano manodvāraṃ na hotīti na
tika-abh04t:229_2: vattabbo”ti vatvā taṃdvāravantadhammadassanatthaṃ “ayaṃ nāma cetanā”tiādi vuttanti
tika-abh04t:229_3: āha “yassa dvāraṃ mano, taṃ dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti. Yathā pana tividhacatubbidhakāyavacīkammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:229_4: dvārabhāvato kāyakammadvāravacīkammadvārāni vuttāni, evaṃ manokammanti vuttaabhijjhādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:229_6: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cetanāya attano kiccaṃ āraddhāya sampayuttāpi taṃ
tika-abh04t:229_7: taṃ sakiccaṃ ārabhantīti sā ne sakicce pavatteti nāma, tathā pavattentī ca sampayutte
tika-abh04t:229_8: ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe avippakiṇṇe karoti byāpāreti cāti vuccati, tathā sampayuttānaṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:229_9: avippakiṇṇakaraṇaṃ sampiṇḍanaṃ āyūhanaṃ byāpārāpādanaṃ byāpāraṇaṃ cetayananti āyūhanacetayanānaṃ
tika-abh04t:229_10: nānattaṃ dassento “phassādidhammehī”tiādimāha. Tathākaraṇanti yathā phassādayo sakasakakicce
tika-abh04t:229_11: pasutā bhavanti, tathā karaṇaṃ. Teneva yathāvuttena avippakiṇṇabyāpāraṇākārena sampayuttānaṃ
tika-abh04t:229_12: karaṇaṃ pavattananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kammakkhayakarattāti kammakkhayakaramanassa kammadvārabhāvo
tika-abh04t:229_13: na yujjatīti adhippāyo. Yato “kammapathakathā lokiyā evā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh04t:232_0: Samānakālāpi kāraṇaphalakiriyā pubbāparakālā viya vattuṃ yuttāyeva. Seyyathāpi paṭiccasamuppāde
tika-abh04t:232_1: “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:232_2: Copanakiriyanti viññattidvayaṃ āha. Tassā hi cittasamuṭṭhānakāyasaddavācāhi kāyavacīviññattīhi
tika-abh04t:232_3: eva vā purimapurimāhi pavattetabbattā “kāyavācāhi copanakiriyaṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:232_4: tabbikārānaṃ bhūtānaṃ tathāpavattanato. Atha vā kāyavācāhīti kāyavacīviññattīhi.
tika-abh04t:232_6: hi kiriyā “rūpakāyaṃ thambhetuṃ cāletuṃ paccayo bhavituṃ samattho”ti, “upādinnakaghaṭṭanassa
tika-abh04t:232_7: paccayabhūto”ti ca vuttattā kāyavacīviññattīhi nipphajjatīti. Evañca katvā “copanakiriyānissayabhūtā
tika-abh04t:232_8: kāyavācā”ti, “kāyādīhi karaṇabhūtehi copanābhijjhādikiriyaṃ karonti vāsiādīhi viya
tika-abh04t:232_9: chedanādi”nti ca idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati. Na kevalaṃ dharamānatāva sabbhāvo,
tika-abh04t:232_10: atha kho maggena asamucchinnatāpīti dassento “anirodhitevā”ti āha. Asamucchinnatā
tika-abh04t:232_13: vuttāti iminā adhippāyena “evañca…pe… yujjantī”ti āha. Evañca katvā kāye sati vācāya
tika-abh04t:232_14: satītiādivacanaṃ anulomitaṃ hoti. Yāya cetanāyāti karaṇaniddeso pana kāyādīnaṃ copanābhijjhādikiriyāya
tika-abh04t:233: Sabhāvato upakārakato magge sati sabbhāvato ca bojjhaṅgā magge antogadhāti āha “na ca na sakkā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:234_0: Kammapathaṃ appattānampi taṃtaṃdvāre saṃsandananti yathā kammapathaṃ pattānaṃ, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:234_1: kammapathaṃ appattānampi satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ yathāsakaṃ dvāreheva nāmaggahaṇanti
tika-abh04t:234_2: vadanti, evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathāya virodho. Dutiyatthassa ca abhāvo siyā, tasmā taṃtaṃdvāre
tika-abh04t:234_3: saṃsandananti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ dvāre kammapathaṃ appattā akusalacetanādayo pavattā,
tika-abh04t:234_4: tāsaṃ tena teneva dvārena nāmaggahaṇaṃ. Taṃ pana taṃtaṃdvārapakkhikabhāvakaraṇato
tika-abh04t:234_5: tattha avarodhananti vuttaṃ. Yathā hi kammapathaṃ pattā kāyakammādisaṅkhātā cetanā
