tika-abh04t:234_6: dvārantare uppannāpi kāyakammādināmameva labhanti, na evaṃ kammapathaṃ appattā. Tā
tika-abh04t:234_7: pana yattha yattha dvāre uppajjanti, tena teneva dvārena kāyaduccaritaṃ vacīduccaritantiādināmaṃ
tika-abh04t:234_8: labhanti. Evaṃ nāmaggahaṇameva hi tesaṃ taṃtaṃdvārapakkhikakaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Teneva
tika-abh04t:234_9: hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kiñcāpi vacīdvāre copanappattaṃ kammapathaṃ, appattatāya pana kāyakammaṃ
tika-abh04t:234_10: na hoti, kevalaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:235_2: Tañhi kammadvārānaṃ asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena patiṭṭhāpanaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya “āṇattisamuṭṭhitesū”ti
tika-abh04t:235_3: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhati. Keci pana “ekekasmiṃ dvāre anekesaṃ kammānaṃ pavattidassanampi
tika-abh04t:235_4: dvārasaṃsandana”nti vadanti. Yathā pavatto byāpādo kammapatho hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh04t:235_5: “ime sattā haññantū”ti pavatti byāpādassa dassitā. Kāyadvārikacetanāya sahakārīkāraṇabhāvato
tika-abh04t:235_6: kāyakammavohāralābhā, abhijjhādīnaṃ parasantakassa attano pariṇāmanavasena “ime sattā
tika-abh04t:235_7: haññantū”tiādinā ca appavattattā manokammavohāravirahā, acetanāsabhāvato vā pāṇātipātādivasena
tika-abh04t:235_8: abbohārikā, pāṇātipātādibhāvena na vattabbāti attho. Etthāti abbohārikabhāve.
tika-abh04t:237_0: Tenādhippetanti “akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ manodvāre samuṭṭhātī”ti vadantena adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh04t:237_1: “Na uposathakkhandhake vutta”nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu tena uposathakkhandhakato suttaṃ
tika-abh04t:237_2: āhaṭanti? Kiñcāpi āhaṭaṃ, tattha avuttoyeva pana so tena vuttoti gahitoti dassento
tika-abh04t:238_0: “Sugatiduggatīsu upapajjanaṃ sukatadukkaṭakammato na hoti, khandhasivādīhi pana hotīti
tika-abh04t:238_2: karotī’ti vutta”nti vadanti. Abhijjhādipadhānattāti etena vijjamānesupi byāpādādīsu
tika-abh04t:238_3: yadā kāyavacīdvāresu cetanā balavatī hoti, na tathā itare, tadā padhānabhāvato cetanā
tika-abh04t:238_4: kāyakammaṃ vacīkammanti ca vohāraṃ labhati. So kho panassā padhānabhāvo pāṇātipātādisiddhiyā
tika-abh04t:238_5: viññāyati. Yadā pana tesuyeva dvāresu abhijjhādayo balavanto honti, na tathā cetanā,
tika-abh04t:238_6: tadā tattha vijjamānāpi cetanā apadhānabhāvato kāyakammaṃ vacīkammanti ca vohāraṃ
tika-abh04t:238_7: na labhati. Abhijjhādayo pana padhānabhāvato satipi kāyaṅgavācaṅgacopane sakena vavatthānena
tika-abh04t:238_8: manokammantveva vuccantīti dasseti. Ye pana “tīsupi dvāresu kammapathabhāvena appattiyā
tika-abh04t:238_9: dvārattayepi kammapathappattamanokammena saha pavattiyā ca cetanā ettha kammanti
tika-abh04t:238_10: na vuccatī”ti vadanti, tehi abhijjhādīnaṃ padhānasabhāvaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh04t:238_11: Atha vā cetanāya nippariyāyakammabhāvato pariyāyakamme anavarodhetabbattā “abbohārikā”ti
tika-abh04t:238_12: vuttaṃ. Attano sabhāveneva pana sā etthāpi kammanti vuccati. Yathāha “cetanāhaṃ,
tika-abh04t:238_13: bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmī”tiādi. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “tasmiṃ dvāre siddhā cetanā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:238_14: cetanāyeva padhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “sabhāveneva sā manokamma”ntiādi. Atha
tika-abh04t:238_15: vā kammapathappattaabhijjhādīhi kāyavacīdvāre sahajātā cetanā kāyavacīkammavasena
tika-abh04t:238_16: abbohārikā cetanāsaṅkhātamanokammattāti. Yadi abhijjhādayo padhānā, na cetanā, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:238_17: sati abhijjhādayo cettha kammaṃ, na cetanā, abhijjhādipakkhikā vā sā siyāti anuyogaṃ
tika-abh04t:238_18: manasi katvā āha “tividhā, bhikkhave”tiādi. “Cetanāpi…pe… manodvāre eva samuṭṭhahantī”ti
tika-abh04t:238_19: idaṃ manodvāre cetanāya abhijjhādīhi manokammabhāve nibbisesabhāvadassananti katvā
tika-abh04t:238_20: “cetanā…pe… adhippāyo”ti āha. Cetanā cetanākammaṃ, abhijjhādayo cetanāsampayuttakammanti
tika-abh04t:238_21: ettakameva hi ettha visesoti. Ettha ca cetanāya kāyavacīkammabhāvo siyāti āsaṅkāya
tika-abh04t:238_22: abhāvato manodvāre akusalakāyavacīkammānaṃ anuppattito ca abbohārikāti na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:239_0: Virativisiṭṭhāti viratito cetanāya padhānabhāvamāha. Tattha “tividhā, bhikkhave,
tika-abh04t:239_2: ca paṭṭhāne cetanāva “kammapaccayo”ti vuttā, na virati, abhijjhādayo vā, tasmā nippariyāyena
tika-abh04t:239_3: kammaṃ “cetanā”ti anabhijjhādayo “cetanāpakkhikā vā”ti vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Asaṅkarato
tika-abh04t:241_0: Tatiyo vikappo paṭhamacatutthaviññāṇadvāresuyeva labbhati, na itarattha “sotaṃ ghāna”ntiādinā
tika-abh04t:241_1: avuttattā, itarathāpi vā avibhattike niddese labbhati. Yato saṃvaravasena pātimokkhasīlaṃ
tika-abh04t:241_2: pavattati, taṃ dussīlyanti āha “dussīlyaṃ pāṇātipātādicetanā”ti. Itarā saṃvaravinimuttā
tika-abh04t:241_3: abhijjhādomanassayuttā tappadhānā vā akusaladhammā satipaṭipakkhā akusalā dhammā.
tika-abh04t:241_4: Ārammaṇe cittavossaggavasena pavatto akusalacittuppādo pamādo. Vīriyapanodanabhāvato
tika-abh04t:242_0: Asuddhatāti akevalatā aññena sammissatā. Dvārañhi dvārantarikakammassa dvāraṃ hontaṃ
tika-abh04t:242_1: tena missitaṃ viya hoti. Tenevāha “musāvādādinopi kāyadvāre pavattisabbhāvā”ti. Keci
tika-abh04t:242_3: vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ anekassapi javanavārassa kāyakammādibhāvena pabandhanavasena
tika-abh04t:242_4: pavatti atthīti katvā vuttaṃ. Aviruddhaṃ hotīti akusalakāyakammādibhāvena avadhāretvā
tika-abh04t:242_5: asaṃvaraṃ vatvā puna tasseva vācāasaṃvaradvārādīsu uppattivacanaṃ kāyadvārūpalakkhito
tika-abh04t:242_6: asaṃvaro dvārantare pavattopi kāyadvāriko evāti evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāya sati na virujjhatīti
tika-abh04t:242_7: attho. Idāni taṃ avirujjhanākāraṃ “asaṃvaro hī”tiādinā vibhāveti. Sadvāreti attano
tika-abh04t:242_8: dvāre. Asaṃvaro dvārantare uppajjamānopi sadvāravasena uppannoti vuccatīti etena
tika-abh04t:242_9: vācāasaṃvaradvāre uppannopi kāyiko asaṃvaro copanakāyaasaṃvaradvāravasena uppannotveva
tika-abh04t:242_10: vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo itaratthāpi. Kammaṃ aññadvāreti kammassa dvārantaracaraṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:243_0: Evaṃ satīti copanasaṅkhāte kāyaasaṃvaradvāre asaṃvaroti ettake eva gahite. Kammapathabhāvappattasseva
tika-abh04t:243_2: Sesanti dvārantarānupalakkhitaṃ. Tathā na vuccatīti kāyakammanti na vuccatīti attho.
tika-abh04t:243_3: Tattheva vakkhāmāti kammapathasaṃsandane vakkhāma. “So hi kāyadvāre copanappatto
tika-abh04t:243_5: kāyakammameva hotī”tiādinā ca vacīkammādīnañca kammapathappattānaṃ asaṃvarabhūtānaṃ
tika-abh04t:243_6: kāyakammādibhāve āpanne “catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammameva hotī”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:243_7: apavādena nivatti daṭṭhabbāti evaṃ vakkhamānataṃ sandhāyāha. Antogadhatā daṭṭhabbā
tika-abh04t:245_0: Sarasena attano sabhāvena. Yāya cetanāya pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa paccayabhūtesu
tika-abh04t:245_2: sā tādisapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pāṇātipāto nāma. Laddhupakkamāni hi bhūtāni na
tika-abh04t:245_3: purimabhūtāni viya visadānīti samānajātiyānaṃ bhūtānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na hontīti. Ekassapi
tika-abh04t:245_4: payogassa sahasā nipphādanavasena kiccasādhikāya bahukkhattuṃ pavattajavanehi laddhāsevanāya
tika-abh04t:245_5: ca sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya vasena payogassa mahantabhāvo. Satipi kadāci khuddake ceva
tika-abh04t:245_6: mahante ca pāṇe payogassa samabhāve mahantaṃ hanantassa cetanā tibbatarā uppajjatīti
tika-abh04t:245_7: vatthussa mahantabhāvoti tadubhayaṃ cetanāya balavabhāveneva hotīti āha “payoga…pe…
tika-abh04t:245_9: Taṃtaṃpaccayehīti guṇavantatādipaccayehi. Ettha ca hantabbassa guṇavantatāya mahāsāvajjatā
tika-abh04t:245_10: vatthumahantatāya viya daṭṭhabbā. Kilesānaṃ upakkamānaṃ dvinnañca mudutāya tibbatāya
tika-abh04t:245_11: ca appasāvajjatā mahāsāvajjatā ca yojetabbā. Pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacittañca pubbabhāgasambhārā,
tika-abh04t:245_12: upakkamo vadhakacetanāsamuṭṭhāpito, pañcasambhāravatī pāṇātipātacetanāti sā pañcasambhāravinimuttā
tika-abh04t:246_0: Mantaparijappanena parassa santakaharaṇaṃ vijjāmayo, vinā mantena parasantakassa
tika-abh04t:246_1: kāyavacīpayogehi ākaḍḍhanaṃ tādisaiddhiyogena iddhimayo payogoti adinnādānassapi
tika-abh04t:247_0: Abhibhavitvā vītikkamane micchācāro mahāsāvajjo, na tathā ubhinnaṃ samānacchandabhāve.
tika-abh04t:247_1: “Cattāro sambhārāti vuttattā abhibhavitvā vītikkamane satipi maggenamaggapaṭipattiadhivāsane
tika-abh04t:247_3: vadanti. Sevanacitte sati payogābhāvo na pamāṇaṃ itthiyā sevanappayogassa yebhuyyena
tika-abh04t:247_4: abhāvato. Purisasseva hi yebhuyyena sevanappayogo hotīti itthiyā puretaraṃ sevanacittaṃ
tika-abh04t:247_5: upaṭṭhāpetvā nipannāyapi micchācāro na siyāti āpajjati, tasmā purisassa vasena ukkaṃsato
tika-abh04t:247_6: cattāro sambhārā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā itthiyā purisakiccakaraṇakāle purisassapi
tika-abh04t:247_7: sevanappayogābhāvato micchācāro na siyāti. Keci pana “attano ruciyā pavattitassa
tika-abh04t:247_8: tīṇi aṅgāni, balakkārena pavattitassa tīṇīti sabbāni aggahitaggahaṇena cattārī”ti
tika-abh04t:248_1: pharusavācā. Maraṇādhippāye pana sati atthasiddhitadabhāvesu pāṇātipātā byāpādā ca
tika-abh04t:248_2: hontīti. Yaṃ pati pharusavācā payujjati, tassa sammukhāva sīsaṃ eti. “Parammukhepi
tika-abh04t:249_0: Yadi cetanāya sabbadā kammapathabhāvābhāvato aniyato kammapathabhāvoti kammapatharāsimhi
tika-abh04t:249_1: avacanaṃ, nanu abhijjhādīnampi kammapathaṃ appattānaṃ atthitāya aniyato kammapathabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:249_2: tesampi kammapatharāsiyaṃ avacanaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, kammapathatātaṃsabhāgatāhi
tika-abh04t:249_3: tesaṃ tattha vuttattā. Yadi evaṃ cetanāpi tattha vattabbā siyāti? Saccametaṃ, sā
tika-abh04t:249_4: pana pāṇātipātādikāti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvoti na vuttaṃ siyā. Cetanāya hi
tika-abh04t:249_5: “cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmi,”“tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā akusalaṃ
tika-abh04t:249_6: kāyakamma”ntiādivacanehi kammabhāvo dīpito. Kammaṃyeva ca sugatiduggatīnaṃ taduppajjanasukhadukkhānañca
tika-abh04t:249_7: pathabhāvena pavattaṃ kammapathoti vuccatīti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvo. Abhijjhādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:249_9: sugatiduggatitaduppajjanasukhadukkhānaṃ pathabhāvo cāti na tathā pākaṭo kammapathabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:249_10: te eva kammapatharāsibhāvena vuttā. Atathājātiyattā vā cetanā tehi saddhiṃ na vuttā
tika-abh04t:250_0: Pāṇātipātādīnaṃ ārammaṇāneva tabbiratiārammaṇānīti pañca sikkhāpadā parittārammaṇā
tika-abh04t:250_1: evāti vacanena adinnādānādīnaṃ sattārammaṇatāvacanassa virodhaṃ codeti. Tathā hi
tika-abh04t:250_2: vakkhati “vītikkamitabbatoyeva hi veramaṇī nāma hotī”ti. Sayameva pariharissatīti
tika-abh04t:250_3: sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pañhapucchakavaṇṇanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tattha hi “yasmā sattoti
tika-abh04t:250_4: saṅkhyaṃ gate saṅkhāreyeva ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tasmā parittārammaṇāti vuccantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:251_0: Duggatatādīnīti ādi-saddena “aladdhālābho laddhavināso icchitānaṃ bhogānaṃ kicchapaṭilābho
tika-abh04t:251_1: rājādīhi sādhāraṇabhogatā dukkhavihāro sāsaṅkavihāro”ti evamādayo saṅgahitā. Keci
tika-abh04t:253: Tāsañca viratīnaṃ cetanāsampayuttattā cetanādvārena sugatiduggatitaduppajjanasukhadukkhānaṃ pathabhāvo yuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:255_0: Tathāti kammapathappattānaṃ. Kecīti dhammasirittheraṃ sandhāyāha. So hi kammapathappattānameva
tika-abh04t:255_1: dussīlyādīnaṃ susīlyādīnañca kammapathehi atthato nānattābhāvadassanaṃ, tesaṃ vā
tika-abh04t:255_2: phassadvārādīhi avirodhabhāvena dīpanaṃ kammapathasaṃsandananti vadati. Kammapathatā
tika-abh04t:255_3: natthīti etena yathāvuttānaṃ asaṃvarasaṃvarānaṃ tesaṃ vāde kammapathasaṃsandane asaṅgahitataṃ
tika-abh04t:255_4: dasseti. Ye pana saṅgahaṃ labhanti, tesaṃ gahaṇe payojanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tividha…pe…
tika-abh04t:255_5: dassanenā”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ purimapakkhe saṅkhepato dosaṃ vatvā dutiyapakkhepi vattuṃ
tika-abh04t:255_6: “na ca duccaritāna”ntiādimāha. Tena ye duccaritasucaritaasaṃvarasaṃvarā anucarīyanti,
tika-abh04t:255_7: tesaṃ kāyakammāditā vidhīyatīti dasseti. “Pañcaphassadvāravasena uppanno asaṃvaro
tika-abh04t:255_8: akusalaṃ manokammameva hotī”tiādinā hi vuttanti. Yadi cātiādinā anavasesapariyādānābhāvamāha.
tika-abh04t:255_9: Uppatti na vattabbāti kammapatha…pe… vadantehi “manokammaṃ chaphassadvāravasena uppajjatī”ti
tika-abh04t:255_10: na vattabbanti attho. Atha vā yadi kammapathappattāneva dussīlyādīni kāyakammādināmehi
tika-abh04t:255_11: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānīti evaṃ vadantehi aṭṭhakathācariyehi manokammassa chaphassadvāravasena
tika-abh04t:255_12: uppatti na vattabbāti attho. Taṃtaṃkammabhāvassa vuttattāti “tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ
tika-abh04t:256_1: Tasmāti yasmā kesañci asaṃvarānaṃ saṃvarānañca kammapathatā natthi, kāyaduccaritādīnañca
tika-abh04t:256_2: kammapathehi nānattābhāvadassanena payojanaṃ natthi, na ca duccaritādīnaṃ phassadvārānaṃ
tika-abh04t:256_3: vasena uppatti dīpitā, na cāyaṃ vidhi niravasesasaṅgāhikā, kammānañca saṅkaro āpajjati,
tika-abh04t:256_4: aṭṭhakathāyañca pubbāparavirodho, tasmāti attho. Samānanāmatā kāyakammāditā. Sāmaññanāmāvijahanaṃ
tika-abh04t:256_6: etena phassadvāraasaṃvaradvārādīnaṃ taṃdvārikakammānañca atthato nānattābhāvepi tathā
tika-abh04t:256_7: tathā pavattadesanāvasena te vicāritāti dasseti. “Akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ pañcaphassadvāravasena
tika-abh04t:257_0: Kāye vācāya ca…pe… siddhitoti etena copanappattaṃ akusalaṃ manokammaṃ copanaṃ appattato
tika-abh04t:257_1: visesetvā dassetuṃ “kāyavacīkamma”nti vuttaṃ, na pana kāyavacīkammabhāvatoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:257_2: Tena kāyavacīgahaṇaṃ yathāvuttacopanappattaṃ eva vibhāvetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-abh04t:257_3: – “copanappattaṃ akusalaṃ kāyadvāre vacīdvāre ca manokammaṃ hotī”ti. Taṃ-sadde vutte
tika-abh04t:257_4: yaṃ-saddo abyabhicāritasambandhatāya vuttoyeva hotīti katvā “yaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:257_7: hotī”ti avuttattā. Idāni niyamākaraṇena laddhaguṇaṃ dassento “na pana sabbampī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:258_2: sambandhaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana vadantītiādinā ettha padakāramatassa ayuttataṃ
tika-abh04t:258_4: samānānaṃ. Taṃtaṃdvārakammapathānañcāti idaṃ imassa cittassa kammapathabhāvena pavattaṃ
tika-abh04t:258_5: kālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sabbadā, kammapathabhāveneva pavattanato. Ca-saddena vā
tika-abh04t:258_6: akammapathasaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā taṃtaṃdvārā ca taṃtaṃdvārakammapathā ca taṃtaṃdvārakammapathāti
tika-abh04t:258_7: “taṃtaṃdvārā”ti padena akammapathānaṃ saṃvarānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tena sabhāvenāti
tika-abh04t:258_8: manokammassa dvārabhāvena, na attanoti adhippāyo. Evamidhāpīti cittajanito cittasampayuttassa
tika-abh04t:258_9: kammassa dvārabhāvo cittepi upacaritoti attho. Vattabbameva natthi anantarapaccayabhūtamanorahitassa
tika-abh04t:260: Kamābhāvaniyamābhāve sabbārammaṇatādīti ādi-saddena saṅgaṇhāti. Na hi…pe… atthīti padhāne asambhavato appadhānaṃ adhikarīyatīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:263: “Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotī”tiādikāya pāḷiyā phassādīnaṃ kāmāvacaratādidassane na tapparabhāvo, sabhāvadassane eva pana tapparabhāvoti dasseti “na hi phassādīna”ntiādinā.
tika-abh04t:264_1: paccayo hotīti etena cittārammaṇasannipātakāraṇaṃ phasso cittārammaṇasannipātoti
tika-abh04t:264_2: vuttoti dasseti. Phasso hi cittassa ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattito tassa ārammaṇe
tika-abh04t:264_3: sannipatitappavattiyā paccayoti ca vuccati. Sā cassa phusanākārappavatti sākhagge
tika-abh04t:264_4: ṭhitaṃ disvā bhūmisaṇṭhitassa avīrakapurisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ, ambilaambapakkādiṃ
tika-abh04t:264_5: khādantaṃ disvā mukhe kheḷuppatti, dayālukassa paraṃ haññamānaṃ disvā sarīrakampananti
tika-abh04t:264_6: evamādīsu paribyattā hoti. Tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammāti yathā paṭihananavasena aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh04t:264_7: āsannataraṃ uppajjamānesu rūpadhammavisesesu saṅghaṭṭanapariyāyo, evaṃ cittārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh04t:264_8: visayakaraṇavisayabhāvappatti paṭihananākārena hoti. So ca cittanissito dhammaviseso
tika-abh04t:264_9: saṅghaṭṭanapariyāyena vutto, yadāha “eva”ntiādi. Keci pana “saṅghaṭṭanaraso phasso
tika-abh04t:264_10: pañcadvārikova, na itaro vatthārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanābhāvato”ti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati
tika-abh04t:264_11: upacārasiddhattā saṅghaṭṭanassa. Itarathā pañcadvārikassapi taṃ na sambhaveyyāti.
tika-abh04t:264_12: Indriyamanasikāresu yathāpavattamānesu taṃtaṃārammaṇe viññāṇaṃ uppajjati, tesaṃ tathāpavattiyeva
tika-abh04t:265_0: “Yaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ
tika-abh04t:265_1: vuccati kāmānaṃ assādo”tiādivacanato sukhavedanāva assādoti āha “assādabhāvato”ti.
tika-abh04t:266: Nimittenāti nīlādinā dīghādinā ca nimittena. Etenupāyenāti yathā ñāṇappadhāne cittuppāde saññā ñāṇamanuvattati, evaṃ samādhippadhāne samādhinti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:267: Pabandhatīti paṭṭhapeti sampayuttadhamme sakasakakicce paṭṭhapeti. Teneva hi tadatthaṃ vivaranto “pavattetī”ti āha.
tika-abh04t:268_0: Vijjamānatāvācī hoti-saddo, vijjamānatā ca saṅkhatadhammānaṃ uppajjanena vinā natthīti
tika-abh04t:268_1: “cittaṃ na tathā atthato nuppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tena yasmā cittaṃ na nuppajjati uppajjati
tika-abh04t:268_2: eva, tasmā cittaṃ hotīti vuttanti ayamettha aṭṭhakathāya attho. Evamavaṭṭhite hoti-uppajjati-saddānaṃ
tika-abh04t:268_3: samānatthattena na kiñci payojanaṃ dissati. Atha vā bhavanaṃ nāma sattā, sattā ca
tika-abh04t:268_4: uppādādinā samaṅgitāti phassādīnaṃ khaṇattayapariyāpannatā “phasso hotī”tiādīsu hoti-saddena
tika-abh04t:268_5: vuttā. Tattha yo bhāvo uppādasamaṅgī, na so na hoti nāma, tasmā uppajjati-saddena
tika-abh04t:268_6: vuccamānassa atthassa hoti-saddavacanīyatā na na sambhavati. Uppannaṃ hotīti ettha
tika-abh04t:268_7: pana kiñcāpi uppanna-saddeneva uppādādisamaṅgitā vuccati, tabbhāvānativatti pana
tika-abh04t:268_8: hoti-saddena vuttā khaṇattayavītivattepi uppanna-saddassa vattanato, tasmā na ettha
tika-abh04t:268_10: pākaṭakaraṇabhāvato. Itarathā “cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti imināva cittassa vijjamānabhāvo
tika-abh04t:268_11: dassitoti kiṃ puna vijjamānabhāvadassanenāti na na sakkā vattuṃ, samayavavatthānavasena
tika-abh04t:268_12: savisesaṃ vuttampi cittaṃ phassādīhi sahuppattiyā suṭṭhutaraṃ nibbisesanti dassetuṃ
tika-abh04t:268_13: cittassa puna vacanaṃ. Uddiṭṭhadhammānaṃyeva cettha niddesavāre vibhajanaṃ, na vibhaṅge
tika-abh04t:268_14: viya pāḷiyā āruḷhasabbapadānanti “uddesavāre saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ niddesavāre vibhajanattha”nti
tika-abh04t:268_15: ayampi attho niccalo. Tathā hi “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:268_16: maggādayo na vibhattā. Apica adhipatibhāvena indriyesu viya phassavedanāsaññācetanāhi
tika-abh04t:268_17: saha sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇarāsiyaṃ gahetabbattā samayavavatthāne vuttampi cittaṃ
tika-abh04t:270_0: Vitakkananti vitakkanakiriyā, sā ca vitakkassa attano paccayehi pavattimattamevāti
tika-abh04t:270_1: bhāvaniddeso vasavattibhāvanivāraṇāya hoti. Yasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti,
tika-abh04t:270_2: taṃ tassa gahaṇayogyaṃ karonto vitakko ākoṭento viya parivattento viya ca hotīti
tika-abh04t:270_3: tassa ākoṭanalakkhaṇatā pariyāhananarasatā ca vuttā. Idañca lakkhaṇaṃ kiccasannissitaṃ
tika-abh04t:270_4: katvā vuttaṃ. Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi, tathā gahetabbākāro.
tika-abh04t:270_5: Bodhaneyyajanānurodhena pana paramatthato ekasabhāvopi sabhāvadhammo pariyāyavacanehi
tika-abh04t:270_6: viya samāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati. Evañhi so suṭṭhu pakāsito hotīti.
tika-abh04t:271_0: Vipphāro nāma vitakkassa thinamiddhapaṭipakkho ārammaṇe anolīnatā asaṅkoco, so pana
tika-abh04t:271_1: abhiniropanabhāvato calanaṃ viya hotīti adhippāyena “vipphāravāti vicalanayutto”ti
tika-abh04t:271_2: vuttaṃ. Upacārappanāsu santānena pavattiyanti etena yathā apubbārammaṇe paṭhamābhinipātabhūto
tika-abh04t:271_3: vitakko vipphāravā hoti, na tathā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ anuppabandhavasena
tika-abh04t:271_4: pavattiyaṃ, nātivipphāravā pana tattha hoti sannisinnabhāvatoti dasseti. Tenevāha
tika-abh04t:272: “Pītisukhena abhisandetī”tiādivacanato pītiyā pharaṇaṃ kāyavisayanti yathā taṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “paṇītarūpehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:273_0: Visārassa byaggabhāvassa paṭipakkho sabhāvo avisāro, na visārābhāvamattaṃ. Avisārāvikkhepānaṃ
tika-abh04t:273_1: samādhānabhāvato atthato visesābhāvepi samukhena sampayuttamukhena ca ubhayaṃ vuttanti
tika-abh04t:273_2: dassetuṃ “avisā…pe… vikkhepo”ti vuttaṃ. Visesatoti atisayenāti vā attho gahetabbo.
tika-abh04t:273_3: Sukhañhi samādhissa visesakāraṇaṃ “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato.
tika-abh04t:275_0: Tatthāti saddahanasaṅkhāte adhimokkhalakkhaṇe. Puggalo saddahatīti imināpi saddhāya
tika-abh04t:275_2: Avayavabyāpāro hi samudāye voharīyatīti. Na kevalaṃ pasādanīyavatthusmiṃ appasādanākārappavattameva
tika-abh04t:275_3: akusalaṃ assaddhiyaṃ, atha kho appasādanīyavatthusmiṃ pasādanākārappavattampīti dassetuṃ
tika-abh04t:275_4: “micchādhimokkho”ti vuttaṃ. Tena pūraṇādīsu pasādassa assaddhiyatamāha. Pasādabhūtoti
tika-abh04t:275_5: etena appasādabhūtaṃ assaddhiyaṃ nivatteti. Vatthugatoti iminā micchādhimokkhaṃ.
tika-abh04t:275_6: “Pasādabhūto nicchayo”ti iminā pana vibhāvitamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto “na yevāpanakādhimokkho”ti
tika-abh04t:275_7: āha. Akālussiyaṃ pasādo, taṃ pana asaṅkhobhabhāvato “anāvilabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ. Tañhi
tika-abh04t:275_8: sampayuttesu vidahantī saddhā akālussiyapaccupaṭṭhānā. Evametanti adhimuccanākārena
tika-abh04t:275_9: pana gahetabbattā adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā. Buddhādivatthūnīti ettha idhalokaparalokakammaphalasambandhāpi
tika-abh04t:275_11: purisassa seṭṭha”nti, “saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhī”ti evamādivacanato kusaladhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:276_0: “Idha bhikkhunā kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti. Tassa evaṃ hoti ‘kammaṃ kho me kattabbaṃ bhavissati,
tika-abh04t:276_1: kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ
tika-abh04t:276_2: vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”’ti –
tika-abh04t:278: Taṃmūlakānīti gantabbamaggādimūlakāni. Ettha ca maggo gantabbo hotītiādayo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassanavaseneva vuttā, na pāḷiyaṃ āgatānukkamenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:279_0: Karaṇādikāle viya cirakatādiārammaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā pavattantī sati taṃ upagantvā
tika-abh04t:279_1: tiṭṭhantī anissajjantī ca hoti. Yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ, taṃ pilavitvā gataṃ viya
tika-abh04t:279_2: calitaṃ viya ca hoti, tappaṭipakkhabhāvena pana asammuṭṭhanti imamatthaṃ dassento
tika-abh04t:279_3: “udake alābu viyā”tiādimāha. Tattha sāraṇanti etena “saranti tāyā”ti imamevatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:279_4: vibhāveti. Saraṇakiriyāya hi pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena sati
tika-abh04t:279_5: paccayo. Tassā hi tathā paccayabhāve sati te dhammā sāritā asammuṭṭhakatā apilāvitāhontīti.
tika-abh04t:279_6: “Imehi nāma hetūhi paccayehi ca ete dhammā sambhavantī”ti sambhavato. “Imaṃ nāma
tika-abh04t:279_7: phalaṃ nibbattentī”ti phalato dhammā uppajjanena vipaccanena ca nipphannā nāma hontīti.
tika-abh04t:280_0: Satipi sabbesaṃ sārammaṇadhammānaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇe na cittaṃ viya pare paricchijjagāhinoti
tika-abh04t:280_1: “paricchinnopaladdhivasena jānātī”ti cittaṃ vuttaṃ. Cetasikesu hi keci visayaṃ paricchijja
tika-abh04t:280_2: gahetuṃ na sakkonti, keci pana paricchedamatteyeva tiṭṭhanti, na viññāṇaṃ viya visayaṃ
tika-abh04t:280_3: gaṇhantīti ye āsaṅkitabbā, tesu tadabhāvaṃ dassento “na saññā…pe… vijjhanavasenā”ti āha.
tika-abh04t:281_0: Pītiyā ca somanassabhāvo āpajjatīti idaṃ pīti ca somanassañca pītisomanassanti pītisomanassānaṃ
tika-abh04t:281_1: tulyayogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Somanassasseva pana “ājaññaratho”ti viya pītiyuttaṃ somanassaṃ
tika-abh04t:281_2: pītisomanassanti padhānabhāvo icchitoti na pītiyā somanassabhāvappatti. Na hi padhāne
tika-abh04t:281_3: vijjamāne appadhānaṃ upayujjati, pītiggahaṇañcettha pītiyuttassa somanassassa yebhuyyena
tika-abh04t:281_4: bhāvato paribyattakiccato ca kataṃ, na ca nippītikasomanassassa asaṅgaho. Ruḷhīsaddesu
tika-abh04t:281_5: kiriyāya anaccantikabhāvato. Pītiyā pana upalakkhaṇabhāvena ayamattho suṭṭhu yujjatīti
tika-abh04t:282_0: Pavattaṃ upādinnakkhandhaṃ. Ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hotīti etena na kevalaṃ anupāletabbadhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:282_1: khaṇaṭṭhitiyāyeva, atha kho pabandhānupacchedassapi jīvitaṃ kāraṇanti dasseti. Aññathā
tika-abh04t:282_2: hi āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ na yujjeyyāti. Avisesenāti kāraṇavisesānapekkhena jīvitindriyatāsāmaññena.
tika-abh04t:282_3: Yadipi arūpāsaññabhavesu rūpārūpadhammā nappavattanti, tehi pana purimapacchimabhavesu
tika-abh04t:282_4: carimapaṭhamadhammā samānajātiyena abyavahitatāya nirantarāyeva nāma hontīti “yāva
tika-abh04t:282_5: parinibbānaṃ avicchinnaṃ pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ. Anupālanādikassāti anupālanapavattanaṭṭhapanāniyeva
tika-abh04t:282_7: Indriyabaddhassa hi matarūpato kammajassa ca utujādito viseso jīvitindriyakatoti.
tika-abh04t:284_1: diṭṭhiādīnaṃ avisesabhūtassa niyyānikabhāvassa sammā-saddena visesitabbattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:284_2: Aviparītattho hi sammā-saddo, na niyyānikatthoti. Aviparītaniyyānikattho eva vā sammā-saddo.
tika-abh04t:286_1: yaṃ kiñci gārava”nti āha. Tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvenāti ajjhattabhūtesu jātiyādīsu
tika-abh04t:288_0: Evañhi upamāya sametīti yathā asucimhi patitapurisassa satipi kāyena allīyane bhāvo
tika-abh04t:288_1: anallīno, evaṃ alobhopi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gahitepi ārammaṇe alaggabhāvena anallīnabhāvo
tika-abh04t:288_2: anallīnākāro eva pavattati. Evaṃsabhāvo hi so dhammoti. Kiñci dussīlyaṃ dosasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:288_4: Tena adoso dosasseva ujuvipaccanīko, taṃmukhena dussīlyassāti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:289_0: Tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena…pe… āsevanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti yo so ekattupagato
tika-abh04t:289_3: samathanimittaṃ paṭipanno, evaṃ paṭipannattā eva tatthupagamanena tattha ca pakkhando,
tika-abh04t:289_6: kiccavasena upekkhānubrūhito, tasmiṃyeva jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā.
tika-abh04t:289_7: Te yathā aññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattanti, evaṃ bhāvanā brūhanā. Tathā yāni
tika-abh04t:289_8: tattha saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā
tika-abh04t:289_9: pavattāni. Yañca tattha tadupagaṃ, tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ
tika-abh04t:289_10: vīriyaṃ vāhīyati pavattīyati, yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā paguṇabalavabhāvāpattisaṅkhātā
tika-abh04t:289_11: āsevanā. Sabbesaṃ etesaṃ ākārānaṃ bhāvanā uppādanā vaḍḍhanā, ayaṃ tattha jātānaṃ…pe…
tika-abh04t:290_0: Yasmā panāyaṃ bhāvanākāro “paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādī”tiādināpi pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh04t:290_1: āgato eva, ñāṇena ca saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavaṃ ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā
tika-abh04t:290_2: nipphādetabbo, tasmā “evaṃ vuttāya paññāsādhanāya bhāvanāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Appavattīti
tika-abh04t:290_3: yasmiṃ dhamme sati yathāvuttā bhāvanā nappavattati, so dhammo paṭipakkhabhāvanāparāmasanena
tika-abh04t:290_4: abhāvanāti vuttoti adhippāyo. Na hi abhāvamattassa amoho paṭipakkhoti yujjatīti.
tika-abh04t:290_5: Tappaṭipakkhabhūtā akusalā kāmacchandādayo daṭṭhabbā. Pamādaviseso vā abhāvanā. So
tika-abh04t:290_6: hi “kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkamma”ntiādinā niddiṭṭhoti.
tika-abh04t:291_0: Ekantena alabbhaneyyadassanatthaṃ “jarādhammo”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “jātidhammānaṃ,
tika-abh04t:291_1: bhikkhave, sattānaṃ evaṃ icchā uppajjatī”tiādinā icchitālābho vibhatto. Alobhānubhāvena
tika-abh04t:291_2: kāyānupassanāya, amohānubhāvena cittadhammānupassanāya siddhi pākaṭāyevāti apākaṭaṃ
tika-abh04t:291_4: yojanā alobhādīnaṃ visesapaccayataṃ sandhāya katā, avisesena pana sabbe sabbesaṃ
tika-abh04t:291_5: paccayā. Sabhāvato saṅkappato ca uppannassa dukkhassa asahanavaseneva uppajjatīti
tika-abh04t:291_6: doso taṃdassanassa āsannapaṭipakkho, na rāgo viya dūrapaṭipakkho.
tika-abh04t:293_0: Abhijjhādayo viya anabhijjhādayopi na ekantaṃ kammapathabhūtāyevāti āha “kammapathatātaṃsabhāgatāhī”ti.
tika-abh04t:293_1: Manokammapathabhāvena pavattanakammabhāvato hi etesaṃ kammapatharāsibhāvena saṅgaho,
tika-abh04t:293_2: na sabbadā kammapathāyevāti. Tena yo aññopi dhammo aniyato kammapathabhāvena pākaṭo
tika-abh04t:293_3: ca, tassapi kammapathatāvacanaṃ na virujjhatīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:295_4: avisesato daṭṭhabbāni. Yathā appanākosallena vinā samatho samathamantarena yathābhūtāvabodho
tika-abh04t:295_5: ca natthīti nānākkhaṇikā samādhipaññā aññamaññassa visesakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ paṭivedhe
tika-abh04t:295_6: ekakkhaṇikāpīti dassento āha “aññamaññaṃ nimittabhāvenā”ti. Paññāya hi sātisayaṃ
tika-abh04t:295_7: avabhāsiyamāne visaye samādhi ekattavasena appetuṃ sakkoti, samādhimhi ca majjhimaṃ
tika-abh04t:295_8: samathanimittaṃ paṭipanne paññā ārammaṇesu visadā vahatīti. Samaṃ pavattāti aññamaññānativattanena
tika-abh04t:295_9: samaṃ avisamaṃ ekarasabhāvena pavattā. Aññamaññasahāyabhāvūpagamanena yogino manorathadhurākaḍḍhane
tika-abh04t:295_10: rathadhurākaḍḍhane viya ājāneyyayugo yugalako hutvā aññamaññānativattamānena naddhā
tika-abh04t:295_11: baddhā viyāti vā yuganaddhā. Adhicittamanuyuttehi vīriyasamādhayo samaṃ yojetabbāti
tika-abh04t:295_12: imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ pubbe gahitāpi te puna gahitāti dassetuṃ vīriyasamādhiyojanatthāyāti
tika-abh04t:295_13: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana samādhivīriyayogassa vibhāvanaṃ hotīti “yogavacanatthāyāti attho”ti āha.
tika-abh04t:297_0: Yathā tathā vāti sammā micchā vā. Anadhimuccantoti “idaṃ karissāmi, etaṃ karissāmī”ti
tika-abh04t:297_2: hi anicchayo, tattha appaṭipatti evāti. Saṃsappanaṃ saṃsayo. So hi “āsappanā parisappanā”ti
tika-abh04t:297_3: vutto. Asatipi byāpāre tatramajjhattatāya sati taṃsampayuttadhammā sakasakakiccavasena
tika-abh04t:297_4: anūnānadhikatāya alīnaanuddhatatāya ca saṃvattantīti sā tesaṃ tathāpavattiyā paccayabhūtā
tika-abh04t:297_5: ūnādhikabhāvaṃ nivāreti viyāti ūnādhikanivāraṇarasā vuttā. Tathā pavattipaccayattāyeva
tika-abh04t:298_0: Jhānapadassāti jhānasaddassa. Tesūti pañcasu. Pañca hi aṅgāni jhānapadassa atthoti
tika-abh04t:298_1: idaṃ saṃvaṇṇiyamānattāyeva imaṃ cittuppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi sabbasmiṃ cittuppāde
tika-abh04t:298_2: pañceva jhānaṅgāni. Padasamūho vākyaṃ, padakoṭṭhāso vā phassapañcamakādi dhammarāsi.
tika-abh04t:298_3: Vuttaṃ pūritanti chapaṇṇāsāditāya pūraṇavasena. Phassapaccayā vedanā “phuṭṭho vedeti,
tika-abh04t:298_4: phuṭṭho sañjānātī”tiādivacanato phasso vedanādīnaṃ paccayo. Yadipi chandādayo yathāvuttarāsikiccābhāvato
tika-abh04t:298_5: tesu na vattabbā, visuṃ rāsiantarabhāvena pana sarūpato vattabbāti codanaṃ manasi
tika-abh04t:302_0: 2. Santeti sabhāvato vijjamāne. Phassassa visayavisayīnaṃ sannipatanākārena gahetabbattā
tika-abh04t:302_1: phusanaṃ visaye cittassa sannipatanaṃ vuttaṃ. “Cintanaṭṭhena cittaṃ, mananaṭṭhena
tika-abh04t:302_2: mano”tiādinā cittādisaddā cintanādibyāpāramukhena attano atthaṃ vibhāventīti āha
tika-abh04t:302_3: “cittaṃ manotiādīsu viya kiccavisesaṃ anapekkhitvā”ti. Yathā loke vikatameva vekataṃ,
tika-abh04t:302_4: visayo eva vesayanti vuccati, evaṃ mano eva mānasanti saddamattaviseso. Nīlādi-saddā
tika-abh04t:302_5: viya vatthādīsu cittesu parisuddhabhāvanibandhanā paṇḍarasaddassa pavattīti tassa
tika-abh04t:302_6: guṇavisesāpekkhatā vuttā. Yathā kāyikaṃ sātanti ettha kāyappasādanissitanti attho,
tika-abh04t:302_7: evaṃ cetasikaṃ sātanti ettha cetonissitaṃ sātanti nissayavisesāpekkhatā vuttā. Ekakkhaṇikā
tika-abh04t:302_8: nānākkhaṇikā ca cittassa ṭhiti nāma, tassa avatthāvisesoti avatthāvisesāpekkho cittassa
tika-abh04t:302_9: ṭhitīti evaṃpakāro niddeso. “Na lubbhatī”ti vuttassa cittassa, puggalassa vā pavattiākārabhāvena
tika-abh04t:302_10: alubbhanāti alobho vuttoti aññassa kiriyābhāvavisesāpekkho alubbhanāti niddeso. Vuttanayeneva
tika-abh04t:302_11: alubbhitassa bhāvo alubbhitattanti ayaṃ niddeso aññassa bhāvabhūtatāvisesāpekkho
tika-abh04t:302_12: vutto. Kattukaraṇabhāvādayo sabhāvadhammānaṃ ajjhāropanavaseneva sijjhanti, bhāvaniddeso
tika-abh04t:302_13: pana ajjhāropanānapekkho, tatoyeva ca visesantaravinimutto vinivatto visesato nijjīvabhāvagibhāvato
tika-abh04t:302_14: sabhāvaniddeso nāma hotīti phassoti idaṃ phusanaṭṭhena “dhammamattadīpanaṃ sabhāvapada”nti
tika-abh04t:302_15: vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ phusantassa cittassa pavattiākāro phusanabyāpāro hotīti “phusanakiriyā
tika-abh04t:302_16: phusanākāro”ti vuttaṃ. Samphusanāti saṃ-saddo “samudayo”tiādīsu viya samāgamatthadīpakoti
tika-abh04t:303_0: Aparena vevacanena. Bahussutabhāvasampādikāya paññāya paṇḍiccapariyāyo. Sippāyatanādīsu
tika-abh04t:303_1: dakkhatābhūtāya kosallapariyāyo, yattha katthaci tikkhasukhumāya nepuññapariyāyo,
tika-abh04t:303_2: sammā dhamme paññapentiyā vebhabyāpariyāyoti evamādinā tesu tesu paññāvisesesu te
tika-abh04t:303_3: te pariyāyavisesā visesena pavattāti tesaṃ paññāvisesānaṃ nānākāle labbhamānatā vuttā,
tika-abh04t:303_4: itarepi anugatā honti yebhuyyenāti adhippāyo. Atthanānattena paññādiatthavisesena.
tika-abh04t:303_5: Kodho kujjhanā kujjhitattanti evaṃpakārā niddesā sabhāvākārabhāvadīpanavasena byañjanavaseneva
tika-abh04t:303_7: imamatthamāha “atha vā”tiādinā. Evamākāro panāti purimākārato viseso atthato vibhattigamanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:304_0: Paṭikkhipanaṃ paṭisedhanaṃ paṭikkhepo, tassa nānattaṃ viseso paṭikkhepanānattaṃ,
tika-abh04t:304_4: bhinno saddhammagarutāya paṭikkhepo paṭisedhanaṃ kodhādivisiṭṭhapaṭikkhepo. Kodhagarutādiyeva,
tika-abh04t:304_7: paṭipakkhabhāvavisesena asaddhammagarutā tabbhāvena ekībhūtāpi nānattaṃ gatā. Yasmā
tika-abh04t:304_8: pana kodho atthato dosoyeva. Makkho dosappadhānā paraguṇaviddhaṃsanākārappavattā
tika-abh04t:304_9: akusalā khandhā. Taggarutā ca tesaṃ sādaraabhisaṅkharaṇavasena pavattanameva. Lābhagarutā
tika-abh04t:304_10: catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ sakkāragarutā, tesaṃyeva susaṅkhatānaṃ laddhakāmatā. Tadubhayesu
tika-abh04t:304_12: asaddhammā nānattaṃ gatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi cattāro asaddhammā icceva uddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh04t:304_13: Asaddhammagarutāti ettha ca purimasmiṃ vikappe “na saddhammagarutā”ti saddhammagarutā
tika-abh04t:304_14: na hotīti attho. Dutiyasmiṃ saddhammagarutāya paṭipakkhoti saddhammagarutā eva vā
tika-abh04t:304_15: paṭipakkho, tassa nānattena saddhammagarutāpaṭipakkhanānattenāti evamettha attho
tika-abh04t:304_16: daṭṭhabbo. Kodhamakkhagarutānañhi saddhammavisesā pavattibhedabhinnā mettā paṭipakkho.
tika-abh04t:304_17: Lābhasakkāragarutānaṃ appicchatā santosā. Tena kodhagarutā na saddhammagarutāti kodhagarutā
tika-abh04t:304_18: kāyaci saddhammagarutāya paṭipakkhoti ayamattho vutto hoti. Tathā makkhagarutādīsupi.
tika-abh04t:304_19: Evañca katvā “cattāro saddhammā saddhammagarutā na kodhagarutā…pe… saddhammagarutā
tika-abh04t:304_20: na sakkāragarutā”ti āgatatantipi samatthitā bhavati. Lobho na hotīti alobho lubbhanā
tika-abh04t:304_21: na hotīti alubbhanāti evamādiko alobhotiādīnaṃ lobhādivisiṭṭho paṭikkhepo “phasso
tika-abh04t:304_22: phusanā”tiādikehi visadisabhāvato “phassādīhi nānatta”nti vutto. Phassādīhīti cettha
tika-abh04t:304_24: alobho”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Alobhādosāmohānaṃ vidhuratāya
tika-abh04t:304_26: lobhādipaṭipakkhabhāvena ca viññāyatīti āha “alobhā…pe… yojetabba”nti. Bahūhi pakārehi
tika-abh04t:305_0: 3. Yadipi ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekaṃyeva ārammaṇaṃ hoti, chasupi pana ārammaṇesu uppattirahattā
tika-abh04t:305_1: “tehi vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassāti sātassa sukhassa. Jātāti etassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kāraṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:305_2: phassatthaṃ pavattā”ti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā cetasikasātasaṅkhātā somanassavedanā
tika-abh04t:305_3: saheva uppajjati, evaṃ tadanurūpaphassasahitā hutvā pavattā tajjāti vuttā. Sādayatīti
tika-abh04t:306_0: 5. Na tassā tajjatāti tassā manoviññāṇadhātuyā tassāruppā “tassa jātā”ti vā ubhayathāpi
tika-abh04t:306_1: tajjatā na yujjati. Yadipi phasso viññāṇassa visesapaccayo na hoti, tathāpi so tassa
tika-abh04t:306_2: paccayo hotiyevāti tassa tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajatā vattabbāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-abh04t:306_3: “na ca tadevā”tiādi. Tehi ārammaṇehi jātā tajjāti imināpi atthena tajjā manoviññāṇadhātusamphassajāti
tika-abh04t:306_4: vattuṃ na sakkā. Viññāṇassa pana tajjatāpaññatti labbhateva. Tathā hi “kiṃ vā etenā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:307: 7. Cittassa ārammaṇe ānayanākārappavatto vitakko atthato ārammaṇaṃ tattha ākaḍḍhanto viya hotīti “ārammaṇassa ākaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:308: 8. Ārammaṇassa anumajjanākārappavatto vicāro tattha paribbhamanto viya samantato caranto viya ca hotīti “samantato caraṇaṃ vicaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:309: 11. Tathā avaṭṭhānamattabhāvatoti pāṇavadhādisādhanaavaṭṭhānamattabhāvato, na balavabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:310: 14. Yena dhammena citte ārammaṇaṃ upatiṭṭhati jotati ca, so dhammo upaṭṭhānaṃ jotananti ca vuttoti āha “upaṭṭhānaṃ jotanañca satiyevā”ti.
tika-abh04t:314_1: kathanti āha “avijjānīvaraṇāna”ntiādi. Tesaṃ bhāvo garutāti etena satipi sabbesaṃ
tika-abh04t:314_2: arūpadhammānaṃ samānakhaṇatte mohasampayuttānaṃ sātisayo dandho pavattiākāroti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:314_3: So pana tesaṃ dandhākāro santāne pākaṭo hoti.
tika-abh04t:317: 50-51. Paccosakkanaṃ māyā yā accasarātipi vuccati. Arumakkhanaṃ vaṇālepanaṃ. Veḷu eva dātabbabhāvena pariggahito veḷudānaṃ nāma.
tika-abh04t:320_0: 58-120. Teti phassapañcamakādayo. Saṅgahagamanenevāti sādhāraṇatādinā kenaci sadisatālesena,
tika-abh04t:320_1: na phassādayo viya visuṃ dhammabhāvenevāti attho. Tathā avippakiṇṇattāti phassādayo
tika-abh04t:320_2: viya sarūpena visuṃ visuṃ avuttattā. Yadipi chandādayo saṅgahasuññatavāresupi sarūpena
tika-abh04t:320_3: na vuttā, khandhāyatanadhāturāsīsu pana saṅgahitāyevāti dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:320_6: ṭhapetabbāti khandhādirāsiantogadhataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uddesādīsu pana “yevāpanātveva
tika-abh04t:320_7: vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tathāyeva saṅgaho yutto”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ṭhapetvā yevāpanake”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:320_8: Sarūpena avuttānampi cittuppādapariyāpannānaṃ khandhādibhāvo na vāretabboti na yevāpanakā
tika-abh04t:321_0: Āhārapaccayasaṅkhātenāti upatthambhakapaccayasaṅkhātena. So ca āhārānaṃ upatthambhakabhāvo
tika-abh04t:321_1: pākaṭoti katvā vutto, na janakattābhāvato. Ojaṭṭhamakarūpassa hi vedanādīnañca āhāraṇato
tika-abh04t:321_2: tesaṃ janakattaṃ labbhatīti. Yadi upatthambhako idha paccayoti adhippeto, kabaḷīkārāhārassa
tika-abh04t:321_3: tāva hotu, itaresaṃ kathanti āha “yathā hī”tiādi. Sahajātādipaccayeti sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatapaccaye
tika-abh04t:321_4: vadati, mahācatukkaṃ vā, ekenākārenāti rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattena upakārakabhāvamāha.
tika-abh04t:321_5: So eva ca nesaṃ āharaṇakiccaṃ. “Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato cetanāya viññāṇassa
tika-abh04t:322_0: Yathāgatamaggoti vutto kāraṇaphalānaṃ abhedūpacārenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, nānākkhaṇiko aṭṭhaṅgikamaggo
tika-abh04t:322_2: vuccamāno tassa yā purimakālabhūtā abhedopacārasiddhā āgamanāvatthā tato nātivilakkhaṇāti
tika-abh04t:322_3: imamatthaṃ vibhāvetīti āha “pubbabhāga…pe… dīpitā”ti. Viññāṇassa cittavicittatā vijānanabhāvavisesā
tika-abh04t:322_5: hontī”tiādīsu vuttamanāyatanādayopi saṅgaṇhāti. Tappaṭikkhepoti tassa jātiniddesabhāvassa
tika-abh04t:322_6: paṭikkhepo. Kato hotīti etena āhārindriyajhānamaggaphalahetuyo yattakā imasmiṃ citte
tika-abh04t:322_7: labbhanti, te sabbepi “eko viññāṇāhāro hotī”tiādinā avuttāpi atthato vuttāyevāti
tika-abh04t:327: 156-159. Nātisamāhitāyāti nānāvajjanūpacāraṃ sandhāya vadati. Yevāpanakehipi nibbisesataṃ dasseti karuṇāmuditānampi uppajjanato.
tika-abh04t:328: Kāyavacīkiriyā kāyavacīpavatti, viññatti eva vā. Asamattabhāvananti pubbabhāgabhāvanamāha.
tika-abh04t:333_0: 160. Uttarapadalopaṃ katvā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti vutto, “rūpī rūpāni passati, rūparāgo”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:333_1: viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Payogasampāditassa rūpajjhānassa rūpabhavātikkamassapi upāyabhāvato
tika-abh04t:333_2: yathā rūpūpapattiyā eva maggoti ayaṃ niyamo na yujjati, evaṃ paccayantaravikalatādīhi
tika-abh04t:333_3: rūpūpapattiyā anabhinipphādakassapi atthibhāvato rūpūpapattiyā maggo evāti ayampi
tika-abh04t:333_4: niyamo na yujjati. Evañca sati yadeva rūpūpapattiyā nipphādakaṃ, tasseva sampayuttassa
tika-abh04t:333_5: rūpāvacarakusalabhāvo, na anabhinipphādakassāti ayamattho āpannoti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti
tika-abh04t:333_6: na sabbassa kusalajjhānassātiādinā. Tattha sāmaññasaddopi adhikāravasena visesaniddiṭṭho
tika-abh04t:334_2: udāharaṇabhāvena vuttaṃ. Sāmaññampi hi visesato bhinnaṃ katvā voharīyatīti. Sabbasamānoti
tika-abh04t:334_3: rūpūpapattiyā nipphādakassa paccayantaravikalatādīhi anipphādakassa ca sabbassa yathādhigatassa
tika-abh04t:334_4: jhānassa sādhāraṇo. Etena uttarapadāvadhāraṇassa pariggahitataṃ dasseti. “Ito añño
tika-abh04t:334_5: maggo nāma natthī”ti imināpi sajātiyā sādhāraṇo aññajātivinivattiyā anaññasādhāraṇo
tika-abh04t:334_6: imassa jhānassa rūpūpapattiyā upāyabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itare dve saddhā hirī
tika-abh04t:334_7: ca. Yadi paṭipadāya sādhetabbato puggalapubbaṅgamāya desanāya bhāventena samayavavatthānaṃ
tika-abh04t:334_8: kataṃ. Paṭipadārahitesu kathanti āha “kesañcī”tiādi. Tattha kesañcīti samathabhāvanāya
tika-abh04t:334_9: katādhikārānaṃ. Tesañhi maggādhigamanato pubbe anadhigatajjhānānaṃ paṭisambhidādayo
tika-abh04t:335_0: Aññānīti ariyamaggasiddhito aññāni. Tesupīti ariyamaggena siddhattā paṭipadārahitesupi.
tika-abh04t:335_1: Nanu ca ariyamaggasiddhassapi āgamanavasena paṭipadā upalabbhatiyeva. Itarathā “na
tika-abh04t:335_2: kāmāvacaraṃ viya vinā paṭipadāya uppajjatī”ti, “bahutaraṃ lokiyajjhānampi na vinā
tika-abh04t:335_3: paṭipadāya ijjhatī”ti ca vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti? Na, yebhuyyena gahaṇato puggalavisesāpekkhattā
tika-abh04t:335_4: ca. Ariyamaggasamijjhanakañhi jhānaṃ kassacideva hoti, tasmā itaraṃ bahutaraṃ lokiyajjhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:335_5: puthujjanassa ariyassa ca akatādhikārassa na vinā paṭipadāya sijjhatīti tesaṃ vasena
tika-abh04t:335_6: vuttaṃ. Ariyamaggasiddhassapi jhānassa vipākānaṃ viya kusalena ariyamaggena sadisattābhāvato
tika-abh04t:335_7: atabbipākattā ca na maggāgamanavasena paṭipadā yujjati, evamassa paṭipadāviraho siddho.
tika-abh04t:335_8: Evañca katvā suddhikanavakadesanāpi suṭṭhu nītā hoti. Tathā ca vakkhati lokuttarakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:336_0: Vaṭṭāsayassa visesapaccayabhūtāya taṇhāya tanukaraṇavasena vivaṭṭāsayassa vaḍḍhananti
tika-abh04t:336_1: āha “taṇhāsaṃkilesasodhanena āsayaposana”nti. Āsayaposananti ca jhānabhāvanāya paccayabhūtā
tika-abh04t:336_2: pubbayogādivasena siddhā ajjhāsayasampadā. Sā pana taṇhupatāpavigamena hotīti āha
tika-abh04t:339_0: Pītisukhavantaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuttaṃ yathā arisasoti dassento “pītisukha…pe…
tika-abh04t:339_1: akāro vutto”ti āha. Maggassapi vā nibbānārammaṇato tathalakkhaṇūpanijjhānatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh04t:341_1: virajjanaṃ pahānañcāti idhādhippetavitakkādayoyeva jhānaṅgabhūtā tathā karīyanti,
tika-abh04t:341_2: na taṃsampayuttaphassādayoti vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamādivacanaṃ ñāyāgataṃ. Yasmā
tika-abh04t:341_3: pana vitakkādayo viya taṃsampayuttadhammāpi etena etaṃ oḷārikanti diṭṭhādīnavā eva,
tika-abh04t:341_4: tasmā avisesena vitakkādīnaṃ taṃsahajātānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkavicārādīnaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:341_5: vūpasamādikaṃ vuccamānaṃ “adhikavacanamaññamatthaṃ bodhetī”ti kiñci visesaṃ dīpetīti
tika-abh04t:341_6: taṃ dassento “yehi vitakkavicārehī”tiādimāha. Visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitānipi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādīni
tika-abh04t:341_7: paheyyaṅganiddesatāsāmaññena cittena samūhato gahetvā avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:341_8: katanti dassento “tesaṃ…pe… taṃ dīpakanti vutta”nti āha. Idāni avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:342_0: Tasmiṃ dassiteti “yā saddhā saddahanā”tiādinā jhānavibhaṅge sampasādane dassite.
tika-abh04t:345_0: 163. Vīriyaṃ upekkhāti vuttaṃ “paggahaniggahesu byāpārākaraṇena upekkhiyatī”ti. Gahaṇe
tika-abh04t:345_1: majjhattabhāvena saṅkhāre upekkhatīti saṅkhārupekkhā, tathāpavattā vipassanā paññā.
tika-abh04t:345_2: Tassā pana visayato pabhedo “aṭṭha saṅkhārupekkhā”tiādinā yassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vutto, taṃ
tika-abh04t:345_4: idha uppattiṃ. Pavattanti tathā uppannassa pavattiṃ. Nimittanti sabbampi saṅkhāragataṃ
tika-abh04t:345_5: nimittabhāvena upaṭṭhānato. Āyūhananti āyatiṃ paṭisandhihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ. Paṭisandhinti
tika-abh04t:345_6: āyatiṃ upapattiṃ. Gatinti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti. Nibbattinti khandhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:345_7: nibbattanaṃ. Upapattinti “samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ vipākappavattiṃ.
tika-abh04t:345_8: Jātinti jarādīnaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ bhavapaccayā jātiṃ. Jarāmaraṇādayo pākaṭā eva. Ettha
tika-abh04t:345_9: ca uppādādayo pañceva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa visayavasena vuttā, sesā tesaṃ vevacanavasena.
tika-abh04t:345_10: “Nibbatti jātī”ti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ. “Gati upapatti
tika-abh04t:345_11: cā”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ pavattassa. Jarādayo nimittassāti.
tika-abh04t:349_0: 167. Ākārabhedanti ākāravisesaṃ. Anekākārā hi dhammā, te ca niravasesaṃ yāthāvato
tika-abh04t:349_1: bhagavatā abhisambuddhā. Yathāha – “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato
tika-abh04t:349_2: ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”ti. Dutiyajjhānapakkhikaṃ na paṭhamajjhānapakkhikanti
tika-abh04t:349_3: adhippāyo. Tenevāha “paṭhamajjhānameva hī”tiādi. Atthato hi catukkapañcakanayā aññamaññānuppavesino.
tika-abh04t:349_4: Pañcakanaye dutiyajjhānaṃ kiṃ savicāratāya paṭhamajjhānapakkhikaṃ udāhu avitakkatāya
tika-abh04t:349_5: dutiyajjhānapakkhikanti siyā āsaṅkāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthamidaṃ vuttaṃ. Kasmātiādinā
tika-abh04t:349_6: tattha kāraṇamāha. Suttantadesanāsu ca dutiyajjhānameva bhajantīti sambandho. Ca-saddena
tika-abh04t:349_7: na kevalaṃ idheva, atha kho suttantadesanāsupīti desanantarepi yathāvuttajjhānassa
tika-abh04t:349_9: vuttaṃ. Tena suttantepi pañcakanayassa labbhamānataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t:350_0: Nanu ca suttante cattāriyeva jhānāni vibhattānīti pañcakanayo natthiyevāti? Na, “savitakkasavicāro
tika-abh04t:350_2: pana katvā pañcakanayo vibhattoti tatthāpi pañcakanayo niddhāretabbo. Vitakkavicārānaṃ
tika-abh04t:350_3: vūpasamāti hi vitakkassa vicārassa vitakkavicārānañca vitakkavicārānanti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh04t:350_4: Tathā avitakkaavicārānanti ca vinā saha ca vicārena vitakkappahānena avitakkaṃ saha
tika-abh04t:350_5: vinā ca vitakkena vicārappahānena avicāranti avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ avitakkaavicārañcāti
tika-abh04t:351_0: Dutiyanti ca vitakkarahite vitakkavicāradvayarahite ca ñāyāgatā desanā. Dutiyaṃ adhigantabbattā
tika-abh04t:351_2: dutiye vūpasantopi vitakko taṃsahāyavicārāvūpasamena na sammāvūpasantoti vitakkavicāradvayarahite
tika-abh04t:351_4: vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ
tika-abh04t:351_5: pītisukhaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti tatiyaṃ catukkanaye dutiyena nibbisesaṃ
tika-abh04t:351_6: vibhattaṃ. Duvidhassapi sahāyavirahena aññathā ca vitakkappahānena avitakkattaṃ samādhijaṃ
tika-abh04t:351_7: pītisukhattañca samānanti samānadhammattāpi dutiyanti niddeso. Vicāramattampi hi
tika-abh04t:351_8: vitakkavicāradvayarahitaṃ viya “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkavicāramattaṃ
tika-abh04t:351_9: samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti avitakkaṃ samādhijaṃ
tika-abh04t:351_10: pītisukhanti vibhattaṃ. Paṭhamajjhāne vā sahacārīsu vitakkavicāresu ekaṃ atikkamitvā
tika-abh04t:351_11: dutiyampi tatraṭṭhameva dosato disvā ubhayampi sahātikkamantassa pañcakanaye tatiyaṃ
tika-abh04t:351_12: vuttaṃ tatiyaṃ adhigantabbattā. Paṭhamato anantarabhāvena panassa dutiyabhāvo ca
tika-abh04t:351_13: uppajjati. Kasmā panettha sarūpato pañcakanayo na vibhattoti? Vineyyajjhāsayato.
tika-abh04t:353_1: santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā nikanti taṃsampayuttā khandhā vā tadārakkhabhūtā
tika-abh04t:353_2: satiyeva vā tassa jhānassa anucchavikatāya “tadanudhammatā satī”ti vuttāti. Kadācīti
tika-abh04t:353_3: yadā paṭhamaṃ adhigantvā yathānisinnoyeva vinā payogantaraṃ dutiyādīni adhigacchati, īdise kāleti attho.
tika-abh04t:354: 186. Kusalajjhānassa adhigatattā “sekkhā”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi te uppādenti nāmāti ariyamaggakkhaṇe rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ anuppajjamānataṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh04t:356_0: 203. Āruppapādakatā ca dassitā vinā abhāvato. Na hi tesaṃ āruppapādakatāya vinā nirodhapādakatā
tika-abh04t:356_1: atthīti. Nimminituṃ icchitassa vatthuno nimmānavasena khippaṃ nisanti nisāmanaṃ ālocanaṃ
tika-abh04t:356_2: adhigamo etassāti khippanisanti. Tabbhāvo “khippanisantibhāvo”ti āha “khippadassanaṃ khippābhiññatā”ti.
tika-abh04t:359_0: 204. Paṭibhāganimittabhūtaṃ kasiṇārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti kasiṇāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh04t:359_1: jhānaṃ. Atha vā ārammaṇassa anavasesapharaṇaṭṭhena kasiṇañca taṃ āyatanañca yogino
tika-abh04t:359_3: jhānaṃ kasiṇāyatanaṃ. Tenevāha “satipi abhibhāyatanānaṃ kasiṇāyatanatte”ti. Bhāvanāya
tika-abh04t:359_4: nimittaṃ bhāvanānimittaṃ, ārammaṇassa parittappamāṇatā suvisuddhanīlāditā ca, tadeva
tika-abh04t:359_5: nānattaṃ. Bhāvanā eva vā pubbabhāgabhūtā bhāvanānimittaṃ, tassa nānattaṃ bhāvanānimittanānattaṃ.
tika-abh04t:359_6: Pubbabhāgabhāvanā hi yathāvuttavisese ārammaṇe pavattiākāravisesato nānāsabhāvāti.
tika-abh04t:359_7: Kasiṇanimittassa abhibhavanakabhāvanānimittanānattaṃ kasiṇa…pe… nānattaṃ, tatoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:360_0: Ettha ca purimāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni bhūtakasiṇārammaṇāni, bhūtakasiṇesu ca
tika-abh04t:360_1: yaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇanti ca na sakkā vattuṃ. Tattha pavattitāni sabbattha vā vaṇṇābhogarahitena
tika-abh04t:360_3: Yadi evaṃ dutiyacatutthehi pañcamādīnaṃ ko visesoti “pañcamādīni vaṇṇato ramaṇīyatarāni,
tika-abh04t:360_4: na tathā itarānī”ti vadanti. Purimānipi cattāri aṭṭha kasiṇārammaṇāneva, tasmā taṃ
tika-abh04t:360_5: nesaṃ matimattaṃ “aṭṭhasu kasiṇesū”ti vuttattā. Vimokkhesu ca paṭhamadutiyavimokkhā
tika-abh04t:360_6: aṭṭha kasiṇārammaṇā. Tatiyo vaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇo. Paṭhamadutiyāpi vā vaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇā
tika-abh04t:360_7: eva “bahiddhā nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passatī”ti vuttattā. Ārammaṇamanuññatāya
tika-abh04t:360_8: hi tattha aniggatitabhāvena tesaṃ pavattīti. Evaṃ sante tatiyassa itarehi ko visesoti?
tika-abh04t:360_9: Subhākārābhogo. Tatiyo eva hi subhanti ābhujanavasena pavattati, na itareti.
tika-abh04t:361_0: Ñāṇaṃ appanāpaññā. Vijjamānepīti api-saddena avijjamānepīti dasseti. Parittappamāṇatā
tika-abh04t:361_1: abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ imesu catūsu abhibhāyatanesūti adhippāyo. Nanu ca sabbattha
tika-abh04t:361_2: “suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vacanato vaṇṇābhogasahitāniyeva gahitānīti? Na gahitānīti dassento
tika-abh04t:361_3: “tattha cā”tiādimāha. Tatthāti āgamesu. Tathā appamāṇānīti vaṇṇābhogarahitāni ca
tika-abh04t:361_4: sabbāni appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti attho. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ visiṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇābhogena
tika-abh04t:361_5: rahitānaṃ sahitānañca ekajjhaṃ manasi karoti? Na ekajjhaṃ, visuṃyeva pana tesu manasikāro.
tika-abh04t:361_6: Yadi visuṃ kathamekanti? Parittabhāvasāmaññato. Yadi evaṃ “suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:361_7: atiricchatī”ti, nātiricchatīti dassento “atthi hi eso pariyāyo”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-abh04t:361_8: yadidaṃ vaṇṇābhogajanitaṃ visesaṃ aggahetvā parittasāmaññena ekattaṃ netvā “parittāni
tika-abh04t:361_9: abhibhuyyā”ti vatvā puna tadantogadhadhammappabhedaṃ vineyyavasena dassetuṃ “tāni
tika-abh04t:361_10: ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyā”ti vattabbatāya
tika-abh04t:361_11: vaṇṇābhogarahitāni sahitāni ca visuṃ manasi katvā ubhayatthāpi vaṇṇābhogarahitaparittābhibhavane
tika-abh04t:361_12: taṃ sahitaparittābhibhavane ca parittābhibhavanassa sāmaññaṃ gahetvā ekanti vacanaṃ,
tika-abh04t:362_0: Evaṃ suttantābhidhammapāṭhavisesato aṭṭhakathāya virodhābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni suttantābhidhammapāṭhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:362_1: avirodhaṃ adhippāyavibhāvanena dassetuṃ “tatthacā”tiādimāha. Evaṃ abhidhamme vaṇṇābhogarahitāni
tika-abh04t:362_2: sahitāni ca visuṃ vuttāni. Suttante pana “ubhayāni ekajjha”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ
tika-abh04t:362_3: viññāyatīti āha “tadeta”ntiādi. Tattha āgatassāti suttante āgatassa. Tattha hi “ajjhattaṃ
tika-abh04t:362_4: rūpasaññī”ti āgataṃ. Avacanatoti abhidhamme avacanato. Yadipi vimokkhā visuṃ desitā,
tika-abh04t:362_5: kasiṇāyatanabhāvo viya pana abhibhāyatanānaṃ vimokkhakiccatāpi atthīti abhibhāyatanavimokkhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:362_6: idhāpi saṅkaro dunnivāroti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato”ti.
tika-abh04t:362_7: Tena yathā abhibhāyatanadesanāyaṃ abhibhāyatanakiccāni niravasesato vuttāni, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:362_8: vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vimokkhakiccānīti idha tesaṃ asaṅkaroyevāti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:363_0: Ye ca yathāvuttaṃ vavatthānaṃ na sampaṭicchanti, tehi suttantābhidhammapāṭhabhede
tika-abh04t:363_1: aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. Kimettha vattabbaṃ, nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā pana
tika-abh04t:363_2: yathā suttante”tiādiṃ vatvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttanti.
tika-abh04t:363_3: Na taṃ tassa kāraṇavacananti dassento “ajjhattarūpāna”ntiādimāha. Tattha yanti idha
tika-abh04t:363_4: suttante ca “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuttavacanaṃ sandhāyāha. Bahiddhā rūpāniyeva
tika-abh04t:363_5: hi abhibhavanīyānīti. Aññahetukanti desanāvilāsato aññaṃ abhibhavanīyahetu etassāti
tika-abh04t:363_6: aññahetukaṃ. Ajjhattaarūpasaññitāya eva, na suttante viya ajjhattarūpasaññitāya cāti
tika-abh04t:363_7: attho. Avibhūtattāti idaṃ ñāṇuttarānaṃ saha nimittuppādanena appanānibbattanaṃ ārammaṇassa
tika-abh04t:363_8: abhibhavo na suṭṭhu vibhūtabhāvamantarena sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:363_9: pāṭhadvayavisesassa desanāvilāso kāraṇabhāvena vuttoti āha “desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena
tika-abh04t:363_10: veditabbo”ti. Desanāvilāso hi nāma vineyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vijjamānasseva pariyāyassa
tika-abh04t:363_11: vibhāvanaṃ na yassa kassacīti. Tattha ca “pariyāyadesanattā”tiādinā vuttappakāravavatthānaṃ
tika-abh04t:363_12: desanāvilāsanibandhanamāha. Tathā ceva hi purato desanāvilāso vibhāvito.
tika-abh04t:366_0: 248. Tanti “sasantatipariyāpannarūpa”nti vuttakesādivaṇṇamāha. Taṃ pana yasmā khalamaṇḍalādi
tika-abh04t:366_1: viya paramparāya jhānassa kāraṇaṃ, tasmā “jhānassa hetubhāvenā”ti āha. Yenāti yathāvuttarūpavisesena.
tika-abh04t:366_3: vuttena rūpajhānena. “Visiṭṭhenā”ti iminā hi atisayarūpayutto rūpīti vuttoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:366_4: “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇa”ntiādinā jhānānameva kasiṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:366_5: pavattā. Sutte ārammaṇānaṃ kasiṇabhāvena pavattā “pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānātī”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t:369_0: 251. Aññāṇasampayuttāpi vā upekkhāvedanā aññāṇupekkhā, upekkhāti aññāṇasampayuttā
tika-abh04t:369_1: upekkhāvedanā, aññāṇupekkhātipi etāsaṃyeva nāmanti hi sammohavinodaniyaṃ vakkhatīti.
tika-abh04t:369_2: Appaṭibhāganimittattepi ekaṃ katipaye vā satte odissa pavattā paricchinnarūpādiupādānavisaye
tika-abh04t:369_3: pavattattā kathamappamāṇagocarāti āha “na ca sammutisaccavasenā”tiādi. Evampi yathā
tika-abh04t:369_4: natthi sattā opapātikāti sattavasena pavattāyapi micchādiṭṭhiyā saṅkhārārammaṇatā
tika-abh04t:369_5: vuccati upādānavasena, evaṃ sattavasena pavattānampi mettādīnaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇatāpi
tika-abh04t:369_6: siyāti ce? Na, aparāmasanavasena pavattānaṃ mettādīnaṃ saupādānaggahaṇāsambhavatoti
tika-abh04t:372_0: 263. “Ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ vā”tiādinā vuttāsu navasu sivathikāsu vaṇṇavasena
tika-abh04t:372_1: pavattajjhānaṃ sivathikāvaṇṇajjhānaṃ. Nanu cetassa vaṇṇakasiṇehi gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t:372_2: na asubhehīti? Na, sivathikāvaṇṇaṃ upamaṃ katvā attano kāye paṭikūlattaṃ amuñcitvāva
tika-abh04t:376_0: 265. Rūpanimittanti rūpahetu rūpādhikaraṇaṃ. Rūpārūpanimittesūti rūpadhammesu ca
tika-abh04t:376_1: pathavīkasiṇādinimittesu ca. Tadārammaṇajjhānesūti ettha taṃ-saddena rūpanimittaṃ
tika-abh04t:376_2: paccāmasati rūpampi vā rūpadhammārammaṇānampi rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ sambhavato. Rūpādīsūti
tika-abh04t:377_0: Cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ…pe… anuppattidhammatāpādanena samatikkamoti etena samatikkamitabbattena
tika-abh04t:377_2: Yesañhi rūpasaññādīnaṃ arūpabhāvanāya samatikkamādiko labbhati, te dassetuṃ “arūpabhāvanāya
tika-abh04t:377_3: abhāve cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahāna”nti vuttanti. Yāti ekantarūpanissitā avasiṭṭhaparittavipākasaññādayo.
tika-abh04t:379_0: Idha ugghāṭitakasiṇavasena parittānantatā hoti nippariyāyadesanattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:379_1: Yadi evaṃ parittakasiṇugghāṭite kathamākāsānañcāyatanavacananti? Tatthāpi anantapharaṇasabbhāvato.
tika-abh04t:379_2: Tenevāha “anantapharaṇatāsabbhāve”ti. Yadi sabbattha anantapharaṇatā atthi, atha
tika-abh04t:379_3: kasmā “ananto ākāso”ti na vuttanti āha “samayavavatthāpanā”tiādi. Tattha paṭipattīti
tika-abh04t:381_0: 268. Ākāse pavattitaviññāṇātikkamato tatiyāti paduddhāraṃ katvā yuttito āgamato ca
tika-abh04t:381_2: pattabbattā visesato ārammaṇe dosadassanaṃ tadeva atikkamitabbanti ayaṃ yutti, ārammaṇe
tika-abh04t:381_3: pana atikkante tadārammaṇaṃ jhānampi atikkantameva hoti. Bhāvanāya ārammaṇassa vigamanaṃ
tika-abh04t:381_4: apanayanaṃ vibhāvanā. Pāḷiyanti vibhaṅge. Nanu ca pāḷiyaṃ “taññeva viññāṇa”nti avisesena
tika-abh04t:384_2: aṭṭhacattālīsa loke gottāni mūlabhūtāni, tathā kaṭṭhakalāpādayo aṭṭhacattālīseva
tika-abh04t:384_3: caraṇānīti āha “aṭṭhacattālīsa”ntiādi. Tattha tesanti bhabbābhabbānaṃ. Dvārasīsena
tika-abh04t:384_4: dvāravantāni gayhantīti adhippāyenāha “taṃtaṃdvārāni vā kāyādīnī”ti. Acittīkārena
tika-abh04t:384_5: vā kataṃ hīnaṃ, ajjhupekkhanena kataṃ majjhimaṃ, sakkaccakataṃ paṇītaṃ. Āmisakiñjakkhādihetu
tika-abh04t:384_6: vā kataṃ hīnaṃ, puññaphalakāmatāya kataṃ majjhimaṃ, kattabbamicceva ariyabhāve ṭhitena
tika-abh04t:384_7: kataṃ paṇītaṃ. Bhavasampattilobhena vā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ, alobhajjhāsayena pavattitaṃ
tika-abh04t:384_8: majjhimaṃ, parahitāya pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ. Parittakataṃ vā hīnaṃ, mattaso kataṃ majjhimaṃ,
tika-abh04t:384_9: adhimattaso kataṃ paṇītaṃ. Mahaggatesu pana paṭiladdhamattaṃ hīnaṃ, nātisubhāvitaṃ
tika-abh04t:384_10: majjhimaṃ, subhāvitaṃ vasippattaṃ paṇītaṃ. Imesupi ekekassa hīnādikassa āyūhananānattādivasena
tika-abh04t:384_11: hīnādibhedo labbhatiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vasenāti yo cittappabhāvito
tika-abh04t:384_12: cittasampayuttānaṃ cittādhipateyyabhāvo, so taṃnimitte citte upacaritoti evaṃ vā ettha attho.
tika-abh04t:387_1: tattha “tividhopi anuttaradhammo lokaṃ taratī”tiādinā saṅgahitoti taṃ tīhi padehi
tika-abh04t:387_2: yojetvā dassetuṃ “lokaṃ taratīti etenā”tiādimāha. Ekekasmiṃ yojetabbo lokassa antagamanāditāya
tika-abh04t:387_3: maggādīsupi labbhamānattā. Maggeyeva vā tividhopi attho yojetabboti sambandho. Anativattanādīti
tika-abh04t:387_4: ādi-saddena indriyānaṃ ekarasatā tadupagavīriyavāhanaṃ āsevanāti ime tayo bhāvanāvisese
tika-abh04t:387_5: saṅgaṇhāti. Yasmā cete bhāvanāvisesā saṃkilesavodānesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭesu ca taṃtaṃādīnavānisaṃsadassanabhūtāya
tika-abh04t:387_6: pubbabhāgapaññāya sampāditena ñāṇavisesena nipphajjanti, tasmā vuttaṃ “aññamaññaṃ…pe… vaḍḍhetī”ti.
tika-abh04t:388_0: Nissayo hotīti rukkho viya sākhāya ādhārabhāvena voharīyatīti attho. Phalañāṇaphalaṅgānaṃ
tika-abh04t:388_1: nissayavacanaṃ nissayapaccayattā. Tatoyeva nissayabhāvato patiṭṭhābhāvato. Ariyaphalasannissayena
tika-abh04t:388_2: hi ariyā katakiccā suṭṭhu nibbinnasabbabhavāpi cirataraṃ loke parahitāya tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh04t:388_3: Kilesānaṃ odhiso pajahanakāpi ariyamaggā avisesena sabbākusalānaṃ sabbakusalapaṭipakkhatāya
tika-abh04t:388_4: aññamaggappahātabbesupi kenaci pahānākārena pavattantīti taṃ pahānākāraṃ dassento
tika-abh04t:388_5: “itaresaṃ vijjutobhāsena viya tamassā”ti āha. Yena pāḷiyaṃ heṭṭhimamaggañāṇānaṃ vijjūpamatā
tika-abh04t:388_6: dassitā. Yadi evaṃ uparimaggavajjhā kilesā itareti idhādhippetā. Na tesaṃ samucchedavacanaṃ
tika-abh04t:388_7: yuttaṃ. Na hi bhāvanāya pahātabbe dassanamaggo samucchindituṃ sakkoti. Tathā ca sati
tika-abh04t:388_8: dassanena pahātabbā eva te siyuṃ. Atha tadaṅgappahānaṃ adhippetaṃ, yena “vijjutobhāsena
tika-abh04t:388_9: viya tamassā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pubbabhāgavipassanāya eva siddhaṃ na ca yuttaṃ lokuttaramaggo
tika-abh04t:388_10: tadaṅgavasena kilese pajahatīti. Vikkhambhanepi eseva nayo, anulomañāṇeneva tassa
tika-abh04t:388_11: sātisayaṃ sādhitattā. Atha pana paṭhamamaggavajjhā eva kilesā itareti adhippetā,
tika-abh04t:388_12: evaṃ sante tesaṃ itarabhāvova na siyā, na ca anapāyagamanīyā nāma kilesā dassanena
tika-abh04t:388_13: pahātabbā atthi, nāpi paṭhamamaggavajjhā kilesā tena vijjutobhāsena viya tamo samucchinditabbāti
tika-abh04t:388_15: na vinā paṭipadāya ijjhatīti idaṃ adhippāyavasena netabbaṃ neyyatthattāti taṃ adhippāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:388_16: vibhāvento “akatādhikārassā”ti āha. Tena yathāvuttavacanassa ca sappadesataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t:388_17: Nanu ca katādhikārassa ariyassa maggena samijjhamānampi jhānaṃ maggapaṭipadāvasena
tika-abh04t:388_18: paṭipadāsahitamevāti. Na vinā paṭipadāya ijjhatīti sakkā vattuṃ, tenetaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-abh04t:388_19: nippadesamevāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “katādhikārassa panā”tiādi. Idāni tassa vacanassa
tika-abh04t:388_20: adhippāyavasena gahetabbatthatā pāḷitopi viññāyatīti dassento āha “yathāvutta…pe… katā”ti.
tika-abh04t:389_0: “Yo kocīti avisesavacana”nti tassa apavādaṃ dassento “sakiṃ dvikkhattu”nti ādimāha.
tika-abh04t:389_2: Kicchasiddhitoti nāmarūpavavatthāpanādīnaṃ kesañci sabbesampi vā kicchasiddhito.
tika-abh04t:389_3: Esa nayo dutiyavārādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ. Sukhasiddhiyampīti nāmarūpavavatthāpanādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:390_1: vipassanāpaññāya cirācirappavattivasena maggassa khippadandhābhiññatā vuttāti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:390_2: Purimānanti purimavārānaṃ, lakkhaṇapaṭivedhādīnaṃyeva vā. Heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tikkhattuṃ
tika-abh04t:390_3: kilesavikkhambhane sati dukkhāpaṭipadābhāvo, na tato heṭṭhāti nicchitattā āha “tikkhattuṃ
tika-abh04t:390_4: vikkhambhanavāratāvasenā”ti. Tassa sukhāpaṭipadā veditabbā ukkaṃsavasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:391_0: Yasmiṃ puggale visaṃvādanabhedanāniṭṭhānatthaniyojanānaṃ pavatti, tattha sinehaviraheneva
tika-abh04t:391_1: tesaṃ pavatti, so ca puggalo asaṅgahito hotīti musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya
tika-abh04t:391_2: lūkhatā ca apariggahatā ca vuttā. Tappaṭipakkhaviruddhasabhāvattā sammāvācāya siniddhabhāvatā
tika-abh04t:391_3: pariggāhakasabhāvatā. Saddhāvisesayogato vā tassā siniddhabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Samuṭṭhāpetīti
tika-abh04t:391_4: pavatteti. Jīvamāno vā satto, sampayuttadhammā vā vodāyanti etena sayaṃ vā vodāyatīti vodānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:392_1: patiṭṭhānaṃ. Ucchedadiṭṭhiyā āyūhanā. Līnavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ. Uddhaccavasena āyūhanā.
tika-abh04t:392_4: vuttesu pakārantaresu idha avuttānaṃ vasenapi patiṭṭhānāyūhanā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t:393_0: Atha vā kilesaggahaṇena taṇhāsassatadiṭṭhisabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā gahitā taṃsabhāgatāya
tika-abh04t:393_2: Līnuddhaccakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogānaṃ visuṃ vuttattā tehi na yojetabbanti kilesābhisaṅkhāravasena
tika-abh04t:393_3: patiṭṭhānāyūhane vatvā taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ tattha visesapaccayataṃ dīpetuṃ tadubhayavasenapi
tika-abh04t:393_4: yojanā katā. Nayadassanaṃ vā etaṃ tattha daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evamitarepi pakārā yojetabbāti.
tika-abh04t:393_5: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato puggalo”tiādīsu aṅga-saddassa kāraṇatthatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t:394: 299. Musāvādādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma kiṃ vakkhamānaṃ kiriyaṃ, kā pana sāti? Musāvādādikiriyāti viditovāyamattho. Evaṃ vā ettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t:395_1: lūkhacīvarādisevanavasena “yo te vihāre vasati, so arahā”tiādinā attānaṃ ariyaguṇasāmantaṃ
tika-abh04t:395_2: katvā bhaṇanavasena visesalābhino viya attano pariharaṇavasena ca pavattā akusalacittuppādā
tika-abh04t:396_0: 343. Satipi saguṇārammaṇehi maggassa animittanāmalābhe na nippariyāyena vipassanā
tika-abh04t:396_1: animittanāmikāti āgamanato maggo animittanāmaṃ na labhatīti āha “na pana saguṇārammaṇehi…pe…
tika-abh04t:396_2: siddhaṃ hotī”ti. Yasmā pana āgamanato suññataṃ appaṇihitanti laddhanāmassa maggassa
tika-abh04t:396_3: saguṇato ārammaṇato ca taṃnāmābhāvo na kadācipi atthi, tasmā nāmattayapāripūrihetuāgamanato
tika-abh04t:397_0: 350. Nimittadhammā saṅkhārā tehi sanimittā saviggahā viya upaṭṭhahantīti tesaṃ abhāvitabhāvanassa
tika-abh04t:397_1: bhāvitabhāvanassa ca upaṭṭhahanākāraṃ dassento “samūhādī”tiādimāha. Tena ca “vimokkhena
tika-abh04t:397_2: saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ, na “tasmiṃ vimokkhe”ti, tasmā “animittavimokkhoti
tika-abh04t:397_3: aniccānupassanaṃ āhā”ti vuttaṃ. Itaratthāpi eseva nayo. Animittassa animittabhāvābhāvo
tika-abh04t:397_4: natthīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu ca aniccānupassanāya animittavimokkhabhāvo pariyāyenāti
tika-abh04t:397_5: nippariyāyadesanāya tassā animittabhāvābhāvo atthi eva, evañca sati “animittassa
tika-abh04t:397_6: animittanāmadānābhāvo”ti ca na na sakkā vattunti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati,
tika-abh04t:397_7: tathā animittena maggassa animittabhāvo na yujjatiyeva. Tenāha “paramatthato nāmaṃ
tika-abh04t:397_8: dātuṃ na sakkotī”ti? Saccametaṃ, pariyāyasiddhaṃyeva pana aniccānupassanāya animittabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:397_10: natthītiviruddhaṃ viya hotī”ti. Evañca katvā “animittaṃ…pe… dīpito hotī”ti sayameva
tika-abh04t:397_11: vakkhatīti. Sāmaññanti upamopamitabbānaṃ sambandhamāha. Na maggādhipatīti maggo adhipati
tika-abh04t:397_12: maggādhipatīti chandacittānaṃ ayaṃ samaññā natthīti attho. Na ca tehi maggassāti
tika-abh04t:397_13: chandacittehi maggo adhipati etassāti maggādhipatīti ayaṃ samaññā maggassa natthi.
tika-abh04t:398_0: Jhānassa suññatādināmakattāti etena indriyabalādīnampi maggasampayogato suññatādināmakatā
tika-abh04t:398_1: dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Satipi paccanīkāmasane na tassa maggassa taṃ paribyattaṃ yathā
tika-abh04t:398_3: āgamananirapekkhehi. Tasmāti yasmā sarasatova nāmalābhe avavatthānāpatti sabbassa
tika-abh04t:398_4: maggassa sabbanāmabhāvāpatti hoti, tasmā. Attābhi…pe… maggāti tena āgamanato nāmalābhassa
tika-abh04t:398_5: paccanīkato nāmalābhabhāvaṃ dasseti. Sarasantareti animittabhāvādike. Paccanīkasahitena
tika-abh04t:398_7: anisedhanato. Suññatāppaṇihitasseva maggassa vuttattā aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo
tika-abh04t:398_8: idha asaṅgahito siyāti āsaṅkitvā āha “aniccānupassanā”tiādi. Saṅkhārehi vuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:398_9: na siyā, lakkhaṇehi eva vuṭṭhānaṃ siyāti adhippāyo, lakkhaṇapaṭivedho na siyā atadārammaṇattāti
tika-abh04t:399_0: Ākāravantesu gahitesu tadākāropi gahitoyeva hotīti āha “lakkhaṇānipi paṭividdhāni
tika-abh04t:402_0: Pañcadhā uddisati pañcupādānakkhandhe ajjhattadukavasena rūpadukavasena ca bhinditvā
tika-abh04t:402_1: abhinditvā ca nimittavacaneneva uddisati pavattassapi saṅkhāranimittabhāvānativattanato
tika-abh04t:402_2: vuṭṭhātabbatāsāmaññato ca. Teneva upādinnānupādinnavasena pavattaṃ dvidhā katvā niddisitvāpi
tika-abh04t:402_3: “ayaṃ tāva nimitte vinicchayo”ti nimittavaseneva nigameti. Ettha ca nimittaṃ ajjhattabahiddhā,
tika-abh04t:402_4: pavattaṃ pana ajjhattamevāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Bojjhaṅgādivisesanti bojjhaṅgajhānaṅgamaggaṅgānaṃ
tika-abh04t:402_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā maggāsannāya vipassanāya somanassasahagatatte maggassa paṭhamādijjhānikatā
tika-abh04t:402_8: ca upekkhāsahagatatte pañcamajjhānikatā eva ca tabbasena ca bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ visesoti
tika-abh04t:402_9: tesaṃ niyame āsannakāraṇaṃ padhānakāraṇañca vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, na evaṃ pādakajjhānādayoti.
tika-abh04t:403_1: maggānaṃ ekantena paṭhamajjhānikabhāvato vipassanāniyamoyevettha ekantiko padhānañcāti
tika-abh04t:403_4: adhiṭṭhānabhūtena pādakajjhānena āhitavisesā maggassa jhānaṅgādivisesaniyāmikā hotīti
tika-abh04t:403_6: evaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena sammasitajjhānena ubhayasabbhāve ajjhāsayavasena āhitavisesā
tika-abh04t:405_1: tassa sabbhāve. Tadabhāvābhāvatoti tassa ajjhāsayassa abhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh04t:406_0: Catutthajjhānikassa maggassa āruppe arūpajjhānameva pādakaṃ siyāti āha “catutthajjhānikavajjāna”nti.
tika-abh04t:406_2: Pañcahi aṅgehīti pañcahi jhānaṅgehi. “Taṃtaṃvādehi paññāpiyamānāni pādakajjhānādīni
tika-abh04t:406_3: vādasahacāritāya ‘vādā’ti vuccantī”ti adhippāyena “tayopete vāde”ti āha. Vadanti
tika-abh04t:407_0: Vipākasantānassa…pe… susaṅkhatattāti etena yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ uppajjati, tattha
tika-abh04t:407_1: uppajjamānameva kiñci visesādhānaṃ karotīti dīpeti. Yato tasmiṃyeva santāne tassa vipāko, nāññattha.
tika-abh04t:408_0: Purimānulomaṃ viya tanti yathā gotrabhuṭṭhāne uppannānulomato purimaanulomañāṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:408_1: taṃ gotrabhuṭṭhāne uppannānulomaṃ anubandhati, evaṃ. Tadapīti gotrabhuṭṭhāne uppannānulomañāṇampi
tika-abh04t:408_2: aññaṃ anulomañāṇameva anubandheyya, tassa anantaraṃ uppajjeyya. Sā bhūmīti sā pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātā
tika-abh04t:408_3: kilesānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya bhūmi. Eko bhavoti gahetvā vuttanti etena satta bhave
tika-abh04t:408_4: dve bhaveti idampi adhippāyavasena netabbatthaṃ, na yathārutavasenāti dasseti. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:408_5: adhippāyo – ekavāraṃ kāmāvacaradevesu ekavāraṃ manussesūti evampi missitūpapattivasena
tika-abh04t:408_6: tesu ekissā eva upapattiyā ayaṃ paricchedo. Yaṃ pana “na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti
tika-abh04t:408_7: vuttaṃ, tampi kāmāvacarabhavaṃyeva sandhāyāha. Mahaggatabhavānaṃ paricchedo natthīti
tika-abh04t:408_8: vadanti. Tathā “ṭhapetvā dve bhave”ti etthāpi kāmāvacaradevamanussabhavānaṃ missakavaseneva,
tika-abh04t:408_9: tasmā kāmadhātuyaṃ ye dve bhavāti kāmāvacaradevamanussavasena ye dve bhavāti attho.
tika-abh04t:408_10: Purimavikappesu puggalabhedena paṭipadā bhinditvā kassaci calatīti, kassaci na calatīti
tika-abh04t:408_11: katvā “calati evā”ti avadhāraṇamantarena attho vutto. Yasmā pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yathā
tika-abh04t:408_12: ca paṭipadā, evaṃ adhipatipi calati evā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā sabbesampi paṭipadāsu abhedena
tika-abh04t:408_13: gahitāsu ekantena calanaṃ sambhavatīti “calaticceva vuttaṃ, na na calatī”ti tatiyavikappo
tika-abh04t:411: 357. Jhānamaggādipariyāyehi kathite bojjhanakāti adhippetā, visesato pubbabhāge “jhānaṃ bhāvemi maggaṃ bhāvemī”ti pavattajjhāsayā hontīti adhippāyena “yassa pubbabhāge”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:412_2: pubbabhāgābhisaṅkhāravasena chandādīnaṃ adhipatibhāvo, kimatthameteyeva evaṃ vuttā,
tika-abh04t:412_3: nanu saddhādīnampi pubbabhāgābhisaṅkhāro labbhatīti āha “sesadhammāna”ntiādi. Ataṃsabhāvattāti
tika-abh04t:412_4: sampayuttehi sātisayamanuvattitabbabhāvarahitattā. Kiñcāpi hi saddhādayopi indriyapaccayatāya
tika-abh04t:412_5: sampayuttehi anuvattayanti, ekasmiṃ pana cittuppāde samadhurena aññena vinā sampayuttehi
tika-abh04t:412_6: anuvattanīyabhāvo na tesaṃ yathā chandādīnanti teyeva adhipatibhāvena vuttā. Evañca
tika-abh04t:414_0: 362. Mānassa diṭṭhisadisā pavatti. Tathā hi so adhipati viya aññādhipatinā diṭṭhiyā
tika-abh04t:414_1: saha nappavattatīti. Ekadesa…pe… upamā hoti, na sabbasāmaññena, itarathā sūriyatthaṅgamane
tika-abh04t:414_3: adhippāyo. Aññamaññanti aññe aññe. “Ānītaṃ idaṃ sutta”nti vibhatti pariṇāmetabbā.
tika-abh04t:414_4: Yathāvuttanayenāti imissā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena. Na upamāya vuttattāti imasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:414_5: sutte na upamāya vuttabhāvato. Yathāvuttanayenāti vā etasmiṃ sutte vuttappakārena
tika-abh04t:414_6: nayena imissā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upamāya na vuttattā. Avayavā viya honti, yena te cetasi
tika-abh04t:414_7: niyuttā, cittassa eteti ca cetasikātiādinā vuccanti, na pana “phassikā”tiādināti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:419_1: Lobhābhibhūtāya eva iṭṭhārammaṇasmiṃ itaratra ca iṭṭhākāraggahaṇavasena somanassasahagatabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:419_6: ca evamādinā vuttanayena anugantabbatāya vuttaṃ “vuttanayaṃ anugantvā”ti.
tika-abh04t:420_0: Gataṃ gamanaṃ pavattīti katvā vuttaṃ “gatamattaṃ gatimattaṃ gahaṇamatta”nti. Diṭṭhiyā
tika-abh04t:420_1: hi gati pavatti evāti. Āsannakāraṇattāti padaṭṭhānatāya, yonisomanasikāro viya hi
tika-abh04t:420_2: kusalassa ayonisomanasikāro akusalassa accāsannahetu. Tathā hi satipi asaddhammasavanādikāraṇe
tika-abh04t:420_3: ayoniso anāvajjite avavatthāpite ca natthi akusalappavatti. Tathā ca vakkhati aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:420_4: “ayoniso akusala”nti. Etena ekantakāraṇatā ca vuttatthā hoti. Paṭisaṅkhā sītādikhamanaṃ
tika-abh04t:420_5: appamādavihāroti vuttaṃ “appamajjanaṃ khamana”nti. Tena satisaṃvaroti idha khantisaṃvaro
tika-abh04t:420_6: vuttoti adhippāyo indriyasaṃvarassa vuttattā. Pahānasaṃvaroti vīriyasaṃvaro. So hi
tika-abh04t:421: Sammāpaṭipattiyā paṭipakkhabhāvena gahetabbatākāro moho sammāpaṭipattipaṭipakkhabhāvaggahaṇākāro. Tena hi nivutā na sammā paṭipajjanti. Abhijjhāya visesayogo kammapathappatti.
tika-abh04t:422_0: Anupaparikkhā moho. So cettha diṭṭhirahito veditabbo. Diṭṭhisahitassa pana diṭṭhiyā
tika-abh04t:422_1: anuvidhāyakattā taggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti. Avatthusminti asaddahanīye vatthusmiṃ. Sānunayo
tika-abh04t:422_3: ahirikādīhi kāraṇehi. Ārakkharahitacitteti cittassa sativirahataṃyeva dasseti. Ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā
tika-abh04t:422_4: hi satīti. Etena “assaddhiyacitte andhabālacitte”ti padadvayaṃ vuttatthaṃ hoti. Upanāhādīti
tika-abh04t:422_6: vuttaṃ visesassa ekaccassa asambhavato. Idhāti, imasmiṃ citte. Nipphādetabbe payojane
tika-abh04t:422_7: bhummaṃ “cammasmiṃ dīpinaṃ hantī”ti viya ārammaṇaṃ vā avūpasamo phalūpacārena “semho guḷo”ti viya.
tika-abh04t:425_1: bujjhati, niccādivisamaggahaṇassa saññādivipariyesassa nissayattā asamaṃ bujjhatīti
tika-abh04t:425_2: moho vutto nimittassa kattubhāvena upacāritattā, ayañca attho diṭṭhisahitamohavasena
tika-abh04t:425_3: daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca pakatīti kāpilānaṃ padhānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:427_0: 400. Apaṇṇakapadaṃ viya avirajjhanakapadampi kadāci niyatabhāvaṃ dīpeyyāti aniyatataṃ
tika-abh04t:427_1: dīpetuṃ “uppattiarahaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ mānassa aniyatattā. Yadi hi māno niyato siyā,
tika-abh04t:427_2: kāmarāgassa mānarahitā pavatti na siyā, tathā bhavarāgassa. Evaṃ sati paṭṭhāne catukkhattuṃ
tika-abh04t:427_3: kāmarāgena yojanā na siyā, tikkhattuṃyeva siyā, bhavarāgamūlikā ca na siyā, evañca
tika-abh04t:427_4: saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi aṭṭhavidhena yojanā siyā, na dasavidhā dassitāti yathāvuttāhi
tika-abh04t:427_5: yojanāhi mānassa aniyatabhāvo pakāsito. Atha vā mānena saddhiṃ pañca honti yathāvuttāni
tika-abh04t:427_6: apaṇṇakaṅgāni, kiṃ pana hontīti apekkhāyaṃ yevāpanakāti viditovāyamattho. Yevāpanakānañhi
tika-abh04t:427_7: pañcabhāvo idha vidhīyati, na apaṇṇakaṅgānanti so yathā hoti, tathā yojetabbaṃ. Kilesaduke
tika-abh04t:427_8: paṭiccavārādīsu “kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:427_9: “lobhaṃ paṭicca moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ. Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho
tika-abh04t:427_10: māno uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ. Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ
tika-abh04t:427_11: anottappaṃ. Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappa”nti vibhattattā “tathā
tika-abh04t:428_0: “Kāmarāgo catudhā ekato uppajjati, paṭigho tidhā, māno ekadhā, tathā vicikicchā bhavarāgoti
tika-abh04t:428_1: uddisitvā kāmarāgo mānasaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ceva avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva ca
tika-abh04t:428_2: saddhiṃ māno bhavarāgāvijjāsaṃyojanehi saddhiṃ bhavarāgo avijjāsaṃyojanena saddhi”nti
tika-abh04t:428_3: aṭṭhakathākaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhamānattā “idha ca vakkhatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattheva
tika-abh04t:428_4: “lobho chadhā ekato uppajjati, paṭigho dvedhā, tathā moho”ti uddisitvā “lobho asaṅkhāriko
tika-abh04t:428_6: asaṅkhāriko eva mohamānauddhaccaahirikaanottappehi, sasaṅkhāriko eva ca mohamānathinauddhaccaahirikaanottappehī”ti
tika-abh04t:430: 402. Ussāhaṃ janentāti ettha cittapayogasaṅkhāto saṅkhāro eva ussāho, na vīriyussāhoti.
tika-abh04t:432_0: 413. Visappanāniṭṭharūpasamuṭṭhānaṃ yena kupitassa sakalasarīraṃ kampati, kupitākāro
tika-abh04t:432_1: paññāyati. Etena sampattiattho raso dassito hoti, pavattiākāravasena vā visappanaraso.
tika-abh04t:432_2: Tathā hi yassa kuppati, tassa amittassa sampatti yebhuyyena paṭighuppattihetu hotīti.
tika-abh04t:435: 424. Nicchayābhāvāti adhimokkhābhāvā. Asaṇṭhahanatoti santānavasena ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe anavaṭṭhānato.
tika-abh04t:437_0: 429. Sahajātādhipati natthi “chandavato ce vicikicchā uppajjati, sā mayhaṃ uppajjeyyā”tiādippavattiyā
tika-abh04t:437_1: abhāvā. Anuddhaṭattā paṭisiddhatā, yathādhammasāsane avacanampi abhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh04t:438_0: Avacanatoti a-kārassa tadaññavacanataṃ dasseti. Etena ca dassanena pahātabbesu abhāvavacanena
tika-abh04t:438_1: kāraṇasiddhiyā phalasiddhīti tattha abhāvassa kāraṇameva tāva dassetuṃ “paṭisandhianākaḍḍhanato”ti
tika-abh04t:438_2: vuttaṃ. Tena taṃsabhāvatā tassa cittuppādassa vuttā hoti. Tato ca “balavaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh04t:438_3: ākaḍḍhati, dubbalaṃ nākaḍḍhatī”ti idaṃ paṭisandhidānasabhāvesu. Yassa pana paṭisandhidānasabhāvo
tika-abh04t:438_4: eva natthi, na tassa balavabhāvo paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane kāraṇanti ayamattho dassito
tika-abh04t:438_5: hoti. Anākaḍḍhanaṃ sādheti “yadi hi ākaḍḍheyyā”tiādinā. Yasmā ca nāgataṃ, tasmā nākaḍḍhatīti
tika-abh04t:438_6: adhippāyo. “Yasmā pana taṃ paṭisandhidānaṃ natthi, tasmā nāgata”nti vuttattā “anākaḍḍhanato
tika-abh04t:439_0: Apāyagamanīyassāti apāyaṃ gametīti apāyagamanīyaṃ, taṃsabhāvanti attho. Paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane
tika-abh04t:439_1: sati uddhaccasahagataṃ ekantena apāyagamanīyaṃ siyā. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “itarassāpi
tika-abh04t:439_2: ettheva paṭisandhidānaṃ bhaveyyā”ti. Na hi akusalapaṭisandhi sugatiyaṃ sambhavatīti.
tika-abh04t:439_3: “Catūhi apāyehi ca vippamutto avinipātadhammo”ti vacanato apāyagamanīyañca dassanena
tika-abh04t:439_4: pahātabbaṃ. Tenāha “apāyagamanīyassa dassanena pahātabbattā”ti. Na cetaṃ dassanena
tika-abh04t:439_5: pahātabbaṃ, na so tassa apāyagamanīyo rāgo doso moho tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesāti etena
tika-abh04t:439_6: saṅgahoti sakkā vattuṃ niyogato bhāvanāya pahātabbabhāvena vuttattā. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-abh04t:440_0: “Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-abh04t:440_1: vuttakammapaccayabhāvo nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo. So ca yadi uddhaccasahagataṃ
tika-abh04t:440_2: paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍheyya, tassāpi siyā. Tathā ca sati uddhaccasahagataṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ
tika-abh04t:440_3: siyā dassanena pahātabbānaṃyeva nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā. Na cetaṃ
tika-abh04t:440_4: dassenena pahātabbanti sabbaṃ pubbe viya āvattati.
tika-abh04t:441_0: Sahajātameva vibhattanti yathā dassanena pahātabbavibhaṅge “dassanena pahātabbo dhammo
tika-abh04t:441_1: neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo”ti sahajātaṃ
tika-abh04t:441_2: nānākkhaṇikanti uddisitvā “sahajātā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-abh04t:441_3: rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo, nānākkhaṇikā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ
tika-abh04t:441_4: khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vibhattaṃ, evaṃ avibhajitvā
tika-abh04t:441_5: “bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-abh04t:441_6: ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “nānākkhaṇikā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca
tika-abh04t:441_7: rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti. Tena na bhāvanāya pahātabbassa nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:441_8: viññāyati. Paccanīyepi yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgāhakapaccayānaṃ vasena paccayuddhāre kariyamāne.
tika-abh04t:441_9: Itarattha cāti dassanenapahātabbapade. Tattha hi “dassanena pahātabbo dhammo neva
tika-abh04t:441_10: dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātaupanissayapacchājātakammapaccayena
tika-abh04t:442_0: Tadabhāvāti nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayattābhāvā. Na ca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ vinā
tika-abh04t:442_1: paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanaṃ atthīti “paṭisandhianākaḍḍhanato tattha anāgatā”ti vuttaṃ. Etthāti
tika-abh04t:442_2: “ṭhapetvā uddhaccasahagataṃ sesāni ekādaseva paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhantī”ti ettha. Pavattivipākassāti
tika-abh04t:442_3: pavattiyaṃ vipāko pavattiekadesatāya pavattibhūto vā vipāko etassāti pavattivipākaṃ,
tika-abh04t:442_4: kammaṃ, tassa. Atha vā pavattiyaṃ vipāko pavattivipāko. Imasmiṃ pana atthe nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayo
tika-abh04t:442_5: etassāti nānā…pe… yo, tabbhāvo…pe… tāti evaṃ padacchedo daṭṭhabbo. Na sakkā nivāretuṃ
tika-abh04t:443_2: Itaro vipākadānābhāvepi siddho vipākadhammabhāvo tādisānaṃ aññesampi labbhamānattāti
tika-abh04t:443_4: upapajjavedanīyañca saṅgaṇhāti. Vuttaṃ siyāti idaṃ sahāyapaccayalābhato puthujjanasantānavuttino
tika-abh04t:443_5: uddhaccasahagatassa vipākuppādanaṃ, tadabhāvā sekkhasantatiyaṃ tassa vipākānuppādanañca
tika-abh04t:443_6: yuttaṃ siyāti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “idaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ suṭṭhu vicāretabba”ntiādi. Tathā
tika-abh04t:443_7: ca vakkhati “puthujjanesu uppajjamānānaṃ sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ uddhaccasahagatacittuppādassa
tika-abh04t:443_9: na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti uddhaccasahagatadhammānaṃ vipāko vibhaṅge vutto”ti. Tassa
tika-abh04t:443_10: tādisasseva sati sahāye vipākuppādanavacanaṃ, asati vipākānuppādanavacanaṃ virujjhatīti
tika-abh04t:443_11: ca pavattivipākadāyikaṃ vā uddhaccasahagatassa manasi katvā “vuttaṃ siyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:443_13: eke vaṇṇayanti. Evaṃ uddhaccacetanāpi na hoti, sāpi viññāṇapaccayabhāve apanetabbāti
tika-abh04t:447_0: 431. Kāmāvacara…pe… ādi vuttanti ettha ādi-saddena “upacitattā”ti padaṃ saṅgayhati
tika-abh04t:447_2: vadanti, taṃ paṭhamajavanassa na yujjati anāsevanattā. Tathā ca sati tassa vipākadānameva
tika-abh04t:447_3: na siyāti tato aññathā atthaṃ dassento “yathā”tiādimāha. Tattha vipākābhimukhanti
tika-abh04t:447_4: vipākadānābhimukhaṃ katokāsaṃ. Katokāsatā ca anādimhi saṃsāre anekesaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ
