tika-abh04t:447_5: atthitāya parassa paṭibāhanena hotīti “aññassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:447_6: Vaḍḍhitatā ca sakammassa baladānasamatthatāvasena attano kāraṇehi abhisaṅkhatatā.
tika-abh04t:447_7: Asādhāraṇena nāmaṃ uddhaṭaṃ “bherīsaddo yavaṅkuro”ti yathā. Viññāṇānanti cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ.
tika-abh04t:448_0: Cakkhusannissitañca taṃ rūpavijānanañcāti etena samānādhikaraṇataṃ samāsassa dassento
tika-abh04t:448_2: Aññaviññāṇanti rūpārammaṇaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ. Rūpaṃyevārammaṇanti pana atthe dibbacakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:448_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ taṃsadisānaṃ tadupacāraṃ katvā yathā “sā eva tittirī tāni eva osadhānī”ti.
tika-abh04t:448_4: Jhānapaccayattābhāve na jhānaṅgatā natthīti pañcaviññāṇesu upekkhādīnaṃ upacaritajhānaṅgataṃ
tika-abh04t:448_5: sādheti. Na hi jhānaṅgānaṃ jhānapaccayataṃ vatvā tesaṃ jhānapaccayabhāvo paṭikkhittoti.
tika-abh04t:448_6: Yadi evaṃ pañcaviññāṇesu upekkhādayo jhānarāsiṭṭhāne na vattabbā siyunti āha “jhānapaccayattābhāve”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:449_0: 436. Akusalaṃ bhavaṅganissandena “paṇḍara”nti vuccati, bhavaṅge apaṇḍare taṃmūlikā
tika-abh04t:449_1: kuto akusalassa paṇḍaratāti “akusalassa cā”ti vuttaṃ. Paṇḍaratāya kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t:449_2: yadi aññakāraṇā paṇḍaratā, sabhāvovāyanti cittassa akilesasabhāvatāya vuttaṃ, na
tika-abh04t:449_3: cettha phassādīnampi paṇḍaratāpatti. Yato dhammānaṃ sabhāvakiccavisesaññunā bhagavatā
tika-abh04t:450_0: 439. Anatikkamanena bhāvanāya. Pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ visayassa yogyadese avaṭṭhānanti “pasādaṃ
tika-abh04t:450_1: ghaṭṭetvā āpāthaṃ gantvā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahābhūtesu paṭihaññatīti ettha na sayaṃ kiñci
tika-abh04t:450_2: paṭihaññati, nāpi kenaci paṭihaññīyati aphoṭṭhabbasabhāvattā. Visayavisayībhūtaṃ
tika-abh04t:450_3: pana abhimukhabhāvappattiyā viññāṇuppattiyā hetutāya visiṭṭhabhāvappattaṃ paṭihatapaṭighātakabhāvena
tika-abh04t:450_4: voharīyati, tasmā tesu sappaṭighavohāro. “Upādārūpaṃ ghaṭṭetīti evamādi ca upacāravaseneva
tika-abh04t:450_5: veditabbaṃ. Mahābhūtārammaṇena pana kāyappasādanissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu ghaṭṭiyamānesu
tika-abh04t:450_6: pasādopi ghaṭṭito eva nāma hotīti vatvā vīmaṃsitabba”nti vadanti. Yathādhippetena
tika-abh04t:450_7: ekadesasāmaññena upamāvacanato nissitanissayaghaṭṭanānaṃ satipi pubbāparabhāve upamatte
tika-abh04t:451_4: Tividhenapi hi manodhātuviññāṇadhātūhi manoviññāṇadhātuyā viseso dassitoti. Tato
tika-abh04t:451_5: eva vijānanavisesavirahatoyeva. Yadi manodhātu “manoviññāṇa”nti na vuccati, chaviññāṇakāyāti
tika-abh04t:451_6: kathaṃ manodhātuyā tattha saṅgaho hotīti? Saṅgaho eva pariyāyadesanattā. Atthi hi
tika-abh04t:451_7: esa pariyāyo “mananamattaṃ viññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇa”nti yathā “mananamattā dhātu manodhātū”ti.
tika-abh04t:451_8: Apica vatthukiccehi manoviññāṇasabhāgattā tassa uparamuppādabhāvato antādibhāvato
tika-abh04t:451_9: ca manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitā manodhātu, na sesaviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitā ataṃsabhāgattā,
tika-abh04t:451_10: idha pana nippariyāyakatattā manaso sambhūya visiṭṭhamanokiccayuttaṃ manoviññāṇanti
tika-abh04t:451_11: tadabhāvato “manoviññāṇantipi na vuccatī”ti imamevatthaṃ sādhetuṃ “na hi taṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:451_12: manato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena manodhātuyā nippariyāyato manoviññāṇakiccavirahaṃyeva dasseti.
tika-abh04t:451_13: Dassanādīnaṃ panātiādinā aññaviññāṇavidhuraṃ manodhātuyā ca sabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t:452_0: Yadi janakasadisatā nāma mahāvipākesu vitakkādīnaṃ sammāsaṅkappāditā, tihetukato
tika-abh04t:452_1: nibbattānaṃ tihetukānaṃ, duhetukato nibbattānaṃ duhetukānañca bhavatu sammāsaṅkappāditā,
tika-abh04t:452_2: tihetukato pana nibbattaduhetukānaṃ kathanti āha “tattha hī”tiādi. Taṃsotapatitatā
tika-abh04t:452_3: na siyā tassā anānantarattā. Tato eva hītiādinā vuttasotapatitaṃ evānantarena vacanena
tika-abh04t:452_4: samatthayati. Yadi vijjamānānampi manodhātuādīsu vitakkādīnaṃ pañcaviññāṇesu viya
tika-abh04t:452_5: agaṇanūpagabhāvo, evaṃ sante paṭṭhāne kathaṃ tesaṃ jhānapaccayatāvacanaṃ. “Abyākato
tika-abh04t:452_6: dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti, “vipākābyākatāni kiriyābyākatāni
tika-abh04t:452_7: jhānaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena
tika-abh04t:452_8: paccayo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Paccanīyepi “abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati
tika-abh04t:452_9: na jhānapaccayā, pañcaviññāṇasahitaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”tiādinā pañcaviññāṇāni
tika-abh04t:452_10: eva uddhaṭāni, na manodhātuādīnīti āha “jhānapaccayakiccamattato”tiādi. Na hettha
tika-abh04t:452_11: jhānaṅgānaṃ balavadubbalabhāvo adhikato, atha kho jhānapaccayabhāvamattanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:453_0: 469. Samānavatthukaṃ anantarapaccayaṃ labhitvāti dassanādito manodhātuyā ca balavabhāve
tika-abh04t:453_1: kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yathārammaṇanti ārammaṇānurūpaṃ. Yadi samānanissayatāya manodhātuto
tika-abh04t:453_3: majjhattavedananti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā tassa balavabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchitvā santatipariṇāmanabyāpāravisesā
tika-abh04t:453_4: na somanassavedananti parihāraṃ vadanto “voṭṭhabbana”ntiādimāha. Vipāko viya anubhavanameva
tika-abh04t:453_5: na hotīti sati samatthatāya vipākānaṃ ekantena ārammaṇarasānubhavanatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:456_1: mano”ti. Payogenāti attanā parehi vā katena ussāhanapayogena. Kusalākusalāni viya
tika-abh04t:456_2: yesaṃ taṃ tadārammaṇaṃ anubandhabhūtaṃ. Paṭhamapañcamacittānaṃ aññamaññabalavadubbalabhāvavicārena
tika-abh04t:456_3: dutiyachaṭṭhādīnampi so vicārito hotīti “etesu balavaṃ dubbalañca vicāretu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:456_4: Yathā sāliādīnaṃ thaddhamudubhūmivasena tiṇādīnaṃ anīharaṇanīharaṇavasena utuādiavasesapaccayānaṃ
tika-abh04t:456_5: vipattisampattivasena ca phalavisesayogo, evaṃ kammassa sugatiduggativasena avisuddhavisuddhapayogavasena
tika-abh04t:456_6: upapattiyā vipattisampattivasena ca visiṭṭhaphalatāya pariṇamanaṃ, evameva gimhavassakālādīsu
tika-abh04t:456_7: bījānaṃ phalavisesayogo viya taṃtaṃkālavisesena kammassa phalavisesayogo hotīti āha
tika-abh04t:456_10: yena “pitūnaṃ ākāraṃ putto anuvidahatī”ti vuccati. Taṃmūlakānanti appāyukasaṃvattaniyakammamūlakānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:458_0: Yato tihetukādikammato. Yasmiñca ṭhāneti paṭisandhiādiṭṭhāne, sugatiduggatiyaṃ vā.
tika-abh04t:458_1: Tihetukato duhetukaṃ anicchanto paṭisandhinti adhippāyo. Pavattivipākaṃ pana tihetukato
tika-abh04t:458_2: duhetukampi icchati eva. Tathā hi vakkhati aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yaṃ purimāya hetukittanaladdhiyā na yujjatī”ti.
tika-abh04t:459_0: Ye “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti, “ekapupphaṃ yajitvāna, asīti kappakoṭiyo.
tika-abh04t:459_1: Duggatiṃ nābhijānāmī”ti ca evamādivacanassa adhippāyaṃ ajānantā “kiṃ nu kho ekenapi
tika-abh04t:459_2: kammena anekā paṭisandhi hotī”ti, “disvā kumāraṃ satapuññalakkhaṇa”ntiādivacanassa
tika-abh04t:459_3: atthaṃ asallakkhetvā “kinnu kho nānākammehi ekā paṭisandhi hotī”ti saṃsayapakkhandā,
tika-abh04t:459_4: tesaṃ bījaṅkuropamāya “ekasmā ekā, anekasmā ca anekā paṭisandhi hotī”ti vinicchitattā
tika-abh04t:459_7: eva alobhalobhādiguṇadosātirekabhāvahetūti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “so tena
tika-abh04t:459_8: kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hotī”tiādi. Ettha ca lobhavasena, dosa,
tika-abh04t:459_9: moha, lobhadosa, lobhamoha, dosamoha, lobhadosamohavasenāti tayo ekakā, tayo dvikā,
tika-abh04t:459_10: eko tikoti lobhādidassanavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā. Tathā kusalapakkhe
tika-abh04t:460_0: Tattha “alobhadosāmohā, alobhādosamohā, alobhadosāmohā balavanto”ti āgatehi kusalapakkhe
tika-abh04t:460_4: vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā. Ye pana ubhayesaṃ vomissatāvaseneva lobhālobhussadavārādayo
tika-abh04t:460_5: apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā, te asambhavato eva na dassitā. Na hi ekasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:460_6: santāne antarena avatthantaraṃ lobho balavā alobho cāti yujjati. Paṭipakkhatoyeva
tika-abh04t:460_7: hi etesaṃ balavadubbalabhāvo, sahajātadhammato vā. Tesu lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhato
tika-abh04t:460_8: alobhena anabhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo, tathā dosamohānaṃ adosāmohehi. Alobhādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:460_9: pana lobhādiabhibhavanato sabbesañca samānajātiyaṃ samabhibhūya pavattivaseneva sahajātadhammato
tika-abh04t:460_10: balavabhāvo. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lobho balavā, alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto,
tika-abh04t:460_11: dosamohā mandā”ti. So ca tesaṃ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato āsayassa paribhāvitatāya
tika-abh04t:460_12: veditabbo. Ettha ca paṭhamadutiyehi, sattamapaṭhamehi vā vārehi tihetukakammato paṭisandhipavattivasena
tika-abh04t:461_0: Idhāti vipākuddhāramātikāyaṃ. Tena hetukittanaṃ viseseti. Jaccandhādivipattinimittaṃ
tika-abh04t:461_1: moho, sabbākusalaṃ vā. Yaṃ pana vuttanti sambandho. Tena paṭisambhidāmaggavacanena.
tika-abh04t:461_2: Gatisampattiyā sati ñāṇasampayutte paṭisandhimhi nipphādetabbe. Aññatthāti nikantipaṭisandhikkhaṇesu.
tika-abh04t:461_3: Kammasarikkhakoti idha sātisayo sarikkhabhāvo adhippetoti daṭṭhabbo. Itarathā tihetukaduhetukāpi
tika-abh04t:461_4: aññamaññaṃ sarikkhāyevāti dassitametanti. Cakkhuviññāṇādīnīti ettha pañcaviññāṇāni
tika-abh04t:461_5: viya apubbanissayapavattinī vijānanavisesarahitā ca manodhātu iṭṭhādibhāgaggahaṇe
tika-abh04t:461_6: na samatthāti “pākaṭāyevā”ti na vuttā, ādi-saddena vā saṅgahitā. Tadārammaṇapaccayasabbajavanavatāti
tika-abh04t:462_0: Anulometi dhammānulome. Āsevanapaccayāti āsevanabhūtā paccayā. Na magge amaggapaccaye.
tika-abh04t:462_1: Sopi moghavāro labbheyyāti yadi voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā, yathā “sukhāya
tika-abh04t:462_2: vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati
tika-abh04t:462_3: āsevanapaccayā na maggapaccayā”ti anulomapaccanīye, paccanīyānulome ca “sukhā…pe…
tika-abh04t:462_4: na maggapaccayā āsevanapaccayā”ti ca vuttaṃ hasituppādacittavasena, evaṃ voṭṭhabbanavasena
tika-abh04t:462_5: “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena
tika-abh04t:462_6: pāṭho siyā, tathā ca sati vāradvayavasena gaṇanāyaṃ “āsevanapaccayā na magge dve.
tika-abh04t:462_7: Na maggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, na pana vuttaṃ, tasmā na labbheyyāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:463_0: Voṭṭhabbanampi yadi āsevanapaccayo siyā, dutiyamoghavāre attano viya tatiyacatutthavāresupi
tika-abh04t:463_1: siyā, tathā sati attanāpi kusalākusalānaṃ siyā. Na hi…pe… avutto atthi “purimā purimā
tika-abh04t:463_2: kusalā dhammā”tiādinā anavasesato vuttattā. Voṭṭhabbanassa…pe… avutto “abyākato dhammo
tika-abh04t:463_3: kusalassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Akusalassa…pe… paccayo”ti vacanābhāvato.
tika-abh04t:463_4: Na kevalaṃ avutto, atha kho kusalaṃ…pe… paṭikkhittova. Athāpi siyātiādi maggasodhanatthameva
tika-abh04t:463_5: vuccati. Samānavedanānaṃ eva āsevanapaccayabhāvassa dassanato “asamānavedanānaṃ vasenā”ti
tika-abh04t:463_6: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ “āsevana paccayena paccayo”tipi vattabbaṃ siyā, samānavedanāvasenāti
tika-abh04t:463_7: adhippāyo. Abhinnajātikassa cāti ca-saddo abhinnavedanassa cāti sampiṇḍanattho. Vedanāttikepi
tika-abh04t:463_8: voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattassa abhāvāti yojanā. Kusalattikādīsu yathādassitapāḷippadesesupīti
tika-abh04t:463_9: sampiṇḍanattho pi-saddo. Gaṇanāya kāraṇabhūtāya gaṇanāya niddhāriyamānāya sati gaṇanāya
tika-abh04t:463_10: vā abbhantare. Dutiyo moghavāro vīmaṃsitabboti āsevanapaccayattābhāvā javanaṭṭhāne
tika-abh04t:463_11: ṭhātuṃ na yujjati. Na hi vinā āsevanaṃ javanappavatti atthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:464_0: Apicettha “yaṃ javanabhāvappattaṃ, taṃ chinnamūlakarukkhapupphaṃ viyā”ti vakkhamānattā
tika-abh04t:464_1: anupacchinnabhavamūlānaṃ pavattamānassa voṭṭhabbanassa kiriyabhāvo na siyā, vutto
tika-abh04t:464_2: ca “yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca
tika-abh04t:464_3: kammavipākā upekkhāsahagatā”ti, tasmā “javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvāti javanassa uppajjanaṭṭhāne
tika-abh04t:464_4: dvikkhattuṃ pavattitvā, na javanabhāvenā”ti, “āsevanaṃ labhitvāti ca āsevanaṃ viya
tika-abh04t:464_5: āsevana”nti vuccamāne na koci virodho, vipphārikassa pana sato dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyevettha
tika-abh04t:464_6: āsevanasadisatā. Vipphārikatāya hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattañcassa vuccati. Vipphārikampi
tika-abh04t:464_7: javanaṃ viya anekakkhattuṃ appavattiyā dubbalattā na nippariyāyato āsevanapaccayabhāvena
tika-abh04t:464_8: pavatteyyāti na imassa pāṭhe āsevanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pariyāyato vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:464_9: yathā “phalacittesu maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”nti. Ayamettha attanomati. Ayampi
tika-abh04t:465_1: voṭṭhabbanaṭṭhānepīti adhippāyo. Tasmāti yasmā voṭṭhabbanaṃ āvajjanāyeva atthato
tika-abh04t:465_4: vatteyya, no aññathāti adhippāyena “voṭṭhabbanato”tiādimāha. Catunnanti muñchāmaraṇāsannavelādīsu
tika-abh04t:465_5: mandībhūtavegatāya cattāripi javanāni uppajjeyyunti adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Ayametassa
tika-abh04t:465_7: yutto”ti vuttaṃ, “āvajjanādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotī”ti pana vuttattā cittappavattivasena
tika-abh04t:465_8: paṭhamamoghavārato etassa na koci viseso. Tenevāha “ayampi…pe… retabbo”ti. Paṭisandhicitteyeva
tika-abh04t:465_9: pavattiyaṃ “bhavaṅga”nti vuccamāne na tassa hetuvasena bhedoti “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-abh04t:465_10: ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti na sakkā vattuṃ, vuttañca, tasmā
tika-abh04t:466_0: Sabhāvakiccehi attano phalassa paccayabhāvo, sabhāvakiccānaṃ vā phalabhūtānaṃ paccayabhāvo
tika-abh04t:466_2: evā”ti imassa atthassa anadhippetattā. Yathā ca ahetukaduhetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ tihetukajavanāvasāne
tika-abh04t:466_5: appaṭisiddhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukampi duhetukampi ahetukampi vipākaṃ
tika-abh04t:466_6: detī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Paripuṇṇavipākassāti imināpi tihetukajavanato yathāvuttatadārammaṇassa
tika-abh04t:466_7: appaṭisiddhaṃyeva sādheti. Na hi paccayantarasāmaggiyā asati tadārammaṇaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-abh04t:466_8: avipaccantaṃ kammaṃ paripuṇṇavipākaṃ hotīti. Mukhanidassanamattameva yathāvuttatadārammaṇappavattiyā
tika-abh04t:466_9: avibhāvitattā. Tihetukādikammassa hi ukkaṭṭhassa tihetukakammassa soḷasa, itarassa
tika-abh04t:466_10: dvādasa, ukkaṭṭhasseva duhetukakammassa dvādasa, itarassa aṭṭhāti evaṃ soḷasavipākacittādīni
tika-abh04t:466_11: yojetabbāni. Tasmāti yasmā paripuṇṇavipākassa paṭisandhijanakakammassa vasena vipākavibhāvanāya
tika-abh04t:467_0: Evañca katvāti nānākammato tadārammaṇuppattiyaṃ ito aññathāpi sambhavatoti attho.
tika-abh04t:467_1: “Upekkhā…pe… uppajjatī”ti ettha kena kiccena uppajjatīti? Tadārammaṇakiccaṃ tāva
tika-abh04t:467_2: na hoti javanārammaṇassa anālambaṇato, nāpi santīraṇakiccaṃ tathā appavattanato,
tika-abh04t:467_3: paṭisandhicutīsu vattabbameva natthi, pārisesato bhavaṅgakiccanti yuttaṃ siyā. Na
tika-abh04t:468_0: Tanninnanti āpāthagatavisayaninnaṃ āvajjananti sambandho. Aññassa viya paṭhamajjhānādikassa
tika-abh04t:468_1: viya. Etassapi sāvajjanatāya bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. Atadatthāti ettha taṃ-saddena
tika-abh04t:468_2: nirodhaṃ paccāmasati. Uppattiyāti uppattito. Tanti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Tassa
tika-abh04t:468_3: nirodhassa. Tathā ca uppajjatīti “anantarapaccayo hotī”ti padassa atthaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh04t:468_4: Yathāvuttā vuttappakārā. Vodānaṃ dutiyamaggādīnaṃ purecārikañāṇaṃ. Etesanti ariyamaggacittamaggānantaraphalacittānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:469_0: Upanissayato tasseva cakkhuviññāṇādivipākassa dassanatthaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ dassanādiatthato
tika-abh04t:469_1: dassanādiphalato, dassanādippayojanato vā. Purimacittāni āvajjanādīni. Vatthantararahitatte
tika-abh04t:469_2: dassetabbe vatthantare viya ārammaṇantarepi na vattatīti “vatthārammaṇantararahita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:470_0: Yadi vipākena kammasarikkheneva bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ sati imasmiṃ vāre ahetukavipākānaṃ
tika-abh04t:470_1: asambhavo eva siyā tesaṃ akammasarikkhakattāti imamatthaṃ manasi katvā āha “ahetukānaṃ
tika-abh04t:470_2: panā”ti. Abhinipātamattanti pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ kiccamāha. Te hi āpāthagatesu rūpādīsu
tika-abh04t:470_3: abhinipātanamatteneva vattanti. Ādi-saddena sampaṭicchanādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Kusalesu
tika-abh04t:470_4: kusalākusalakiriyesupi vā vijjamānā sasaṅkhārikāsaṅkhārikatā aññamaññaṃ asarikkhattā
tika-abh04t:470_5: pahānāvaṭṭhānato ca viruddhā viyāti vipākesu sā tadanukūlā siyā, sā pana mūlābhāvena
tika-abh04t:470_6: na suppatiṭṭhitānaṃ savisayābhinipatanamattādivuttīnaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “na sasaṅkhārikaviruddho”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:470_7: Ubhayenapi tesaṃ nibbattiṃ anujānāti yathā “kaṭattārūpāna”nti adhippāyo. “Vipākadhammadhammo
tika-abh04t:470_8: vipākassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato
tika-abh04t:470_9: dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, domanassaṃ
tika-abh04t:470_10: uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe”tiādinā vipākattike viya siyā kusalattikepi pāḷīti
tika-abh04t:470_11: katvā “kusalattike cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hi “kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa
tika-abh04t:470_12: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti uddisitvā “sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṃ aniccato
tika-abh04t:470_13: dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, kusalaṃ
tika-abh04t:470_14: assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi, vicikicchā, uddhaccaṃ,
tika-abh04t:470_15: domanassaṃ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:470_16: Avijjamānattā eva avacananti adhippāyena tattha yuttiṃ dasseti “vipphārikañhī”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t:471_1: na sakkā nisedhetunti nidassanabhāvena paṇṇapuṭamupanītaṃ asamānaṃ. Kiriyajavanānantaraṃ
tika-abh04t:471_2: tadārammaṇābhāvassa pāḷiyaṃ avacanampi akāraṇaṃ labbhamānassapi katthaci kenaci adhippāyena
tika-abh04t:471_3: avacanato. Tathā hi dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto,
tika-abh04t:471_4: tasmā kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇābhāvo vīmaṃsitabbo”ti vadanti. Satipi kiriyamayatte
tika-abh04t:471_5: sabbattha tādibhāvappattānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ javanacittaṃ na itaresaṃ viya vipphārikaṃ,
tika-abh04t:471_6: santasabhāvatāya pana sannisinnarasaṃ siyāti tassa paṇṇapuṭaṃ dassitaṃ. Dhammasaṅgahe
tika-abh04t:471_7: akusalaniddese adhipatino viya paṭṭhāne kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇassa labbhamānassa
tika-abh04t:471_8: avacane na kiñci kāraṇaṃ dissati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ tattha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “heṭṭhā dassitanayattā”ti.
tika-abh04t:471_9: Na cettha dassitanayattāti sakkā vattuṃ vipākadhammadhammehi kusalākusalehi ataṃsabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh04t:471_10: nayadassanassa ayujjamānakattā. Apica tattha vīmaṃsāya kesuci sabbesañca adhipatīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:471_11: abhāvato ekarasaṃ desanaṃ dassetuṃ “uddhaṭo”ti ca sakkā vattuṃ, idha pana na tādisaṃ
tika-abh04t:471_12: avacane kāraṇaṃ labbhatīti “avacane kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:472_0: Adhippāyenāti akusalānantaraṃ sahetukatadārammaṇaṃ natthīti tassa therassa matimattanti
tika-abh04t:472_1: dasseti. “Kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vacanato
tika-abh04t:472_2: pana akusalānantaraṃ sahetukatadārammaṇampi vijjatiyevāti uppattiṃ vadantassa yuttaggahaṇavasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:473_0: Na ettha kāraṇaṃ dissatīti etena tihetukajavanānantaraṃ tividhampi tadārammaṇaṃ yuttanti
tika-abh04t:473_1: dasseti. Yena adhippāyenāti paṭhamatherena tāva ekena kammunā anekatadārammaṇaṃ nibbattamānaṃ
tika-abh04t:473_2: kammavisesābhāvā taṃtaṃjavanasaṅkhātapaccayavisesena visiṭṭhaṃ hotīti iminā adhippāyena
tika-abh04t:473_3: javanavasena tadārammaṇassa sasaṅkhārādividhānaṃ vuttaṃ, vipākena nāma kammasarikkhena
tika-abh04t:473_4: bhavitabbaṃ, na kammaviruddhasabhāvena. Aññathā aniṭṭhappasaṅgo siyāti evamadhippāyena
tika-abh04t:473_7: duhetukapaṭisandhimpi nānujānātī”ti iminā nayena tesu vādesu adhippāyāvirodhavasena
tika-abh04t:473_8: yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Mahāpakaraṇe āgatapāḷiyāti “sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa
tika-abh04t:473_9: anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imassa vibhaṅge “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa
tika-abh04t:473_10: anantarapaccayena paccayo, sahetukā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-abh04t:476_0: 499. Tasmiṃ khaṇe vijjamānānaṃ chandādīnanti etena vipākajjhāne dukkhāpaṭipadādibhāvassa
tika-abh04t:476_1: avijjamānataṃ dasseti. Na hi kusalajjhānaṃ viya vipākajjhānaṃ parikammavasena nibbattatīti.
tika-abh04t:476_2: Na cettha paṭipadābhedo viya kusalānurūpo vipākassa ārammaṇabhedopi na paramatthiko
tika-abh04t:476_3: siyāti sakkā vattuṃ ekantena sārammaṇattā arūpadhammānaṃ vipākassa ca kammanimittārammaṇatāya
tika-abh04t:476_4: aññatrāpi vijjamānattā. Nānākkhaṇesu nānādhipateyyanti “yasmiṃ khaṇe yaṃ jhānaṃ yadadhipatikaṃ,
tika-abh04t:476_5: tato aññasmiṃ khaṇe taṃ jhānaṃ ekantena tadadhipatikaṃ na hotī”ti katvā vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānassevāti
tika-abh04t:476_6: ca paṭipadā viya adhipatayo na ekantikāti imamevatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t:479_0: 505. Taṇhāvijjādīhi āhitavisesaṃ lokiyakammaṃ vipākuppādanasamatthaṃ hoti, na aññathāti
tika-abh04t:479_2: suddhikapaṭipadāya vibhāvito, yo ca suttantapariyāyena animittoti vuccati. Tenevāha
tika-abh04t:479_5: satī”ti sāsaṅkaṃ āha. Animittanāmañca labhati maggāgamanato phalassa nāmalābhe visesābhāvatoti
tika-abh04t:479_6: adhippāyo. Tādisāya evāti yādisā magge saddhā, tādisāya eva phale saddhāya.
tika-abh04t:480_0: 555. “Katame dhammā niyyānikā? Cattāro maggā”ti vacanato aniyyānikapadaniddese ca
tika-abh04t:480_1: “catūsu bhūmīsu vipāko”ti vuttattā na nippariyāyena phalaṃ niyyānasabhāvaṃ, niyyānasabhāvassa
tika-abh04t:480_2: pana vipāko kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānavasena pavattamāno pariyāyato tathā vuccatīti
tika-abh04t:480_3: āha “niyyānikasabhāvassā”tiādi. Pañcaṅgiko cāti etena maggavibhaṅge sabbavāresupi
tika-abh04t:480_4: phalassa maggapariyāyo āgatoti dasseti. Tattha hi ariyamaggakkhaṇe vijjamānāsupi
tika-abh04t:480_5: viratīsu tadavasiṭṭhānaṃ pañcannaṃ kārāpakaṅgānaṃ atirekakiccatādassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh04t:480_6: pañcaṅgikopi maggo uddhaṭoti. Evaṃ bojjhaṅgāpīti yathā maggo, evaṃ maggabojjhaṅgavibhaṅgesu
tika-abh04t:483_0: 568. Purimā pavattīti mahākiriyacittappavattiṃ āha. Tāya hi khīṇāsavo evaṃ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh04t:483_1: Tenevāha “idaṃ pana cittaṃ vicāraṇapaññārahita”nti. Evanti yathā sotadvāre, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:483_2: ghānadvārādīsupi mahākiriyacittehi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye idamatthikatāya paricchinnāya
tika-abh04t:483_3: idaṃ cittaṃ vattatīti dasseti. Pañcadvārānugataṃ hutvā labbhamānanti pañcadvāre pavattamahākiriyacittānaṃ
tika-abh04t:483_4: piṭṭhivaṭṭakabhāvena imassa cittassa pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pañcadvāre eva vā
tika-abh04t:483_5: idameva pavattanti sambandho. “Loluppa…pe… bhūta”nti vuttattā pañcadvāre paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh04t:483_6: iminā cittena somanassito hutvā pacchā mahākiriyacittehi taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vicinotīti
tika-abh04t:483_7: ayamattho vutto viya dissati. Pubbeyeva pana manodvārikacittena padhānasāruppaṭṭhānādiṃ
tika-abh04t:483_8: paricchindantassa pañcadvāre tādisasseva tādisesu rūpādīsu idaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti
tika-abh04t:483_9: vadanti. Ayampi attho pañcadvāre eva pavattaṃ loluppataṇhāpahānādipaccavekkhaṇāhetu
tika-abh04t:483_10: yathāvuttakāraṇabhūtaṃ jātanti evaṃ yojetvā sakkā vattuṃ. Evañca sati imassa cittassa
tika-abh04t:483_11: paccayabhūtā purimā pavattīti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh04t:484_0: Ettha ca pañcadvāre iminā cittena somanassuppādanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na hāsuppādanaṃ
tika-abh04t:484_1: pañcadvārikacittānaṃ aviññattijanakattā, manodvāre pana hāsuppādanaṃ hoti. Teneva
tika-abh04t:484_2: hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pañcadvāre “somanassito hotī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, manodvāre ca
tika-abh04t:484_5: pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho, evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:484_6: “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Avassañca etaṃ evaṃ
tika-abh04t:484_7: icchitabbaṃ, aññathā āvajjanacittassapi bhagavato pavatti na yujjeyya. Tassapi hi
tika-abh04t:484_8: viññattisamuṭṭhāpakabhāvassa nicchitattā, na ca viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatte taṃsamuṭṭhitāya
tika-abh04t:485_0: Tato evāti mūlābhāvena na suppatiṭṭhitattā eva. “Ahetukānaṃ jhānaṅgāni balāni cā”ti
tika-abh04t:485_1: sampiṇḍanattho jhānaṅgāni cāti ca-saddo. Yadi aparipuṇṇattā balabhāvassa imasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:485_2: ahetukadvaye balāni anuddiṭṭhāni asaṅgahitāni ca, atha kasmā niddiṭṭhānīti āha “yasmā
tika-abh04t:485_3: panā”tiādi. Sammā niyyānikasabhāvānaṃ kusalānaṃ paṭibhāgabhūto vipākopi phalaṃ viya
tika-abh04t:485_4: taṃsabhāvo siyāti sahetukavipākacittāni aggahetvā kiriyacittakatattā vā “mahākiriyacittesū”ti
tika-abh04t:485_5: vuttaṃ. Atha vā mahākiriyacittesucāti ca-saddena sahetukavipākacittānipi gahitānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh04t:486: 574. “Indriya …pe… imassānantaraṃ uppajjamānānī”ti vuttaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kāmāvacarattā. Itaresaṃ mahaggatattā “parikammānantarānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:487: 577. Āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, so eva bhavati uppajjati, na paraparikappito viya niccoti attabhāvo. Attāti vā diṭṭhigatikehi gahetabbākārena bhavati pavattatīti attabhāvo.
tika-abh04t:492_0: Kenacīti rūpena vā arūpena vā. Cittuppādena tāva rūpassa samayavavatthānaṃ na sakkā
tika-abh04t:492_1: kātuṃ abyāpitāya anekantikatāya cāti imamatthaṃ dassento “acittasamuṭṭhānasabbhāvato”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:492_2: Tattha acittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ cittassa tīsu khaṇesu uppajjatīti imasmiṃ tāva vāde
tika-abh04t:492_3: cittuppattisamayena rūpūpapattisamayassa vavatthānaṃ mā hotu, cittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva
tika-abh04t:492_4: sabbampi rūpaṃ uppajjatīti imasmiṃ pana vāde kathanti? Etthāpi acittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:492_5: rūpaṃ cittena sahuppādepi anindriyabaddharūpaṃ viya acittapaṭi bandhuppādatāya na
tika-abh04t:492_7: rūpassa samayavavatthānaṃ na byāpīti dasseti. Anekacittasamuṭṭhānatāya vavatthānābhāvatoti
tika-abh04t:492_8: sambandho. Niyate hi samuṭṭhāpakacitte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa siyā vavatthānanti.
tika-abh04t:493_0: Kesañcīti kāmāvacarakusalādīnaṃ. Katthacīti āruppe. Kesañcīti vā kesañci pañcavokāravipākānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:493_1: Katthacīti paṭisandhikkhaṇe carimakkhaṇe ca. “Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotī”tiādinā cittasahabhāvinaṃ
tika-abh04t:493_2: eva cittena samayavavatthānaṃ katanti vuttaṃ “acittasahabhubhāvato”ti. Tesanti upādārūpānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:493_3: Yo yassa sahabhāvena upakārako, so eva tassa samayavavatthāpakabhāvena vuttoti āha
tika-abh04t:493_4: “sahajāta…pe… ttanato”ti. Nāpi mahābhūtehītiādinā vavatthānābhāvameva dasseti. Kesañcīti
tika-abh04t:493_5: akammajādīnaṃ. Kehicīti kammajādīhi. Pavattitoti pavattanato. Sahāti ekasmiṃ kāle.
tika-abh04t:494_0: Viññatti …pe… na sakkā vattuṃ mahābhūtehi samayavavatthāne kariyamāne tehi ayāvabhāvitatāyāti
tika-abh04t:494_1: adhippāyo. Ekasmiṃ kāletiādināpi mahābhūtehi samayaniyamane vavatthānābhāvameva vibhāveti.
tika-abh04t:494_2: “Tathā vibhajanattha”nti, “avibhattaṃ abyākataṃ atthīti dassetu”nti ca imesaṃ padānaṃ
tika-abh04t:494_3: “vibhattaṃ avibhattañca sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhanto āhā”ti iminā sambandho. Samayavavatthānaṃ
tika-abh04t:494_4: katvā niddisiyamānassa nippadesatāya asambhavato ekadesaṃ niddisitvā sāmaññena nigamanaṃ
tika-abh04t:494_5: yuttaṃ, akatvā pana samayavavatthānaṃ sarūpato niddisanena tathāti imamatthaṃ āha
tika-abh04t:494_6: “samayavavatthānenā”tiādinā. Avibhatteti vipākakiriyābyākataṃ viya na pubbe vibhatte.
tika-abh04t:494_7: Vibhajitabbeti bhedavantatāya vibhajanārahe. Dassiteti uddisanavasena dassite. Vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:495_0: Vipākādidhammānaṃ nayanaṃ nayo, sova dassananti nayadassanaṃ. “Desanā”ti vuttaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-abh04t:495_1: gahaṇameva nayadassananti. Dutiyavikappe pana kāmāvacarādibhāvena nīyatīti nayo,
tika-abh04t:495_2: kiriyābyākataṃ. Tassa dassanaṃ nayadassananti yojetabbaṃ. Dukādīsu niddesavāre ca
tika-abh04t:495_3: hadayavatthuno anāgatattā taṃ aggahetvā paṭhamavikappo vutto, ekake pana vatthupi
tika-abh04t:495_4: gahitanti “hadayavatthuñcā”ti dutiyavikappe vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ dukādīsu niddesavāre
tika-abh04t:495_5: ca hadayavatthu na gahitanti? Itaravatthūhi asamānagatikattā desanābhedato ca. Yathā
tika-abh04t:495_6: hi cakkhuviññāṇādīni ekantato cakkhādinissayāni, na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantato hadayavatthunissayaṃ,
tika-abh04t:495_7: nissitamukhena ca vatthudukādidesanā pavattā. Yampi ekantato hadayavatthunissayaṃ,
tika-abh04t:495_8: tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu vuccamānesupi tadanukūlaārammaṇadukādayo
tika-abh04t:495_9: na sambhavanti. Na hi “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa
tika-abh04t:495_10: ārammaṇa”ntiādinā sakkā vattunti vatthārammaṇadukadesanā bhinnagatikā siyuṃ, samānagatikā
tika-abh04t:495_11: ca tā desetuṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayo. Esā hi bhagavato desanā pakati. Teneva hi nikkhepakaṇḍe
tika-abh04t:495_12: cittuppādavibhāgena avuccamānattā avitakkāvicārapadavissajjane vicāroti vattuṃ na
tika-abh04t:495_13: sakkāti avitakkavicāramattapadavissajjane labbhamānopi vitakko na uddhaṭo, aññathā
tika-abh04t:495_14: vitakko cāti vattabbaṃ siyāti. Evaṃ itaravatthūhi asamānagatikattā desanābhedato
tika-abh04t:495_15: ca dukādīsu uddese na gahitaṃ. Uddiṭṭhasseva hi niddisanato niddesepi na gahitaṃ
tika-abh04t:496_1: ekasantānavasena vā cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyabhāvavatthudasakā satta. Nibbānassa asatipi
tika-abh04t:496_2: paramatthato bhede parikappitabhedopi bhedoyeva vohāravisayeti katvā sopādisesādibhedo vutto.
tika-abh04t:497_0: 584. Kiñcāpi aññattha kukkuṭaṇḍasaṇṭhāne parimaṇḍala-saddo dissati, cakkasaṇṭhānatā
tika-abh04t:497_1: pana vaṭṭasaṇṭhāne cakkavāḷe vuccamāno parimaṇḍala-saddo vaṭṭapariyāyo siyā. Anekatthā
tika-abh04t:497_2: hi saddāti adhippāyenāha “vaṭṭaṃ parimaṇḍala”nti. Ettha ca sineruyugandharādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:497_3: samuddato upariadhobhāgānaṃ vasena ubbedho vutto, āyāmavitthārehipi sineru caturāsītiyojanasahassaparimāṇova.
tika-abh04t:497_4: Yathāha “sineru, bhikkhave, pabbatarājā caturāsīti yojanasahassāni āyāmena, caturāsīti
tika-abh04t:497_5: yojanasahassāni vitthārenā”ti. Sineruṃ pākāraparikkhepavasena parikkhipitvā ṭhitā
tika-abh04t:497_6: yugandharādayo, sineruyugandharādīnaṃ antarepi sītasamuddā nāma. “Te visālato yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh04t:498_1: viya dhammatāvaseneva veditabbo. Vikappasamānasamuccayavibhāvanesu viya avadhāraṇe
tika-abh04t:498_2: aniyame ca vā-saddo vattatīti tathā yojanā katā. Anekatthā hi nipātāti. Tattha anekantikattho aniyamattho.
tika-abh04t:499_1: vāyāmena. Satipi lakkhaṇādibhede ekasmiṃ eva kāle ekasmiṃ santāne anekasatasahassakalāpavuttito
tika-abh04t:499_2: mahantāni bahūni bhūtāni paramatthato vijjamānānīti vā mahābhūtāni yathā “mahājano”ti.
tika-abh04t:499_3: Evanti “upādāya pavatta”nti atthe sati paṭiccasamuppannatā vuttā hoti paccayasambhūtatādīpanato.
tika-abh04t:499_4: Upādāyatīti upādāyati evāti adhippāyo. Tenevāha “ekantanissitassā”ti. “Bhavati hi
tika-abh04t:499_6: attho saṃsāmisambandhavacanicchāya sāmibhāvena vuccati yathā “rukkhassa sākhā”ti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:501_1: veditabbā. Sakkā hi etena nayena…pe… viññātunti ettha pañcavīsāya tāva vatthudukesu
tika-abh04t:501_2: paṭhamadukapañcakādayo cuddasahipi pakiṇṇakadukehi avasiṭṭhehi vatthudukehi pañcavīsāya
tika-abh04t:501_3: ārammaṇadukehi pañcahi bāhirāyatanadukehi rūpadhātudukādīhi pañcahi dhātudukehi pacchimakehi
tika-abh04t:501_4: tīhi indriyadukehi dvādasahipi sukhumarūpadukehi paṭhamādivajjehi avasiṭṭhehi āyatanadhātuindriyadukehi
tika-abh04t:501_5: ca yojanaṃ gacchanti. Pañcavīsāya pana ārammaṇadukesu purimako dukapañcako upādinnaupādinnupādāniyasanidassanacittasamuṭṭhānacittasahabhucittānuparivattidukavajjehi
tika-abh04t:501_7: sabbehipi indriyadukasukhumarūpadukehi yojanaṃ gacchati. Dutiyadukapañcakādīsu yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh04t:501_8: saddāyatanasaddadhātudukādayo yojanaṃ na gacchanti, rūpāyatanarūpadhātudukādayo gacchanti.
tika-abh04t:501_9: Pakiṇṇakadukesu sanidassanadukañcāti ayameva viseso. Yathā ca vatthudukesu, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:501_12: sukhumarūpadukā ca sabbehipi dukehi yojanaṃ gacchantīti evaṃ tāva tikayojanā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t:501_13: Nanu cāyampi yojanā bhagavatā na desitāti na kātabbāti? Nayidaṃ ekantikaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-abh04t:501_14: Bhagavatā dinnanayena yojanāpi bhagavatoyeva desanā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ mātikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:501_15: “hetū ceva dhammā ahetukā cāti idampi sambhavatī”tiādi. Sambhavo hi gahaṇassa kāraṇanti ca.
tika-abh04t:504_0: 586. Cittato eva samuṭṭhātīti cittasamuṭṭhānanti imameva atthaṃ gahetvā “viññattidukādīhi
tika-abh04t:504_1: samānagatiko cittasamuṭṭhānaduko”ti vuttaṃ. Vinivattite hi sāmaññe yaṃ rūpaṃ janakapaccayesu
tika-abh04t:504_2: cittato samuṭṭhāti, taṃ cittato eva samuṭṭhātīti. Viññattidukādīhīti ādi-saddena
tika-abh04t:504_3: cittasahabhucittānuparivattiduke saṅgaṇhāti. Labbhamānoti yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādā, taṃ
tika-abh04t:504_4: atthi cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, atthi na cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ nupādā, taṃ atthi
tika-abh04t:504_5: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, atthi na cittasamuṭṭhānanti evaṃ labbhamāno. Sanidassanadukādīnanti
tika-abh04t:505_1: Catukkā labbhantīti yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnaṃ, taṃ atthi cakkhusamphassassa ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t:505_2: atthi cakkhusamphassassa nārammaṇaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnaṃ, taṃ atthi cakkhusamphassassa
tika-abh04t:505_4: yojanāyaṃ catukkā labbhantīti sambandho. Avasesehīti ārammaṇabāhirāyatanarūpadhātudukādito
tika-abh04t:505_6: Aññesanti upādinnadukādito aññesaṃ upādādukādīnaṃ. Vatthudukādīhīti ādi-saddena cakkhāyatanadukādayo
tika-abh04t:505_7: saṅgaṇhāti. Etthāpi avasesehi tesaṃ aññesañca yojanāya catukkā na labbhantīti sambandho.
tika-abh04t:510_0: 594. Pathavīādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ ruppanasabhāvo viya na hetuādibhāvopi sādhāraṇoti na
tika-abh04t:510_1: hetūsu vibhajitabboti vuttaṃ “avijjamānavibhāgassā”ti. Tassa pana vibhāgābhāvadassanasarūpadassanameva
tika-abh04t:510_2: niddeso. Evañca katvā nibbānassapi vibhāgarahitattā “asaṅkhatā dhātū”ti ettakameva
tika-abh04t:511_0: Yadipi hinoti etena patiṭṭhāti kusalādiko dhammoti alobhādayo kevalaṃ hetupadavacanīyā,
tika-abh04t:511_1: kāraṇabhāvasāmaññato pana mahābhūtādayopi hetu-saddābhidheyyāti mūlaṭṭhavācinā dutiyena
tika-abh04t:511_3: mūlatthena upakārakadhammā “tayo kusalahetū”tiādinā paṭṭhāne ca teyeva “hetupaccayo”ti
tika-abh04t:511_4: vuttāti āha “mūlahetu paccayahetūti vā ayamattho”ti. Hinoti etena, etasmā vā phalaṃ
tika-abh04t:511_5: pavattatīti hetu, paṭicca etasmā eti pavattatīti paccayoti evaṃ hetupaccaya-saddānaṃ
tika-abh04t:511_6: anānatthataṃ sandhāya hetusaddapariyāyabhāvena paccaya-saddo vuttoti āha “hetupaccayasaddānaṃ
tika-abh04t:511_7: samānatthattā”ti. Bhūtattayanissitāni ca mahābhūtāni catumahābhūtanissitaṃ upādārūpanti
tika-abh04t:511_8: sabbampi rūpaṃ sabbadā sabbattha sabbākāraṃ catumahābhūtahetukaṃ mahābhūtāni ca anāmaṭṭhabhedāni
tika-abh04t:512: Kammasamādānānanti samādānānaṃ kammānaṃ, samādiyitvā katakammānaṃ vā. Aññesu paccayesu vipākassa taṇhāvijjādīsu.
tika-abh04t:513_0: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko
tika-abh04t:513_1: nibbatteyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati, yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa
tika-abh04t:513_2: aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati. Vacī…pe… mano…pe…
tika-abh04t:513_3: vijjati…pe… aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ kāyasucaritassa aniṭṭho akanto
tika-abh04t:514_0: “Kammaṃ satte vibhajati, yadidaṃ hīnapaṇītatāyā”ti – evamādivacanato kammaṃ vipākassa
tika-abh04t:514_2: ṭhānaṃ vipākassa okāsabhāvato. Na hi tehi vinā koci vipāko nibbattatīti. Yathāvuttaṭṭhāne
tika-abh04t:514_3: sati adhigantabbaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ “gati…pe… nipphādita”nti vuttaṃ. Vipākassa
tika-abh04t:514_4: ārammaṇena vinā abhāvato ārammaṇampi tassa padhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Anaññasabhāvatoti hetuādisabhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh04t:515_0: Ruppanaṃ rūpaṃ. Taṃ assa atthīti ettha “assā”ti vuccamāno pathavīādiatthoyeva ruppatītipi
tika-abh04t:515_1: vuccatīti āha “ruppanalakkhaṇayuttasseva rūpīrūpabhāvato”ti. Etaṃ sabhāvanti etaṃ
tika-abh04t:515_2: uppannabhāve sati chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyasabhāvaṃ rūpe niyameti rūpasseva taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh04t:515_3: Na rūpaṃ etasminti kālabhedavasena ataṃsabhāvassapi rūpassa atthitāya na rūpaṃ tattha
tika-abh04t:515_4: niyantabbanti dasseti. Atthi hītiādinā tattha rūpasseva niyantabbatābhāvaṃyeva vivarati.
tika-abh04t:515_5: Etamevātiādinā uddesena niddesaṃ saṃsandeti. Ettha etameva rūpe yathāvuttasabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:515_6: niyametabbaṃ niddese eva-saddena niyameti avadhāretīti attho. Yathāvutto niyamoti
tika-abh04t:515_7: uppannabhāve sati chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyabhāvo niyantabbatāya “niyamo”ti vutto,
tika-abh04t:515_8: so rūpe atthi eva rūpasseva taṃsabhāvattā. Visiṭṭhakālassa vuttappakāraṃ avadhāraṇaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:515_9: vā yathāvutto niyamo, so rūpe atthiyeva sambhavatiyeva, na arūpe viya na sambhavatīti
tika-abh04t:515_10: attho daṭṭhabbo. Kālabhedanti kālavisesaṃ. Anāmasitvāti aggahetvā. Taṃ sabbanti anāmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ
tika-abh04t:515_11: tatoyeva arūpehi samānaviññeyyasabhāvaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ. Uppannanti etena kālabhedāmasanena
tika-abh04t:516_0: Vattamānakālikaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ diṭṭhasutamutaviññātasabhāvaṃ, taṃ yathāsakaṃ chahi
tika-abh04t:516_1: viññāṇehi viññeyyasabhāvameva, na tehi aviññeyyaṃ. Nāpi uppannameva chahi viññāṇehi
tika-abh04t:516_2: viññeyyasabhāvaṃ ekantalakkhaṇaniyamābhāvāpattitoti evaṃ aviparīte atthe vibhāvitepi
tika-abh04t:516_3: codako adhippāyaṃ ajānanto “nanu eva”ntiādinā sabbassa sabbārammaṇatāpattiṃ codeti.
tika-abh04t:516_4: Itaro “rūpaṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vibhāveti. Ettha ekībhāvena
tika-abh04t:516_5: gahetvāti idaṃ “sampiṇḍetvā”ti etassa atthavacanaṃ. Ekantalakkhaṇaṃ chahi viññāṇehi
tika-abh04t:516_6: viññeyyasabhāvoyeva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kiñcāpi pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ visayantare
tika-abh04t:516_7: appavattanato na sabbassa sabbārammaṇatā, sabbassapi pana rūpassa chaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvato
tika-abh04t:516_8: yathāsakaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyatāya chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyatāva atthi, taṃ ekato
tika-abh04t:516_9: saṅgahaṇavasena gahetvā “uppannaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyya”nti vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:516_10: yathā “abhiññāppattaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ chaḷārammaṇaṃ hotī”ti. Yathā hi dibbacakkhudibbasotādiabhiññāppattassa
tika-abh04t:516_11: pañcamajjhānassa visuṃ asabbārammaṇattepi ekantalakkhaṇavasena ekībhāvena gahetvā
tika-abh04t:516_13: chaḷārammaṇaṃ hotī”ti vuccati, evaṃ arūpato rūpassa visayavasena visesaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh04t:516_14: “uppa …pe… viññeyya”nti vuttanti. Chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyabhāvo rūpe niyametabbo,
tika-abh04t:516_15: na pana rūpaṃ tasmiṃ niyametabbaṃ, aniyatadeso ca eva-saddoti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paccuppannarūpameva
tika-abh04t:516_17: dosamāha. Tasmāti yasmā pāḷiyaṃ viññeyyamevāti eva-saddo vutto, na ca tassa aṭṭhānayojanena
tika-abh04t:516_18: kāci iṭṭhasiddhi, atha kho aniṭṭhasiddhiyeva sabbarūpassa ekantalakkhaṇaniyamādassanato,
tika-abh04t:516_19: tasmā. Yathārutavaseneva niyame gayhamāne uppa…pe… patti natthi, tato ca sotapatitatāyapi
tika-abh04t:517_0: Ñāṇassa vā uttarassa purimañāṇaṃ vatthukāraṇanti ñāṇavatthu. “Sajātī”ti ettha sa-kāro
tika-abh04t:517_1: samānasaddatthoti dassetuṃ “samānajātikāna”nti vuttaṃ. Samānajātitā ca sammāvācādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:517_2: sīlanattho eva. Etena samānasabhāvatā sajātisaṅgahoti veditabbo. Ārammaṇe cetaso
tika-abh04t:517_3: avikkhepappavattiyā upaṭṭhānussāhanāni viya tesaṃ avikkhepopi atisayena upakārakoti
tika-abh04t:517_4: “aññamaññopakāravasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Teneva vijjamānesupi aññesu sahajātadhammesu etesaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:517_5: samādhikkhandhasaṅgaho dassito. Yaṃ pana saccavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ visuddhimaggādīsu
tika-abh04t:517_6: ca “vāyāmasatiyo kiriyato saṅgahitā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ asamādhisabhāvataṃ tesaṃ samādhissa
tika-abh04t:517_7: upakārakattañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Teneva ca tattha “samādhiyevettha sajātito samādhikkhandhena
tika-abh04t:517_8: saṅgahito”ti vuttaṃ. Idha pana sajātisaṅgahoti samādhitadupakārakadhammānaṃ uppattidesavasena
tika-abh04t:517_9: saṅgaho vuttoti. Avirādhetvā visayasabhāvāvaggahaṇaṃ paṭivedho, appanā ca ārammaṇe
tika-abh04t:517_10: daḷhanipāto tadavagāhoyevāti “paṭivedhasadisaṃ kicca”nti vuttaṃ. Atha vā ārammaṇapaṭivedhassa
tika-abh04t:521_0: 596. Samantato sabbaso dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu samantacakkhūti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatadassana”nti
tika-abh04t:521_1: vuttaṃ. Evamādināti ettha ādi-saddo “dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”nti tīsupi padesu
tika-abh04t:521_2: paccekaṃ yojetabbo. “Idaṃ dukkhanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ
tika-abh04t:521_3: udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādī”tiādinā hi pāḷi pavattāti. Ākārenāti dvādasavidhena ākārena.
tika-abh04t:521_5: vipassanāñāṇantipi yujjatī”ti vadanti. Aggamaggena pana saha vipassanā paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti
tika-abh04t:522_0: Yathāvutte maṃsapiṇḍe sasambhāre cakkhuvohāro santānavasena pavattamāne catusamuṭṭhānikarūpadhamme
tika-abh04t:522_1: upādāya pavattoti “catu…pe… sambhārā”ti vuttaṃ. Saṇṭhānanti vaṇṇāyatanamevāti tena
tika-abh04t:522_2: tena ākārena sanniviṭṭhesu mahābhūtesu taṃtaṃsaṇṭhānavasena vaṇṇāyatanassa viññāyamānattā
tika-abh04t:522_3: vuttaṃ, na vaṇṇāyatanasseva saṇṭhānapaññattiyā upādānattā. Tathā hi andhakāre phusitvāpi
tika-abh04t:522_4: saṇṭhānaṃ viññāyatīti. Tathā ca vakkhati “dīghādīni phusitvāpi sakkā jānitu”nti,
tika-abh04t:522_5: “dīghādisannivesaṃ bhūtasamudāyaṃ nissāyā”ti ca. Tesaṃ sambhavasaṇṭhānānaṃ āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanehi
tika-abh04t:522_6: anatthantarabhāvepi tehi visuṃ vacanaṃ tathābhūtānaṃ sambhavabhūtānaṃ saṇṭhānabhūtānañca.
tika-abh04t:522_7: Etena āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānaṃ vasena vattamānaavatthāviseso sambhavo saṇṭhānañcāti
tika-abh04t:522_8: ayamattho dassito hoti. Tattha sambhavo catusamuṭṭhāniko soḷasavassakāle uppajjati.
tika-abh04t:522_9: Tassa rāgavasena ṭhānā vacanaṃ hotīti vadanti. Atathābhūtānaṃ tato aññathābhūtānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:522_10: Yathāvutte sambhāravatthusaṅkhāte. Vijjamānattāti bhiyyovuttivasena vuttaṃ. Tathā
tika-abh04t:522_11: hi khīṇāsavānaṃ brahmānañca sambhavo natthīti. Āpodhātuvisesattā sambhavo āpodhātusambandhī
tika-abh04t:522_12: āpodhātutannissayanissitopi hotīti tassa catudhātunissitatāya avirodho vutto.
tika-abh04t:523_1: vadanti. Anekakalāpagatabhāvaṃ cakkhussa dasseti yato upaddutapaṭale nirākaraṇepi
tika-abh04t:523_2: cakkhu vijjatīti. Paṭighaṭṭanaṃ visayābhimukhabhāvo nighaṃsapaccayattā. Nighaṃso
tika-abh04t:524_0: Anekattāti idaṃ avacanassa kāraṇaṃ, na hetukiriyāya viññāyamānabhāvassa. So pana
tika-abh04t:524_1: apekkhāsiddhito eva veditabbo. Hetukiriyāpekkhā hi phalakiriyāti. Cakkhuṃ saṅgaṇhātīti
tika-abh04t:524_3: tattha niruḷhabhāvaṃ dasseti. Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭho cakkhussa indaṭṭhoyevāti “yathā
tika-abh04t:524_4: hi issaro”tiādinā issaropamā vuttā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakicce pariṇāyantaṃ cakkhu
tika-abh04t:524_5: taṃsahajāte cakkhusamphassādayopi tattha pariṇāyatīti vuccatīti “te dhamme…pe… pariṇāyatī”ti
tika-abh04t:524_6: vuttaṃ, na pana cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ dassanakiccattā. Atha vā cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:524_7: indriyapaccayabhāvena upakārakaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakicce pariṇāyantaṃ cakkhu
tika-abh04t:524_8: tattha cakkhusamphassādayopi tadanuvattake pariṇāyatīti atthāyaṃ pariyāyoti dassento
tika-abh04t:524_9: āha “te dhamme…pe… ṇāyatī”ti. Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ cakkhatīti imassa “pariṇāyati
tika-abh04t:524_10: pakāsetī”ti ca atthā vuttā. Saṇṭhānampi rūpāyatanamevāti “samavisamāni rūpāni cakkhatīti
tika-abh04t:524_11: cakkhū”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃdvārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ upanissayapaccayabhāvo eva vaḷañjanattho.
tika-abh04t:525_0: 599. Taṃdvārikā…pe… uppatti vuttāti cakkhuviññāṇe uppanne sampaṭicchanādīni balavārammaṇe
tika-abh04t:525_1: javanaṃ ekantena uppajjatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Tathā ceva hi antarā cakkhuviññāṇe vā
tika-abh04t:525_2: sampaṭicchane vā santīraṇe vā ṭhatvā nivattissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti nicchitaṃ.
tika-abh04t:525_3: Tena paccayenāti taṃpakārena paccayena. Taṃsadisānanti garuṃ katvā assādanādippavattivisesarahitatāya
tika-abh04t:525_5: aññathā garuṃ katvā pavatti natthi rūpadhammavisayattāti “assādanābhinandanabhūtānī”ti
tika-abh04t:525_6: ettakameva vuttaṃ. Manodvārikajavanapiṭṭhivaṭṭakānampi hi pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ assādanābhinandanabhāvena
tika-abh04t:525_7: rūpaṃ garuṃ katvā pavatti natthīti na sakkā vattunti. Rūpaṃ ārammaṇādhipati akusalasseva
tika-abh04t:525_8: hoti. Tathā hi paṭṭhāne “abyākato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh04t:525_9: Ārammaṇādhipati cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandatī”tiādinā rūpadhammopi ārammaṇādhipati
tika-abh04t:525_10: vibhatto. “Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa abyākato dhammo kusalassā”ti ettha
tika-abh04t:525_11: pana phalanibbānāneva ārammaṇādhipatibhāvena vibhattānīti. Gaṇanāya ca “ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapurejātaatthiavigatanti
tika-abh04t:525_12: eka”nti vuttaṃ. Yadi kusalassapi siyā, dveti vattabbaṃ siyāti. Tānīti yathāvuttajavanāni
tika-abh04t:525_13: paṭiniddiṭṭhāni. Taṃsampayuttāni cāti javanasampayuttāni. Aññāni cakkhusamphassādīni.
tika-abh04t:525_14: Yadi rūpassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvamattaṃ adhippetaṃ, “taṃ rūpārammaṇeti eteneva sijjheyyā”ti
tika-abh04t:525_15: ettakameva vadeyya. Yasmā pana rūpaṃ taṃdvārikajavanānaṃ paccayavisesopi hoti, tasmā
tika-abh04t:525_16: tassa visesassa dīpanatthaṃ “ārabbhā”ti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ siyāti āha “ārammaṇapaccayato
tika-abh04t:526_2: Jīvitanimittamāhāraraso jīvitaṃ, tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhāti evaṃ siddhena
tika-abh04t:526_3: jivhā-saddena pakāsiyamānā rasāvhāyanasaṅkhātā sāyanakiriyā labbhatīti katvā vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:526_5: jivhā”ti. Āyoti uppattideso. Pasādakāyassa kāyikānaṃ dukkhasukhānaṃ nissayabhāvato
tika-abh04t:526_7: byāpibhāve, byāpibhāvena vā. Kāyappasādabhāvoti kāyappasādasabbhāvo. Anuviddhattāti
tika-abh04t:526_8: anuyuttabhāvato, saṃsaṭṭhabhāvatoti attho. Tasmāti yasmā yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādinnakapavattaṃ
tika-abh04t:526_9: nāma atthi, sabbattha kāyāyatanaṃ kappāsapaṭale sneho viyāti vuttaṃ, tasmā. Paṇḍarasabhāvā
tika-abh04t:526_10: pasādā āpāthagataṃ visayaṃ viññāṇuppattihetubhāvena pakāsentā viya hontīti tesaṃ
tika-abh04t:526_11: visayāvabhāsanakiccatā vuttā. Samānanissayānanti ekanissayānaṃ. Avinibbhuttesu hi
tika-abh04t:526_12: rūparasādīsu yaṃnissayaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃnissayo eva rasādīti. Aññamaññasabhāvānupagamenāti
tika-abh04t:527_0: Yasmā paccayantarasahitoyeva cakkhuppasādo rūpābhihananavasena pavattati, na paccayantararahito,
tika-abh04t:527_1: tasmā rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā hotu, evaṃsabhāvo so rūpadhammoti dassetuṃ “rūpābhighātāraho”ti
tika-abh04t:527_2: vuttaṃ yathā “vipākārahasabhāvā kusalākusalā”ti. Visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ abhimukhabhāvo
tika-abh04t:527_3: abhighāto viyāti abhighāto, so rūpe cakkhussa, cakkhumhi vā rūpassa hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:527_4: “rūpe, rūpassa vā abhighāto”ti. Tenevāha “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi
tika-abh04t:527_5: rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā”ti, “cakkhu anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi
tika-abh04t:527_6: sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti ca ādi. Ettha ca taṃtaṃbhavapatthanāvasena
tika-abh04t:527_8: vuttaṃ, sudūrasukhumādibhedassapi rūpassa gahaṇasamatthameva cakkhu hotūti evaṃ nibbattitaāveṇikakammavasena
tika-abh04t:527_9: dutiyaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Atha vā satipi pañcannaṃ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh04t:527_10: pasādabyāpārassa dassanavasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ, pasādakāraṇassa satipi kammabhāvasāmaññe
tika-abh04t:528_0: Kāmataṇhāti kāmabhave taṇhā. Tathā rūpataṇhā daṭṭhabbā. Tassa tassa bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā
tika-abh04t:528_1: taṇhā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti kāmataṇhādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:528_2: daṭṭhukāmatādivohārārahatā vuttā. Daṭṭhukāmatāti hi daṭṭhumicchā rūpataṇhāti attho.
tika-abh04t:528_4: sati purimanibbattiyaṃ vattabbaṃ natthi. Asatipi tassa maggena asamugghātitabhāveneva
tika-abh04t:528_5: kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yato maggena asamucchinnaṃ kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano
tika-abh04t:528_7: aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne
tika-abh04t:528_8: pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpeti”, “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ
tika-abh04t:528_9: atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandoti pajānātī”ti ca evamādīsu.
tika-abh04t:529_0: Etthāha – cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kiṃ ekakammunā uppatti, udāhu nānākammunāti? Ubhayathāpīti
tika-abh04t:529_1: porāṇā. Tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visese vattabbaṃ natthi kāraṇassa
tika-abh04t:529_2: bhinnattā. Ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṃ tesaṃ kathaṃ visesoti? Kāraṇassa bhinnattāyeva.
tika-abh04t:529_3: Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā
tika-abh04t:529_4: upanissayabhāvena taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammassa vicittabhedataṃ vidahati. Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ
tika-abh04t:529_5: taṃ tathārūpasamatthatāyogena anekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekaṃ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ
tika-abh04t:529_6: nibbatteti. Tathā ca vakkhati “kammameva nesaṃ visesakāraṇa”nti. Na cettha samatthatābhāvato
tika-abh04t:529_8: Tathā hi sati ekassapi kammassa anekindriyahetutāvisesayogaṃ ekampi kammantiādinā
tika-abh04t:529_9: yuttito āgamatopi parato sayameva vakkhati. Tathā ca ekasseva kusalacittassa soḷasādivipākacittanibbattihetubhāvo
tika-abh04t:529_11: dissati. Kiṃ vā etāya yutticintāya, na cintitabbamevetaṃ. Yato kammavipāko cakkhādīni
tika-abh04t:529_12: kammavipāko ca sabbākārato buddhānaṃyeva kammavipākañāṇaphalayuttānaṃ visayo, na
tika-abh04t:529_13: aññesaṃ atakkāvacaratāya. Teneva ca bhagavatā “kammavipāko acinteyyo na cintetabbo,
tika-abh04t:529_14: yo cinteyya ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti ādīnavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhittaṃ. Āviñchanaṃ
tika-abh04t:530_0: Sabbesanti padassa pakaraṇato pārisesato vā labbhamānaṃ atthavisesaṃ ajānanto yathārutavaseneva
tika-abh04t:530_1: atthaṃ gahetvā “ko ettha viseso”tiādinā codeti. Itaro tejādīnaṃ paccekaṃ adhikabhāve
tika-abh04t:530_2: viya dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ekakādivasena labbhamānāya
tika-abh04t:530_3: omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti viññāyamānattā pakaraṇato pārisesato vā catunnampi
tika-abh04t:530_4: bhūtānaṃ samabhāvena kāyo hotīti ayamattho siddhoti sabba-saddo idha samabhāvadīpakoti
tika-abh04t:530_5: dassetuṃ “idaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Imamatthaṃ dīpetīti ca yathāvuttena ñāyena “sabbesa”nti
tika-abh04t:530_6: vacanato ayamattho labbhati, na tassa vācakattāti dasseti. Tenevāha “anuvatta…pe…
tika-abh04t:530_7: vasena vuttattā”ti. Ekadesādhikabhāvanivāraṇeneva hi ekadesomattatānivāraṇampi viññāyatīti.
tika-abh04t:530_8: Ekadeso avayavo. Catudhātusamudāyanissayassa hi pasādassa tadekadhātuadhikatā avayavādhikatā hotīti.
tika-abh04t:531_0: “Purimā cettha dvepi vādino nikāyantariyā”ti vadanti. Ālokādisahakārīkāraṇasahitānaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:531_1: cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādiavabhāsanasamatthatā vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇupanissayabhāvo guṇoti
tika-abh04t:531_2: tesaṃ laddhīti adhippāyena “taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tejādīnaṃ viya vivarassa
tika-abh04t:531_3: bhūtabhāvābhāvato “yathāyoga”nti vuttaṃ. Atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti
tika-abh04t:531_4: parādhippāyaṃ dassento “taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehī”ti āha. Tejassa pana ālokarūpena, ākāsasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh04t:531_5: vivarassa saddena, vāyussa gandhena, udakassa rasena, pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti imamatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:531_6: sandhāya “yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehī”ti vuttaṃ siyā. Rūpādiggahaṇeti rūpādivisaye
tika-abh04t:531_7: cakkhuviññāṇādike nipphādetabbeti attho. Upakaritabbatoti sahakārīkāraṇabhūtehi yathāvuttabhūtaguṇehi
tika-abh04t:531_8: cakkhādīnaṃ sakiccakaraṇe upakaritabbato. Sabhāvena suyyamānassāti kenaci anuccāriyamānasseva
tika-abh04t:531_9: labbhamānattā vuttaṃ. Ghaṭṭanaṃ pana vinā vāyusaddopi natthīti. Atha vā vāyumhi saddo
tika-abh04t:531_10: sabhāvena suyyatīti āpe raso madhuroti ca tassa laddhiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dutiyavādissapi
tika-abh04t:531_11: niggaho hoti tassapi tejādiguṇā rūpādayoti evaṃladdhikattā.
tika-abh04t:532_0: Rūpādivisesaguṇehīti rūpādivisesaguṇayuttehi. Teja…pe… vāyūhīti sahākāsehi tejādiparamāṇūhi.
tika-abh04t:532_1: Kappāsato visadisāyāti kappāsapathavito visesayuttāya tato adhikasāmatthiyayuttāyāti
tika-abh04t:532_2: adhippāyo. Tassāyevāti kappāsapathaviyāyeva. Yasmā sā vijjamānānipi avisesabhūtāni
tika-abh04t:532_3: atthīti gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena abhibhavitvā ṭhitā, tasmā tassāyeva gandho adhikataro
tika-abh04t:532_4: bhaveyyāti attho. Ayañca sabbo uttaro “tassa tassa bhūtassa adhikatāyā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:532_5: vuttattā tathāgatānaṃ vādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vadantassa kaṇādassa vasena vutto. “Attano
tika-abh04t:532_6: pana matena kaṇādakapilādayo kevalaṃ pathavādidrabyamevātiādi laddhi. Kaṇādasāsanāya
tika-abh04t:532_7: adhimuttānaṃ sāsane anavagāḷhānaṃ kesañci ayaṃ vādo”ti ca vadanti. Etassubhayassāti
tika-abh04t:532_8: āsavagandhato kappāsagandho adhiko sītudakavaṇṇato uṇhodakavaṇṇo ca adhikoti etassa
tika-abh04t:532_9: ubhayassa. Tejādiadhikesu ca sambhāresu rūpādīnaṃ visesassa adassanato na rūpādayo
tika-abh04t:532_10: tejādīnaṃ visesaguṇoti siddhanti āha “tadabhā…pe… ttitā”ti. Tena na rūpaṃ tejassa
tika-abh04t:532_11: visesaguṇo ekantato tejādike sambhāre visesena adassanato, yo yassa visesaguṇo, na
tika-abh04t:532_12: so tadadhike sambhāre ekantato visesena dissati yathā pathavīadhike sambhāre āpodhātūti
tika-abh04t:532_13: dasseti. Evaṃ sesesupi yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Ko pana vādo nānākalāpeti sabhāvato
tika-abh04t:532_14: nānattābhāvepi mūlakāraṇanānattavasena atthi koci viseso asaṅghāteti dasseti, yato
tika-abh04t:533_0: Ekampīti pi-saddena anekasmiṃ vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. Pañcāyatanikattabhāve
tika-abh04t:533_1: patthanā yā daṭṭhukāmatādibhāvena vuttā, tāya nipphannaṃ. Etena kāraṇavisesena phalavisesamāha.
tika-abh04t:533_2: Na hītiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ samatthayati. Tanti kammaṃ. Visesenāti attano kāraṇena
tika-abh04t:533_3: āhitātisayena. Teneva sotassa na hoti paccayo, tato aññeneva pana hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:533_4: Tena anekasabhāvena kāraṇena āhitavisesaṃ ekampi kammaṃ anekasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nipphādetuṃ
tika-abh04t:533_5: samatthaṃ hotīti dasseti. Idāni kammassa vuttappakāravisesābhāve dosamāha “indriyantarābhāvappattito”ti.
tika-abh04t:533_6: Tassattho – kāraṇavisesābhāve phalavisesassa asambhavato yaṃ visesayuttaṃ kammaṃ
tika-abh04t:533_7: cakkhussa kāraṇaṃ, tassa tato aññavisesābhāve tadaññindriyuppādakatāpi na siyāti
tika-abh04t:533_8: sotindriyādīnaṃ tato anuppatti eva siyā. Evamitaratthāpi. Visesoti cettha kammassa
tika-abh04t:533_9: taṃtaṃindriyuppādanasamatthatā adhippetā, sā ca pubbe dassitasabhāvova.
tika-abh04t:534_0: Anekāhi mahaggatacetanāhi ekāya vā parittacetanāsahitāya paṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpānaṃ
tika-abh04t:534_1: nibbattīti na sakkā viññātunti “sabbesaṃ…pe… viññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva asakkuṇeyyataṃ
tika-abh04t:534_3: paccayo”ti ettha yadi nānākammavasena indriyānaṃ uppatti adhippetā, evaṃ sati mahaggatakammena
tika-abh04t:534_4: ca kāmāvacarakammena ca taṃtaṃpaṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpaṃ uppannaṃ siyā, na cetaṃ
tika-abh04t:534_6: vikalindriyatā gatisampattiyā opapātikayoniyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe yuttā. Atha mahaggatāhi
tika-abh04t:534_7: eva nānācetanāhi nibbattaṃ, na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hoti. Nicchitañhetaṃ
tika-abh04t:534_9: uppattiñāpakena iminā vacanena parittakammunāpi ekena yathārahaṃ anekesaṃ indriyānaṃ
tika-abh04t:534_10: uppatti siddhāvāti vuttaṃ “siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotī”ti.
tika-abh04t:535_0: Sampattoyeva nāma sampattikiccakaraṇatoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭi…pe… nakato”ti
tika-abh04t:535_2: ca “vāyu viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa kadācipi ārammaṇapaccayo
tika-abh04t:535_3: na siyā dhātuparamparāya ghaṭṭentassa utusamuṭṭhānattā. Tenāha “na hi…pe… pajjatī”ti.
tika-abh04t:535_4: Paṭṭhāne ca “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:536_0: Nanu cirena suyyantīti dūre ṭhitānaṃ lahukaṃ savanaṃ natthi, tesampi vā lahukaṃ savanena
tika-abh04t:536_1: dūrāsannabhāvānaṃ viseso na siyāti adhippāyo. Na, dū…pe… toti na dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā
tika-abh04t:536_2: cirena sotaviññāṇena suyyanti, sace savanūpacāre so saddo dūre āsanne ca ṭhitānaṃ
tika-abh04t:536_3: yathābhūte āpāthagate sadde manoviññāṇasaṅkhātato gahaṇavisesato cirena suto sīghaṃ
tika-abh04t:536_4: sutoti abhimānoti attho. Etamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Nicchaya…pe…
tika-abh04t:536_5: abhimāno hoti, sotaviññāṇappavatti pana ubhayatthāpi samānā, yasmā so pana saddo…pe…
tika-abh04t:536_6: āgacchatīti. Yadi dhātuparamparāya saddo nappavattati, kathaṃ paṭighosādīnaṃ uppattīti
tika-abh04t:536_7: āha “dūre…pe… paccayo hotī”ti. Uppattivasena āgatānīti etena rūpadhammāpi yattha
tika-abh04t:536_8: uppajjanti, tattheva bhijjanti, na desantaraṃ saṅkamantīti dasseti. Ghaṭṭanasabhāvānevāti
tika-abh04t:536_9: tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ saddasamuppattihetubhāvamāha. Sotapadesassāti sotadesassa, sotadese ṭhitassāti attho.
tika-abh04t:537_0: Cakkhumato puggalassa ajjhāsayavasenāti citravicitrarūpāyatane yebhuyyena sattānaṃ
tika-abh04t:537_1: cakkhudvārikajavanassa anukaḍḍhanavasena pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kaṇṇakūpacchiddeyeva
tika-abh04t:537_2: pavattanatoti etena adhiṭṭhānato bahiddhā indriyaṃ pavattīti vādaṃ paṭisedheti. Adhiṭṭhānadese
tika-abh04t:537_3: eva hi indriyaṃ vattati tattha kiccādippayogadassanato. Satipi panassa bahiddhā vuttiyaṃ
tika-abh04t:537_4: na visayaggahaṇe samatthatā, aññathā adhiṭṭhānapidahanepi visayaggahaṇaṃ bhaveyyāti.
tika-abh04t:537_5: Ārammaṇaggahaṇahetuto cāti kaṇṇakūpacchiddeyeva ṭhatvā ārammaṇakaraṇassa viññāṇassa vā hetubhāvato.
tika-abh04t:538_0: Tabbohārenāti gandhagandhaggahaṇassa sahacaritāya gandhopi tathā vuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:538_1: Gandho paccayoti gandho sahakārīpaccayoti attho. Kheḷādiko paccayoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:538_2: Tathā pathavīti sahakārīpaccayantarabhūtā ajjhattikabāhirā pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe
tika-abh04t:538_3: paccayoti attho. Ādhārabhūtāti tejovāyodhātūnaṃ ādhārabhūtā. Nissayabhūtānanti nissayamahābhūtānaṃ
tika-abh04t:538_4: āpotejovāyodhātūnaṃ. Sabbadāti uppīḷanakāle ca anuppīḷanakāle ca. Tatthāti caturāsītipabhede
tika-abh04t:538_5: uparimakāyasaṅkhāte rūpasamūhe. Vinibbhujjituṃ asakkuṇeyyānanti idaṃ cakkhudasakaṃ
tika-abh04t:538_6: idaṃ kāyadasakaṃ idaṃ bhāvadasakanti evaṃ kalāpatopi vinibbhujjituṃ asakkuṇeyyānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:539_0: 616. Dīghādīnaṃ phusitvā jānitabbatoti idaṃ dīghādīnaṃ na kāyaviññāṇagocarattā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t:539_1: dīghādivohārarūpādīnaṃ pana phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā kāyaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattena
tika-abh04t:539_3: Ekasmiṃ itarassa abhāvāti chāyātapānaṃ ālokandhakārānañca asahaṭṭhāyitaṃ āha. Kathaṃ
tika-abh04t:539_4: pana āloko andhakāraṃ vidhamatīti? “Ālokappavattisamānakālaṃ andhakārasabhāvena pavattamānaṃ
tika-abh04t:539_5: vaṇṇāyatanaṃ bhijjati. Andhakārassa nissayo hutvā pavattamānāni bhūtāni kamena tathārūpassa
tika-abh04t:539_6: vaṇṇāyatanassa nissayabhāvaṃ gacchantī”ti keci. Saha andhakārena tannissayabhūtānaṃ
tika-abh04t:539_7: nirodhasamanantaraṃ taṃsantatiyaṃ tādise paccayasannipāte ālokanissayabhūtānaṃ uppattīti
tika-abh04t:539_8: veditabbaṃ. Na hi nissayamahābhūtehi vinā ālokappavatti atthi, nāpi andhakārasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh04t:539_10: nirujjhanato. Padīpasikhāmaṇiraṃsiyo viya pathavīpākārarukkhādīni muñcitvāpi andhakāro
tika-abh04t:539_11: pavattatīti vadanti. Mandaṃ pana pākārādiādhārarahitaṃ na suṭṭhu paññāyati, bahalaṃ
tika-abh04t:539_12: ādhāraṃ nissāya pavattatīti yuttanti ca vadanti.
tika-abh04t:540_1: anadhippetattā, manussato pana anaññatānivattiatthoti dassetuṃ “amanussa…pe… ṭṭhādayopī”ti
tika-abh04t:541_0: 632. Kammacittādināti ādi-saddena utuāhāre saṅgaṇhāti. Taṃtadākārānīti itthiliṅgādiākārāni.
tika-abh04t:541_1: Itthindriyaṃ paṭicca samuṭṭhahantīti aññamaññapaccayānipi itthiliṅgādīni yebhuyyena
tika-abh04t:541_2: itthindriyasahite eva santāne sabbhāvā itarattha ca abhāvā indriyahetukāni vuttāni.
tika-abh04t:541_3: Aññathāti itthiliṅgādiākārato aññathā, itthindriyābhāve vā. Itthiggahaṇassa cāti
tika-abh04t:541_4: itthīti cittappavattiyā. Tesaṃ rūpānanti itthiliṅgādiākārarūpānaṃ. Yadi itthindriyaṃ
tika-abh04t:541_5: itthiliṅgādiākārarūpānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ, atha kasmā tassa indriyādipaccayabhāvo
tika-abh04t:541_6: tesaṃ na vuttoti? Neva taṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ, atha kho tesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitāmattena
tika-abh04t:541_7: taṃ kāraṇanti vuccatīti dassetuṃ āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:542_0: 633. Liṅgaṃ parivattamānaṃ purimaliṅgādhārajātianurūpameva hutvā parivattatīti katvā
tika-abh04t:542_1: vuttaṃ “paṭisandhiyaṃ viya pavattepī”ti. Yassa…pe… noti ādivacanatoti ādi-saddena
tika-abh04t:542_2: “yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti no”ti saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh04t:543_0: 635. Dvārabhāvena kucchitānaṃ āsavadhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānatāya pasādavisese viya
tika-abh04t:543_2: thambhanaṃ “vāyodhātukicca”nti vuttaṃ. Kiccampi hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvoyevāti. Pathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh04t:544_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadā hi sā tehi pariggahitā nāma hotīti. Ekassapi akkharassa anekehi
tika-abh04t:544_2: javanehi nibbattetabbattā tathā nibbattiyamānatāya asamatthasabhāvattā na viññātavisesā
tika-abh04t:544_3: na bhinnā evāti āha “sava…pe… bhinnā”ti. Abbokiṇṇeti antarantarā uppajjamānehi asaṃsaṭṭhe.
tika-abh04t:544_4: “Pacchimacitta”nti avisesena cuticittaṃ vuttanti adhippāyena “aññesampi cuticittaṃ…pe… ñāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:545_0: Atha vā “ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ
tika-abh04t:545_1: tesaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatī”ti rūpārūpabhavūpapajjanakānaṃ
tika-abh04t:546: “Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati, tassa vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti āmantā”ti,
tika-abh04t:547: “Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati, tassa cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti āmantā”ti ca,
tika-abh04t:548: “Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhati cittasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhissatī”ti –
tika-abh04t:549_0: Ādivacanato ca pacchimacittassa purato soḷasamena cittena tato orimena vā saddhiṃ
tika-abh04t:549_1: assāsapassāsā na uppajjantīti siddhaṃ. Yadi uppajjeyyuṃ, “pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
tika-abh04t:549_2: tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro na nirujjhatī”ti na vadeyya, vuttañcetaṃ, tasmā heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
tika-abh04t:549_3: cutito purimena sattarasamena uppannā assāsapassāsā cutiyā heṭṭhā dutiyena cittena
tika-abh04t:549_4: saddhiṃ nirujjhanti. Tena “yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissatī”ti
tika-abh04t:550_0: Atha vā yassa cittassāti yena cittena sabbapacchimo kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati. Taṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh04t:550_1: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ, na pacchimacittassa anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ. Anantarāti hi kāyasaṅkhāruppādanaṃ
tika-abh04t:550_2: antaraṃ vinā, yato pacchā kāyasaṅkhāruppādanena anantaritaṃ hutvā pacchimacittaṃ
tika-abh04t:550_3: uppajjissatīti attho. Kasmā? “Itaresaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro ca nirujjhissati kāyasaṅkhāro
tika-abh04t:550_5: kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjatīti āpajjatīti. Evaṃ sabbesampi cuticittassa rūpajanakatābhāve
tika-abh04t:550_6: āgamaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttiṃ dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādimāha. Tattha gabbhagamanādīti ādi-saddena
tika-abh04t:551_0: 637. Anekesaṃ kalāpānaṃ ekato hutvā ekaghanapiṇḍabhāvena pavattanato kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ
tika-abh04t:551_1: kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāvo vutto. Yato tesaṃ duviññeyyanānattaṃ, na pana
tika-abh04t:551_2: avinibbhuttabhāvato. Taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatāti tesaṃ tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ vibhattabhāvo kalāpantarabhūtehi
tika-abh04t:551_3: vibhattasabhāvatā asaṃkiṇṇatāti attho. Yasmā pana yathāvuttā vivittatā rūpānaṃ osānaṃ
tika-abh04t:551_4: hoti, tasmā “rūpapariyanto”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā taṃtaṃbhūtasuññatā. Yesañhi paricchedo
tika-abh04t:551_5: ākāso, tesaṃ pariyantatāya tehi suññabhāvoti lakkhitabbo. Tatoyeva ca so bhūtantarehi
tika-abh04t:551_6: viya tehi asamphuṭṭhoti vuccatīti. Aññathāti paricchinditabbehi asamphuṭṭhabhāvābhāve.
tika-abh04t:552_0: 638. Taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehīti ettha kathaṃ cammasuvaṇṇesu mudutākammaññatā labbhanti,
tika-abh04t:552_1: nanu lahutādivikārā ekantato indriyabaddharūpe eva pavattanato anindriyabaddhe na
tika-abh04t:552_2: labbhantīti? Saccametaṃ, idha pana taṃsadisesu tabbohāravasena vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tūlapicuādīsu
tika-abh04t:552_4: eva vā sandhāya “taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbe sabbesaṃ paccayā
tika-abh04t:553_0: 641. Ācayasaddenevāti niddese vuttaācayasaddeneva. Yo āyatanānaṃ ādicayattā ācayo
tika-abh04t:553_1: punappunaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ, sova rūpassa uparicayattā upacayoti adhippetaṃ atthaṃ
tika-abh04t:553_2: pāḷiyaṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “pāḷiyaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upa-saddo paṭhamattho “dānaṃ,
tika-abh04t:553_3: bhikkhave, paṇḍitupaññatta”ntiādīsu viya. Upariatthoca “sammaṭṭhe upasitte ca, te
tika-abh04t:553_4: nisīdiṃsu maṇḍape”tiādīsu viya. Aññathāti upa-saddassa upariatthasseva gahaṇe.
tika-abh04t:554_0: 643. Phalavipaccanapakatiyāti phalavipaccanasabhāvena. Phalameva vā pakatīti āyusaṃhānādinā
tika-abh04t:554_1: phalasabhāvena jarāniddesoti attho. Tathā hi “phalūpacārena vuttā”ti vuttaṃ. Supariṇatarūpaparipākakāle hānidasakādīsu.
tika-abh04t:555_1: Visabhūte saṅghāte ojā mandā hotīti savisattābhāvato sukhumatā vuttā. Aṅgamaṅgānusārino
tika-abh04t:555_2: rasassa sāroti rasaharaṇīdhamanijālānusārena sarīrāvayave anuppaviṭṭhassa āhārarasassa
tika-abh04t:555_3: abbhantarāhārapaccayo sneho, yo loke rasadhātūti vuccati.
tika-abh04t:558_0: 646. “Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādivacanato
tika-abh04t:558_1: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ avasesamahābhūte nissayati, tehi upādārūpena ca nissīyatīti āha “nissayati ca nissīyati cā”ti.
tika-abh04t:559_0: 647. Mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññāvijahanato ekasmimpi kalāpe anekaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ atthīti
tika-abh04t:559_1: phoṭṭhabbasabhāvesuyeva anekesupi ārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu ābhogādivasena ekaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:559_2: viññāṇuppattihetu hotīti ayaṃ vicāro dassito. Itaresupi pana yathāyogaṃ dassetabbo.
tika-abh04t:559_3: Tattha rasārammaṇaṃ tāva indriyanissayaṃ allīyitvā viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato satipi
tika-abh04t:559_4: anekesaṃ rasānaṃ āpāthagamane ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekappakāraṃyeva yathāvuttanayena jivhāviññāṇuppattihetu
tika-abh04t:559_5: hoti, tathā gandhārammaṇaṃ. Rūpasaddārammaṇāni pana indriyanissayaṃ asampatvāva viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato
tika-abh04t:559_6: yogyadese avaṭṭhitāni yattakāni sahakārīpaccayantaragataṃ upakāraṃ labhanti, tattakāni
tika-abh04t:559_7: ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti na vattabbāni. Tathā hi saddo nigghosādiko
tika-abh04t:559_8: anekakalāpagato tathā vaṇṇopi sivikubbahananiyāmena ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti. Etthāpi
tika-abh04t:559_9: ca ābhujitavasena ārammaṇādhimattatāvasena anekakalāpasannipātepi katthaci viññāṇuppatti
tika-abh04t:559_10: hotiyeva. Pasādādhimattatā pittādivibandhābhāvena pasādassa tikkhatā. Kathaṃ pana
tika-abh04t:560_0: 651. Tādisāyāti yā pacurajanassa atthītipi na gahitā. Santī samānā. Evanti yathāsasambhārudakaṃ
tika-abh04t:560_1: sasambhārapathaviyā ābandhakaṃ, evaṃ paramatthudakaṃ paramatthapathaviyāti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:560_3: purimehi ca pathavīādīhi. Aphusitvā patiṭṭhā hoti, aphusitvā ābandhatīti iminā phusitabbaphusanakabhāvo
tika-abh04t:560_4: āpodhātuyaṃ natthīti phoṭṭhabbavasena ubhayadhammataṃ āha. Aññamaññaṃ nissayatā aññamaññanissayatā.
tika-abh04t:560_5: Atha vā aññamaññatā ca nissayatā ca aññamaññanissayatā. Yadi phoṭṭhabbāphoṭṭhabbadhātūnaṃ
tika-abh04t:560_6: phoṭṭhabbabhāvena vinā aññamaññanissayatā, pathavīādīnaṃ kakkhaḷādisabhāvo eva phoṭṭhabbabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:560_7: tabbirahena kathaṃ tesaṃ āpodhātuyā nissayādibhāvoti āha “avinibbhogavuttīsū”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:560_8: Aññamaññapaccayabhūtesūti etena upādārūpaṃ nivatteti. Atha vā pubbe aṭṭhakathādhippāye
tika-abh04t:560_9: ṭhatvā phoṭṭhabbāphoṭṭhabbadhātūnaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ aññamaññanissayataṃ vatvā idāni attano
tika-abh04t:560_10: adhippāye ṭhatvā avisesena taṃ dassento āha “avinibbhogavuttīsū”tiādi. Taṃyeva avisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh04t:560_11: aññamaññanissayataṃ daḷhaṃ katvā dassento “nāpi sahajātesū”tiādimāha. Tattha aphusanaṃ
tika-abh04t:560_12: tāva ekakalāpagatattā na vicāretabbaṃ, phusanaṃ pana kathanti? Ekakalāpagatattā eva.
tika-abh04t:560_13: Visuṃ siddhānaṃyeva hi visayamahābhūtānaṃ kāyappasādanissayabhūtesu phusanaṃ dissati.
tika-abh04t:561_0: Jhāyatīti paripaccati. Na uṇhā hutvāti etassa uṇhasabhāvā hutvāti ayamatthoti katvā
tika-abh04t:561_1: “tejosabhāvataṃyeva paṭikkhipatī”ti vuttaṃ. Uṇhapaṭipakkhattā sītassa uṇhatāya paṭikkhepe
tika-abh04t:561_2: sītatāsaṅkā siyāti āha “na sītattaṃ anujānātī”ti. Tejosabhāgataṃyeva vā sītatāyapi
tika-abh04t:561_3: dassetuṃ “na sītattaṃ anujānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “tejo eva hi sīta”nti. Mande
tika-abh04t:561_4: hi uṇhabhāve sītabuddhīti tejo eva hi sītaṃ. Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññāyatīti? Sītabuddhiyā
tika-abh04t:561_5: avavatthitabhāvato pārāpāraṃ viya. Tathā hi ātape ṭhatvā chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi
tika-abh04t:561_6: hoti, tattheva pathavīgabbhato niggatānaṃ uṇhabuddhīti. Yadi tejoyeva sītaṃ, uṇhabhāvena
tika-abh04t:561_7: saddhiṃ sītabhāvopi ekasmiṃ kalāpe upalabbheyyāti āha “sītuṇhānañcā”tiādi. Uṇhasītakalāpesu
tika-abh04t:561_8: sītuṇhānaṃ appavatti. Dvinnaṃ…pe… yujjati, na āpodhātuvāyodhātūnaṃ sītabhāveti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:561_9: Āpodhātuyā hi vāyodhātuyā sītabhāve uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe sītabhāvo
tika-abh04t:561_10: labbheyya, na pana labbhati. Na cettha āpodhātuadhike vāyodhātuadhike vā kalāpe sītabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:561_11: sakkā viññātuṃ tādisepi katthaci kalāpe alabbhamānattā sītabhāvassāti. Kharatādisabhāvādhikassa
tika-abh04t:561_12: bhūtasaṅghātassa davatādisabhāvādhikatāpatti bhāvaññathattaṃ. Taṃ pana yathā hoti,
tika-abh04t:562_1: Purimānampīti “yaṃ vā panaññampī”ti etasmā vacanato purimānaṃ anupādinnānaṃ saddāyatanakāyaviññattiādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:562_4: ādi-saddena ekantācittajaṃ gayhati. Tā jaratāaniccatā. Anekantesu na gahitāti ekantato
tika-abh04t:562_5: akammajesu saddāyatanādīsu acittajesu ca cakkhāyatanādīsu gahetvā catusamuṭṭhānikattā
tika-abh04t:563: 666. Anipphannattāti aññaṃ anapekkhitvā sabhāvato asiddhattaṃ. Tassāti viññattidvayassa.
tika-abh04t:567_0: 966. “Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ manasā viññāta”nti vacanato yadi viññātato aññaṃ diṭṭhādi na hotīti
tika-abh04t:567_1: “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ diṭṭha”ntiādinā pucchā na katā, evaṃ sante catukkabhāvo kathanti
tika-abh04t:567_2: anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “dassanādiggahaṇavisesato”ti. Dassanaṃ savanaṃ minitvā
tika-abh04t:567_3: jānanaṃ vijānanañcāti etasmā dassanādiggahaṇavisesato. Etena gāhakabhedena gahetabbabhedoti
tika-abh04t:567_4: dasseti. Idāni samukhenapi gahetabbabhedo labbhatīti dassetuṃ “diṭṭhā…pe… bhāvato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:569: 969. Tadidaṃ nayakaraṇaṃ chabbidhādīsu tīsu saṅgahesu yojitaṃ.
tika-abh04t:571_0: 975. Ekantato nīvaraṇattā middhassa “natthi nīvaraṇā”ti vacanena gahaṇanti dassetuṃ
tika-abh04t:571_1: “middhassapi nīvaraṇassā”ti vuttaṃ. Na ca rūpaṃ pahātabbaṃ nippariyāyappahānassa
tika-abh04t:571_2: idha adhippetattā. Ettha keci “nāmakāyarūpakāyagelaññasabhāvato duvidhaṃ middhaṃ.
tika-abh04t:571_3: Tattha purimaṃ ‘nīvaraṇā’ti vacanena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ rūpasabhāva”nti vadanti. Tattha
tika-abh04t:571_4: yaṃ taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ, tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvato itaraṃ
tika-abh04t:571_5: middhaṃ viyāti parikappitamiddhassapi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ nivattetunti tesaṃ
tika-abh04t:571_6: vacanassa nīvaraṇappahānavacanena virodhaṃ dassento “na ca rūpakāya”ntiādimāha. Atha
tika-abh04t:571_7: vā khīṇāsavānaṃ soppanasabhāvato soppassa ca middhahetukattā atthi middharūpanti
tika-abh04t:571_8: vādaṃ sandhāya uttaramāha “na ca rūpakāyagelañña”ntiādinā. Tattha middhameva soppahetūti
tika-abh04t:571_9: nāyaṃ avadhāraṇā icchitā, soppahetu eva middhanti pana icchitāti middhato aññopi
tika-abh04t:571_10: soppahetu atthi, ko pana so? Rūpakāyagelaññaṃ. Na ca rūpa…pe… vacanatoti yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t:572_0: Vacīghosādīti ādi-saddena huṃkārādisaddo saṅgayhati. Aṅguliphoṭādisaddo utusamuṭṭhānoyeva,
tika-abh04t:572_1: cittapaccayo pana hoti. Rūpabhāvamattānīti jarāmaraṇasabhāvānaṃ rūpānaṃ taṃdhammamattāni,
tika-abh04t:572_2: tato eva na jātiādidhammavantānīti āha “na sayaṃ sabhāvavantānī”ti. Yathā jarā aniccatā
tika-abh04t:572_3: ca rūpabhāvamattaṃ, evaṃ jātipīti jātiyā rūpabhāvamattatāya upasaṃharaṇattho tathā-saddo.
tika-abh04t:573_0: Tesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ. Saṅkhātādi-saddo viya abhinibbattita-saddopi vattamānakālikopi
tika-abh04t:573_3: abhinibbattivohārañca na labhanti, evamapi tesaṃ upādinnatā vattabbāti sambandho.
tika-abh04t:573_4: “Jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti vacanato tassa pariyāyataṃ vivarati “tesaṃ uppāde satī”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t:574_0: Yadi evanti yadi nissayapaṭibaddhavuttikā jātiādayo, evaṃ sati. “Mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti
tika-abh04t:574_1: vacanato bhūtanissitesu kevalo upādāyavohāroti upādāye nissitāpi aparena upādāya-saddena
tika-abh04t:574_2: visesetvā vattabbāti adhippāyena “upādāyupādāyabhāvo āpajjatī”ti āha. Kāraṇakāraṇepi
tika-abh04t:574_3: kāraṇe viya vohāro hoti “corehi gāmo daḍḍho”ti yathāti dassento “bhūta…pe… ttanato”ti
tika-abh04t:574_4: āha. Idāni paramparā vinā nippariyāyato uppādādīnaṃ bhūtapaṭibaddhabhāvaṃ saha nidassanena
tika-abh04t:574_6: ekasmiṃ kalāpe ekekāva vikārādayoti jīvitindriyaṃ viya kalāpānupālakaṃ kalāpavikārādibhāvato
tika-abh04t:575_1: anupalabbhamānatāya sasavisāṇaṃ viya kenaci na saṅkhatanti asaṅkhataṃ nāma siyāti
tika-abh04t:575_2: imissā āsaṅkāya nivattanavasena vuttaṃ. Atha vā rūpavikārādibhāvato rūpabhāvo viya
tika-abh04t:575_3: rūpe sati santi, asati na santīti siddhāya paṭiccasamuppannatāya sādhitā parinipphannatā
tika-abh04t:575_4: tesaṃ saṅkhatabhāvaṃ sādhentī asaṅkhatabhāvaṃ nivāraṇatthaṃ jāyatīti vuttaṃ “asaṅkhatabhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:580_1: veneyyajjhāsayavasena vā chandādayo “yevāpanā”ti vuttāti yevāpanakānaṃ paduddhārena
tika-abh04t:580_2: niddesānarahatāya kāraṇaṃ vuttanti hadayavatthussa tathā niddesānarahatāya kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:580_3: vadanto “sukhumupā…pe… hitassā”ti āha. Sukhumabhāvepi indriyādisabhāvāni upādāyarūpāni
tika-abh04t:580_4: ādhipaccādivasena pākaṭāni honti, na ataṃsabhāvaṃ sukhumupādāyarūpanti hadayavatthussa
tika-abh04t:580_5: paduddhārena kusalattikapadabhājane niddesānarahatā vuttā. Sukhumabhāvatoyeva hi
tika-abh04t:580_6: taṃ mahāpakaraṇepi “yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattantī”ti
tika-abh04t:580_7: nissitadhammamukhena dassitanti. Veneyyajjhāsayavasena vā hadayavatthu paduddhārena
tika-abh04t:580_8: na dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yena pana adhippāyena rūpakaṇḍe hadayavatthu duvidhena
tika-abh04t:580_9: rūpasaṅgahādīsu na vuttaṃ, so rūpakaṇḍavaṇṇanāya vibhāvito evāti. Nikkhipitvāti padassa
tika-abh04t:580_10: pakkhipitvāti atthoti adhippāyena “vitthāradesanaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ. Mūlādivasena
tika-abh04t:580_11: hi desitā kusalādidhammā taṃtaṃcittuppādādivasenapi desitā eva nāma honti taṃsabhāvānativattanatoti.
tika-abh04t:581_0: Mūlavasenāti suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanavasena. Etāni hetupadādīni hinoti phalaṃ etasmā
tika-abh04t:581_1: pavattatīti hetu, paṭicca etasmā etīti paccayo, janetīti janako, nibbattetīti nibbattakoti
tika-abh04t:581_2: sesānaṃ vacanattho. “Mūlaṭṭhassa…pe… vutta”nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu “pīḷanaṭṭho”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:581_3: viya mūlabhāvo mūlaṭṭho, tīṇi kusalamūlānīti ayañca mūlato nikkhepoti? Na, mūlassa
tika-abh04t:581_4: attho mūlaṭṭho, so eva mūlaṭṭhoti suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanaṭṭhena mūlasabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh04t:581_5: alobhādidhammānaṃ kusaladhammesu kiccavisesassa adhippetattā. Tenevāha “atthoti dhammakicca”nti.
tika-abh04t:581_6: Atha vā atthavasenāti “tīṇi kusalamūlānī”ti vuttānaṃ tesaṃ mūlānaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaatthavasena,
tika-abh04t:581_7: na gāthāya vuttaatthavasena. Yasmā pana so mūlaṭṭhoyeva ca hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “alobhādīna”ntiādi.
tika-abh04t:581_8: Alobhādayo viya vedanākkhandhādayopi adhikatattā taṃ-saddena paṭiniddisitabbāti vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:581_9: “te kusalamūlā taṃsampayuttā”ti. Tehi alobhādīhīti ettha ādi-saddena vā vedanākkhandhādayopi
tika-abh04t:582_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā”ti pucchitvā phassādibhedato cattāro khandhe dassetvā “ime
tika-abh04t:582_1: dhammā kusalā”ti vuttatā khandhā ca kusalanti vuttaṃ “khandhehi sabhāvato kusale
tika-abh04t:582_2: pariyādiyatī”ti. Vedanākkhandho vāti kusalaṃ…pe… viññāṇakkhandho vāti. Aññassa attano
tika-abh04t:582_3: phalassa. Mūlehi kusalānaṃ anavajjatāya hetuṃ dassetīti idaṃ na mūlānaṃ kusalassa
tika-abh04t:582_4: anavajjabhāvasādhakattā vuttaṃ, atha kho tassa anavajjatāya suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhakattā.
tika-abh04t:582_5: Yadi hi mūlehi kato kusalānaṃ anavajjabhāvo bhaveyya, taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassapi so bhaveyya,
tika-abh04t:582_6: mūlānaṃ vā tesaṃ paccayabhāvo na siyā, hoti ca so. Vuttañhetaṃ “hetū hetu…pe… paccayo”ti.
tika-abh04t:582_7: Kiñca bhiyyo kusalānaṃ viya akusalābyākatānampi tabbhāvo mūlapaṭibaddho bhaveyya,
tika-abh04t:582_8: tathā sati ahetukānaṃ akusalābyākatānaṃ tabbhāvo na siyā, tasmā kusalādīnaṃ yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho
tika-abh04t:582_9: kusalādibhāvo, na mūlapaṭibaddho, mūlāni pana kusalādīnaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanānīti
tika-abh04t:582_10: veditabbaṃ. Sahetukā hi dhammā viruḷhamūlā viya pādapā suppatiṭṭhitā thirā honti,
tika-abh04t:582_11: na tathā ahetukāti. Taṃsampayogakataṃ anavajjasabhāvanti idampi na anavajjasabhāvassa
tika-abh04t:582_12: taṃsampayogena nipphāditattā vuttaṃ, anavajjasabhāvaṃ pana visesetvā dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:582_13: Alobhādisampayogato hi kusalādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ anavajjabhāvo suppatiṭṭhito jāyati,
tika-abh04t:582_14: na ahetukābyākatānaṃ viya na suppatiṭṭhitoti. Yadi evaṃ na tesaṃ khandhānaṃ kusalādibhāvo
tika-abh04t:582_15: dassito siyā? Na, adhikārato kusalabhāvassa viññāyamānattā. Kamma-saddo viya vipākadhammatāvācino
tika-abh04t:582_16: na mūlakkhandhasaddā, so ca idha avisesato vuttoti āha “kammehi sukhavipākataṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-abh04t:582_19: yojetabbā. Yonisomanasikārato hi kusalā alobhādimūlakā, alobhādisampayogato ca lobhādipaṭipakkhasukhavipākāva jātāti.
tika-abh04t:583_0: 986. “Kasmā vutta”nti anuyuñjitvā codako “nanū”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh04t:583_1: Itaro yathāvuttamohassa idha sampayutta-saddena avuccamānataṃ “saccameta”nti sampaṭicchitvā
tika-abh04t:583_3: padhānabhāvena na gahito, nānantariyakatāya pana guṇabhāvena gahitoti. Aññattha abhāvāti
tika-abh04t:583_4: yathāvuttasampayuttato aññattha abhāvā. Na hi vicikicchuddhaccasahagato moho vicikicchuddhaccādidhammehi vinā hotīti.
tika-abh04t:584_1: pana tadavatthadhammavikārabhāvato taṃtaṃdhammaggahaṇena gahitāyeva. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:584_2: “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti, “rūpassa upacayo”ti ca ādi. Kesakumbhādi
tika-abh04t:584_3: sabbaṃ nāmaṃ nāmapaññatti, rūpavedanādiupādānā brahmavihārādigocarā upādāpaññatti
tika-abh04t:584_4: sattapaññatti, taṃtaṃbhūtanimittaṃ bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya gahetabbo jhānagocaraviseso
tika-abh04t:584_5: kasiṇapaññatti. Paramatthe amuñcitvā vohariyamānāti iminā vihāramañcādipaññattīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:584_6: sattapaññattisadisataṃ dasseti, yato tā sattapaññattiggahaṇena gayhanti. Hutvā abhāvapaṭipīḷanaavasavattanākārabhāvato
tika-abh04t:584_7: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ ākārabhāvato saṅkhatadhammānaṃ ākāravisesabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni viññattiādayo
tika-abh04t:584_8: viya vattabbāni siyuṃ, tāni pana nissayānapekkhaṃ na labbhantīti paññattisabhāvāneva
tika-abh04t:584_9: tajjāpaññattibhāvatoti na vuttāni, sattaghaṭādito visesadassanatthaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:584_10: visuṃ vuttānīti. Na hi ko…pe… vattuṃ yuttaṃ kusalattikassa nippadesattā.
tika-abh04t:585_0: 988. Bhavati etthāti bhūmi, nissayapaccayabhāvato sukhassa bhūmi sukhabhūmi. Sukhavedanāsahitaṃ
tika-abh04t:585_1: cittaṃ. Tassa bhūmibhedena niddhāraṇatthaṃ taṃnissayabhūtā sampayuttadhammā “kāmāvacare”ti
tika-abh04t:585_2: vuttā. Tassa vā ekadesabhūtassa samudāyabhāvato ādhāraṇabhāvena apekkhitvā taṃsamānabhūmi
tika-abh04t:585_3: “kāmāvacare”ti vuttā. Tattha “sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare”ti dvepi bhummavacanāni bhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:585_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānīti ubhayesampi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena atthayogaṃ dassetuṃ “sukhabhūmīti
tika-abh04t:585_5: kāmāvacarādayopi yujjantī”ti vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi cittaṃ, evaṃ sabbepi parittasukhena
tika-abh04t:585_6: sampayuttā dhammā tassa nissayabhāvato bhūmi kāmāvacarāti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi vā ayamattho
tika-abh04t:585_7: vuttoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Citta”nti hi cittuppādopi vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “cittaṃ uppannanti
tika-abh04t:585_8: ettha cittameva aggahetvā paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammehi saddhiṃyeva cittaṃ gahita”nti.
tika-abh04t:585_9: Evañca katvāti sukhabhūmiyanti cittuppādassa viññāyamānattā. Vibhāgadassanaṃ visesadassanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:585_10: Bhāsitabbaṃ bhāsitaṃ, tadeva atthoti bhāsitattho. Abhidheyyattho. Tadatthaviññāpanenāti
tika-abh04t:586_0: 994. Ko pana vādo khandhārammaṇassāti pubbāparabhāvena vattamāne arahato khandhe
tika-abh04t:586_1: ekattanayavasena santānato “amhākaṃ mātulatthero”tiādinā ālambitvā pavattamānaṃ upādānaṃ
tika-abh04t:586_2: tassa upādānakkhandheyeva gaṇhāti. Satipi taṃsantatipariyāpanne lokuttarakkhandhe
tika-abh04t:586_3: tattha pavattituṃ asamatthabhāvato kā pana kathā khandhe ārabbha pavattamāne. Etena
