tika-abh04t:586_4: natthi maggo visuddhiyā, natthi nibbānanti evamādivasena pavattā micchādiṭṭhiādayo
tika-abh04t:587: 998. Evaṃ saṃ…pe… lesikāti anupādāniyehi asaṃkilesikānaṃ bhedābhāvamāha.
tika-abh04t:588_0: 1006. Avijjamāno ca so niccādivipariyāsākāro cāti avi…pe… sākāroti padacchedo. Diṭṭhiyā
tika-abh04t:588_1: niccādiavijjamānākārena gayhamānattepi na tadākāro viya paramatthato avijjamāno,
tika-abh04t:588_2: atha kho vijjamāno kāyo sakkāyoti avijjamānaniccādivipariyāsākārato visesananti lokuttarā
tika-abh04t:588_3: na idaṃ visesanaṃ arahanti “santo vijjamāno kāyo sakkāyo”ti. Vatthu avisesitaṃ hotīti
tika-abh04t:588_4: idaṃ “satī kāye”ti ettha kāya-saddo samūhatthatāya anāmasitavisesaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
tika-abh04t:588_5: vadatīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Pasādakāyo viya kucchitānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya
tika-abh04t:588_6: kāyoti vuccatīti evaṃ pana atthe sati diṭṭhiyā vatthu visesitameva hotīti lokuttarāpi
tika-abh04t:588_7: apanītā. Na hi lokuttarā khandhā uppattiṭṭhānatāya “kāyo”ti vuccantīti. Suddhiyā
tika-abh04t:588_8: ahetubhūtenāti gosīlādinā, lokiyasīlena vā lokuttarasīlassa apadaṭṭhānena. “Avītikkamanīyatāsatataṃcaritabbatāhi
tika-abh04t:588_9: vā sīlaṃ, tapocaraṇabhāvena samādinnatāya vataṃ. Attano gavādibhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ,
tika-abh04t:588_11: vā sīlaṃ, taṃsamādānavato vesabhojanakiccacaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti vata”nti ca sīlabbatānaṃ visesaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh04t:589_0: 1007. Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti uppādoti na jananamattaṃ adhippetaṃ, atha kho
tika-abh04t:589_1: anirodhopīti “avighātaṃ janasaddo vadatī”ti āha. Tatthāyaṃ jana-sadde nayo, janitāti
tika-abh04t:589_2: janā, avihatāti attho. Puthū janā etesanti puthujjanāti puthusatthumānino sattā.
tika-abh04t:589_3: Abhisaṅkharaṇādiattho vā jana-saddo anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ. Khandhāyatanādīnaṃ savanādhīnattā
tika-abh04t:589_4: paññācakkhupaṭilābhassa tesaṃ savanābhāvadīpakaṃ “assutavā”ti idaṃ padaṃ andhataṃ vadati.
tika-abh04t:590_0: Kataṃ jānantīti attanā parehi ca kataṃ kusalākusalaṃ tehi nipphāditaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ
tika-abh04t:590_1: yāthāvato jānanti. Paresaṃ attanā, attano ca parehi kataṃ upakāraṃ yathāvuttākārena
tika-abh04t:590_2: pākaṭaṃ karonti. Byādhiādīhi dukkhitassa upaṭṭhānādikātabbaṃ, saṃsāradukkhadukkhitasseva
tika-abh04t:590_3: vā yathāvuttākārena kātabbaṃ karonti. Ariyakaradhammā ariyasaccānīti purimasaccadvayavasena
tika-abh04t:590_4: vuttaṃ “vipassiyamānā aniccādayo”ti. Pariññādivisesena vā passiyamānāti atthe sati
tika-abh04t:590_5: aniccādayoti ādi-saddena niccampi nibbānaṃ gahitanti catusaccavasenapi yojetabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t:591_0: Avasesakilesā kilesasotaṃ. Ñāṇanti yāthāvato jānanaṃ. Yathābhūtāvabodhena hi tassa
tika-abh04t:591_1: tāni anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditatāya santāne appavesārahāni “saṃvutāni pihitānī”ti
tika-abh04t:591_2: ca vuccanti. Tathāti sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ vippakārassa khamanākārena. Aviparītadhammā
tika-abh04t:591_3: etāya nijjhāyaṃ khamantīti paññā khantīti. Aduṭṭhasseva titikkhābhāvato tathāpavattā
tika-abh04t:591_4: khandhāti adosappadhānā khandhā vuttāti “adoso eva vā”ti tatiyo vikappo vutto. Satipaṭipakkhattā
tika-abh04t:591_7: nibbāne paṭilomabhāvo. Carimānulomañāṇavajjhataṇhādiko kilesoti vutto, paṭipadāñāṇadassanañāṇadassanāni
tika-abh04t:591_8: viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ kilesānaṃ appavattikaraṇabhāvena vattati, kilesavisayātilaṅghanabhāvena
tika-abh04t:592_0: Diṭṭhiyādīnaṃ samudayasabhāgatā kammassa vikuppādane sahakārīkāraṇabhāvo, dassanādibyāpāraṃ
tika-abh04t:592_1: vā attānañca dassanādikiccaṃ cakkhādīnanti evañhi yathātakkitaṃ attānaṃ rūpanti gaṇhāti.
tika-abh04t:592_2: Yathādiṭṭhanti takkadassanena yathopaladdhanti adhippāyo. Na hi diṭṭhigatiko rūpāyatanameva
tika-abh04t:592_3: attāti gaṇhātīti. Imissāpavattiyāti sāmaññena rūpaṃ attāti sabbasaṅgāhakabhūtāya
tika-abh04t:592_4: pavattiyā. Rūpe…pe… mānanti cakkhādīsu taṃsabhāvo attāti pavattamānaṃ attaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t:592_6: vaṇṇarukkhapupphamaṇīnaṃ. Nanu ca rukkhapupphamaṇiyo paramatthato na vijjanti? Saccaṃ
tika-abh04t:592_7: na vijjanti, tadupādānaṃ pana vijjatīti taṃ samuditādippakāraṃ idha rukkhādipariyāyena
tika-abh04t:592_8: vuttanti rukkhādinidassanepi na doso chāyārukkhādīnaṃ viya rūpassa attano ca saṃsāmibhāvādimattassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh04t:594_1: sāmatthiyato vā labbhamānatāya satipi āgatatte sarūpena pabhedena vā diṭṭhiādayo
tika-abh04t:594_2: viya anāgatattā lobhādayo “anāgatā”ti vuttāti āha “idha …pe… ssetu”nti. Atthato viññāyati
tika-abh04t:594_3: lobhādīhi sahajātā hutvā diṭṭhiyā eva pāḷiyaṃ vuttakilesabhāvato. Itipi attho yujjati
tika-abh04t:595_0: 1013. Ekade…pe… vadati avayavenapi samudāyo vuccatīti. Hetu etesaṃ atthīti vā hetukā.
tika-abh04t:595_1: Aniyatoti na avadhārito. Purimapadāvadhāraṇavasena gahetabbatthattā vivaraṇīyatthavā.
tika-abh04t:595_2: Atthato nikkhipitunti “tayo kusalahetū alobho adoso amoho”tiādīsu viya purimanayena
tika-abh04t:596: 1029. Abhiññāyuttavajjānaṃ mahaggatānaṃ parittārammaṇattābhāvā “mahaggatā vā iddhividhādayo”ti vuttaṃ. Atītaṃsañāṇassa kāmāvacarattā “ceto…pe… ñāṇasampayuttā”ti āha.
tika-abh04t:597_0: 1035. Anantare niyuttānīti cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ, tasmiṃ niyuttāni taṃ ekantena
tika-abh04t:597_1: nipphādanato anatikkamanakānīti attho. Vuttappakārassa anantarassa karaṇaṃ anantaraṃ,
tika-abh04t:597_2: taṃ sīlānīti yojetabbaṃ. Anekesu ānantariyesu katesu kiñcāpi balavatoyeva paṭisandhidānaṃ,
tika-abh04t:597_3: na itaresaṃ, attanā pana kātabbakiccassa teneva katattā tassa vipākassa upatthambhanavasena
tika-abh04t:597_4: pavattanato na itarāni tena nivāritaphalāni nāma honti, ko pana vādo paṭipakkhesu
tika-abh04t:597_6: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu anekesu ānantariyesu katesu balavaṃyeva paṭisandhidāyakanti tena
tika-abh04t:597_7: itaresaṃ vipāko paṭibāhito hotīti āha “na ca tesa”ntiādi. Tañca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh04t:598_0: Atthato āpannaṃ aggahetvā yathārutavaseneva pāḷiyā atthaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ vādānaṃ tapparabhāvena
tika-abh04t:598_1: pavattiṃ sandhāya ahetukavādādīnaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “purimavādo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aniyyānikaniyyānikabhedaṃ
tika-abh04t:598_2: pana sambhārakammaṃ bandhamokkhahetūti bandhamokkhahetuṃ paṭisedhentopi kammaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh04t:598_3: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ pana vipākassa kammakilesasamādhipaññānaṃ hetubhāvato vipākopi
tika-abh04t:598_4: bandhamokkhahetūti “natthi hetūti vadanto ubhayaṃ paṭibāhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kammaṃ
tika-abh04t:598_5: paṭisedhentenapi vipāko paṭisedhito hoti, vipākaṃ paṭisedhentenapi kammanti tayopi
tika-abh04t:598_6: ete vādā atthato ubhayapaṭisedhakāti veditabbā. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhinti ahetukavādādipaṭisaṃyutte
tika-abh04t:598_8: cintentassa tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, javanāni
tika-abh04t:598_9: javanti. Paṭhamajavane satekiccho hoti, tathā dutiyādīsu. Sattame atekicchabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:598_10: patto nāma hoti. Yā evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “niyatamicchādiṭṭhi”nti.
tika-abh04t:599_0: 1039. Sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatādivisiṭṭhabhāvepi maggapaccayassa sampayogavisiṭṭhatādīpaneneva
tika-abh04t:599_2: vuttaṃ. Magga…pe… dassetuṃ, na pana maggaṅgānaṃ aññamaññaṃ maggapaccayabhāvābhāvatoti
tika-abh04t:599_3: adhippāyo. Evaṃ satīti yadi maggaṅgānaṃ maggapaccayalābhitāya pakāsano paṭhamanayo,
tika-abh04t:599_4: evaṃ sante. Maggaṅgānipi vedanādayo viya maggahetukabhāvena vattabbattā amaggasabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh04t:599_5: alobhādīnaṃ tadaññesaṃ tadubhayasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayabhāvadīpane tatiyanaye
tika-abh04t:599_6: viya na ṭhapetabbānīti āha “ṭhapetvāti na vattabbaṃ siyā”ti. Pubbeti purimanaye.
tika-abh04t:600_0: Dutiyanayepīti pi-saddena paṭhamanayaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Tena sammādiṭṭhiyā purimasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:600_1: nayadvaye ṭhapitattā tassa sahetukabhāvadassano tatiyanayo āraddhoti dasseti. Tatiyanaye
tika-abh04t:600_2: sammādiṭṭhiyā sahetukabhāvadassanaṃ anicchanto codako “kathaṃ dassito”ti codetvā
tika-abh04t:600_3: “nanū”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Itaro “yathā hī”tiādinā dassanena pahātabbahetubhāvena
tika-abh04t:600_5: dassanena pahātabbahetukasaṅgaho viya maggahetubhāvena vuttāyapi sammādiṭṭhiyā maggahetukabhāvopi
tika-abh04t:601_0: Tato aññassevāti tato sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātahetuto aññassa alobhādosasseva. Aññenāti
tika-abh04t:601_1: “maggo hetū”ti ito aññena. Alobhādosānaṃyeva adhippetattā tesaṃyeva āveṇikena maggahetūti
tika-abh04t:601_2: iminā pariyāyena. Sādhāraṇena pariyāyenāti tiṇṇampi hetūnaṃ adhippetattā maggāmaggasabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh04t:601_3: sādhāraṇena maggahetumaggahetūti iminā pariyāyena. Tesanti hetūnaṃ. Aññesanti hetusampayuttānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:601_5: ca sesadhammānaṃ sahetukabhāvadassanavasena pavattā dutiyatatiyanayā “sarūpato hetuhetumantadassana”nti
tika-abh04t:601_6: vuttā. Tathāadassanatoti sarūpena adassanato. Atthena…pe… gamanatoti “maggaṅgāni
tika-abh04t:601_7: ṭhapetvā taṃsampayutto”ti vacanato maggasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ maggapaccayatāsaṅkhāto
tika-abh04t:601_8: sampayuttānaṃ hetubhāvo sarūpato dassito. Maggahetubhūtāya pana sammādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttānaṃ
tika-abh04t:602_0: 1040. Asabhāvadhammo garukātabbo na hotīti “sabhāvadhammo”ti vuttaṃ. Teneva paṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:602_2: vakkhati. Maggādīni ṭhapetvāti maggādīni pahāya. Aññesanti maggādito aññesaṃ. Adhi…pe…
tika-abh04t:602_4: ca paññādhurattā vīmaṃsādhipatissa sesādhipatīnaṃ padhānatā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t:603_1: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Laddhokāsaṃ yaṃ bhavissatīti laddhokāsaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pāpuṇissati.
tika-abh04t:603_2: Kappasahassātikkame avassaṃ uppajjanavipākattā tadapi…pe… vuccatīti. Aladdhattalābhatāya
tika-abh04t:603_3: uppādādikkhaṇaṃ appattassa vipākassa anuppannabhāvo natthibhāvo pākaṭabhāvābhāvatoti
tika-abh04t:603_4: vuttaṃ “natthi nāma na hotīti anuppanno nāma na hotī”ti. Tatthāti arūpabhavaṅge.
tika-abh04t:604_2: uppannampi kammaṃ anuppannasamānanti “okāso na bhaveyyā”ti etassa samatthatā na siyāti
tika-abh04t:604_3: atthamāha. Tena apacayagāmikammakiccassa okāsābhāvo dassito. Pubbe niratthakattā
tika-abh04t:604_4: uppattiyā okāso na bhaveyyāti payojanābhāvato kammuppattiyā okāsābhāvo vutto. “Vipākato
tika-abh04t:604_5: aññassa pavattiokāso na bhaveyyā”ti iminā asambhavatoti ayametesaṃ viseso. Dhuvavipākassa
tika-abh04t:604_8: savisesanadhuvavipākatā vuttā. Ettha ca “pañca ānantariyakammānī”ti nidassanamattaṃ
tika-abh04t:604_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyāpi dhuvavipākattā. Yassa kammassa katattā yo vipāko
tika-abh04t:604_10: niyogato uppajjissati, so tassa anāgatakālepi uppādivohāraṃ labhati. So ca uppādivohāro
tika-abh04t:604_11: āyūhitakammavasena vuccamāno bhāvinā āyūhitabhāvena maggo anuppannoti ettha vuttoti
tika-abh04t:605_0: 1050. Upādānehi ādinnāti sambandho. Aññeti upādānārammaṇehi aññe anupādāniyāti attho.
tika-abh04t:605_1: Ādikena gahaṇenāti “ahaṃ phalaṃ sacchākāsi”nti evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇasaṅkhātena gahaṇena.
tika-abh04t:605_2: Idāni upetatthadīpakassa upa-saddassa vasena upādinna-saddassa atthaṃ vattuṃ “upādinnasaddena
tika-abh04t:605_3: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nibbānassa anajjhattabhāvato “amaggaphaladhammāyeva vuttā”ti
tika-abh04t:608: 1062. Mettāya ayanaṃ upagamanaṃ mettāyanaṃ, tañca attano santāne mettāya lābho uppādanaṃ sattānaṃ anupagamo atthato majjanamevāti “mettā, medana”nti vatvā “sinehana”nti āha.
tika-abh04t:609_0: 1065. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye cittaṃ saṃrañjatīti cittassa saṃrañjanaṃ. Taṇhāvicaritādīti
tika-abh04t:609_1: ādi-saddena esanādayo saṅgahitā. Taṇhāya vipulatā visayavasena pavattivasena vā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t:609_2: Aniccādisabhāvassa rūpādikassa niccādito gahaṇaṃ abhiniveso visesato taṇhāvasena
tika-abh04t:609_3: hoti taṇhārahitāya diṭṭhiyā abhāvāti upacāravasena nimittassa kattubhāvamāha “niccādito
tika-abh04t:609_4: gaṇhantī visaṃvādikā hotī”ti. Pākaṭena saddena labbhamānattā yathārutaviññāyamānattā
tika-abh04t:609_5: ca visattikāsaddassa visatasabhāvo “padhāno attho”ti vutto. “Antalikkhacaro pāso,
tika-abh04t:609_6: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso. Tena taṃ bādhayissāmī”tiādivasena mārena gahitatāya.
tika-abh04t:610_1: uppannakopo viya sattesu atthācaraṇādinā āropanādhippāyesuyeva tadajjhāropanavasena
tika-abh04t:610_2: pavatto yadipi anāyatanuppattiyā aṭṭhānāghātoyeva hoti, sattavisayattā pana sati
tika-abh04t:610_3: cittassa ekantabyāpattiyaṃ kammapathabhedo hotiyevāti sakkā viññātuṃ, aṭṭhānuppattiyaṃ
tika-abh04t:610_4: panassa na siyā kammapathabhedoti āha “sattesu uppanno aṭṭhānakopo karotī”ti. Paṭighādipadānaṃ
tika-abh04t:611_0: 1091. Dve dhammā tayo dhammāti saddantarasannidhānena paricchedavato bahuvacanassa
tika-abh04t:611_1: dassanato “aparicchedena bahuvacanenā”ti vuttaṃ. Uddeso katoti iti-saddo hetuattho.
tika-abh04t:611_2: Tena bahuvacanena uddesakaraṇaṃ bahuvacanena pucchāya kāraṇanti dīpeti. Uddesānuvidhāyinī
tika-abh04t:611_3: hi pucchāti. Tathā hi saṅkhāparicchinne uddese “katame vā tayo”ti saṅkhāparicchinnāva
tika-abh04t:611_4: pucchā karīyatīti. Uddesena dhammānaṃ atthitāmattavacanicchāyaṃ sabhāvabhūmikāraṇaphalādiparicchedo
tika-abh04t:611_5: viya saṅkhāparicchedopi na kātabboti adhippāyena “aniddhāritaparicchede”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:611_6: “Apaccayā dhammā”ti padato pana heṭṭhā anekabhedabhinnā dhammā aparicchedena bahuvacaneneva
tika-abh04t:611_7: uddiṭṭhā, uddhañca tathā uddisīyantīti taṃ sotapatitatāya bhedābhāvepi paramatthato
tika-abh04t:611_9: upacaritabhedegahite padadvayena atthi kāci bhedamattāti aparicchedena bahuvacanena
tika-abh04t:611_10: uddeso katoti yuttaṃ siyā. Uddesānusārīni pucchānigamanānīti tānipi tathā pavattāni.
tika-abh04t:611_12: dhātu icceva kato paramatthato bhedābhāvadīpanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathetukāmatāvasena
tika-abh04t:611_13: pucchanto yassa katheti, tena kātabbapucchāya karaṇato taggataṃ ajānanaṃ saṃsayaṃ
tika-abh04t:611_14: vā anuvidhāyayeva pucchatīti “sabhāva…pe… ajānantassa vasena pucchā karīyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:611_15: Niddesato pubbetiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ pucchānusandhiṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-abh04t:612_3: taṃtaṃpaññattiyañca taṃtaṃvohāravasena pavattena āvajjanena ca yathāvuttaviññāṇānaṃ
tika-abh04t:612_4: purecārikena kāmāvacaradhammā na viññeyyā. Itarenāti parittārammaṇena. Kāmāvacarānameva
tika-abh04t:612_5: ārammaṇānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Rūpārammaṇādīhi viññāṇehi tattha rūpārammaṇena
tika-abh04t:612_6: viññāṇenapi saddādīnaṃ aviññeyyatā rūpassa ca viññeyyatā. Evaṃ sesesupi yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t:612_7: Cakkhudvārikena saddādīnaṃ aviññeyyatā rūpassa viññeyyatātiādinā dvārabhedavasena
tika-abh04t:612_10: lokuttarā kāmāvacarato ñāṇavippayuttakusalakiriyehi akusalehi ca aviññeyyāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:613_1: diṭṭhisahito sabbakāmāvacaradhammavisayo ca lobho kāmāsavo bhavituṃ yuttoti vuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:613_2: “bhavāsavaṃ…pe… siyā”ti. Kāmāsavabhavāsavavinimuttassa hi lobhassa abhāvaṃ sayameva
tika-abh04t:613_3: vakkhatīti. Pāḷiyanti aṭṭhakathākaṇḍapāḷiyaṃ. Tattha yathā “kāmāsavo aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittuppādesu
tika-abh04t:613_4: uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ “bhavāsavo aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittuppādesu uppajjatī”ti
tika-abh04t:613_6: “bhavāsavo…pe… yuttesu eva uppajjatī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti sāvadhāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā
tika-abh04t:613_7: ca vakkhati “bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu avijjāsavena saddhiṃ ekadhāva
tika-abh04t:613_8: ekato uppajjatī”ti. Sopi rāgoti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo. Kāmabhavapatthanā viya
tika-abh04t:613_10: vattabbapariyāyo atthīti “sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhavarāgavasena patthanā bhavāsavo
tika-abh04t:613_11: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, na tesaṃ idha adhippetabhavāsavabhāvadassanatthanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:613_12: adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “rūpārūpasaṅkhāte kammato ca upapattito ca duvidhepi
tika-abh04t:613_13: bhave āsavo bhavāsavo”ti vuttanti. Tattha kāmabhavapatthanāya tāva kāmāsavabhāvo
tika-abh04t:613_14: hotu, rūpārūpabhavesu sassatābhinivesasahagatarāgassa kathanti? Sopi yathāvuttavisaye
tika-abh04t:613_15: kāmanavasena pavattito kāmāsavoyeva nāma. Sabbepi hi tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyaṭṭhena
tika-abh04t:613_16: kāmāti. Na cettha aniṭṭhappasaṅgo diṭṭhivippayuttalobhassa bhavāsavabhāvena visuṃ
tika-abh04t:613_17: uddhaṭattā. Avassañcetamevaṃ viññātabbaṃ, itarathā rūpārūpabhavesu ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatassapi
tika-abh04t:613_18: lobhassa bhavāsavabhāvo āpajjeyyāti. Kāmāsavādayo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikāsavabhāvena dvidhā vuttā.
tika-abh04t:614: 1103. Idha pāḷiyāpi bhavāsavavinimuttalobhassa kāmāsavabhāvo na na sakkā yojetunti dassetuṃ “kāmāsavaniddese cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Dhammacchando saddhā”ti keci.
tika-abh04t:615_1: paramatthato abhāvā. Rūpe…pe… viññāṇe vā pana na patiṭṭhāti rūpādīnaṃ aviparītasabhāvamatte
tika-abh04t:615_2: aṭṭhatvā sayaṃ samāropitassa tesu parikappanāmattasiddhassa kassaci ākārassa abhinivesanato.
tika-abh04t:615_3: Tenevāha “tato aññaṃ katvā”ti. Tato upādānakkhandhato. Vedanādayopi hi keci diṭṭhigatikā
tika-abh04t:615_4: aniccāti passantīti. Tatoti vā sarīrasaṅkhātarūpakkhandhato. “Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra”nti
tika-abh04t:615_5: hi vuttaṃ. Hotīti bhavati sassataṃ attāti attho. Aññanti brahmaissarādito aññaṃ.
tika-abh04t:616_0: Arūpabhavo viya rūparāgappahānena rūpabhavo kāmarāgappahānena pattabbo. Rūpībrahmānañca
tika-abh04t:616_1: pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pahīyati, na vimānādīsu rāgoti so akāmarāgoti katvā kāmāsavo
tika-abh04t:616_2: na hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ. Ṭīkākārehi pana kāmāsavabhavāsavavinimuttalobhābhāvadassanena
tika-abh04t:616_4: sabbo lobho kāmāsavoti dassito. Tattha yuttaṃ vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Siyā āsavasampayutto
tika-abh04t:616_5: kāmarāgena bhavarāgena vā sahuppattiyaṃ, siyā āsavavippayutto tadaññarāgena sahuppattiyaṃ,
tika-abh04t:617_2: hi sarīraṃ vuccatīti. Mānaṃ jappetīti mānaṃ pavatteti karoti. Pavatto māno pavattamāno.
tika-abh04t:617_3: Puggalavisesanti seyyassa seyyotiādibhedaṃ puggalavisesaṃ. Seyyaṃ bhinditvā pavattamāno
tika-abh04t:617_4: seyyamāno. Tiṇṇanti seyyassa seyyādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā aññaṃ puggalaṃ
tika-abh04t:617_5: anissāya vuttānaṃ. Seyyādivasena attano mananaṃ paggaho māno, tassa karaṇaṃ seyyohamasmītiādipavattiyevāti
tika-abh04t:618_0: 1140. Sabbopi lobho abhijjhāsabhāvoti abhijjhā āsavadvayasabhāvā, kāmarāgo kāmāsavasabhāvo
tika-abh04t:618_1: evāti āsavadvayaekāsavabhāvo abhijjhākāmarāgānaṃ viseso vutto. Na abhijjhā ca dhammā
tika-abh04t:618_2: ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avijjañca noāsavasabhāvā. Abhijjhā ca āsavadvayasabhāvā eva, naabhijjhāsabhāvo
tika-abh04t:618_3: ca lobho natthīti adhippāyena “noāsavalobhassa sabbhāvo vicāretabbo”ti āha. Gaṇanāya
tika-abh04t:618_4: hetuyā sattāti vuttanti pañhāvārapāṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi “āsavo dhammo
tika-abh04t:618_5: āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Āsavo dhammo noāsavassa dhammassa. Āsavo
tika-abh04t:618_6: dhammo āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca. Noāsavo dhammo noāsavassa. Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa.
tika-abh04t:618_7: Noāsavo dhammo āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca. Āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā noāsavassa hetupaccayena
tika-abh04t:618_8: paccayo”ti imesaṃ vārānaṃ vasena “gaṇanāya sattā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yadi noāsavasabhāvopi
tika-abh04t:618_9: lobho siyā, diṭṭhisampayuttacittassa vasena “āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā mohayathāvuttalobhā
tika-abh04t:618_10: āsavassa dhammassa diṭṭhiyā hetupaccayena paccayo”ti sattamo, pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ sattamaṃ
tika-abh04t:618_11: aṭṭhamaṃ katvā “āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
tika-abh04t:618_12: paccayo”ti navamo pañho vucceyya, na pana vuttoti. Evaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttalobhassa
tika-abh04t:618_13: noāsavabhāvābhāvaṃ dassetvā itarassapi taṃ dassetuṃ “diṭṭhivippayutte cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:619_0: 1162. Yathārūpe rūpappabandhe vattamāne puggalo gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdatīti vuccati,
tika-abh04t:619_1: tathā visadarūpassa uppādakaṃ cittaṃ iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ. Taṃ pana kusalato kiriyato
tika-abh04t:619_2: ca pañcamajjhānacittaṃ abhiññāppattaṃ appattañca bhinditvā sattapaññāsa javanāni
tika-abh04t:619_4: visadāni rūpāni na samuṭṭhapeti na upatthambheti cāti vuttaṃ “iriyāpathaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonta”nti.
tika-abh04t:620_0: 1163. Vipakkhepi bhāvato anekantikattā rūpattāsādhakattaṃ. Garubhāvappatti lahutāviraho
tika-abh04t:620_1: daṭṭhabbo. Satipi aññesampi akusalādīnaṃ lahutāvirahe thinamiddhānaṃ ekantato lahutāpaṭipakkhattā
tika-abh04t:620_2: kāraṇānurūpattā ca phalassa “thinamiddhasamuṭṭhitarūpehī”ti vuttaṃ. Na jāgara…pe…
tika-abh04t:620_3: santatinti etena nāmakāye supanassa asiddhataṃ dasseti. Middhassa phalattāti ettha
tika-abh04t:620_4: middhaṃyeva niddākāraṇanti nāyaṃ niyamo icchito, niddākāraṇameva pana middhanti niyamo
tika-abh04t:620_5: icchitoti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi khīṇāsavānaṃ niddāya middhato aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ karajakāyassa
tika-abh04t:621_0: Chādanaṃ, avattharaṇaṃ vā onāho, so rūpasseva sabhāvoti parassa āsaṅkaṃ manasi katvā
tika-abh04t:621_1: āha “tena saha vuttā onāhapariyonāhā cā”ti. Asaṅkocavasena visadā pavatti vipphārikabhāvo.
tika-abh04t:621_2: Āvaraṇabhāvo viyāti etena āvaraṇasabhāvattepi middhassa tabbidhuro anaññasādhāraṇattā
tika-abh04t:621_3: onahanādibhāvoti dasseti. Sāmaññañhi pañcannampi kāmacchandādīnaṃ āvaraṇasabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:621_4: āvaraṇabhāvasadisassa onahanādibhāvassa nāmakāye labbhamānassa gahitatāti etthādhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:622_0: Pānanti anuyogoti ca taṃkiriyāsādhikā cetanā adhippetāti surāpānassa surā…pe… yogassa
tika-abh04t:622_1: ca akusalabhāvena upakkilesadubbalīkaraṇabhāvo yuttoti vutto. “Surāmerayassa ajjhoharaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:622_2: pānaṃ pamādaṭṭhānānuyogo cā”ti parassa adhippāyo. Nīvaraṇaṃ hutvā vātiādinā idaṃ
tika-abh04t:622_4: katthaci adiṭṭhapayogassa asampayuttassa rūpassa yathālābhato gahaṇaṃ ñāyoyeva na
tika-abh04t:622_6: dassitā, na rūpanti thinaṃ viya middhampi arūpamevāti viññāyatī”ti. Yanti yena vacanena.
tika-abh04t:623_0: Tenāti tena rūpārammaṇassa chandarāgassa pahānavacanena. Rūpappahānato aññoti katvā
tika-abh04t:623_1: rūpe chandarāgappahānaṃ “añño kāro”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññathā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:623_2: Idantiādinā “taṃ pajahathā”ti pāḷiyā na nippariyāyappahānaṃ adhippetanti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:623_3: Arūpasseva yujjatīti sududdasaṃ dūraṅgamādippavattakaṃ cittaṃ taṃsampayutto arūpadhammoyeva
tika-abh04t:623_4: vibandhituṃ samatthoti dasseti. Cetaso pariyuṭṭhānanti kusalacittassa gahaṇaṃ. Nīvaraṇāni
tika-abh04t:623_5: hi uppajjamānāni uppajjituṃ appadānena kusalavāraṃ gaṇhantīti vuccanti. Gahaṇañcettha
tika-abh04t:624_0: 1176. Uddhaccaṃ kukkuccañca saha vuttanti uddesapucchānigamane sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ
tika-abh04t:624_1: pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ uddhaccassa kukkuccena vinābhāvakāraṇaṃ vatvā “bhinditvā vutta”nti
tika-abh04t:624_2: vuttaṃ, taṃ “nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā cā”ti padassa niddese uddhaccakukkuccānaṃ
tika-abh04t:624_3: visuṃ niddiṭṭhataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kāmacchandassa ukkaṭṭhanīvaraṇatā orambhāgiyabhāvo.
tika-abh04t:624_4: So hi rūparāgārūparāgappakārakāmacchandaṃ upādāya tato tibbakiccatāya “ukkaṭṭhanīvaraṇa”nti
tika-abh04t:624_5: vuccati. Kāmacchandanīvaraṇantveva lobho vutto, na bhinditvā. Kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa
tika-abh04t:624_6: ca anavasesato anāgāmimaggena pahāne vuccamāne catutthamaggavajjho lobho anīvaraṇasabhāvo
tika-abh04t:624_7: āpajjatīti āha “yadi…pe… siyā”ti. Nonīvaraṇo rūparāgārūparāgappakāro lobhadhammo
tika-abh04t:624_8: nīvaraṇassa avijjādikassa. Ādi-saddena “nonīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa ca nonīvaraṇassa
tika-abh04t:624_9: ca dhammassa. Nīvaraṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa dhammassa. Nīvaraṇo ca
tika-abh04t:624_10: nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa. Nīvaraṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa
tika-abh04t:624_11: ca nonīvaraṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ime pañhe saṅgaṇhāti. Cattārīti
tika-abh04t:624_12: vuttaṃ nīvaraṇapadamūlakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nonīvaraṇamūlakassa ekassa vasena. Nīvaraṇanonīvaraṇatadubhayamūlakānaṃ
tika-abh04t:624_13: pana tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena navāti vuttaṃ. Tasmāti yathādassitanayāya pāḷiyā abhāvā
tika-abh04t:626: 1221. Cittena paraloke ṭhitoti yasmiṃ loke nibbattivasena sayaṃ ṭhito, tato aññaṃ lokaṃ paralokoti cittena gahetvā ṭhito.
tika-abh04t:627: 1236. Na hi purimehītiādinā paṭhamamaggādīhi samugghāṭitaapāyagamanīyabhāvādikā eva rāgādayo dutiyamaggādīhi pahīyantīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:628: 1287. Upaṭṭhitepi duggatinimittādike na tathā tibbo lobho uppajjati, yathā sugatinimittādiketi āha “balavanikantivirahenā”ti.
tika-abh04t:629_0: 1301. Ekasmiṃ cittuppāde uppannānaṃ viya ekasmiṃ santāne uppannānampi sahapavattipariyāyo
tika-abh04t:629_1: atthīti pahānekaṭṭhena rāgaraṇena vicikicchuddhaccasahagatamohassa saraṇatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t:629_2: Uddhaccavicikicchāhi yo moho sahajāto bhave, sopi rāgena saraṇo pahānekaṭṭhabhāvatoti.
tika-abh04t:629_4: akusalassa saṅgahaṇavasena pavatto saraṇapadaniddeso araṇavibhaṅgasuttenapi aññadatthu
tika-abh04t:629_5: saṃsandatīti dassetuṃ “araṇavibhaṅgasutte”tiādimāha. Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sampayogappahānekaṭṭhabhāvadīpanena
tika-abh04t:629_6: rāgādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ vā akusaladhammānaṃ saraṇabhāvadassanaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā yathādassitadhammānaṃ
tika-abh04t:629_9: nippariyāyato saraṇabhāvo viya araṇabhāvopi akusaladhammānaṃyevāti tathāpavattāya
tika-abh04t:631_0: 1313. Ahaṃ-saddena hetubhūtena yo atthoti ettha ahaṃ-saddo atthoti adhippeto. Atthāvabodhanattho
tika-abh04t:631_1: hi saddappayogo. Atthaparādhīno kevalo atthapadatthako, so padatthavipariyesakārinā
tika-abh04t:631_2: pana iti-saddena parato payuttena saddapadatthako jāyati yathā gāvīti ayamāhāti go-saddaṃ
tika-abh04t:631_3: āhāti viññāyati. Tena viññattivikārasahito saddo paññattīti dasseti. Tathā hi “buddhassa
tika-abh04t:631_4: bhagavato vohāro lokiyasote paṭihaññatī”tiādinā paññattiyā vacanabhāvaṃ sādhayati.
tika-abh04t:631_5: Aññathātiādinā paññattiyā asaddasabhāvatte dosamāha. Adhivacanāditā siyā, tathā ca
tika-abh04t:631_6: adhivacanādīnaṃ adhivacanapathādito viseso na siyāti dukoyeva na sambhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:631_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakasantatipariyāpanne rūpādayo dhamme samūhato santānato ca ekattavasena
tika-abh04t:631_8: gahetvā ahanti vohariyamānā upādāpaññatti saṅkhāyati voharīyatīti saṅkhāti adhippetā.
tika-abh04t:631_9: Tathā sesesu yathāsambhavaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “dattoti ettāvatā sattapaññattiṃ
tika-abh04t:631_10: dassetvā aññampi upādāpaññattiṃ dassetu”ntiādi. Padatthassāti ahaṃ-saddādipadābhidheyyassa,
tika-abh04t:631_11: paramatthassa vā. Adhivacanaṃ saddoti adhippāyena “vadantenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. So hi
tika-abh04t:631_12: attanā ñāpetabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ ñāto eva ñāpetīti aggahitasambandhassa na saddo atthappakāsanasamatthoti
tika-abh04t:631_13: vuttaṃ “pubbe gahitasaññenā”ti. Visesena ñāyatīti samaññāti saṃ-saddassa visesatthataṃ āha.
tika-abh04t:632_0: Karīyatīti idaṃ imassatthassa adhivacananti evaṃ nikkhipīyati. Nāmabhūtaṃ vacanameva
tika-abh04t:632_1: taṃ taṃ atthaṃ niddhāretvā sahetukaṃ katvā vadati byañjayati cāti āha “nāmamicceva
tika-abh04t:632_2: vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Tenevāha “na hi pathavī”tiādi. Pathavīsaṅkhātanti pathavī-saddābhidheyyaṃ.
tika-abh04t:633_0: Ācariyāti aṭṭhakathāya saṃvaṇṇanakā ācariyā, na aṭṭhakathācariyāti adhippāyena vadati.
tika-abh04t:633_1: Mātikāyanti mātikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ. Tenāti mātikāvaṇṇanāvacanena. Imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya
tika-abh04t:633_2: ca atthadassanassa etassa yathāvuttassa ācariyavādassa virodho siyā, tameva virodhaṃ
tika-abh04t:633_3: “na hī”tiādinā vivarati. Tattha adhivacanapathādibhāvena vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ pakāsakassa
tika-abh04t:633_4: sabhāvassa viññattivikārasahitasaddasseva vacanamattaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiādi
tika-abh04t:633_5: yujjati, na asabhāvassāti adhippāyena “uppādavayakiccarahitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh04t:634_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ puggalapaññattivaṇṇanāyaṃ. Nanu ca tattha upanidhāpaññattiādayo aparāpi
tika-abh04t:634_2: paññattiyo vuttā, atha kasmā “cha paññattiyova vuttā”ti vuttaṃ? Saccaṃ vuttā, tā
tika-abh04t:634_3: pana vijjamānapaññattiādīsu chasu eva antogadhāti “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vijjamānapaññattiādayo
tika-abh04t:635_0: Tattha rūpādi viya avijjamānattā paññāpitabbattā ca avijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānassa
tika-abh04t:635_1: ca sattarathādiatthassa paññāpanato avijjamānapaññattīti evaṃ avijjamānapaññattivacanena
tika-abh04t:635_2: yathāvuttā duvidhāpi paññatti saṅgahitāti āha “avijjamāna…pe… vuttā”ti. Itarehīti
tika-abh04t:635_3: vijjamānapaññattiādīhi avasesehi pañcahi, rūpavedanādīnaṃ sattarathādīnañca atthānaṃ
tika-abh04t:635_4: pakārehi ñāpanato taṃtaṃvācako saddoyeva visayabhedato vijjamānapaññattiādibhedā
tika-abh04t:635_5: paññatti saṅkhādīhi dasahi padehi vuttāti ayaṃ purimo attho, so ca yathārutavaseneva
tika-abh04t:635_6: pāḷiyā viññāyamānattā “pāḷianugato ujuko”ti ca vutto. Yadi cātiādīsu sattādikā yathāvuttappakārā
tika-abh04t:635_7: upādāpaññatti yadi avijjamānapaññatti, sā atthīti na vattabbā. Avijjamānā ca sā paññāpitabbato
tika-abh04t:635_8: paññatti cāti tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ laddhīti adhippāyo. Idāni tassā laddhiyā vasena paññattipathāti
tika-abh04t:635_10: cā”tiādinā. Tatoti yasmā avijjamānattā paññāpitabbattā ca sattarathādīnaṃ avijjamānapaññattibhāvo
tika-abh04t:635_11: viya vijjamānattā paññāpitabbattā ca sabbesaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ vijjamānapaññattibhāvo
tika-abh04t:636_1: kāraṇamāsaṅkati. “Nāpī”tiādinā tassa kāraṇassa asiddhataṃ dasseti. “Purisoti saṅkhā”tiādīsu
tika-abh04t:636_2: saṅkhādayopi nāmādīhi atthato avisiṭṭhā vuttāti āha “saṅkhādisaddānaṃ samānatthattā”ti.
tika-abh04t:636_3: Vacanaggahaṇaṃ vacanuccāraṇaṃ. Aññassāti nāmapaññattiṃ sandhāyāha. Tesanti saṅketaggahaṇavacanaggahaṇānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:636_4: Asamatthatā na sambhavatīti yojanā. Tameva asambhavaṃ “yadi hī”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-abh04t:636_5: Paññattiyāti nāmapaññattiyā. Paññattipaññāpaneti yāya nāmapaññattiyā upādāyapaññatti
tika-abh04t:636_6: rūpādayo ca paññāpīyanti, yā ca sotadvāraviññāṇasantānānantaramuppannena gahitapubbasaṅketena
tika-abh04t:636_7: manodvāraviññāṇasantānena gayhati, sā ayaṃ nāmāti tassā paññāpane asaṅkarato ṭhapane.
tika-abh04t:636_9: gāhāpane paricchindane. Tassā aññā paññatti vattabbā siyāti tassā nāmapaññattiyā
tika-abh04t:636_10: ñāpane saṅketaggahaṇavacanaggahaṇānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtā aññā nāmapaññatti atthīti
tika-abh04t:636_11: vattabbā anuññātabbā siyā. Tato atthavijānanameva na siyāti kevalāni saṅketaggahaṇavacanaggahaṇāni
tika-abh04t:636_12: atthapaññāpane viya paññattiñāpanepi asamatthāni, paññatti ca ñātāyeva tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:637_0: Saṅketo rūpādīsu na kiñci hoti, bhūtādinimittaṃ bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya vohariyamānā
tika-abh04t:637_1: kasiṇādipaññatti viya taṃ taṃ saṅketitabbaṃ saṅketakaraṇañca upādāya vohāramatto,
tika-abh04t:637_2: tassa ca paññāpikā nāmapaññattīti yathāvuttadosāpattiṃ dassento “nāpi saṅketaggahaṇa”nti
tika-abh04t:637_3: avoca. Nanu ca atthavijānanāsambhavacodaneneva saṅketaggahaṇābhavopi dassitoti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-abh04t:637_4: saṅkete pana ācariyānaṃ matibhedo vijjati. Tattha ekapakkhiko ayaṃ dosoti dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:637_5: tassa visuṃ vacanaṃ vuccamānā rūpādayo dhammāvacanatthā paññāpitabbā ca, tadabhidhāyako
tika-abh04t:637_6: saddo paññattīti. Ettāvatā sabbavohāro sijjhatīti adhippāyena “vacana…pe… janaṃ natthī”ti
tika-abh04t:637_7: āha. Paññattiyā vacanabhāvo siddho paṭihananasotabbatādīpakattā tesaṃ pāṭhānanti
tika-abh04t:637_8: adhippāyo. Ādi-saddena “atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇanti, niruttipaṭisambhidā
tika-abh04t:637_9: paccuppannārammaṇā”ti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tasmāti yasmā “paññattidhammā”ti padassa
tika-abh04t:637_10: yathāvuttapaññattiyo atthoti etasmiṃ pakkhe mātikāvaṇṇanāya virodho, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:637_11: avuttatā, imissā pāḷiyā ananugamo, sabbe dhammā paññattīti niddisitabbatā, paññattipathapadassa
tika-abh04t:637_12: navattabbatā, anavatthānāpattito atthavijānanāsambhavoti aneke dosā, viññattivikārasahitassa
tika-abh04t:637_13: pana saddassa paññattibhāve yathāvuttadosābhāvo anekesaṃ pāṭhappadesānañca anulomanaṃ,
tika-abh04t:637_14: tasmā. Tattha yuttaṃ gahetabbanti adhippāyenāha “pāḷi…pe… tabbo”ti.
tika-abh04t:638_0: Yadi sattātiādinā saddassa paññattibhāve aṭṭhakathāya virodhamāha. Evaṃ paññattibhāve
tika-abh04t:638_1: yadi saddassa paññattibhāvo, tassa paramatthato vijjamānattā rūpādiatthassa ca paññāpanato
tika-abh04t:638_2: vijjamānapaññattibhāvo eva siyā, na avijjamānapaññattibhāvo. Na hi te sattādayo paññattīti.
tika-abh04t:638_3: Evañca avijjamānapaññattiyā abhāvo eva siyā. Vuttā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “avijjamānapaññattī”ti.
tika-abh04t:638_4: Itaro visayassa avijjamānattā tassa avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti yathāvuttavirodhābhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:638_5: dassento “avijjamānāna”ntiādimāha. Idāni sattādivisayassa kenacipi pariyāyena atthitāya
tika-abh04t:638_8: vuccanti, na sabbathā abhāvato. Tathā hi tathā tathā paññāpiyamānabhāvena viññāyantīti
tika-abh04t:638_9: yathāvuttarūpo vādo “rūpaṃ atthīti? Hevatthi heva natthīti. Sevatthi seva natthīti.
tika-abh04t:638_10: Na hevaṃ vattabbe. Sevatthi seva natthīti. Āmantā. Atthaṭṭho natthaṭṭho”ti evaṃ pavattāya
tika-abh04t:638_11: hevatthikathāya. Tattha hi rūpādayo dhammā rūpādisabhāvena atthi, vedanādisabhāvena
tika-abh04t:638_12: natthi, tasmā sabbamevidaṃ evaṃ atthi evaṃ natthīti evaṃladdhike sandhāya “rūpaṃ
tika-abh04t:638_13: atthī”ti pucchā sakavādissa. “Hevatthi heva natthī”ti vissajjanaṃ paravādissa. Atha
tika-abh04t:638_14: naṃ sakavādī yadi rūpameva evaṃ atthi evaṃ natthīti laddhi, evaṃ sante so eva atthi
tika-abh04t:638_15: so eva natthi nāmāti pucchanto “sevatthī”ti āha. Itaro teneva sabhāvena atthitaṃ,
tika-abh04t:638_16: teneva natthitaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho sakabhāvena atthitaṃ, parabhāvena
tika-abh04t:638_17: natthitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tato sakavādī “atthaṭṭho natthaṭṭho”tiādinā atthitā
tika-abh04t:638_18: vā natthitā vā aññamaññaviruddhā ekasmiṃ dhamme vinā kālabhedena asambhavattāti kiṃ
tika-abh04t:638_19: ekattaṃ āpajjatīti dassento paravādiṃ niggaṇhātīti. Paṭisiddhoti ca “rūpaṃ ‘rūpa’nti
tika-abh04t:638_20: hevatthi, rūpaṃ ‘vedanā’ti heva natthī”tiādinā vuttāya rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ
tika-abh04t:638_21: sakabhāvena atthitāya parabhāvena natthitāya ca paṭisedhanena sattādīnampi tathābhāvo
tika-abh04t:639_0: Rūpādayo na hontīti rūpādisabhāvā na honti. Tathā tathāti samūhasantānādivasena.
tika-abh04t:639_1: Vicittasaññā parikappavasena uppajjati. Yadi sattarathādisaññāvalambito vacanattho
tika-abh04t:639_2: vijjamāno na hoti, nanu sattarathādiabhilāpā anariyavohārā jāyantīti āha “na ca te
tika-abh04t:639_3: abhilāpā”tiādi. Attano vasena kiñci ahontaṃ paññāpakassa vacanasseva vasena paññāpitabbattā
tika-abh04t:639_4: paññattivohāraṃ labhati. Imināva adhippāyenātiādi “sayaṃ avijjamāno”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-abh04t:639_5: sandhāyāha. Tanti sattādiggahaṇaṃ. “Brahmavihāracatukkaṃ sattapaññattiṃ ārabbha pavattattā
tika-abh04t:639_6: navattabbārammaṇaṃ nāma hotī”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tattha tattha na vattabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:639_7: Yadi parittādibhāvena na vattabbaṃ, kathaṃ avijjamānassa sattādikassa paccayabhāvoti
tika-abh04t:639_9: puggaloti gahaṇapaññattīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ. Yadi puggalasaññāya sevamānassa kusalādiuppatti
tika-abh04t:639_10: hoti, kathaṃ puggaladassanaṃ micchādassananti paṭisiddhanti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:639_11: Pathavīdhātu upalabbhatīti puggalābhāve vipakkhavasena nidassanamāha. Idañhettha
tika-abh04t:639_12: anumānaṃ. Na rūpādayo vivecetvā puggalo upalabbhati tesaṃ aggahaṇe tathārūpāya buddhiyā
tika-abh04t:639_13: abhāvato sevanādayo viyāti. Puggalo upalabbhati sacchikaṭṭhaparamatthena yo chaviññāṇaviññeyyoti
tika-abh04t:639_14: saṃsarati muccati cāti evaṃ diṭṭhiyā parikappitapuggalova paṭisedhito, na vohārapuggaloti
tika-abh04t:640_0: Gāthāya pañcasu khandhesu rūpaṃ vedanā saññā cetanā viññāṇanti etesu kaṃ nāma dhammaṃ
tika-abh04t:640_1: sattoti jānāsi nu, etesu ekampi sattoti gaṇhituṃ nārahatīti dasseti. Atha etehi añño
tika-abh04t:640_2: eko satto atthīti paccesi. Evampi māra diṭṭhigataṃ nu te. Nu-saddo diṭṭhigatameveti
tika-abh04t:640_3: avadhāraṇattho. Kasmā? Yasmā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjoyaṃ. Tamevatthaṃ vivarati “nayidha
tika-abh04t:640_4: sattūpalabbhatī”ti. Yasmā paccakkhato vā anumānato vā anupaladdhito natthi ettha
tika-abh04t:640_5: koci satto nāmāti adhippāyo. Yadi satto natthi, kathaṃ satto saṃsāramāpādītiādi nīyatīti.
tika-abh04t:640_6: Kimettha netabbaṃ, sattoti vohārasatto adhippeto, yasmā satta-saddo vohāre pavattatīti.
tika-abh04t:640_7: Dutiyagāthāya sambandhaṃ dassento “satto panā”tiādimāha. Aṅgasambhārāti aṅgasambhārato
tika-abh04t:641_0: Avijjamānassāti accantaṃ avijjamānassa sasavisāṇādikassa. Yadi accantaṃ avijjamānaṃ,
tika-abh04t:641_1: kathaṃ taṃ gayhatīti āha “parikappita”nti. Lokasaññātaṃ ghaṭādi. Ettha pana yathā
tika-abh04t:641_4: evaṃ attānaṃ ārabbha pavattanakadhammavasena uppādādirahitāpi paññatti pavattāti
tika-abh04t:641_5: vuttā. Hetuattho vā antonītoti pavattitā vohāritāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā nāmapaññatti
tika-abh04t:641_6: paññapetabbamatthaṃ gahitāyeva paññāpeti, viññatti viya adhippāyaṃ viññāpetīti sā
tika-abh04t:641_7: gahetabbābhāvato vuccamānatthadvārena vuccamānāti vuttā. Paññāpitabbapaññattiyā pana
tika-abh04t:641_8: vuccamānabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Tathā pakārato ñāpanabhāvena ñāpetabbañāpananti
tika-abh04t:641_9: katvā gahetabbattāyeva ca tassā aniddhāritasabhāvatā paṭikkhittā daṭṭhabbā. Na hi
tika-abh04t:641_10: sabhāvadhammānaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādi sarūpato saddena vacanīyabhāvaṃ bhajati, apica
tika-abh04t:641_11: kho nesaṃ kāladesādibhedabhinnānaṃ vinivattaaññajātiyako sajātiyasādhāraṇo pubbasaṅketānurūpaṃ
tika-abh04t:641_12: ajjhāropasiddho sāmaññākāro vacanīyo. Tatthāpi na vinā kenaci pavattinimittena saddo
tika-abh04t:641_13: pavattatīti tassa pavattinimittabhūto lokasaṅketasiddho taṃtaṃvacanatthaniyato sāmaññākāraviseso
tika-abh04t:641_14: nāma paññattīti pubbācariyā. So hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe saddaṃ nāmeti, tassa tassa
tika-abh04t:641_15: vā atthassa nāmasaññaṃ karotīti nāmaṃ, pakārehi ñāpanato paññatti cāti.
tika-abh04t:642_0: Kassa pana so ākāravisesoti? Paññāpetabbatthassāti veditabbaṃ. Anekākārā hi atthāti.
tika-abh04t:642_1: Evañca katvā tassā paññattiyā gahetabbatāvacanañca samatthitaṃ bhavati, avassañca
tika-abh04t:642_2: etamevaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Aññathā vacanavacanīyabhedānaṃ saṅkaro siyā, sabbopi
tika-abh04t:642_3: attho sabbassa saddassa vacanīyo, sabbo ca saddo sabbassa atthassa vācakoti na cettha
tika-abh04t:642_4: saṅketaggahaṇeneva tesaṃ pavattāti sakkā vattuṃ vavatthitesu eva tesu saṅketaggahaṇassa pavattito.
tika-abh04t:643_0: Apare pana “yathā dhūmato aggianumāne na kevalena dhūmeneva aggi viññāyati, dhūmassa
tika-abh04t:643_1: pana agginā avinābhāvasaṅkhāto sambandho viññāyamāno dhūmena aggi viññāyati, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:643_2: saddena atthavijānane na kevalena saddena tadattho viññāyati. Taṃtaṃsaddassa pana
tika-abh04t:643_3: tena tena atthena avinābhāvasaṅkhāto sambandho viññāyamāno tena tena saddena atthaṃ
tika-abh04t:643_4: ñāpetīti veditabbaṃ. Aññathā aggahitasambandhenapi saddasavanamattena tadattho viññāyeyyāti.
tika-abh04t:643_5: Yo yamettha yathāvuttarūpo sambandho, so tassa tassa atthassa saññāpanabhāvena nāmanti
tika-abh04t:643_6: paramatthato abhāvā lokasaṅketavasena lokasaṅketoti vā siddho ñātoti lokasaṅketasiddhoti,
tika-abh04t:643_7: saddena pakāsiyamānānaṃ atthappakārānaṃ adhigamahetutāya pakārato ñāpanato paññattīti
tika-abh04t:644_0: Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatavinimuttassapi ñeyyavisesassa abhāve ghaṭādisaddābhidheyyā viya pathavīphassādisaddavacanīyopi
tika-abh04t:644_1: na labbhatiyevāti sabbavohāralopo siyā. Yasmā ca rūpārūpadhammā pabandhasaṅkhātataṃtaṃvisesākāravaseneva
tika-abh04t:644_2: pavattanti, na kevalā, tasmā tesaṃ te saṇṭhānasamūhaavatthāvisesākārā yadipi paramatthato
tika-abh04t:644_3: kiñci na honti, paramatthato pana vijjamānānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ upādānānaṃ vasena vijjamānabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:644_4: labhitvā taṃtaṃgahaṇānurūpaṃ taṃtaṃabhilāpādhikaraṇaṃ bhavati. Upādāyapaññatti hi
tika-abh04t:644_5: upādānato yathā aññā anaññāti ca na vattabbā, evaṃ sabbathā atthi natthīti ca na
tika-abh04t:644_6: vattabbā. Tayopi hi ete santāyevāti evaṃ tāva mātikāvaṇṇanāya na koci virodho. Saṅkhāyati
tika-abh04t:644_7: saṃkathīyatīti saṅkhāti ayamattho kathetabbabhāvena vacanattheyeva niruḷho, na vacanasminti
tika-abh04t:644_8: vacanapakkhassa ujukatā sambhavati. Vacanapakkhoyeva pāḷianugato, na paramparāgato
tika-abh04t:644_9: yathāvutto atthoti kuto panetaṃ labbhā. Na hi anīto attho pāḷiananugato, nāpi sabbā
tika-abh04t:644_10: pāḷinītatthā evāti yathāvuttā duvidhā paññattiyo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ chahi paññattīhi yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-abh04t:645_0: Yadi paramatthato atthitāpaṭisedho, iṭṭhametaṃ. Atha vohārato, sattarathaghaṭādīhi
tika-abh04t:645_1: sattarathādivacanappayogoyeva na sambhaveyyāti. Na hi vacanīyarahito vacanappayogo
tika-abh04t:645_4: Na ca paññattipathapaññattidhammaniddesānaṃ avisesavacanaṃ yuttaṃ, saddasseva pana
tika-abh04t:645_5: paññattibhāve siyā kāci tesaṃ visesamattā. Paññāpitabbassa aparamatthasabhāvasseva
tika-abh04t:645_6: paññattibhāvo adhippetoti na sabbo paññattipatho paññattisaddena vutto, paññatti
tika-abh04t:645_7: ca paññāpetabbabhāvena vuttāti paññattipathapadaṃ vattabbameva. Evañcetaṃ icchitabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:645_8: Itarathā saddassa ca paññāpitabbatāya paññattipathabhāvoti paññattipadaṃ na vattabbaṃ
tika-abh04t:645_9: siyāti ca sakkā vattuṃ, nikkhepakaṇḍe vibhattāyeva paññatti “puriso māgaṇḍiyo”ti
tika-abh04t:645_10: etthāpi dassitāti na na sakkā vattuṃ. Tathāpi hi yathāvuttaupādāyapaññattināmapaññattīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:645_11: sabhāvasambhavatoti saṅkhādisaddānaṃ samānatthatāpi tesaṃ matimattameva, viññatti
tika-abh04t:645_12: viya adhippāyaṃ viññāpentā sayaṃ ñātāyeva nāmapaññatti paññāpetabbamatthaṃ paññāpeti
tika-abh04t:645_13: gahitasarūpatāya padīpo viya rūpagatavidhaṃsaneti na paññattiantaraparikappanena
tika-abh04t:645_14: payojanaṃ atthi paññāpetabbatthapaññāpane, nāmapaññattipaññāpane pana upādānabhedabhinnā
tika-abh04t:645_15: upādāyapaññatti viya taṃtaṃvacanavacanatthabhedabhinnā nāmapaññattīti aññā paññatti
tika-abh04t:645_16: icchitā eva. Na ca anavatthānadoso taṃtaṃvacanassa tadatthavibhāvane sahakārīkāraṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t:645_17: paṭiniyatasarūpattā. Etena saṅketaggahaṇābhāvopi paṭisiddho daṭṭhabbo, tathā nāmapaññattiyā
tika-abh04t:646_0: “Vohāro lokiyasote paṭihaññatī”tiādīsu sotabbassa saddassa vasena tabbisayabhūtā
tika-abh04t:646_1: vohārādayo paṭihananasotabbatāpariyāyena vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Saddoyeva vā tattha vohārādisahacāritāya
tika-abh04t:646_2: tathā vutto. Na hi sakkā sabbattha ekarasā desanā pavattīti vattuṃ. Tathā hi katthaci
tika-abh04t:646_3: sukhā dukkhā, sukhāpi vedanā dukkhāti vuccanti, dukkhā sukhā, dukkhāpi sukhāti, evaṃ
tika-abh04t:646_4: yathāvuttā duvidhāpi paññatti adhivacanādipāṭhassa atthabhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttāyevāti.
tika-abh04t:646_5: Ayaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatavinimuttaṃ ñeyyavisesaṃ icchantānaṃ vasena vinicchayo.
tika-abh04t:647_0: 1316. Satipi paresaṃ sāmaññādināmakārakānaṃ nāmakaraṇabhāve parānapekkhatāya tato
tika-abh04t:647_1: ativiya yutto idha nāmakaraṇasabhāvo ukkaṃsaparicchedena nāmakaraṇatthoti adhippetoti
tika-abh04t:647_2: dassetuṃ “aññaṃ anapekkhitvā”tiādimāha. Nāmakaraṇasabhāvatā na hoti asabhāvikatāya
tika-abh04t:647_3: kadācideva pavattito cāti adhippāyo. Sabhāvasiddhattāti vedanādīnaṃ vedanādināmakaraṇadhammataṃ
tika-abh04t:647_4: āha. Yadi vedanādīnaṃ kenaci akataṃ sakanāmaṃ ādāyayeva pavattanato opapātikanāmānaṃ
tika-abh04t:647_5: nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena nāmabhāvo, evaṃ sati pathavīādīnampi nāmabhāvo āpajjati, aññathā
tika-abh04t:647_6: pathavīādinidassanameva na siyāti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “pathavīādinidassanenā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:647_7: Ekadesasāmaññena hi yathādhippetena upamā hoti, na sabbasāmaññenāti. Evampi yadi
tika-abh04t:647_8: sabhāvasiddhanāmattā vedanādayo nāmaṃ, pathavīādīnampi anivattanīyo nāmabhāvoti āha
tika-abh04t:647_9: “niruḷhattā”tiādi. Tena yaṃnimittaṃ vedanādīsu nāmasaddappavatti, satipi tadaññesaṃ
tika-abh04t:647_10: taṃnimittayoge go-saddo viya kukkuṭādisattapiṇḍe niruḷhato vedanādīsu nāma-saddo
tika-abh04t:647_11: pavattoti dasseti. Tathā hi anekesu suttapadesesu tesaṃyeva nāmavohāro dissati. Nāmatānāpatti
tika-abh04t:647_14: gahaṇaṃ pavattati, taṃ pana yebhuyyena atthātiparikappamukhena ekadhammavaseneva,
tika-abh04t:648_1: So nāmamantarena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pākaṭoti nidassanabhāvena vutto. “Adhivacanasamphasso
tika-abh04t:648_2: viyā”ti vacanena manosamphassatappakārānameva nāmabhāvo siyā, na paṭighasamphassatappakārānanti
tika-abh04t:648_4: phasso paṭighasamphasso. Pi-saddo sambhāvane. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – visayīvisayasaṅghaṭṭanasamuppattiyā
tika-abh04t:648_5: aññaphassato oḷārikopi paṭighasamphasso na rūpadhammā viya vibhūtākāro, tato nāmāyattagahaṇiyabhāvo
tika-abh04t:648_6: nāmassevāti. Arūpatāya vātiādinā sāmaññato visesato ca paṭighasamphassassa upacāravasena
tika-abh04t:648_7: nāmabhāvamāha. Pacchimapurimānanti “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti imaṃ anupubbiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:648_8: Satipi rūpassātiādinā nāmavohārahetuṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ nibbānassa adhipatipaccayabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:648_9: eva vibhāveti, yato ariyānaṃ aññavisayavinissaṭaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena asaṅkhatadhātuyaṃ
tika-abh04t:649: 1318. Vaṭṭasmiṃ ādīnavapaṭicchādanato tadassādanābhinandanato ca vaṭṭassa mūlaṃ padhānakāraṇanti vaṭṭamūlaṃ.
tika-abh04t:650_0: 1320. Ekekasmiṃ rūpādike yathābhiniviṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ ahaṃmānādhāranimittataṃ kusalākusalatabbipākalokādhāratañca
tika-abh04t:650_1: samāropetvā pavattaggahaṇaviseso. Yā kāci diṭṭhi nivisamānā dhammasabhāvaṃ aticcaparāmasanākāreneva
tika-abh04t:653_2: hi vuttanti. Kāraṇajānanena phalaṃ suṭṭhu ñātaṃ hotīti taṃ dassetuṃ “āpattiyā vā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:658_1: hetūti cakkhudvārikassa abhijjhādianvāssavanassa taṃdvārikaviññāṇassa viya cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-abh04t:658_2: padhānakāraṇaṃ. Sati hi asaṃvutatte cakkhundriyassa te te anvāssavantīti asaṃvariyamānacakkhundriyahetuko
tika-abh04t:658_3: so asaṃvaro tathāvuttoti aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyaṃ dasseti. Idāni yathāvutte adhippāye
tika-abh04t:658_4: ṭhatvā “yatvādhikaraṇanti hī”tiādinā pāḷiyā yojanaṃ dasseti. Kassa cāti pakāraṃ pucchati,
tika-abh04t:658_5: kathaṃvidhassa kathaṃsaṇṭhitassāti attho. Na hi sarūpe vutte puna sarūpapucchāya
tika-abh04t:658_6: payojanaṃ atthi. Anvāssavanti abhijjhādayo. Tadupalakkhitanti anvāssavūpalakkhitaṃ
tika-abh04t:659_0: Yathāsambhavanti dussīlyāsaṃvaro manodvāravasena, sesāsaṃvaro chadvāravasena yojetabbo.
tika-abh04t:659_1: Muṭṭhassaccādīnaṃ satipaṭipakkhākusaladhammādibhāvato siyā pañcadvāre uppatti, na
tika-abh04t:659_2: tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ
tika-abh04t:659_3: aviññattijanakattāti tameva yathāsambhavaṃ “na hi pañcadvāre”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-abh04t:660_0: Yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro “cakkhundriye asaṃvaro”ti vuccati,
tika-abh04t:660_1: taṃ nidassanaṃ kinti attho. Tatthāyaṃ pavattikkamo – pañcadvāre rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate
tika-abh04t:660_2: niyamitādivasena kusalākusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe manodvārikajavanaṃ
tika-abh04t:660_3: taṃyevārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre “itthipuriso”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:660_4: vavatthapetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Puna vāre pasādarajjanādivasena javanaṃ
tika-abh04t:660_5: javati. Puna yadi taṃ ārammaṇaṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchati, taṃsadisameva pañcadvārādīsu javanaṃ
tika-abh04t:660_6: tadā uppajjamānakaṃ sandhāya “evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare
tika-abh04t:660_7: sati dvārampi agutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ pana ukkaṭṭhanayo paricitārammaṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh04t:660_8: vutto, aparicite antarantarā pañcadvāre uppajjitvā tadanurūpaṃ manodvārepi uppajjatīti.
tika-abh04t:661_0: Sati dvārabhavaṅgādiketi paccayabhāvena purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi
tika-abh04t:661_1: cakkhādi viya phalanipphattiyā santaññeva nāmāti vuttaṃ. Na hi dharamānaṃyeva santanti
tika-abh04t:661_2: vuccatīti. Bāhiraṃ viya katvāti paramatthato javanassa bāhirabhāve itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve
tika-abh04t:661_3: asatipi “pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”ntiādivacanato
tika-abh04t:661_4: āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo tabbidhurasabhāvassa
tika-abh04t:661_5: itarassa abbhantarabhāvo pariyāyato vuttoti dasseti. Asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattitoti dvārādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:661_6: asaṃvarahetubhāvāpajjanassa pākaṭabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha. Uppanne hi asaṃvare dvārādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:661_7: tassa hetubhāvo paññāyatīti. Dvārabhavaṅgādimūsananti dvārabhavaṅgādīsu mūsanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:661_8: Yasmiñhi dvāre asaṃvaro uppajjati, so tattha dvārādīnaṃ saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ upacchindantoyeva
tika-abh04t:662_0: Ettha ca “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādipāḷiyaṃ saṃvaro, saṃvaritabbaṃ, saṃvaraṇupāyo,
tika-abh04t:662_1: yato ca so saṃvaro, yattha ca so saṃvaroti imaṃ pabhedaṃ dassetvā yojetabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh04t:662_2: “Rakkhati…pe… saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti etena saṃvaro vutto. Satiṃ paccuṭṭhapetīti ayañhettha
tika-abh04t:662_3: atthoti. Cakkhādi saṃvaritabbaṃ. Na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhīti saṃvaraṇupāyo.
tika-abh04t:662_5: duvidhopi indriyasaṃvaro? Tattha purimena visayesu ādīnavadassanaṃ, itarena ādīnavappahānaṃ.
tika-abh04t:662_6: Tathā purimena pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ, itarena anusayappahānaṃ. Tathā purimo lokiyamaggasaṅgahito,
tika-abh04t:663_0: 1353. Davatthādiabhilāsoti davo eva attho payojananti davattho, so ādi yesaṃ te davatthādayo.
tika-abh04t:663_1: Tesu, tesaṃ vā abhilāso, davo vā attho etassāti davattho, tadādiko davatthādi, ko
tika-abh04t:663_2: pana soti āha “abhilāso”ti. Āhāraparibhoge asantussanāti āhāraparibhoge atitti. Bahuno
tika-abh04t:663_3: uḷārassa ca patthanāvasena pavattā bhiyyokamyatā asantussanāti evamettha attho yujjati.
tika-abh04t:664_0: 1355. Majjanākārena pavatti mānassevāti katvā “mānova mānamado”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi
tika-abh04t:664_1: jātimadādayo “māno maññanā”tiādinā mānabhāveneva vibhattāti. Khudā nāma kammajatejo.
tika-abh04t:664_2: Taṃ pana abhutte bhutte ca uppajjatīti yaṃ tattha āmāsayasaṅkhātassa sarīradesassa
tika-abh04t:664_3: pīḷanato vihiṃsāsaddavacanīyaṃ, tadeva dassetabbaṃ, itarañca nivattetabbanti abhuttapaccayā
tika-abh04t:664_4: uppajjanakattena khudā visesitāti āha “khudāya visesana”nti. Ye pana “kammajatejapaccayā
tika-abh04t:664_5: dukkhā vedanā khudā”ti vadanti, tesaṃ abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakāti visesanameva na
tika-abh04t:664_6: yujjati. Satipi tasmiṃ bhūtatthakathane vihiṃsūparatipurāṇavedanāpaṭihananānaṃ visesābhāvo
tika-abh04t:664_7: āpajjatīti purimoyevettha attho. Etāsaṃ ko visesoti abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā,
tika-abh04t:664_8: bhuttapaccayā na uppajjanakavedanāti dvepi cetā vedanā yāvatā anāgatāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:664_9: Satipi anāgatatte purimā uppannasadisī, itarā pana ataṃsadisī accantaṃ anuppannāvāti
tika-abh04t:664_10: ayamettha viseso. Teneva “yathāpavattā”ti purimāyaṃ vuttaṃ, itarattha ca “appavattā”ti.
tika-abh04t:664_11: Atha vā abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā pubbe katakammassa vipākattā purāṇavedanā
tika-abh04t:664_13: na uppajjissatīti bhuttapaccayā na uppajjanakavedanā navavedanā nāma. Vihiṃsānimittatā vihiṃsānibbattatā.
tika-abh04t:665_0: Yāpenti etenāti yāpanāti vuttassa sarīrayāpanakāraṇassa jīvitindriyassapiyāpanakāraṇanti
tika-abh04t:665_1: imassa visesassadassanatthaṃ “jīvitindriyayāpanatthāyā”ti vatvā na kevalaṃ jīvitindriyasseva
tika-abh04t:665_3: yāpanakāraṇanti taṃdīpanatthaṃ yātrāti vacananti yāpanā me bhavissatīti avisesena
tika-abh04t:665_4: vuttanti dassento “catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanā yātrā”ti āha.
tika-abh04t:665_6: Yenāti gaṇabhojanalakkhaṇappattassa thūpīkatādikassa vā paṭiggahaṇena. Sāvajjaṃ sanindaṃ
tika-abh04t:666_0: Iriyā…pe… vuttanti sukhaṃ pavattamānehi iriyāpathehi tesaṃ tathāpavattiyā kāraṇanti
tika-abh04t:666_2: iriyāpathakattukāni viya vuttānīti attho. Yathā hi “paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā
tika-abh04t:666_3: hontī”ti dassanassa khayahetutā, “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ bhavati, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ
tika-abh04t:666_4: bhavatī”ti ca pānadassanānaṃ balabhayahetutā vuccati, evaṃ bhuñjanapivanānaṃ iriyāpathasukhappavattihetubhāvo
tika-abh04t:666_5: vuttoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sulabhānavajjabhāvo viya appabhāvopi paccayānaṃ
tika-abh04t:666_7: pavattāhi anantaragāthāhi idhāpi dhammasenāpatinā sukhavihārāya pariyatto appabhāvukkaṃso
tika-abh04t:667: 1368. Satiādidhammāti satipaññāsamādhivīriyasammāvācādidhammā, ye chahi dukehi pariggahitā.
tika-abh04t:668: 1373. Paṭivijjhitabbehi paṭivedho vutto. Visayenapi hi visayī vuccati sahacarabhāvato. Yathā –
tika-abh04t:672_0: Yathā dukkhādīnaṃ pariññādivasena pavattamānaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ asammohato te avilometvā
tika-abh04t:672_1: avirodhetvā pavattati nāma, evaṃ tadupanissayabhāvaṃ vipassanāñāṇampi yathābalaṃ
tika-abh04t:672_2: te avilometvā pavattatīti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ anulomanti vuttanti dutiyo atthavikappo
tika-abh04t:672_3: vutto. Ettha ca “catunnaṃ saccāna”nti padaṃ vinā upacārena vuttaṃ, purimasmiṃ upacārenāti
tika-abh04t:672_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammādiṭṭhippadhānattā vā sesamaggaṅgānaṃ maggasaccekadesassa paṭivedhassa
tika-abh04t:672_5: anulomaṃ samudāyānulomaṃ vuttaṃ, catusaccekadesassa maggassa vā.
tika-abh04t:673: 1380. Khayasamayeti khayasamūhe. “Kilesānaṃ khayavasena pavattadhammapuñje”ti ca vadanti.
tika-abh04t:674: 1381. Aparibandhabhāvena nirāsaṅkā, ārammaṇe abhiratibhāvena ca pavatti adhimuccanaṭṭhoti āha “ani…pe… ttanaṭṭhenā”ti.
tika-abh04t:675_1: khayapariyosāne pavattattā “khīṇante ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ maggānantaraṃ
tika-abh04t:675_2: uppajjati, tasmā maggena ṭhānaso khīṇesu kilesesu tesaṃ khīṇabhāvānantaraṃ pavattamānaṃ
tika-abh04t:675_3: khīṇabhāvānaṃ paṭhamakāle pavattantipi vuccatīti dutiyo vikappo vutto.
tika-abh04t:680_0: 1384. Nayagamananti nīyati, neti, nīyanti vā etenāti nayo, gammati etenāti gamanaṃ,
tika-abh04t:680_1: nayova, nayassa vā gamanaṃ nayagamanaṃ. Gati eva vā gamanaṃ. Paṭhamena ādi-saddena
tika-abh04t:680_4: ekamūlādippakārā ca. Ettha atthesu nicchitesūti etasmiṃ aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe cittuppādavasena
tika-abh04t:680_5: bhūmantaravisesayogato sabbesaṃ mātikāpadānaṃ atthesu saṅkhepato vavatthāpitesu.
tika-abh04t:681_0: Pañhuddhārantiādīsu “siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:681_1: kusalapadaṃ ādiṃ katvā kusalākusalābyākatantā tisso kusalādikā, kusalābyākataakusalābyākatakusalākusalantā
tika-abh04t:681_2: tisso, kusalākusalābyākatantā ekāti kusalādikā satta pucchā, tathā akusalādikā, abyākatādikā,
tika-abh04t:681_4: sattannaṃ sattakānaṃ vasena dhammānulome kusalattikaṃ nissāya hetupaccaye ekūnapaññāsa
tika-abh04t:681_5: pucchā, tathā sesapaccayesu sesatikesu dhammapaccanīyādīsu ca. Taṃ sandhāya “ekūnapaññāsāya
tika-abh04t:681_6: ekūnapaññāsāyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Siyā hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetudhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:681_7: “hetuṃ paṭicca hetu, hetuṃ paṭicca nahetu, hetuṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca. Nahetuṃ
tika-abh04t:681_8: paṭicca nahetu, nahetuṃ paṭicca hetu, nahetuṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca. Hetuñca
tika-abh04t:681_9: nahetuñca paṭicca hetu, hetuñca nahetuñca paṭicca nahetu, hetuñca nahetuñca paṭicca
tika-abh04t:681_10: hetu ca nahetu cā”ti ekekasmiṃ duke hetupaccayādīsu ekamekasmiṃ paccaye nava nava
tika-abh04t:681_11: pucchā honti. Tā sandhāya “navasu navasu pañhesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:682_0: Labbhamānassāti kusalattike tāva paṭiccavāre hetupaccaye “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
tika-abh04t:682_1: kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”tiādinā
tika-abh04t:682_2: kusalena kusalaṃ, kusalena abyākataṃ, kusalena kusalābyākataṃ, akusalena akusalaṃ,
tika-abh04t:682_3: akusalena abyākataṃ, akusalena akusalābyākataṃ, abyākatena abyākataṃ, kusalābyākatena
tika-abh04t:682_4: abyākataṃ, akusalābyākatena abyākatanti navannaṃ navannaṃ pañhānaṃ atthato sambhavantassa
tika-abh04t:682_5: pañhassa vissajjanavasena uddharaṇaṃ, tathā sesapaccayavārattikādīsu. Tesuyevāti
tika-abh04t:682_6: yathāvuttesu eva pañhesu atthasambhavato yathāvibhattānaṃ pañhavissajjanānaṃ “hetuyā
tika-abh04t:682_7: navā”tiādinā gaṇanāṭhapanaṃ. Pasaṭe dhammeti yathā heṭṭhā kaṇḍadvaye “yasmiṃ samaye
tika-abh04t:682_8: kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ citta”ntiādinā vippakiṇṇe muttapupphe viya phassādayo dhamme.
tika-abh04t:683_1: āraddhā, evaṃ sante idha kasmā kusalattikaniddeso vuttoti āha “yadipi kusalattikavitthāro”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:683_2: Dhammavisesanabhāvatoti “dhammā”ti padassa padhānabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ato hi tadabhidheyyā
tika-abh04t:683_3: pucchitabbā jātā. Viññātāhīti bhūmīnaṃ visesanalakkhaṇayogamāha. Ettha padhānanti
tika-abh04t:683_4: kiñcāpi uddese kusalapadena dhammā visesitabbā, “catūsu bhūmīsu kusala”nti imasmiṃ
tika-abh04t:683_5: pana niddese bhūmīhi visesitabbattā kusalapadaṃ padhānanti visesanabhāvena vacanicchāya
tika-abh04t:683_6: abhāvato satipi visesitabbadhammānaṃ kāmāvacarādiphassādibhede tadanapekkhaṃ anavajjasukhavipākatāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh04t:683_7: attano kusalākārameva gahetvā pavattamānattā “ekattameva upādāya pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:683_8: Sabbepi hi kusalā dhammā anavajjasukhavipākatāya ekasabhāvāyevāti.
tika-abh04t:684_0: 1385. Yathāyogaṃ yojetabbanti catūhi bhūmīhi ādhārabhūtāhi visesetvā samayaphassādibhedaṃ
tika-abh04t:684_1: anāmasitvā vipākabhāvena ekattaṃ netvā “catūsu bhūmīsu vipāko”ti vuttanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:685_0: Uppajjati etthāti uppādo, cetasikā. Te hi cittassa sabbathāpi nissayādipaccayabhāvato
tika-abh04t:685_1: ettha ca uppattiyā ādhārabhāvena apekkhitā. Yathā ca cetasikā cittassa, evaṃ cittampi
tika-abh04t:685_2: cetasikānaṃ nissayādipaccayabhāvato ādhārabhāvena vattabbataṃ arahatīti yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh04t:685_3: uppādasaddābhidheyyataṃ na vinivattati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “cittuppādo”ti ettha uppādassa
tika-abh04t:685_4: visesanabhāvena pavattamānampi cittaṃ attani yathāvuttauppādaatthasambhavato apariccattavisesitabbabhāvameva
tika-abh04t:685_5: hutvā tassa visesanabhāvaṃ paṭipajjatīti. Yadāha “avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇavasena
tika-abh04t:685_6: attho sambhavatī”ti. Cittasamānagatikassa idha cittaggahaṇena gahetabbatāya “dvepañcaviññāṇānī”ti
tika-abh04t:685_7: nidassanena vakkhamānattā “citta…pe… gahaṇaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha aññassāti rūpassa.
tika-abh04t:686_2: kammānurūpaṃ pavattamāno vipāko parittakammavipākatāya parittārammaṇeyeva pavattitumarahati,
tika-abh04t:686_3: na mahaggatappamāṇārammaṇeti adhippāyo. Samādhippadhānassapi kassaci kammassa appanāappattassa
tika-abh04t:686_5: aggahetvā lokasaññānurodheneva gahite pathavādike parikammasaññāya samuppāditattā
tika-abh04t:686_6: paṭibhāganimittasaṅkhātaṃ saññāvasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assāti saññāvasārammaṇaṃ. Tādisenevāti
tika-abh04t:686_7: samādhippadhānatāya appanāppattīhi viya saññāvasārammaṇatāya ca nibbiseseneva. Sopīti
tika-abh04t:686_8: pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tenetaṃ dasseti “attano kammassa samānabhūmikadhammārammaṇatāya
tika-abh04t:686_9: viya tassa ārammaṇārammaṇatāyapi vipāko kammānurūpoyeva nāma hotī”ti.
tika-abh04t:687_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā mahaggatappamāṇārammaṇassa parittakammassa vipāko tadārammaṇārammaṇo
tika-abh04t:687_1: na hotīti? Appanāppattakammavipākassa viya tassa kammārammaṇārammaṇatāya niyamābhāvato
tika-abh04t:687_2: kammānurūpatāya ca anekarūpattā. Yathā attano kammasadisassa mahaggatajavanassa parittārammaṇassapi
tika-abh04t:687_3: tadārammaṇaṃ nānubandhakaṃ paricayābhāvato, evaṃ attano kammassa nimittabhūtepi tassa
tika-abh04t:687_4: sahakārīkāraṇāhi apariyādinne mahaggatappamāṇe ārammaṇe paricayābhāvato parittavipāko
tika-abh04t:687_5: na pavattati, kammanimittārammaṇo pana jāyamāno paritteneva tena hotīti āha “paṭisandhiādibhūto”tiādi.
tika-abh04t:687_6: Yasmā panātiādinā pāḷiyāva yathāvuttamatthaṃ nicchinoti. Nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayo
tika-abh04t:687_7: hi ettha adhippeto paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ bhinnārammaṇatāya vuttattā. Na cātiādinā
tika-abh04t:687_8: parittavipākā eva idha paccayuppannabhāvena vuttāti dasseti. Idhāti imasmiṃ atthuddhārakaṇḍe.
tika-abh04t:688_1: vuttaṃ. Avītarāgānaṃ aparittepi katthaci ārammaṇe siyā cetaso uppilāvitattanti “kilesavirahe”ti
tika-abh04t:688_3: eva-saddo tameva nivattetabbaṃ visesaṃ dasseti, nāññathā. Kosajjādīti ādi-saddena
tika-abh04t:688_4: dosādayo saṅgaṇhāti. Ādarākaraṇaṃ nirussukkatā evāti ādaraṃ karontā nirussukkabhāveneva
tika-abh04t:688_5: na honti, na pana ādaraṃ na karontiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekacce pana “akammaññasarīratāya
tika-abh04t:688_6: aññavihitatāya ca khīṇāsavānaṃ asakkaccadānādipavatti na anādaravasenā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh04t:689_0: 1421. Atipaguṇānanti subhāvitānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ vasippattānaṃ. Evaṃ paguṇajjhānesupi
tika-abh04t:689_1: pavatti hoti tattha vicāraṇussāhassa mandabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Pubbe dassitanti “tīṇi
tika-abh04t:689_2: lakkhaṇānīti ahanti vā”tiādinā pubbe dassitaṃ. “Avijjamāno aparamatthabhāvato, vijjamāno
tika-abh04t:689_3: ca lokasaṅketasiddhiyā sammutisaccabhāvato attho arīyati cittena gammati ñāyatī”ti
tika-abh04t:689_4: ācariyā vadanti. Yato tabbisayā cittuppādā navattabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti navattabbārammaṇāti
tika-abh04t:689_5: aññapadatthasamāsavasena vuccanti. Ayaṃ pana vādo hevatthikavādo viya hotīti tassa
tika-abh04t:689_6: accantaṃ avijjamānataṃ maññanto ito ca aññathā avijjamānapaññattiṃ dassetuṃ “sammutisacce
tika-abh04t:689_7: panā”tiādimāha. Kathaṃ pana tassa accantamavijjamānatte tabbisayānaṃ dhammānaṃ pavatti
tika-abh04t:689_8: navattabbārammaṇabhāvo cāti āha “avijjamānampī”tiādi. Parittādiārammaṇāti na vattabbāti
tika-abh04t:689_9: vuttāti parittādayo viya tassa visuṃ vavatthitabhāvaṃ nisedheti.
tika-abh04t:690_0: Vikkhipanaṃ nānārammaṇesu cittassa pavattanaṃ. Anavaṭṭhānaṃ ekasmiṃyeva pavattituṃ
tika-abh04t:691_0: Sabbatthapādakanti nipphādetabbe, payojane vā bhummaṃ “cetaso avūpasame”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh04t:691_1: Tena sabbesu vipassanādīsu nipphādetabbesūti attho. Tenevāha “sabbesū”tiādi. Atītaṃsañāṇassa
tika-abh04t:691_2: kāmāvacarattā iddhividhādīsu tassa aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassa pana atītasattadivasato
tika-abh04t:691_3: heṭṭhā yāva paccuppannapaṭisandhi, tāva visayoti vadanti. Atītasattadivasesupi khandhapaṭibaddhānaṃ
tika-abh04t:692_0: Pādakajjhānacittaṃ parikammehi gahetvāti pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “idaṃ
tika-abh04t:692_1: cittaṃ viya ayaṃ kāyo sīghagamano hotū”ti pubbabhāgaparikammehi rūpakāyassa viya
tika-abh04t:692_2: pādakajjhānacittassapi gahetabbataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ pavattatīti
tika-abh04t:692_3: veditabbaṃ. Adhippetaṭṭhānapāpuṇanatthaṃ gantukāmataṃ purakkhatvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-abh04t:692_4: vuṭṭhāya “idaṃ cittaṃ viya ayaṃ kāyo sīghagamano hotū”ti karajakāyārammaṇaṃ parikammaṃ
tika-abh04t:692_5: katvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā vuṭṭhāya pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna bhavaṅge otiṇṇe
tika-abh04t:692_6: manodvārāvajjanaṃ rūpakāyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati anulomāni ca. Tato adhiṭṭhānacittampi
tika-abh04t:692_7: tamevārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati. Tassānubhāvena yathādhippetaṭṭhānaṃ gatoyeva hoti.
tika-abh04t:692_8: Evaṃ adissamānena kāyena gacchanto panāyaṃ kiṃ tassa adhiṭṭhānacittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh04t:692_9: gacchati, udāhu ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe vāti? Tīsu khaṇesu gacchatīti icchanti.
tika-abh04t:692_10: Citteti pādakajjhānacitte. Samodahatīti cittānugatikaṃ cittaṃ viya sīghagamanaṃ karotīti
tika-abh04t:692_11: attho. Yathā hi cittaṃ icchitakkhaṇe atidūrepi visayaṃ ārabbha pavattati, evaṃ rūpakāyassapi
tika-abh04t:692_12: lahuparivattibhāvāpādanaṃ cittavasena kāyapariṇāmanaṃ. Na cettha rūpadhammānaṃ dandhaparivattibhāvato
tika-abh04t:692_13: ekacittakkhaṇena desantaruppatti na yujjatīti vattabbā adhiṭṭhānacittena rūpakāyassa
tika-abh04t:692_14: lahuparivattibhāvassa āpāditattā. Tenevāha “cittavasena kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca
tika-abh04t:692_15: lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchatī”ti. Acinteyyo hi
tika-abh04t:693_0: Cittasantānaṃ rūpakāye samodahitanti yattakehi cittehi dissamānena kāyena yathādhippetaṭṭhānappatti,
tika-abh04t:693_1: tattakānaṃ cittānaṃ pabandhassa dandhagamanakaraṇato imassa adhiṭṭhānassa karajakāye
tika-abh04t:693_2: āropitaṃ tadanuguṇanti attho. Idampi adhiṭṭhānapādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
tika-abh04t:693_3: “ayaṃ kāyo viya idaṃ cittaṃ dandhagamanaṃ hotū”ti samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitajjhānacittārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:693_4: parikammaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-abh04t:693_5: puna bhavaṅge otiṇṇe manodvārāvajjanaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati anulomāni
tika-abh04t:693_6: ca. Tato adhiṭṭhānacittampi tamevārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati. Tassānubhāvena antarā
tika-abh04t:693_7: pañcaviññāṇādīsu uppannesupi apatanto icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. Evaṃ gacchanto ca
tika-abh04t:693_8: sace icchati, pathavīkasiṇavasena ākāse maggaṃ nimminitvā padasā gacchati. Sace icchati,
tika-abh04t:693_9: vāyokasiṇavasena vāyuṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā tūlapicu viya vāyunā gacchati. Apica gantukāmatāva
tika-abh04t:693_10: ettha pamāṇaṃ. Sati hi gantukāmatāya evaṃ katādhiṭṭhāno adhiṭṭhānavegakkhittoveso
tika-abh04t:693_11: issāsapakkhitto saro viya dissamāno gacchatīti. Tattha ākāse maggaṃ nimminitvā gacchanto
tika-abh04t:693_12: vināpi abhiññāñāṇena pakatipathaviyaṃ viya gacchati. Teneva “padasā gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:693_14: Ubhayatthāpi antarā vanarāmaṇīyakādīni pekkhamāno āpāthagate sadde ca suṇamāno gacchatīti
tika-abh04t:693_15: vadanti. Keci pana “adissamānena kāyena ekacittakkhaṇeneva icchitaṭṭhānagamane dissamānena
tika-abh04t:693_16: kāyena padasā vāyunā ca gamane abhiññācittasamuṭṭhitakāyaviññattivipphārena gamana”nti
tika-abh04t:694_2: sukhasaññālahusaññāsabbhāvato, tabbhāvaṃ āpajjanatoti attho. Sukhasaññāti cettha
tika-abh04t:694_3: upekkhāsampayuttā saññā. Upekkhā hi “santaṃ sukha”nti vuttā. Sāyeva ca saññā nīvaraṇehi
tika-abh04t:694_4: ceva vitakkādīhi paccanīkehi ca vimuttattā “lahusaññā”tipi veditabbā. Tāhi samokkantāhi
tika-abh04t:694_5: rūpakāyopi tūlapicu viya sallahuko hoti. So evaṃ vātakkhittatūlapicunā viya sallahukena
tika-abh04t:694_6: ekacittakkhaṇena adissamānena ca kāyena yathāruci gacchatīti.
tika-abh04t:695: “Mutto vatamhi tāya anatthasaṃhitāya dukkarakārikāya, sādhu vatamhi sammāsambodhiṃ sambujjha”nti pavattaṃ bhagavato cetoparivitakkamaññāya māro “amuttabhāvamassa karissāmī”ti,
tika-abh04t:698_0: Āhāti evamādiṃ sandhāya “mārādīnampi bhagavato cittajānanaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Nibbānapaccavekkhaṇañca
tika-abh04t:698_1: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena nibbānā…pe… ñātesu pavattatīti sambandho. Nibbānā…pe… ñātesūti
tika-abh04t:698_2: idaṃ abhiññāñāṇassa parato pavattamānaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ abhiññāñāṇassa visaye viya
tika-abh04t:698_3: abhiññāñāṇavisayavisayepi kadāci pavattituṃ arahatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Appamāṇārammaṇatanti
tika-abh04t:698_4: appamāṇakhandhārammaṇatanti attho. Tasmāti yasmā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa nibbānārammaṇabhāvadīpako
tika-abh04t:698_5: koci pāṭho natthi, tasmā. Paccavekkhaṇakicce vuccamāneti ruḷhiṃ aggahetvā maggādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:698_6: atītānaṃ pati pati avekkhanaṃ anussaraṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
tika-abh04t:698_7: kiccaṃyeva paccavekkhaṇanti vuccamāneti attho. Anuññātāti dissatīti “maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇato”ti
tika-abh04t:698_8: idameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena nibbānārammaṇe
tika-abh04t:698_9: khandhe disvā “ime dhammā kiṃ nu kho ārabbha pavattā”ti āvajjentassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:699_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā parittattike “appamāṇo dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
tika-abh04t:699_3: bahiddhādhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅgesu
tika-abh04t:699_5: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ nibbānanti. Cetopariyaiddhividhādiñāṇehi
tika-abh04t:699_6: saha vuttattāti ce, evampi visuṃ vibhajitabbaṃ siyā. Na hi visuṃ vibhajanārahaṃ saha
tika-abh04t:699_7: vibhajatīti? Na, avacanassa aññakāraṇattā. Yāni hi puthujjanānaṃ pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsañāṇāni,
tika-abh04t:699_8: tesaṃ avisayo eva nibbānaṃ. Ariyānaṃ pana maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇehi sacchikatanibbānānaṃ
tika-abh04t:699_9: imehi ñāṇehi paccakkhakaraṇe payojanaṃ natthīti sādhāraṇena iddhividhañāṇādīnaṃ gahitattā
tika-abh04t:699_10: nibbānaṃ na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nibbattakkhandhajānanamāha, na nibbattakakkhandhajānanaṃ.
tika-abh04t:699_11: Yathākammūpagañāṇakiccañhi tanti. Attho sambhavatīti idaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassapi anibbānārammaṇataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t:700_0: 1429. Maggārammaṇattike yasmā cittuppādakaṇḍe bodhitesu cittuppādesu ekantato maggārammaṇāyeva
tika-abh04t:700_1: keci natthi, maggārammaṇāyeva pana kadāci maggādhipatino honti, tasmā “katame dhammā
tika-abh04t:700_2: maggārammaṇā”ti ekameva pucchaṃ katvā tayopi koṭṭhāsā labbhamānavasena vibhattā.
tika-abh04t:700_3: Iminā nayena paratopi evarūpesu ṭhānesu attho veditabbo. “Cittuppādā”ti, “maggārammaṇā”ti
tika-abh04t:700_4: ca vuttadhammānaṃyeva maggahetukattābhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ “asahajātattā”ti idaṃ hetuvacananti
tika-abh04t:700_6: evā”ti avadhāraṇassa aggahitattā garuṃ akatvā maggārammaṇakālepi maggādhipatibhāvena
tika-abh04t:700_7: na vattabbāti ayampi attho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pariggahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Garuṃ katvā
tika-abh04t:700_8: paccavekkhaṇakāle”ti hi vuttattā garuṃ akatvā paccavekkhaṇakālepi atthi eva. Tadā
tika-abh04t:700_9: ca maggādhipatibhāvena na vattabbā te dhammāti bhiyyopi siddhovāyamattho.
tika-abh04t:701_0: 1434. Atītārammaṇāvāti uddhaṭaṃ, “atītārammaṇā”ti pana aṭṭhakathāpāṭho bahūsu potthakesu
tika-abh04t:701_2: tāta, tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyati, cittaṃ pasādehī’ti vatvā”tiādinā pañcadvāre
tika-abh04t:701_3: rūpādiārammaṇūpasaṃharaṇaṃ tattha tadārammaṇapariyosānānaṃ cuddasannaṃ cittānaṃ pavattiñca
tika-abh04t:701_4: vatvā tasmiṃyeva ekacittakkhaṇaṭṭhitike ārammaṇe paṭisandhicittaṃ uppajjatīti paccuppannārammaṇabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:701_5: paṭisandhiyā vakkhati, tasmāti attho. Dve bhavaṅgāni āvajjanaṃ maraṇassāsannabhāvena
tika-abh04t:701_6: mandībhūtavegattā pañca javanāni dve tadārammaṇāni cuticittanti ekādasa cittakkhaṇā
tika-abh04t:701_8: Idāni tameva “itaratthā”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “yadā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t:701_9: Cutiyā tadārammaṇarahitattā paṭisandhiyā ca paccuppannārammaṇattā “rūpā…pe… jjantassā”ti
tika-abh04t:701_10: udāhaṭaṃ. Cha bhavaṅgāni paccuppannārammaṇāni honti, nava cittakkhaṇā atītāti sattacittakkhaṇāvasiṭṭhāyuke
tika-abh04t:702: Vijjamānameva kāyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti etena sukhalahusaññokkamanena paccuppannasseva bhūtupādāyarūpasaṅghātassa lahuparivattibhāvāpādanaṃ, na bhāvinoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t:703_0: Etthantareti apākaṭakālato paṭṭhāya yāva pākaṭakālo, etasmiṃ antare. Yasmā pana kassaci
tika-abh04t:703_1: kiñci sīghaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, kassaci dandhaṃ, tasmā “ekadvesantativārā”ti aniyametvā
tika-abh04t:703_2: vuttaṃ. “Vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vutta”nti eke, keci pana “etthantare pavattā rūpadhammā
tika-abh04t:703_3: arūpadhammā ca paccuppannāti gahite eko santativāro hoti, taṃ pana dvidhā vibhajitvā
tika-abh04t:703_4: apākaṭakālaṃ ādiṃ katvā yebhuyyena pākaṭakālato orabhāvo eko koṭṭhāso yebhuyyena
tika-abh04t:703_5: pākaṭakālaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva supākaṭakālo ekoti ete dve santativārā. Iminā nayena
tika-abh04t:703_6: sesasantativārabhedāpi veditabbā. Tattha kālavasena sabbesaṃ samānabhāvaṃ aggahetvā
tika-abh04t:703_7: dhammānaṃ sadisappavattivasena santatiparicchedo dīpitabbo”ti vadanti. Kiñci kiñci
tika-abh04t:703_8: kālaṃ sadisaṃ pavattamānāpi hi utucittādisamuṭṭhānā rūpadhammā santativārāti vuccanti.
tika-abh04t:703_10: saṅgahitāyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratīti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi ākaḍḍhanīyaṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-abh04t:703_11: vuttaṃ. “Yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā”ti visayivisayabhūtā ekabhavabhūtā ca ekasantatipariyāpannā
tika-abh04t:703_12: dhammā vibhāgaṃ akatvā gayhamānā addhāpaccuppannaṃ hoti, sati pana vibhāgakaraṇe
tika-abh04t:703_13: khaṇasantatipaccuppannatā labbhatīti āha “addhāpaccuppannaṃ hontaṃ etaṃ ubhayaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh04t:704_0: Tassāti mahājanassa. Atītādivibhāgaṃ akatvāti āvajjanādīnaṃ samānākārappavattiyā
tika-abh04t:704_1: upāyaṃ dasseti. Siddhaṃ hotīti khaṇapaccuppannārammaṇattepi parikammacetopariyañāṇānaṃ
tika-abh04t:704_2: ayaṃ pāḷi suṭṭhu nītā hotīti attho. Atītattiko ca evaṃ abhinno hotīti evaṃ khaṇapaccuppanneyeva
tika-abh04t:704_3: dhamme idha paccuppannoti gayhamāne aññapadasaṅgahitasseva anantarapaccayabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t:704_4: pakāsento atītattiko ca paṭṭhāne abhedato sammā atthassa uddhaṭattā avināsito hoti.
tika-abh04t:704_5: Atha vā atītattikoti paṭṭhāne atītattikapāḷi, imāya atītattikapāḷiyā yathāvuttakāraṇatoyeva
tika-abh04t:704_6: abhinno avisiṭṭho aññadatthu saṃsandati sametīti attho.
tika-abh04t:705_1: anāgatapaccuppannātītārammaṇatāti yojetabbaṃ. Nānārammaṇatā na siyā addhāvasena paccuppannārammaṇattāti
tika-abh04t:705_2: adhippāyo. Ayañca attho ekissā javanavīthiyā ekasmiṃyeva citte pavattiyaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t:705_3: anāgatādiārammaṇatā sambhavatīti sambhavadassanavasena vuttoti yathādhippetassa abhiññācittassa
tika-abh04t:705_5: dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo, anāgatārammaṇo dhammo
tika-abh04t:705_6: anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa, paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa
tika-abh04t:705_7: āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti padantarasaṅgahitadhammānapekkhā dhammā tīṇi pañhavissajjanānīti
tika-abh04t:705_8: attho. Anāsevanaṃ natthīti āsevanalābhe sati yathādhammasāsane avacanassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:705_9: natthīti avacanena tattha itaresaṃ pañhānaṃ paṭisedho viññāyatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t:706_1: siddha”nti vādassa. Nissayabhāvoti atthasambhavato yathāvuttanayassa jotakabhāvo.
tika-abh04t:706_3: Ettha ca kālavisesaṃ āmasati, anāgatāyeva ca āvajjanā pavattatīti nayidaṃ yujjamānakaṃ.
tika-abh04t:706_4: Atha “yaṃ imassa cittaṃ bhavissati, taṃ jānāmī”ti ābhogaṃ karoti, evaṃ sati parikammābhiññācittānampi
tika-abh04t:706_6: sijjhatīti āha “pavatti…pe… vuttattā”ti. Dosāpattiyāti dosāpajjanena, dosāpattito
tika-abh04t:706_9: abhidhammamātikāyaṃ āgatapaccuppannapadassa natthīti adhippāye ṭhatvā nānujāneyyuṃ.
tika-abh04t:706_10: Ettha ca satipi sabhāvabhede ākārabhedābhāvato ekattanayavasena āvajjanaparikammābhiññācittānaṃ
tika-abh04t:706_12: adhippāyavibhāvanamukhena dassitā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sabhāvabhede sati nānārammaṇatādosābhāvo
tika-abh04t:706_13: natthi evāti ekasmiṃ eva citte addhāsantativasena paccuppannārammaṇatā vibhāvitā”ti
tika-abh04t:706_14: dvīsupi vādesu yaṃ yuttaṃ, taṃ vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:707_0: Tenevāti yasmā atītattike uppannattike ca cetopariyañāṇassa vattamānadhammārammaṇabhāvajotano
tika-abh04t:707_1: pāṭho na dissati, teneva kāraṇena. Dvīsu ñāṇesūti pubbenivāsacetopariyañāṇesu. Kammamukhena
tika-abh04t:707_2: gayhantīti satipi ārammaṇabhāve cattāro khandhā yathākammūpagañāṇena kammadvārena
tika-abh04t:707_3: kusalākusalā icceva gayhanti, na pana vibhāgasoti dasseti. Lobhādisampayogavisesena
tika-abh04t:707_4: duccaritabhāvo, alobhādisampayogavisesena ca sucaritabhāvo lakkhīyatīti duccaritasucaritāni
tika-abh04t:707_5: vibhāventaṃ lobhādayopi vibhāvetiyeva nāma hotīti āha “duccarita…pe… bhāvanaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh04t:708_1: ajjhattapariyāyo, na pana sabhāvadhammassa asattasantāneva tassāti vuttaṃ “sabhāva…pe…
tika-abh04t:708_2: ahonta”nti. Tathā hi “attano khandhādīni paccavekkhantassā”ti ettha “ajjhattārammaṇā”ti
tika-abh04t:708_3: padassa atthavivaraṇavasena “ajjhattaṃ gayhamānaṃ ahanti paññattiṃ ādi-saddena gaṇhātī”ti
tika-abh04t:708_4: vakkhati. Yadi evaṃ tassa ajjhattattikepi ajjhattabhāvo vattabbo siyā? Na, bahiddhābhāvassa
tika-abh04t:708_5: viya ajjhattabhāvassapi ajjhattattike nippariyāyavasena adhippetattāti. Yadāha “asabhā…pe…
tika-abh04t:708_6: na vutta”nti. Ākiñcaññāyatanādīti ādi-saddena sāvajjanāni tassa purecārikaupacāracittāni
tika-abh04t:709_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ taṃ-saddena ākaḍḍhitvā vadati, na pana taṃ sabbanti vuttaṃ, yañca
tika-abh04t:709_1: tassa purecārikanti attho. Lesavacananti ekadesasāruppena samānārammaṇabhāvena ekadesasseva
tika-abh04t:709_2: vacanaṃ. Lissati silissati ekadesena allīyatīti hi leso. Yesanti kāmāvacarakusalākusalamahākiriyāvajjanacittānaṃ
tika-abh04t:709_4: yesaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttatā vuttā, tesu ekameva upekkhāsahagataniddesaṃ
tika-abh04t:709_5: vatvā itaraṃ na vattabbaṃ siyāti attho. Ādi-saddena hetusampayuttakāmāvacarādiniddese
tika-abh04t:709_6: saṅgaṇhāti. Tatthāpi hi parittasahetukādibhāvena vuttesu dhammesu ekameva vatvā itaraṃ
tika-abh04t:709_7: na vattabbaṃ siyāti. Abhāvanāniṭṭhappavattiyāti abhāvanāniṭṭhappavattiyā abhāvanākārassa
tika-abh04t:709_8: ukkaṃsappavattiyāti attho, abhāvassa vā ukkaṃsappavattiyā. Navattabbaṃ jātaṃ ajjhattārammaṇādibhāvenāti
tika-abh04t:709_9: adhippāyo. Tānīti ākiñcaññāyatanena samānārammaṇāni āvajjanādīni. Yadi evaṃ “abhāvanāsāmaññe”ti
tika-abh04t:709_10: kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi ākiñcaññāyatanārammaṇassa paccavekkhaṇaassādanādivasena pavattacittānaṃ
tika-abh04t:709_11: abhāvanākārena pavatti atthīti? Na, abhāvetabbatāya adhippetattā. Na bhāvīyatīti
tika-abh04t:710_1: sabhāvato avijjamānesu visayesu yebhuyyena mahaggatā dhammā pavattanti, bahiddhākāraggahaṇavasena
tika-abh04t:710_2: pana kasiṇādīnaṃ bahiddhābhāvoti tadārammaṇadhammā bahiddhārammaṇāti vuttaṃ. Kasiṇānañhi
tika-abh04t:710_3: santānaṃ muñcitvā upaṭṭhānaṃ visesato vaḍḍhitakasiṇavasena viññāyati, paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvassa
tika-abh04t:710_4: pana na bahiddhākāro, nāpi ajjhattākāroti ubhayākāravidhure tasmiṃ anaññasādhāraṇena
tika-abh04t:710_5: pavattiyākārena pavattamānaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanameva navattabbārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, na itare
tika-abh04t:712_0: Asabhāvadhammattepi bahiddhākārena gahaṇīyabhāvato kasiṇānaṃ bahiddhābhāvo viya ekantato
tika-abh04t:712_1: idha ajjhattadhammupādānatāya ahanti paññattiyā siyā ajjhattabhāvoti vuttaṃ “ajjhatta”ntiādi.
tika-abh04t:712_2: “Khandhādīti ādi-saddena dhātuāyatanādi saṅgayhatī”ti ca vadanti. Esa nayoti “arūpakkhandhe
tika-abh04t:712_3: khandhāti gahetvā”tiādikaṃ vaṇṇanānītiṃ āha. Paresaṃ khandhādiggahaṇeti paresaṃ khandhādīti
tika-abh04t:712_4: imassa padassa kathane uccāraṇe. Sabbaṃ upādāpaññattiṃ āha ādisaddenāti sambandho.
tika-abh04t:715_0: 1473. Aññathāti vuttappakārassa dassane. Vuttappakārassa dassanato eva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh04t:715_1: sasaṅkhārikānaṃ thinamiddhavirahe asaṅkhārikasadisī yojanā na dassitā. Bhavarāgādīsūti
tika-abh04t:716_1: uddhaccāvijjānīvaraṇāni. Dve vā tīṇi vāti pāḷiyaṃ vā-saddassa luttaniddiṭṭhataṃ āha.
tika-abh04t:716_2: Atha vā nipātasaddasannidhānepi nāmapadādīhi eva samuccayādiattho vuccati, na nipātapadehi
tika-abh04t:716_3: tesaṃ avācakattāti antarenapi nipātapadaṃ ayamattho labbhati. Tathā vacanicchāya
tika-abh04t:716_4: sambhavo eva hettha pamāṇanti pāḷiyaṃ “dve tīṇī”ti vuttaṃ. Yattha sahuppattītiādinā
tika-abh04t:716_5: “dve tīṇī”ti lakkhaṇavacananti sabbasādhāraṇamatthamāha. Tathā hi “evañca katvā kilesagocchake
tika-abh04t:716_6: cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tassāyamadhippāyo – kilesadvayasahitasseva cittuppādassa abhāvepi pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh04t:716_7: dviggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, kilesānañca sambhavantānaṃ sabbesaṃ sarūpena gahaṇaṃ na katanti
tika-abh04t:717_0: Yadi sabbākusale uppajjanakassapi uddhaccassa eko eva cittuppādo visayabhāvena vuccati,
tika-abh04t:717_1: avijjānīvaraṇassapi tathā vattabbanti adhippāyena “kasmā vutta”ntiādinā codeti. Itaro
tika-abh04t:717_2: uddhaccanīvaraṇasseva tathā vattabbataṃ avijjānīvaraṇassa tathā vattabbatābhāvañca
tika-abh04t:717_3: dassetuṃ “suttante”tiādimāha. Tattha suttante vuttesu pañcasu nīvaraṇesūti uddhaccasahagate
tika-abh04t:717_4: uddhaccassa avijjānīvaraṇena nīvaraṇasahitataṃ āsaṅkitvā vuttaṃ. Nanu ca suttantepi
tika-abh04t:717_6: paṭipakkhabhāvena pana suttante bahulaṃ kāmacchandādayo pañceva nīvaraṇāni vuttānīti
tika-abh04t:718_0: Keci pana “yathā nikkhepakaṇḍe kusalapaṭipakkhabhūtāni dubbalānipi nīvaraṇāni paṭṭhāne
tika-abh04t:718_1: viya dassitāni. Tathā hi paṭṭhāne ‘nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati
tika-abh04t:718_2: na purejātapaccayā. Arūpe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇa’ntiādi
tika-abh04t:718_3: vuttaṃ, na evaṃ aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe. Aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe pana jhānapaṭipakkhabhūtāniyeva
tika-abh04t:718_5: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana uddhaccanīvaraṇassa kāmacchandādīhi ekato uppattidassanaṃ
tika-abh04t:718_6: nikkhepakaṇḍānusārena kataṃ ekato uppattiyā pabhedadassanatthaṃ. Tattha hi pāḷiyaṃyeva
tika-abh04t:718_7: tāni vitthārato vuttānī”ti vadanti. Ayañca vādo “uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccasahagate
tika-abh04t:718_8: cittuppāde uppajjatī”ti idameva vacanaṃ ñāpakanti katvā vutto. Aññathā avijjānīvaraṇaṃ
tika-abh04t:718_9: viya vattabbaṃ siyā. Na ti ito aññaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapaṭṭhāyīniyeva nīvaraṇāni atthuddhārakaṇḍe
tika-abh04t:718_10: adhippetānīti imassa atthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ atthi, idaṃ vacanaṃ dvetīṇivacanassa
tika-abh04t:718_12: payojanantarena vuttabhāvassa dassitattā ca ñāpakaṃ na bhavatīti dissati, tasmā vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t:719: Aggahetvāti yathārutavaseneva atthaṃ aggahetvā yathā nikkhepakaṇḍapaṭṭhānādīhi na imissā pāḷiyā virodho hoti, evaṃ adhippāyo gavesitabboti yathāvuttamevatthaṃ nigameti.
tika-abh04t:720_0: 1577. Tesanti lobhādito aññesaṃ. Dassitāti kathaṃ dassitā? Māno tāva lobhamohauddhaccaahirikānottappehi,
tika-abh04t:721_0: Yathā ca uddhaccaṃ, evaṃ ahirikānottappāni ca yojetvā veditabbāni. Kathaṃ? Ahirikaṃ
tika-abh04t:721_4: mohauddhaccānottappehi ca ekato uppajjati. Anottappaṃ lobhamohadiṭṭhiuddhaccāhirikehi,
tika-abh04t:721_8: ca ekato uppajjatīti evamettha mānādīnampi ekato uppatti veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
